Title: More than 100 enemy missiles were shot down - the work of our air defense in repelling a record-brea...
Description: This was announced on November 17 by the Air Force of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. In general, according to preliminary data, the radio engineering troops of the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine identified and escorted 210 enemy air targets: 120 missiles and 90 UAVs. By type, the Russians used the following weapons: — 1 hypersonic cruise missile 3M22 -Zircon-; — 8 Kh-47M2 -dagger- aeroballistic missiles; — 101 Kh-101 cruise missiles, -caliber-; — 1 Iskander-M ballistic missile; – 4 Kh-22/Kh-31P cruise/anti-radiation missiles; – 5 Kh-59/Kh-69 guided air missiles; – 90 attack UAVs/drones of an unspecified type. The enemy involved 7 Tu-160 and 16 Tu-95MS strategic bombers, 2 Tu-22M3 long-range bombers, 5 Su-34 fighter-bombers, 4 Su-27 fighters, 10 MiG-31K fighters, 4 cruise missile carriers for the air attack. . During the night, all available forces and means of air defense worked along the tracking route of missiles and drones. Aviation, anti-aircraft missile units, EW devices and mobile fire groups of the Air Force and the Defense Forces of Ukraine were involved. According to preliminary data, as of 12:00 p.m., there is information about the downing of 144 air targets — 102 missiles and 42 unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs): – 1 3M22 -Zircon- hypersonic ship missile; – 7 Kh-47M2 -dagger- aeroballistic missiles; – 85 Kh-101 -Caliber- cruise missiles; – 4 Kh-22/Kh-31P cruise/anti-radio missiles; – 5 Kh-59/69 guided air missiles; – 42 attack UAVs/drones of an unspecified type (from Kursk, Orel, Primorsko-Akhtarsk regions - Russian Federation). As a result of active countermeasures by the Defense Forces, 41 enemy UAVs were lost in location in different regions of Ukraine, two more UAVs flew towards Russia and the temporarily occupied territory. Anti-aircraft defense worked in almost all regions of Ukraine — in Kyiv, Cherkasy, Kirovohrad, Chernihiv, Sumy, Kharkiv, Poltava, Odesa, Mykolaiv, Zaporizhia, Dnipropetrovsk, Zhytomyr, Vinnytsia, Khmelnytskyi, Ternopil, Ivano-Frankivsk, Rivne, Volyn and Lviv regions. As reported by ArmyInform, about massive strike Russian said President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyi.

Title: Injured teenager and rescued dog: Odesa recovers from Russian attack
Description: This was informed Oleg Kiper, the head of Odesa OVA. There are interruptions in the supply of heat, water and electricity in the region. Emergency power outages are applied as directed by Ukrenergo. Hospitals and other critical infrastructure facilities operate with the help of generators. All authorized services are working to repair the damage. At the moment, specialists are taking all possible measures to restore heat and water supply within a few hours. Energy workers are continuously working to eliminate the consequences of shelling. On the morning of the 10th, 445 points were deployed in the region. Another 357 will be opened additionally if necessary. In addition, as a result of the shelling, fires broke out in three private houses, four more houses were partially destroyed. Also, two people died from the Russian attack. A 17-year-old boy was also injured. Currently, doctors are providing him with all the necessary assistance. A psychologist from the State Emergency Service provided assistance to local residents. Rescuers also found a lost dog and handed it over to its owners. As reported by ArmyInform, on the night of November 17 Russian troops carried out a massive combined attack on all regions of Ukraine, using about 120 missiles of various types, including -Zirkon-, -Iskander-, -Kinjal-, as well as about 90 drones, including -Shaheed-. The enemy's target was the country's energy infrastructure.

Title: A minimum of 20 tickets to the kobzon - in the South HIMARS - tickets - Russian attack aircraft
Description: The video of the damage was published on the Internet. The occupiers gathered in a forest strip near the settlement of Tavriya, Vasylivsky District, Zaporizhzhia. And it was there that the HIMARS missiles arrived, which provided funeral payments to at least 20 Russian families. Our gunners did not stop there and accompanied the attempts of the remnants of the invaders to escape with a cluster munition strike. Be sure to watch the video to the end:   As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the Black Forest artillery reconnaissance brigade were able to track down the 39N6 -Kasta-2E2- long-range detection radar and impress her.

Title: 14 countries are financing the mine action project in Ukraine
Description: reports this by the Main Directorate of Mine Action, Civil Defense and Environmental Security. The event was attended by representatives of the Secretariat of the National Mine Action Authority, the Mine Action Center, the Ministry of Economy of Ukraine, other authorities and international donors. According to the Permanent Representative of UNDP in Ukraine Yako Silje, this year the main focus was on supporting the development of the National Mine Action Strategy for 2024-2033, as well as its operational plan for 2024-2026. Within the scope of the project, the following was carried out: The head of the mine countermeasures department, Colonel Oleg Shuvarskyi, thanked UNDP and donors for their contribution to the reduction of the territories of Ukraine potentially contaminated by explosive objects by 35,000. km². Project financing is provided by the governments of 14 countries: Belgium, Denmark, Spain, Luxembourg, Malta, the Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, the Republic of Korea, Great Britain, France, Croatia, Switzerland and Sweden. At the meeting, work was also started on the Work Plan of the -Mine Protection Activity in Ukraine- project for 2025. As reported by ArmiyaInform, the Ministry of Defense presented a study of environmental consequences use of new types of weapons.

Title: 25 million dollars turned into dust: footage of the liquidation of the Tor-M2 air defense system
Description: informs about this by the Command of the Unmanned Systems Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Operators of the 412th separate battalion of unmanned systems -Nemesis- discovered and hit the Tor-M2 air defense system. The drones were able to successfully defeat the Russian tactical air defense system. -These complexes are an important element of enemy air defense, and their cost reaching about $25 million per unit. We are systematically weakening the enemy's air defense in key areas,- the department noted. As reported by ArmyInform, as of the morning of November 17 for a day at the front, the Russian invaders lost 1,640 people killed and wounded.

Title: Without water and heat: the occupiers are unable to restore utility networks
Description: This was reported by Artem Lysogor, head of the Luhansk OVA. According to him, centralized water supply was recently disconnected in the occupied cities, in particular in Perevalsk, Bryantsk, Kadiivtka and Alchevsk. The occupiers promised to complete the repair work in a week, but they could not even replace the necessary part of the water pipe. Of the 14 km of pipe that has not been repaired for more than ten years, only 2.7 km have been replaced, and the repair will not be completed before the end of the year. A similar situation is also observed in Severodonetsk, where work has begun on the heating main in the old districts, but the streets are still open, and the heat in the multi-storey buildings is not supplied for the third winter in a row. Local residents are forced to endure the absence of basic public services, which should have been restored a year ago. As reported by ArmyInform, part of the territory of the so-called -LNR-, where it is allowed to use the Internet, will be cut off from foreign content.

Title: Nikopol region was covered with artillery fire: there are victims
Description: reported this by the head of Dnipropetrovsk OVA Serhiy Lysak. Two people died in Nikopol due to enemy shelling. They are a 58-year-old man and a 62-year-old woman. Condolences to relatives. Five local residents were injured. Three women aged 67, 72 and 57. Two men aged 40 and 32 were also injured. Everyone receives the necessary medical care. A transport company, several private houses, farm buildings, cars were damaged. As ArmiyaInform reported, Russian troops attacked the Dnipro on November 17, as a result of which a 42-year-old man was injured. He received shrapnel wounds and is currently receiving the necessary medical help.

Title: The Armed Forces eliminated almost 12,000 occupiers this week
Description: This was reported by the Commander of the Ground Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, Lieutenant General Oleksandr Pavliuk. At the same time, Russian equipment and weapons also suffered significant losses: In addition, our defenders destroyed 7 enemy missiles and 355 UAVs (not including combat work on November 17, 2024). These results confirm the effectiveness of the defense and the efforts of the Armed Forces of Ukraine to weaken the Russian forces. As reported by ArmyInform, The defense forces damaged -another important object of the enemy-.

Title: As a result of the Russian attack on the garage cooperative in the Lviv region, there are victims am...
Description: informs the State Emergency Service of Ukraine about this. A fire broke out in the garage cooperative on an area of ​​100 square meters as a result of the impact of fragments of an enemy missile. The fire destroyed several garages. As a result of the shelling, one person was killed, two others were injured of varying degrees of severity. The fire has already been extinguished. 15 rescuers and 3 units of equipment were involved in the work. Rescue services continue to work at the scene to eliminate all the consequences of the shelling. As reported by ArmiyaInform, a massive attack by Russia: 120 missiles and 90 drones attacked Ukraine.

Title: In a week, sappers removed more than 1,200 explosive items
Description: reports this by the Main Directorate of Mine Action, Civil Defense and Environmental Security. During the last week from November 8 to 15, 2024, the following were inspected and cleared: The work is carried out with the involvement of special equipment for mechanized demining. During the week of work, 1,268 GNPs were removed and neutralized. As reported by ArmyInform, The Ministry of Defense presented a study of the environmental consequences of the use of new types of weapons.

Title: Two men were injured in the attacks on the critical infrastructure of Zaporozhye
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of Zaporizhzhya OVA. According to specified data, two people were injured as a result of the shelling. A 59-year-old man was hospitalized and is currently receiving the necessary medical care. The 18-year-old young man, after being examined by doctors, refused hospitalization. The situation at the scene is being clarified, emergency services continue to work. As reported by ArmyInform, during the day the occupiers inflicted 392 strikes on 11 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region. A 41-year-old man was injured as a result of Russian attacks in the Vasyliv district.

Title: Russia's massive strike: 120 missiles and 90 drones attacked Ukraine
Description: reported this President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy, noting that Ukrainian air defense forces destroyed more than 140 air targets, including missiles and drones. In Mykolaiv, as a result of a drone attack, two people were killed, six more were injured, including two children. All the necessary services are working to eliminate the consequences of the shelling and to restore the power supply, since there are areas without electricity in the city. The President thanked the Ukrainian air defense forces, in particular, the anti-aircraft missile forces, aviation, mobile fire groups and EW for the effective repulse of the attack and reliable protection. As reported by ArmyInform, massive strikes on Mykolaiv: among the injured are children, two women died.

Title: Five-hour alarm: details of the combined attack on Kyiv
Description: reported this by Serhii Popko, head of the Kyiv City Military Administration. Various types of weapons were used for the attack, including Kh-101/55 cruise missiles from Tu-95MS strategic aircraft, Kinzhal aeroballistic missiles from MiG-31K, Iskander-M ballistic missiles, Zircon and Kalibr missiles, and also attack drones. Massive shelling covered almost the entire territory of Ukraine, including Kyiv, where an air alert was declared twice and lasted for about 5 hours. In the capital, as a result of shelling, a five-story residential building was damaged in the Pechersk district, and in Holosiivsk and Dniprovsk districts, debris was recorded falling on open terrain and non-residential buildings. According to the report, one person suffered a fatal head wound and was hospitalized. The condition of the victim is stable. As ArmyInform reported, in the Pechersk district of Kyiv as a result fall of rocket fragments, a fire broke out on the roof of a five-story residential building.

Title: Miracles on the border: law enforcement officers healed lameness and resurrected relatives
Description: About this informs the State Border Service of Ukraine. Molodyk claimed that he came to Transcarpathia to visit the graves of his relatives, and for the sake of believability he took an artificial bouquet of flowers. To avoid attracting attention, he also used a crutch and pretended to be lame. The border guards paid attention to the man at the bus station in Veliky Berezny, and later followed his actions. It turned out that the man bypassed the local cemetery and was heading towards the border. During the inspection, the Kyivan could not explain where exactly his relatives are buried, and later admitted his intention to enter Slovakia illegally. He also explained that the crutch was only part of his disguise. The offender was taken to the border unit, where administrative and procedural documents were filed against him. Now he will be responsible before the court for violating the border regime and attempting to illegally cross the state border. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting Centers .

Title: Shrapnel injuries and destruction in the Dnipro after a missile strike
Description: This was notified by the head of Dnipropetrovsk OVA Serhiy Lysak. Several high-rise buildings, an educational institution and a car were damaged during the shelling. There was also a lot of noise in Kryvorizhzhia, in particular in the Samarivsky district and Kamiansky, where several fires broke out. In the evening and at night, the aggressor attacked Nikopol region. One of the villages of the Marganets community came under fire from artillery and a combat drone. Fortunately, there were no casualties as a result of these attacks. The circumstances of the incident are being clarified, and emergency services are on the scene. As reported by ArmyInform, a series of airstrikes in Kharkiv Oblast: in OVA they talked about the consequences.

Title: A series of airstrikes in the Kharkiv region: the OVA spoke about the consequences
Description: reported this by Oleg Synegubov, the head of the Kharkiv Regional Military Administration. Around 03:10, the occupiers carried out an airstrike using two KAB air bombs on an open area near the villages of Odnorobivka and Kovali. At 03:00 a shelling with the use of anti-tank missiles damaged the glazing and roof of a private house in the village of Cherkaska Lozova, Malodanylivska hromada. At 02:00, five houses and one car were damaged in the Rohan village of the Rohan community as a result of the Shahed kamikaze drone attack. At 10:35 p.m., Russian aviation struck an open area near the village of Udy, Zolochiv community with an anti-aircraft missile. Around 3:35 p.m., the enemy launched four airstrikes on the outskirts of the villages of Kostyantynivka, Stognia, Odnorobivka, and Timofiivka in the Zolochiv community. At 12:00 p.m., shelling damaged a private house in the village of Osynovo, Kupyansk community. Three people were injured: two women aged 62 and 66 and a 75-year-old man. Also, 28 people were evacuated from the Kupyansk and Borivsk directions during the day. We will remind you that the enemy hit a village in the Kupyan region from an aircraft: three people were injured. As reported by ArmyInform, during the day the occupiers inflicted 392 strikes on 11 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region. A 41-year-old man was injured as a result of Russian attacks in the Vasyliv district.

Title: The defense forces damaged -another important object of the enemy-
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. However, our soldiers inflict significant losses on the occupying forces in manpower, equipment and actively undermine the offensive potential of the enemy in the rear. Over the past day, aviation, missile forces and artillery of the Defense Forces hit seven areas of concentration of personnel, weapons and military equipment and one more important object of the enemy. As reported by ArmyInform, our soldiers stopped 133 enemy attempts to move deep into the territory of Ukraine. We will remind, last day of the loss of the Russian invaders made 1640 persons. Also, Ukrainian soldiers destroyed 12 tanks, 27 armored combat vehicles, 36 artillery systems, 60 UAVs of the operational-tactical level, 85 cars and 2 units of special equipment of the occupiers.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, fortitude, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , decree: to start holding a national minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, which will be announced in all mass media regardless of ownership,- the document says.

Title: Volunteers of the Ukrainian Legion took the Military Oath in Poland
Description: About this informs the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. It is noted that taking the oath is one of the most important and solemn events in the life of a serviceman. -For legion volunteers, this moment is special, because their decision to defend Ukraine is conscious and decisive. The unit is formed from highly motivated soldiers for whom the protection of the Motherland from the aggressor is a matter of honor,- emphasized the representative of the legion command Petro Horkusha. Soldiers have now begun an intensive course of training that includes fire training (including elements of CQB - Close-quarters battle), tactical medicine, mine safety, topography and other necessary disciplines. It should be noted that training is conducted by experienced Polish instructors.

Title: Russian troops shelled the Kherson region: there are wounded and infrastructure damage
Description: This was reported by the head of the Kherson Regional Military Administration Oleksandr Prokudin. In particular, Chornobayivka, Komyshany, Stanislav, Sadove, Antonivka, Ingulets, Stepanivka, Beryslav, Kachkarivka, Tyaginka, Osokorivka, Olhivka and Kherson came under Russian attack. The Russian military targeted a critical infrastructure facility and an educational institution, and also shelled residential areas. As a result of the attacks, a high-rise building, 9 private houses, a garage and several cars were damaged. Due to the aggression of the Russian Federation, 7 people were injured and are being provided with the necessary medical assistance. As reported by ArmyInform, massive strikes on Mykolaiv: among the injured are children, one woman died.

Title: Our soldiers stopped 133 enemy attempts to advance deep into the territory of Ukraine
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. In addition, he fired more than 4,500 shots, 88 of them from rocket salvo fire systems. The aggressor carried out airstrikes, in particular, in the areas of Mazenivka, Esman, Novenke, Vovchansk, Berestov, Borivska Andriivka, Novokruglyakivka, Shyykivka, Borova, Ivanivka, Dronivka, Kreminna, Khromivka, Novomarkove. Ivanopillia, Kostyantynivka, Svitlodarsk, Petrivka, Sukha Balka, Rivne, Myrnograd, Sukhyi Yar, Krynycha, Novy Trud, Hannivka, Velyka Novosilka, Temyrivka, Andriivka, Olhivka were also attacked by the Russians. With the support of aviation in the Kharkiv direction, the enemy stormed six times in the areas of the settlements of Vovchansk and Strelecha. In the Kupyansk direction ten attacks by the occupiers took place during the day. The defense forces repelled enemy assaults near Pischany, Kolisnykyvka, Kruglyakivka, and Zagryzovy. The enemy actively used aviation in the direction. On the Lyman direction the enemy attacked ten times. Tried to wedge into our defenses near Grekivka, Makiivka, Cherneshchyna, Tverdokhlibovo and Terny. In the Toretsk direction the enemy launched seven attacks near Toretsk and Shcherbinivka. In the Pokrovsky direction, our defenders stopped 32 offensive actions of the aggressor towards the settlements of Myrolyubivka, Lysivka, Promin, Krutyy Yar, Petrivka, Novooleksiivka and Pustinka. Most of the enemy's attacks were directed at the Beam. In the Kurakhiv direction the defense forces repelled 25 attacks. The occupiers most actively tried to advance in the areas of the settlements of Nova Illinka, Berestki, Novoselidivka, Voznesenka, Sontsivka, Novodmytrivka, Zorya, Kurakhove, Dalnye, Katerynivka, and Antonivka. In the Vremivsk direction, the enemy carried out 14 assaults on our positions in the Romanivka, Suhy Yali, Novodarivka, Trudovoy, Yantarny, and Rivnopol districts. In the Dnieper direction our troops successfully repelled four enemy attacks. In the Volyn and Poliske directions no signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. In addition, the operation in Kursk Oblast is ongoing. We will remind, last day of the loss of the Russian invaders made 1640 persons. Also, Ukrainian soldiers destroyed 12 tanks, 27 armored combat vehicles, 36 artillery systems, 60 UAVs of the operational-tactical level, 85 cars and 2 units of special equipment of the occupiers.

Title: Zaporizhzhia under fire: hundreds of attacks by drones, artillery and aviation
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of Zaporizhzhya OVA. Russian troops carried out 3 airstrikes on Temyrivka. In addition, 226 UAVs of various modifications attacked Stepnohirsk, Primorske, Lobkovo, Gulyaipole, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Mala Tokmachka, Biloghirya and Novodarivka. As Ivan Fedorov pointed out, 3 shellings from the RSZV covered Novodarivka and Mala Tokmachka. Also, 160 artillery shells were fired on the territory of Lobkovo, Gulyaipol, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Malaya Tokmachka, Biloghirya and Novodarivka. -We received 19 reports about the destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure,- added the head of the OVA. We will remind, an explosive wave destroyed a car in Zaporizhzhia: a man was wounded. As reported by ArmyInform, massive strikes on Mykolaiv: among the injured are children, one woman died.

Title: Dozens of artillery systems and 1,640 occupants: the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine an...
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. The total combat losses of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 17.11.24 are approximately: As reported by ArmyInform, ZSU stopped more than 130 Russian attacks: the situation on two fronts remains tense.

Title: The threat of a missile strike: there are 4 Russian ships with -Calibers- in the Black Sea
Description: This is reported by the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. There are no enemy ships in the Sea of ​​Azov. There are 3 enemy ships in the Mediterranean Sea, 3 of which are Caliber cruise missile carriers with a total salvo of up to 24 missiles. During the day in the interests of the Russian Federation, passage through the Kerch Strait was carried out: The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention on the Protection of Life at Sea of ​​1974. (SOLAS) by disabling automatic identification systems. As reported by ArmiyaInform, Russia has drawn conclusions - that is why the winged -neefektyvnist-kalibriv/->Kalibr missiles as a separate type of weapon have not been used for a long time.

Title: Massive strikes in Mykolaiv: among the injured are children, one woman died
Description: This was informed by the head of Mykolaivska OVA Vitaly Kim. On the morning of November 17, starting at 04:30, the enemy attacked the city of Mykolaiv with Shahed 131/136 kamikaze drones in several waves. As a result of the attack, private residential buildings, a high-rise building, cars, a shopping center, and an infrastructure object were damaged. Several fires also broke out. One woman died, four adults and two children were injured. In addition, yesterday, November 16, at 7:25 p.m., the enemy launched a missile attack on an infrastructure object in the city, formerly -Iskander-M-. There are no casualties. Also yesterday, the enemy struck Mykolaiv district. In particular, the enemy attacked the Kutsurub community with FPV drones. There are no casualties. In addition, the enemy directed an FPV drone and launched a mortar attack on the water area of ​​Ochakivska hromada. There are no casualties. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Pechersk district of Kyiv as a result fall of rocket fragments, a fire broke out on the roof of a five-story residential building.

Title: The Armed Forces stopped more than 130 Russian attacks: the situation on two fronts remains tense
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. The terrorist state launched a missile strike with one missile, 56 airstrikes, dropping 74 anti-aircraft missiles. In addition, the invaders used 593 kamikaze drones for strikes and fired more than 3,600 shots at the positions of our troops and populated areas. In the Kharkiv direction, Russian terrorists unsuccessfully stormed the positions of our units in the Vovchansk and Strelcha districts five times, and another attack is underway. Ten times the enemy attacked our positions on the Kupyan direction. Near the settlements of Pishchane, Kolisnikivka, Kruglyakivka, and Zagryzove, units of the Defense Forces repulsed nine assaults. One battle is in progress. The areas of the settlements of Berestov, Borivska Andriivka, Nova Kruglyakivka, Shyykivka were hit by airstrikes. In the Lyman direction, Russian troops attacked Ukrainian defenders ten times in the areas of Grekivka, Makiivka, Cherneshchyna, Tverdokhlibovo, and Terny settlements. All enemy attacks were repelled. Areas of the settlements of Borova, Ivanivka, Dronivka, Shyykivka were hit by airstrikes. In Toretsk and in the direction of Shcherbinivka, the enemy tried seven times to improve their position in the Toretsk direction, in addition, the aggressor's aircraft bombarded the areas of the settlements of Ivanopil'a, Kostyantynivka, Svitlodarsk, Petrivka. In the Pokrovsky direction during the day, the aggressor attacked our positions 32 times in the Myrolyubivka, Lysivka, Promenya, Krutoy Yar, Petrivka, Novooleksiivka and Pustinka districts. One battle is still ongoing. The enemy carried out airstrikes in the areas of the settlements of Sukh Balka, Rivne, Myrnograd, Sukhyi Yar, Krynycha, Novy Trud. According to preliminary estimates, the occupiers lost 340 servicemen killed and wounded in this direction. One armored personnel carrier, one armored personnel carrier, four vehicles, one motorcycle and one gun of the occupiers were destroyed. Ukrainian defenders also caused significant damage to two tanks, one armored personnel carrier and a cannon. In the Kurakhiv direction, 25 enemy attacks were recorded. One of them continues. The main battle is ongoing in the districts of Nova Illinka, Berestki, Novoselidivka, Voznesenka, Sontsivka, Novodmytrivka, Zorya, Kurakhove, Dalnye, Katerynivka, and Antonivka. The enemy dropped one KAB on Hannivka. Fourteen times the enemy stormed the front edge of our defense in the areas of Romanivka, Suhy Yali, Novodarivka, Trudovoy, Yantarny and Rivnopol in the Vremivsk direction, three attacks are ongoing. At the same time, the enemy launched airstrikes in the regions of Velika Novosilka, Temyrivka, and Andriivka. Four times the enemy unsuccessfully attacked the positions of the Ukrainian defenders on the Dnieper direction. The Defense Forces of Ukraine continue the operation in Kurshchyna, where our troops repelled 24 enemy attacks. Soldiers of the 17th Separate Heavy Mechanized Kryvyi Rih Brigade named after Kostyantyn Pestushka, the 35th Separate Marine Brigade named after Rear Admiral Mykhailo Ostrogradskyi, 425 separate assault battalion, 3 operational brigades of the National Guard of Ukraine, 406 separate artillery units were awarded for their effective combat work. brigade named after Corporal General Oleksiy Almazov, who confidently hold the lines and inflict significant losses on the enemy. As reported by ArmyInform, during an attempt to carry out assault actions in the Kursk region of the Russian Federation, the enemy lost 17 pieces of equipment - only due to the detonation of mines.

Title: Rocket attack on Kyiv: a five-story building is on fire in the Pechersk district
Description: reported this by Serhiy Popko, head of the Kyiv City Military Administration. The fire was caused by a Russian missile attack on the capital. It is currently known that one injured woman was hospitalized in the Pechersk district from a residential building hit by a UAV fragment. Previously, the wall and ceiling were damaged in the apartment on the 4th floor. Emergency services are on the scene. The circumstances of the event are being clarified. As reported by ArmyInform, an explosive wave destroyed a car in Zaporizhzhia: a man was wounded.

Title: Huge losses of the Russians, IPSO and whether Pokrovsk will fall: an expert on possible scenarios of...
Description: “The general characteristics of the situation at the front should be considered in the context of major geopolitics and the outcome of the presidential election in the United States. It really is. The front line of the Russian-Ukrainian war now has three large complex sections. The first is the Kurakhiv direction. Is a tactical withdrawal of the Defense Forces of Ukraine possible from there? It is possible, you should not be afraid of this, because battles can be lost, the main thing is to win the war. I really like historical parallels. Napoleon brilliantly won the Battle of Borodino, but lost the war. Ukrainians were heartbroken when our soldiers left Severodonetsk, Lysychansk, and especially Bakhmut. But the war is not lost on this. Indeed, this is a very difficult and difficult direction, but nevertheless such a scenario can be. Pokrovsk is next. There is a lot of speculation here that, they say, the city will fall, and then Donetsk will fall. This is not true. After all, Pokrovsk is a rather complex agglomeration, dense urban development and so on. Let's turn to illustrative examples. Avdiivka, in the active phase of a large-scale war, was stormed by the Rashists from October 7 last year, that is, they took it for more than six months. The enemy could not capture Bakhmut for more than 10 months. At the same time, they advanced beyond the city itself, there, the main hills, and could not. Reaching Pokrovsk does not mean taking it. The battle itself can be very long and not necessarily successful for the enemy. There will be huge enemy losses. Reconcentration of the enemy's forces and means in the Zaporozhye direction is logical. There is a very fundamental rule of war: the attacking side, if it slips at some point, must inevitably change the vector of the blow. Because if this does not happen, then a moment of balance occurs and the defending party gets a chance for counter-offensive actions. the Russians cannot allow this. According to their logic, the Zaporozhye direction is also a working one. Now speculation about the borders of Dnipropetrovsk region. It is very unfortunate that all this is happening in the information space. It is at least 30 km to the administrative borders, well, that's a lot. Indeed, according to the results of this year, the Russian Federation has the highest indicators of captured territory of Ukraine. But if these indicators are compared with the losses, then this is something incredible. According to the results of 2022, the losses of the enemy amount to 90 thousand, in 2023 more than 220 thousand, and this year I estimate them in the perspective of more than 350 thousand occupiers, because there are already 300 thousand, 21,940 people in October alone. This is simply a phenomenal figure. Therefore, it is still necessary to go 30 km to Dnipropetrovsk region. And this is a very serious distance, wet weather must also be taken into account, so you can only move on roads. The Ukrainian defenders are shelling large columns of firecrackers like nuts. The enemy from IPSO actively joined these speculations around the Dnipropetrovsk region, dispersing panic, betrayal and fakes. Why do we associate the situation on the Russian-Ukrainian war front with the victory of Donald Trump in the USA? Trump really declares a quick freezing of the conflict. But only after his inauguration on January 20 will any concrete conversation begin. A brief historical example: the Taliban and the Americans have been talking for more than a year, these are very low geopolitical stakes. And with such huge geopolitical stakes, which are now in the Russian-Ukrainian war, God forbid that in six months they would find some points of contact. Moreover, in these two months before Trump's inauguration, world geopolitics may turn around more than once. Let's not forget, Iran threatens to strike Israel already in the land part. This can really make a big difference. And if this happens conditionally, then the Russian Federation will experience a colossal reduction in the supply of explosives. The Iranians provide the Rashists with unmanned systems and ammunition. In my personal opinion, the front is moving towards a fiery equilibrium. Wet weather sets in, a cycle of rain and sleet. There will be, as in the previous two winters, endless counter-battery artillery duels. And here the Defense Forces of Ukraine are head and shoulders above the enemy. That is why he is raging now, he wants to capture as many kilometers of our land as possible.

Title: Almost like SpaceX: Israel has developed a vertical takeoff barrage munition
Description: In a brief description of the ammunition, the Israeli arms manufacturer positions ROC-X Weapon System as a hand-launched VTOL (vertical take-off and landing) electro-optical missile that provides troops with new opportunities for attack and maneuvering, ArmyInform reports. This innovative munition is designed to increase the accuracy and speed of hitting a wide range of targets, both stationary and moving, providing new opportunities for quick response on the battlefield. As indicate analysts of the defense publication Army Recognition, ROC-X stands out against the background of others of ammunition as the world's first VTOL missile that can be manually launched by a single soldier. The device is designed to solve tactical tasks, allowing the operator to independently control the flight, select targets and return it safely after completing the mission. The ROC-X design includes a one-meter-long fuselage and X-shaped wings with a span of 0.8 meters. An innovative system of engines with a channel screw without moving parts provides the product with silence, stealth and high maneuverability, which makes it practically invisible in combat conditions. Particular attention should be paid to the accuracy of the device: the probable deviation from the point of impact is only one meter, which makes the ROC-X an effective tool for destroying targets at a distance of up to 10 kilometers. Such accuracy is achieved thanks to advanced electro-optical and GPS guidance systems, which allows the operator to do without special launchers. One of the key advantages of the ROC-X is its ability for rapid manual launch, which allows it to respond instantly to changing combat conditions. This feature makes it a versatile tool for modern tactical applications where speed and flexibility play a crucial role. In combat conditions, the ROC-X demonstrates high maneuverability and rapid readiness for deployment, and also has features that reduce acoustic and thermal signatures, facilitating covert operations in enemy territory. The device weighs only 6.8 kg and is equipped with a warhead weighing 2 kg, with the possibility of using shock and non-contact detonators, which allows to effectively hit targets. ROC-X can stay in flight for up to 20 minutes, supporting both manual and automatic control modes, giving the operator the ability to adapt to changing combat conditions. Thus, this device is a versatile and highly effective tool that significantly improves the capabilities of ground troops in the conditions of modern combat conflict. The development of systems similar to the ROC-X by other defense companies is aimed at creating accurate and versatile munitions that can be controlled by individual soldiers. However, the ROC-X stands out for its true portability as it is fully manually operated, unlike other systems such as the US-based Switchblade 300 previously reported told our agency, or the Chinese CH-901, which require special launchers for use. This feature makes the ROC-X particularly suitable for dynamic environments, providing quick response and flexible operation in the field, giving soldiers greater autonomy compared to similar systems. It should be noted that in January 2023 the US Department of Defense concluded with the Israeli company Israel Aerospace Industries a contract for the development and delivery of a new portable barrage drone with electro-optical guidance. IAI, as a prime contractor, received a multimillion-dollar contract from the Office of Irregular Warfare Technical Support (IWTSD) of the US Department of Defense for the rapid development and delivery of POINT BLANK systems in the ROC-X version. ROC-X hand-launched vertical takeoff and landing barrage munition. Video: Israel Aerospace

Title: -They drove to -Otchenashi--: 2 thousand km along the front line to -Funtyk-. How the driver took th...
Description: Artem, a senior soldier of the 21st separate special purpose battalion of the Separate Presidential Brigade named after Hetman Bohdan Khmelnytskyi, with the call sign -Pavlyk- at the front since March 2024. Since then, he has driven more than two thousand kilometers on the front lines in a Hummer with the call sign -Funtik- and -rolled- more than 60 thousand km in pickup trucks. And there was a rapid mission on an armored Ford and experience on a Turkish Kirpi. The driver Artyom -Pavlyk- told ArmyInform correspondents about why being a driver on the front line is important and honorable, but dangerous, how fear helps to fulfill the mission and about the heroic rescue of Ukrainian drones from a semicircle. Artem has been in the Armed Forces for over 20 months. He went to serve without hesitation as soon as the summons came. But he did not get to the front right away, at first he guarded the administration of the Pechersk District of Kyiv. However, he then transferred to a combat brigade and has been on the front line for more than half a year since then. In civilian life, -Pavlyk- worked as a tractor driver, and not so long ago he served his term as a driver. The acquired experience came in handy during the service - Artem was appointed to the position of a driver. Since then, -Pavlik- had to perform numerous logistical and rescue missions, delivering fighters and cargo for them to the front line and taking the wounded from there. - Driving in, bringing in, taking out - all this is my work, my tasks. I fly -to the point-, drop off or pick up guys, deliver them water, food, etc., he says. It was possible to drive -Pavlik- on different vehicles, but most of all - on a pickup truck and a Hummer. The pickup truck, he says, is faster and has higher cross-country ability, but it has virtually no protection. - You can drive at a speed of 100-120 kilometers per hour, even on mud, but there is no protection - except that you can install a REBchik, - says Artem. On the other hand, the Hummer is slower, its cross-country ability is worse. The driver explains that this armored personnel carrier is more suitable for the desert plains than for the Donbas mud, where the ground is viscous and sticky, like plasticine. But instead, this armor has powerful protection. — -Hummer- drives slower - 80-90 km/h, and -guzzles- a lot - 35 liters per 100 kilometers, and the passability is worse. And here the ground is like plasticine - such that the car simply floats, not on the ground, but floats on it. But -Funtyk- is strong, withstands many -arrivals-, protects against debris and even a direct hit, it has a good armored capsule, - explains Artem. — I had to relearn a little, because the car is like a car, but the dimensions are wider. And it is very heavy - five tons, says -Pavlyk- about -Funtyk-. And it also shows the padlock on the door. The Hummer does not have a standard factory lock, so it is impossible to lock it. The ignition key is also unnecessary - the car starts with half a turn of the toggle switch. -There were cases when Hammers were stolen, so we came up with a way out - to lock the door with a padlock,- explains Artem. An unusual device on the door of an American armored personnel carrier makes it look like the entrance to a basement converted into a bunker - armored doors were installed, and a lock was attached to them forgot to mount. As evidence -Pavlyk- shows the impact sites of debris from the explosions of grenades, mines and the explosive charge of the FPV drone. Deep scars in the armored doors and the body of the -Hummer- testify to the force of the explosions, and the laminated glass, apparently, withstood a direct hit from an automatic grenade launcher. — They said that -Funtyk- also traveled to Bakhmut. And the FPV shot flew behind me under the frame and exploded there. But the car survived, I hit the gas and drove away with two flat tires, Artem says. At that time, it was necessary to drive on a -docket- - pressed rubber inside the wheels, which allows you to move even after the road has -eaten- the rubber of the tires. The driver explains that under fire the main thing is not to get confused, not to reduce speed and to maneuver sharply. Then the chances that they will be able to hit the car with precision drop sharply. To do this, you need to be a true specialist in your field, a skilled driver. And yet… — Fear helps. Because when there is fear, the reaction is sharper - you understand everything faster, assess the situation, maneuver. In a calm environment, you drive relaxed. And there you go - -whoosh-whoosh-whoosh!- - run! Reaction, maneuvers, more gas - you know, you feel what you need to do, how to leave - explains the driver. You also need to be very fast and not linger anywhere, not stop longer than a couple of minutes, and even better - a few tens of seconds. That's why he always drives the guys, especially those who come out of positions, because when they load into the car for the trip, they often calm down and relax too much. — He who is not afraid will drive slowly, relaxed. And everything will catch up with him, motherfucker. Need more reaction to everything. Guys need to be coached to load and unload faster, because they lose their fear when they get out of position. And you need to be afraid until you leave, says -Pavlyk-. However, fear and adrenaline alone will not get you far - you must always carefully prepare for each mission and never violate the basic rules - drive only at night or at dusk, in no case turn on the headlights, carefully study the driving route. — I ride in a -night lamp- so as not to reveal myself. I drive very fast, at the maximum possible speed on this road. Also, before leaving, I carefully study the map in order to remember the route, I count the number of turns, says Artem. He does not have a navigator, so he carefully studies the entire route before leaving on a map, keeps it in his memory and orients himself to the local area at breakneck speed. Accidentally, due to oversight, jumping into a -turn that is not there- is deadly, because there may not be time to turn around and take the correct route. — In half an hour you have to -get stuck in.- And it is better to drive, unload and load in 20-25 minutes, and return, Artem explains. -Pavlyk- recalls that during his missions he had to take out the bodies of three dead and more than 30 wounded fighters. The mission was the most difficult, when one dead and three wounded had to be taken out at the same time, but the driver coped with it as well. — I had to drive by three -300s- and one -200- on a road where I had never driven. I looked at the map for almost two hours thinking about how to do all this, how to bypass the dangerous section. And, in the end, everything worked out - drove in, picked up, took out, - recalls the fighter. He recalls that he had to drive along a broken country road, on one of the sections of which a mortar often hit. However, in the end, skill, experience and thorough training helped accomplish the mission. Artem says that a car on the front line is the main target for all the enemy's weapons, because everyone is interested in aiming at a car. But it is not possible without it, because the infantrymen -at ground zero- are critically dependent on -last kilometer- logistics. — The car that goes! Everyone is interested in knocking her down, destroying her, because she is carrying someone or something - fighters, supplies. That is, the idea that a driver is such a safe profession in the army is false - on the -front- we are the first target, he explains. However, -Pavlyk- only partially agrees with the definition of himself as a -special purpose- driver. He emphasizes that not all of us are made for war, but someone has to do this hard work - and he does it. — It is necessary to protect, because who else will protect? And if you are smart, fast, and know how to do something, then you will simply be able to do it well, says Artem. Artem can have from one to 3-4 departures per night. Sometimes you have to wait for hours for a mission, being in full readiness to start the same second the order is received. Even after completing the mission, the driver says, he can wait for several hours until the fighters delivered by him reach their positions and report their arrival. - They can go for 3 or 4 hours - during this time I don't sleep because I'm worried about them. I understand that nothing depends on my waiting, but I'm still waiting for a message, he says. This attitude of Artyom was noticed by the fighters themselves, among whom -Pavlyk- gained extreme respect, because they know that he will never leave them to their own devices and will do everything possible to help. Artyom recalls one of his many missions, during which he had to take out drones from a semicircle in an unfamiliar car - an armored Ford. The enemy had already appeared behind their positions, so if they were not taken out before morning, they would inevitably have to engage in a direct shooting battle. The driver of the Ford then refused to go, and Pavlyk and the commander drove in an unfamiliar car, flew to the position of the drones and pulled the boys out. All this took about 40 minutes. — For forty minutes there and back, loaded in about a minute. The guys were very pleased, everyone thanked us for coming. They were already waiting for the car to arrive, they had already packed their things, and I turned around. They jumped in - and we chased them, - says Artem. Later, the drone operators told how relieved they felt not even when they broke out of the semi-encirclement, but also when they received a message that Pavlyk was coming after them: -If Pavlyk is coming after us, then we will leave!- Photo by Ruslan Tarasov

Title: the Russians filmed a video allegedly from the Institute for the Study of War: which points to a fak...
Description: The published video and the so-called -data on TCC deaths- are false. It was the Russians who faked the video, because the Institute for the Study of War has never released such information. Such statistics were not disseminated by Ukrainian officials and the media either. Fakeness is also indicated by the fact that Russians have traditionally made a lot of grammatical mistakes. In particular, -territorial recruitment and social support centers- were translated into the video as TRSSCs. Whereas in English it is correct TCR and SS (Territorial Centers of Recruitment and Social Support). In addition, they used a fake final frame of the Institute for the Study of War. At the end of each entry, the Institute calls for a donation to their organization (-Donate today-), while the propagandists only have a list of social networks instead. Russian propagandists actively spread such posts to discredit the mobilization in Ukraine.

Title: In Zaporizhzhia, a car was destroyed by an explosive wave: a man was injured
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of the Zaporizhia Regional Military Administration. As a result of the shelling, a car was destroyed by an explosive wave and debris. A man who was nearby was injured. Specialists of emergency services are working at the scene, the details of the incident are being clarified. In addition, in the morning, the Russians attacked Zaporizhzhia and the Zaporizhzhia district with -shahedas-. Damaged critical infrastructure object. Previously, there were no casualties. However, the blast wave mutilated the commercial premises and the road surface. We will remind, during the day the occupiers struck 464 17 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region. As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy hit a village in the Kupyan region from aircraft: three people were injured.

Title: Air Hunters: How Border Patrolmen Master the Art of Flight
Description: This is reported by the State Border Service of Ukraine. Border guards are actively training to work with drones in order to accurately destroy enemy positions, dugouts and enemy manpower. Such training - also a constant struggle with one's own framework. However, each fall is a valuable lesson, and each successful flight is a step towards the drone becoming not only the eyes, but also the team's shield. We remind you that when attempting to carry out assault actions in the Kursk region of the Russian Federation, the enemy lost 17 pieces of equipment - only due to detonation of mines.

Title: The enemy hit a village in the Kupyan region from an aircraft: three people were injured
Description: The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office informs about this. According to the investigation, on November 16, around 12:00 p.m., Russian troops launched an airstrike on the village. Osynovo, Kupyan district. The impact of aviation ammunition on the territory of a private household was recorded. One resident suffered an acute reaction to stress, another woman and a man were injured. Despite the difficult security situation, prosecutors, together with police investigators, are taking all measures to document crimes committed by servicemen of the Soviet Union. We remind you that today at noon, enemy aircraft attacked strike on the residential sector of the village of Osynovo in the Kupyan district.

Title: The residents of Mariupol still have no heat in their houses: the occupiers blamed the townspeople w...
Description: notifies the Mariupol City Council. Mariupol residents, who had to leave the city due to the Russian invasion, were blamed for this. As if because of the closed apartments, it is impossible to replace the heating system. the morgue found a solution - to break the locks and declare the apartments -unoccupied-. That is, just to steal people's property. It should be noted that the occupiers are massively trying to -nationalize- housing, referring to the lack of owners. Lists of such apartments are published regularly. Within 30 days, the owners must apply to the pseudo-administration of the district and provide proof of ownership of the property. Under this pretext, they are trying to return people to the occupation. We remind you, blocked sewerage and lack of heating. With such problems, the people of Mariupol turn to the occupation administration of the city en masse.

Title: During the day, Nikopol was attacked by the enemy almost a dozen times
Description: About this informs head of Dnipropetrovsk OVA Serhii Lysak. The aggressor targeted the communities of Nikopol, Marganetska and Myrivska. A 75-year-old woman was injured. She was given medical assistance. Will be treated on an outpatient basis. A transport company, a five-story building, 10 private houses and 10 farm buildings, 3 garages, solar panels, a greenhouse, a power line and a gas pipeline were damaged. We remind you, occupiers are agitating schoolchildren to become policemen.

Title: The occupiers continue to -hunt- the civilians of the Kherson region from drones: there are wounded
Description: notifies of the Kherson Regional Military Administration. The 41-year-old man also received shrapnel wounds to his face and forearm. The 19-year-old victim was diagnosed with a hand injury. Now the men are in the hospital, where they are receiving the necessary help. In addition, Russian troops dropped explosives from a UAV on a 55-year-old resident of Berislav. The victim was taken to the hospital with a blast injury and leg injury. Currently, hospitals provide him with all the necessary assistance. We remind you that at noon today enemy aviation strike on the residential sector of the village of Osynovo in the Kupyan district.

Title: Ukraine and NATO agreed on the algorithm of actions within the framework of the final stage of the c...
Description: About this notifies the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. JATEC is created within the framework of the implementation of the decisions of the Washington Summit of the Alliance. This will be the first joint institution of Ukraine and NATO. -The center will help Ukraine integrate into the structures of the Alliance, promote the exchange of experience between the parties and the search for solutions to strengthen the defense capabilities of Ukraine and NATO,- said Brigadier General Anatoly Klochko. The participants of the meeting discussed the implementation of measures necessary for the creation of the Center and confirmed the intention to start its work at the beginning of 2025. Among such measures is approval of the necessary legal procedures, in particular, ensuring the participation of Ukraine in the processes of management and decision-making in the structure of the Center. On behalf of the Alliance, the event was attended by NATO Assistant Secretary General Thomas Hoffus, NATO Commander-in-Chief for Transformation Admiral Pierre Vandier, NATO Information and Communication Agency General Manager Ludwig Decamps, and NATO Senior Representative in Ukraine Patrick Turner. They also discussed the creation of an information and communication system that will allow organizing interaction and secure data exchange between Ukraine and NATO. Ukraine will be the first partner country with which the Alliance will create such a secure system. The parties agreed on a list of the first urgent projects, which the Center will begin its work with. We remind you, Army+ already has 900 reports on change of place of service.

Title: The President discussed strengthening cooperation between the countries with the Minister of Foreign...
Description: This is reported by /a> website of the Head of State. Separately, Volodymyr Zelenskyi noted that Takeshi Ivaya visited not only Kyiv, but also other Ukrainian cities, including Bucha. The President thanked for consistently maintaining the sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, as well as for significant financial and humanitarian assistance from Japan, in particular for the transfer of a new package of assistance to our energy sector. -You have been on our side since the beginning of the full-scale invasion of Russia, you have helped us. We highly appreciate the help that the Japanese government and people have provided to Ukraine. The amount of almost 12 billion dollars is the total support of Ukraine during this war,- Volodymyr Zelenskyi said. Separately, the President thanked for the allocation of 3 billion dollars. within the framework of the G7 decision regarding a $50 billion loan, which will be repaid with the proceeds from frozen Russian assets. The President noted the close relations between Ukraine and Japan, and also expressed hope that the dialogue will continue at the same high level with the new Prime Minister of Japan, Shigeru Ishiba. -In light of what is happening with the intervention of the North Korean military in Russia's war against Ukraine, it is important to discuss how to prevent further escalation by Russia, already together with North Korea,- he said. Volodymyr Zelenskyi and Takeshi Ivaya agreed to intensify the implementation of the bilateral security agreement, which was concluded on June 13 in Apulia. Takeshi Iwaya noted that he came to Ukraine to testify to the unchanged position: Japan is and will be together with Ukraine. Separately, he emphasized that he supports the strengthening of bilateral relations between the countries for the sake of security. Among the other topics of the negotiations are Japan's support of the Peace Formula and its further leadership in the implementation of the nuclear safety clause, expansion of economic and humanitarian cooperation, extension and strengthening of sanctions against Russia. Volodymyr Zelenskyi also sent the head of the Japanese government an invitation to visit Ukraine. We remind you, Volodymyr Zelensky held today a meeting on the preparation of our internal Sustainability Plan - item on hero policy.

Title: -Clean Thursday- with clogged sewers: the pseudo-mayor of Mariupol was lowered into the basement wit...
Description: notifies Mariupol City Council. So, in order to appear to solve the problems, pseudo-mayor Oleg Morgun met with residents as part of the -Clean Thursday- campaign. However, the day turned out to be rather -dirty-. Residents of the building on Chelyuskintsiv Street, 2 complained about the clogged sewer and showed the pseudo-chief a basement clogged with sewage. According to people, they have been carrying out everything with buckets for six months. At the same time, utility workers had problems with equipment. So they manually clean the drains. It should be noted that for almost three years, the occupiers have not managed to establish the communal sphere of the city. Due to low salaries, the positions are not filled. And the invaders do not allocate funds for new equipment. We remind you that in the Mariupol library the occupiers staged an exhibition about the terrorists -DNR- and -asvabaditeley svo-.

Title: Ministry of Defense: Every defender of Ukraine will receive improved nutrition in medical institutio...
Description: The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine informs about this. The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine has initiated important changes in the system of providing servicemen during treatment and rehabilitation. Thanks to the Resolution adopted by the Cabinet of Ministers, the mechanism of providing improved food to servicemen in health care facilities of all forms of ownership has been improved. The resolution allows to provide our defenders with food according to the standards of military medical institutions of NATO countries even in civilian hospitals. -Every defender who risks their lives for our freedom deserves the best conditions for recovery. Not only do we provide our troops with the care they need, but we also work to ensure that each one of them feels supported and respected. This initiative is our response to their dedication and courage,- said the Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine, Brigadier General Serhiy Melnyk. According to the new regulations, food in civilian hospitals for servicemen will be served according to a specially designed diet, which, in particular, determines the list of products, their quantity and weight required for one serviceman per day, taking into account the specific needs of the body during recovery. -The new standards ensure the complete nutrition needed for a quick recovery. For example, they take into account the increased need for protein, vitamins and calories needed to heal injuries or illnesses. The cost of such food is calculated on the basis of a special product catalog approved by the Ministry of Defense. This Catalog contains current prices for products, and they are taken into account when determining the cost of food for one bed-day in medical facilities,- explains Serhiy Melnyk. According to him, this ensures that each soldier will receive the proper ration for a quick recovery. The resolution of the Cabinet of Ministers also provides for a clear mechanism for compensating costs for civilian medical institutions, which will allow maintaining high standards of service. The new financing mechanism provides for the conclusion of a standard contract that will ensure transparent compensation for the costs of improved nutrition. Thus, civilian medical facilities will receive adequate funding, and military personnel will receive quality treatment and rehabilitation. We remind you that recently in the structure of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine the department for intellectual property issues was launched and the technology of detection of enemy FPV drones -Vitryak-M- was patented.

Title: Army+ already has 900 reports for changing the place of service
Description: About this reports Kateryna Chernogorenko.

Title: Magyar makes fireworks with the Russians, the SBU eliminates the occupiers, the SSO operation: a str...
Description: At two o'clock in the morning, the operators of the 73rd naval center received a combat mission to remove a group of servicemen from friendly units from the surrounding area. The evacuation team worked under the fire of an enemy tank, machine gun fire, as well as an FPV drone. Operators of the Khorne Group showed footage of the cleaning of Kupyansk. After the Russians broke into the city, our fighters set out to eliminate them. The video shows the occupiers surrendering to our military with raised hands. SBU special forces destroyed the Russians who tried to storm. Operators of FPV drones of the SBU -A- CSO stopped the enemy infantry even before it went to storm the positions of friendly units. These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - Captain Artem Golub and Major Andriy Makarenko.

Title: President: Ukrainians prove every day with their courage and their resilience that they can stop Rus...
Description: This was announced by the Head of State in his evening address. -The meeting was quite broad - not only the Ministry of Veterans Affairs. Various government officials. Many aspects. It is very important that there should be no less specifics in the decisions of the state. Specific programs that work. Specific support measures. Specific things in the memory of the war and feat of the Ukrainian people. And specific proposals for the post-war period for our soldiers, who have proven that they are the strongest force in Europe, capable of defending their home and the whole of Europe,- the President emphasized. Also, he said that this is only one of the many aspects in which the internal Stability Plan of Ukraine is interconnected with the Victory Plan, which was presented to the partners and which can be implemented by the partners themselves. -Ukrainians prove every day with their courage and resilience that they can stop Russia. Courage and stability are also needed from partners,- he added. We remind you that the adversary pokorskomu-napryamkah/->does not stop trying to advance deep into the territory of Ukraine. So far, the enemy has attacked the positions of the Defense Forces 75 times.

Title: The occupiers are agitating schoolchildren to become policemen
Description: reports this by the Center of National Resistance. the Russians are agitating schoolchildren to take shortened courses after finishing school and, upon coming of age, to serve in the police in lower positions in order to fill the shortage of personnel. At the same time, the occupiers are ready to take such candidates without entrance exams to the Donetsk branch of the -Academy of the Ministry of Internal Affairs- so that they will later become puppet officers in the repressive structure. Let us note that Russia is a country where the social elevator is possible under the condition of serving the government. However, this service is usually short-lived and harmful to health. We remind you that TOT is the enemy continues to take measures to recruit the population into the ranks of its army.

Title: The enemy tried to break through the positions of the Defense Forces 75 times: the most difficult si...
Description: notifies of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

Title: The enemy carried out an airstrike on the residential sector of Kharkiv region: there are casualties
Description: notifies of the State Emergency Service of Ukraine.

Title: -I'll show you what an ambush looks like-, -Datsyk- a diary from the Kharkiv region
Description: The corresponding video was published by the brigade's official page. After operation with an ambush around the perimeter of the landing, about 40 Russian -Zhmurs- are scattered. There are 50 more in the adjacent square. Some of them -frozen- at the moment of tearing off the check, others became a pile of camouflage, where it is no longer easy to recognize a person. In just three days, the fighters of the 2nd Battalion turned this area into a Killzone. We remind you that the border guards shared results of work against the enemy in a week.

Title: On TOT, the enemy prolongs taking measures to recruit the population into the ranks of his army
Description: About this reports Center of National Resistance. The occupiers offer all those detained for minor offenses, as well as those who are called up for military service, to go and serve them on a contract. At the same time, methods of psychological pressure and threats are used. At the same time, the enemy promises not to send TOT contractors to the line of combat clashes, but this is a lie that can be confirmed by forcibly mobilized residents of the captured territories of eastern Ukraine. We remind you, In the Mariupol library, the occupiers organized an exhibition about the DNR and Asvabaditeley Svo terrorists.

Title: Mines were blown up: the enemy lost 17 pieces of equipment in Kurshchyna
Description: This was reported by the commander of the Ground Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, Lieutenant General Oleksandr Pavlyuk. In this direction, thanks to mine-explosive barrages, professionally equipped by specialists of the 12th separate support regiment and engineering and sapper units of other parts of the Ground Forces, about 30% of enemy equipment was destroyed during an attempt to advance. -Thank you to the soldiers for their high professionalism and effective combat work!- — noted Oleksandr Pavlyuk. As reported by ArmyInform, border guards destroyed the Russian tricolor established by the Russian DRG.

Title: The Ministry of Defense submitted applications for the registration of trademarks and the coat of ar...
Description: This was told by the head of the intellectual property department of the Main Department of Military Justice of the Ministry Defense of Ukraine Ilya Kostin. -Also, we launched a provision on the use of symbols and markings. This will be a special platform in the MoU, where all interested parties can apply for such a permit. But the Ministry of Defense will decide, during a short interval, whether to give or not to give. We need to put things in order little by little,- said Ilya Kostin. He also emphasized that this will make it possible to -block hostile channels in social networks.- -We have already prepared this analysis and provided it to the management,- he added. Ilya Kostin also emphasized that currently the use of symbols is -completely uncontrolled.- But world practice shows that it -must be done.- In particular, separate departments have been created in the Ministry of Defense of Great Britain and the United States. -So that we understand: more than 1,000 people work in the Department of Intellectual Property in the (Ministry of Defense, – ed.) of the United States. And they are specially trained for this, especially for the defense department,- Ilya Kostin summarized. As reported by ArmyInform, he recently started working in the structure of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine intellectual property department and the technology of detection of enemy FPV drones was patented -Vitryak-M-.

Title: Revenge in full: the border guards shared the results of their work against the enemy in a week
Description: This is reported by the State Border Service of Ukraine. 2 PMM warehouses and 3 BC warehouses were destroyed. We remind you, operators of fpv drones of TsSO -A- of the Security Service of Ukraine stopped the enemy infantry, which was rushing to the assault.

Title: Artillery Coalition member countries discussed the needs of the Defense Forces of Ukraine until 2027
Description: About this notified the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. Representatives of 14 states, as well as the EU and NATO, took part in the online meeting of the Coalition, which is co-led by France and the USA. The representatives of the participating states discussed the potential contributions of each of them to meet these needs, as well as the possibility of investing in the Ukrainian defense industry. The Artillery Coalition was launched in January of this year in Paris. Its participants are countries that have advanced technologies for the production of the best artillery systems, ammunition, artillery reconnaissance, unmanned targeting systems, and fire control systems. The purpose of the Coalition's activity is that by the end of 2027, the Defense Forces of Ukraine should acquire sustainable complex artillery capabilities and interoperability with NATO. This is necessary in order to strengthen the ability of the Ukrainian army to resist Russian attacks and deter potential new invasions, as well as to neutralize Russia's fire superiority, its combat capabilities, and to establish operational interoperability with NATO. The Artillery Coalition was created within the framework of the Contact Group on Defense of Ukraine (-Ramstein- format). Coalitions such as the Air Force Coalition, the Integrated Air and Missile Defense Coalition, the Armored and Maneuverable Coalition, the Maritime Capabilities Coalition, the Drone Coalition, the Mine Action Coalition, and the IT Coalition are also currently operational.

Title: Part of the territory of the so-called -lnr-, where it is allowed to use the Internet, will be disco...
Description: This reports the head of Luhansk OVA Artem Lysogor. Corresponding warnings were received by the occupying authorities and Russian banking institutions. By January 2026, residents of the occupied Luhansk region must replace their cars with Ukrainian-style state license plates with Russian ones. Otherwise, the documents will become invalid. However, many are stopped by the price of the issue. There are enough cases when the replacement of numbers is preceded by a mandatory procedure for registration of inheritance in the event of the death of the testator. If the car is not new, then it costs more than the vehicle itself. Therefore, they continue to travel by proxy, without the ability and sense to fulfill Russian whims. We remind you that the invaders have directed 38 UAVs /a> on the fortifications of our defenders in Luhansk region

Title: In the Mariupol library, the occupiers arranged an exhibition about the terrorists -DNR- and -asvaba...
Description: notifies Mariupol City Council. There were stands with information about the terrorists and murderers of the so-called -DNR- - Zakharchenko, Motorola and Vladimir Zoha. Added information about -asvabaditeley Mariupol-. The pseudo-director of the library, Nataliya Seletska, told a local propaganda channel that the purpose of the exhibition is to glorify -Russian citizens who defended our Donbas.- From whom it was necessary to -protect- him, she did not say. And I also forgot to add about tens of thousands of dead civilians and completely destroyed cities. The occupiers plan to bring schoolchildren to the exhibition. After all, it was children who became the main target of ideological processing for the invaders. Through schools, cultural institutions and libraries, they are trying to impose a Russian identity and a distorted story about the Russian-Ukrainian war. We remind you that in the temporarily occupied A large number of damaged Russian military vessels are recorded in Mariupol of equipment, which enters the territory of the Ilyich plant for repairs.

Title: The Ministry of Defense explained the tasks of the new intellectual property department
Description: About this told Ilya Kostin, Head of the Intellectual Property Department of the Main Department of Military Justice of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. According to him, this is the first time that the state, represented by the Ministry of Defense, has received the rights to a technological product. -This has never been done before in the Ministry - when the manufacturer, a specialized military unit (Center for Scaling of Technological solutions) invented this product. This technological solution is of very high quality. And this was confirmed by state registration and a patent for a useful model was issued. This happened only in the MOU system. I repeat: this has never happened before. Thus, the state, represented by the MoU, has obtained the rights to this product and will now give permission to manufacturers to scale this product. But the fact that state money was invested — it remained with the state,- said Ilya Kostin. Vitryak-M is a detector that scans different ranges of FPV drones, automatically turning on EW systems. -This allows the fighter to know that there is an FPV drone nearby and to turn on the EW only when it is needed, instead of creating a dome curtain that prevents not only the enemy from working, but also us.- - explained the head of the intellectual property department.

Title: Was a cook, became a unit commander: the Defense Forces told the story of a fighter on pseudo-Cook-
Description: The story of the fighter was made public by the brigade's official page.

Title: The special forces - dismantled - the occupiers who rushed to the assault
Description: The SBU released the video of the defeat. The drones of the SBU destroyed the Russian infantry even before it went to storm the positions of its comrades from the Armed Forces of Ukraine. And well-aimed strikes on the positions of the occupiers buried the Russians in Ukrainian land forever. As reported by ArmyInform, border guards destroyed the Russian tricolor, established by the Russian DRG.

Title: The invaders directed 38 UAVs against the fortifications of our defenders in the Luhansk Region
Description: This reports the head of Luhansk OVA Artem Lysogor. The enemy also targeted these settlements from artillery installations. The enemy carried out offensive actions in the districts of Nadia, Novoyehorivka, and Makiivka. In the Lyman direction, the occupiers had the support of bomber aircraft. We remind you that the troops of the Russian Federation during the last 14 settlements were shelled during the day, 3161 enemy shellings were recorded on the front line and the residential sector.

Title: Russia lost the oil battle for the English Channel
Description: This is reported by /a> Foreign Intelligence Service of Ukraine. The document provides for the development of transport monitoring mechanisms, the application of sanctions against the -shadow fleet- and strengthening of control over sea routes. The resolution of the European Parliament is a continuation of the October sanctions of the United Kingdom. Although the decision is of a recommendatory nature, it reflects the EU's intentions to implement tougher measures within the framework of the future sanctions package. It is expected that by the end of the year, the EU will approve a new package to combat Russia's circumvention of sanctions. We remind you that for almost three years of the large-scale invasion, technological processes and the changes that have taken place in Ukraine — in the private and public sectors — have led to the fact that our state is technologically the strongest in Europe.

Title: During the day, the Russians shelled populated areas of Donetsk region 21 times: one person was kill...
Description: reports this by the head of the Donetsk OVA, Vadym Filashkin. One person died in Kurakhovo, numerous houses were damaged. 13 houses were damaged in the community. 2 houses were damaged in Pokrovsk. In Lyman, an administrative building, a shop and a restaurant were damaged. In Slovyansk, a person died, a warehouse and a power line were damaged. A warehouse was damaged in Mykolaivka. In Romanivka, Illinivska TG, 11 objects were damaged. 3 houses and 2 non-residential premises were damaged in Kostyantynivka; in Novodmytrivka, 9 private houses, 2 high-rise buildings, 2 administrative buildings, a utility room, a gas pipeline and 2 power lines were damaged; in Ivanopil, numerous houses and 2 administrative buildings were damaged. In Siversk, 4 private houses were destroyed, 2 private houses and a high-rise building were damaged; 3 houses were destroyed in Riznikivka. In Chasovoyarsk TG, 1 person died and 1 was injured. We remind you, on November 15, around 20:30, servicemen of the army of the Russian Federation shelled the outskirts of Slov Yanska. A person died as a result of an impact on an industrial zone.

Title: Training centers of the Ground Forces have started training soldiers according to the updated progra...
Description: This was reported by the -North- Operational Command. From November 1, the training centers of the Ground Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces switched to a new program of basic combined military training, the duration of which was increased from 30 to 45 days. The new BZVP includes increased hours of combat and pre-medical training, topography, etc. Also, servicemen will receive knowledge from the UAV course, communications and familiarize themselves with EW tools. An additional 15 days at the BZVP will allow you to improve your skills and abilities. BZVP includes shooting from so-called collective weapons: machine guns, RPGs, AGS; the hours of military topography, communications and tactical medicine have increased; new disciplines have been introduced - the study of UAVs and REB.

Title: Rustem Umyerov: The Ministry of Defense has created a new system of patenting military technologies
Description: This was reported by the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov.
