Our soldiers imperceptibly entered the enemy's positions and left the Russians with little choice: either surrender or die. -All those who made the right decision and surrendered were given first aid and taken to a safe place,- the SSO reported.   As reported by ArmiyaInform, SSO fighters filmed a new method of Russians helping their wounded: throwing them out of a car at speed.

Title: It's not theirs, that's why they're screwing up — the Russians are remotely mining Kherson
Description: This was announced on November 10 by the head of the Kherson City Military Administration, Roman Mrochko. -We are conducting a campaign to inform the population about the danger of mines: materials about the types of threats are regularly posted on resources, and appropriate signs are installed in parks. We constantly and in various ways remind: it is strictly forbidden to approach such explosive objects. A mine can detonate at any moment, even if it is not touched,- Roman Mrochko wrote. According to him, the other day in another park of Kherson — Prydniprovskyi — signs were installed warning of the possibility of remote mining of territories by the enemy. It was here that at one time cases of people being blown up on suspicious explosive objects were recorded. Previously, the corresponding signs were installed in Shevchenko Square and Park, in Slavy Park and Kherson Fortress Park. -Unfortunately, cases of remote mining by enemy troops in our community are not unique. The most often used -petal- mine is the most dangerous for people and animals. Be careful! Take care of yourself!-, urged Roman Mrochko. As reported by ArmyInform, in Kherson Oblast due to enemy shelling two people died, two more were injured.

Title: Russia used more than 800 air defense systems and about 600 attack drones in a week — President
Description: This was reported by the President on the morning of November 10. -Last night, Russia launched a record number of Shaheds and other attack drones against Ukraine — 145. During this week, it used more than 800 guided aerial bombs, about 600 attack drones and almost 20 missiles of various types. Such terror cannot be stopped with words, and the killing of children, the loss of relatives cannot simply be forgotten. Without strong decisions, there is no security from terror, and this is equally clear in every country. And without justice, there is no reliable peace, and achieving this is quite realistic for Ukraine,- said Volodymyr Zelenskyi. He posted a video about the consequences of Russian strikes on Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, the President said that Ukraine crossed the mark of the first hundred units of missile weapons this year.

Title: The occupiers are forming pincers - continuous assaults around Kurakhovo
Description: Orest Drymalovsky told about this on the telethon -Edyny Novyny- , a representative of the press service of the 79th Tavri Airborne Assault Brigade of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. According to him, mechanized Russian attacks continue almost every day in the brigade's area of ​​responsibility. The day before, Taurian paratroopers burned two armored vehicles with infantry, destroyed one tank and knocked out another tank. -The occupiers are trying to form ticks. To increase the operation of its FPV drones and shock drones, which are already operating in the city of Kurakhovo itself and on the approaches to the city. It is impossible to imagine movement in the combat zone without EW devices,- said Orest Drymalovskyi. Previously ArmyInform reported that the fighters of the 79th Tavrian Assault Brigade of the DSHV of the Armed Forces of Ukraine destroy columns of Russian armored vehicles as soon as they enter the line of attack.

Title: At least 8 explosions were recorded - the General Staff spoke about a new attack on Russia
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported this on November 10. -At least 8 explosions were recorded. The results of objective control indicate the presence of at least two ignition points on the territory of the military unit and signs of secondary detonation. As of six in the morning, a strong fire continued at the facility in the Bryansk region. The results of the damage are being clarified. The joint successful combat work of all components of the Defense Forces on important targets of the Russian Armed Forces will continue. There will be more!-, the General Staff of the Armed Forces assured. As reported by ArmyInform, #8217;a video of the attack on the arsenal in Bryansk appeared.

Title: To break through, to gain a foothold, to attack further, regardless of losses, are the tactics of th...
Description: The video of the combat work was published on November 10 on the unit's channel. -The offensive technique of the Russians is very simple and -meaty-. First, several armored boxes with the landing party on board break through the landings. The main part of which is affected together with the -armor-. But someone gets fixed in the landing and waits for reinforcements. Our task is to smash the reinforcements as hard as possible, which we are successfully doing,- commented the situation in -Hostry Kartuza-. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the -Sharp Cartouche- unit of the National Guard punished the occupiers for burning the Ukrainian house.

Title: Autumn has come - logistics have stopped: the enemy has problems with the delivery of ammunition
Description: A military serviceman with the call sign Archie 57 told about this on the Army TV airwaves of the mechanized brigade named after Kostya Gordienko, the chieftain of Kosh. According to Archie, the goal of the occupiers is to get to the Vovchaya River. In the process of the offensive, they protect the equipment more than the personnel. So, untrained personnel began to be thrown into the assaults. -Recently a prisoner was taken. It was a freshly mobilized resource that had been trained for less than a month. Currently, their personnel is diluted by such additions. Plus, according to him, they have disbanded many rear units that are being thrown into attack aircraft,- Archie said. In addition, according to a soldier of the 57th separate mechanized brigade, the occupiers have almost stopped using MLRS. Currently, mortars, anti-aircraft guns, and FPV drones are most often used. -Because, due to worsening weather conditions, the enemy has problems with logistics – they cannot consistently deliver ammunition. Plus control of logistics routes from our side. Therefore, currently the intensity of use of MLRS systems has significantly decreased,- states Archie. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the -Shkval- battalion of the 57th motorized infantry brigade named after Kostya Gordienko captured prisoners during cleaning of the building in Vovchansk.

Title: The green light of crossing the red lines — in Bryansk, UAVs attacked the artillery arsenal
Description: Video and photos of the blows were made public already a few hours. They show explosions and secondary detonation of ammunition stored at the arsenal. The overall extent of the damage will be determined at a later date. The affected arsenal is located 105 km from the border of Ukraine.   As reported by ArmyInform, a month ago units of the Unmanned Systems Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine -rosiyi/->hit the enemy arsenal near the village of Karachevo, Bryansk region of the Russian Federation.

Title: Let's kiss everyone - the Cabinet of Ministers allowed civilians to shoot the occupiers with declare...
Description: About this reported on November 10 by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. Now civilians will be able to use declared weapons to repel aggression against Ukraine. The adopted resolution, taking into account the requirements of the Law of Ukraine -On ensuring the participation of civilians in the defense of Ukraine-, makes changes to paragraph 4 of the Procedure for the use of firearms by civilians during participation in repelling and deterring armed aggression of the Russian Federation and/or other states against Ukraine during the period of martial law state The updated Procedure provides for the right of civilians to use firearms, which was declared in accordance with the Law of Ukraine -On ensuring the participation of civilians in the defense of Ukraine.- In August of this year, the Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine amended the above-mentioned law and streamlined the rules for the handling of weapons by civilians, as well as granted the right to declare all available weapons and ammunition for them. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense and the Defense Procurement Agency are actively working on strengthening defense capabilities of Ukraine, investing and attracting funds from national manufacturers and introducing competitive bidding.

Title: One was shot down, the other killed them - our pilots were hunting down Russian drone hunters
Description: The video of the defeat was released on November 10 on the company's channel. -Moving along the roads of Donetsk region, the invaders used an automobile electronic warfare device and a pump-action shotgun against our drone. Admittedly, this link worked before, and they shot down our -bird- when we lost control link. But revenge was instant, and in this game the driver and his bodyguard with a gun were sent to hell. We like this exchange: minus two drones against minus two orcs,- Muramasa commented on the video. The pilots thanked one of the famous volunteers for the drones. As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the company of Muramasa unmanned attack aircraft complexes of the 109th separate brigade of the Terrodefense Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces destroyed a Russian vehicle together with the occupants.

Title: -Meat-attacks with -vinaigrette- — in Donetsk region, the Russians drive the freshly mobilized invad...
Description: This was told on Army TV by acting. press officer of the 33rd separate mechanized brigade Nazar Voytenkov. According to Voytenkov, there are simply too many enemies. the Russians are storming with both weak-minded and experienced forces. -It's vinaigrette. There are plenty of newly mobilized among them. As always, they collect any garbage from their territory, dress them in uniforms and throw them into battle,- said Nazar Voytenkov. As reported by > ArmyInform, the occupiers are using combined assaults — they are trying to get close to Kurakhovo both from the north and from the south.

Title: Russia hit Ukraine with a record number of UAVs
Description: This was reported by the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine on the morning of November 10. The air attack was repulsed by anti-aircraft missile forces, aviation, electronic warfare units, mobile fire groups of the Air Force and the Defense Forces of Ukraine. As of 09:30, 62 enemy UAVs were shot down in Odesa, Kyiv, Zhytomyr, Kharkiv, Poltava, Sumy, Vinnytsia, Khmelnytskyi, Chernihiv, Dnipropetrovsk, Mykolaiv, Zaporizhia and Donetsk regions. 67 enemy drones were lost in various regions of Ukraine, another 10 Russian UAVs left the airspace of Ukraine in the direction of Moldova, Belarus and the Russian Federation. Odesa and other regions suffered as a result of the occupiers' attack. Apartment buildings and private property were damaged, there were no casualties, and the victims are being assisted. As reported by ArmyInform, expert told why the enemy chose the tactics of massive attacks by -shahedes-.

Title: The killers of the Russian Federation - the occupiers shot a captured soldier of the Armed Forces
Description: This was reported by the prosecutor's office of the Donetsk region on the evening of November 9. A pre-trial investigation has been started in criminal proceedings for the commission of a war crime that caused the death of a person (Part 2 of Article 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). Urgent investigative (search) actions aimed at establishing all the circumstances of the event are currently being conducted. The time and place of the crime are also determined. The killing of prisoners of war is a gross violation of the Geneva Conventions and is classified as a grave international crime. As reported by ArmyInform, the occupiers shot 6 of our prisoners a> in the Pokrovsky direction.

Title: 120 - good Russians - paratroopers took a census of Russian corpses in front of their positions
Description: A video with the consequences of the debacle was made public on November 10 on the brigade's channel. The air reconnaissance of the paratroopers counted all the corpses of the occupiers that remained after the attack and recorded 120 dead. -The coordinated combat work, courage and bravery of the paratroopers together with the reconnaissance, artillery and unmanned aerial vehicle companies are behind the successful actions,- the brigade commented on the video.   As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the Rubaka attack UAV unit of the 77th Airmobile Dnipro Brigade destroyed enemy anti-aircraft missile complex -Buk-.

Title: They went on a mission in ten, surrendered in two - the story of Russian prisoners
Description: The video of the conversation with the prisoners was made public on the battalion's channel. During a successful assault near the village of Shakhtarske in Donetsk region, Skala fighters captured two servicemen from the 69th separate Russian cover brigade. -The prisoners say that there were ten of them going on the mission, but only two remained. All those who refused to lay down their arms — 200,- the battalion commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 425th assault battalion -Skala- showed risky raid of their scouts who are under fire were preparing the way for our offensive.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, fortitude, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , I decree: to start holding a nationwide minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, to be announced in all mass media regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: Abandoned equipment, many corpses are the consequences of the Russian armored assault in Kurshchyna
Description: The video was made public on the evening of November 9. The Russians tried to attack our positions, but were defeated by heavy fire and fled, leaving behind damaged equipment and the bodies of their soldiers. In the course of that -meaty- attack, the total losses of the 810 Marine Infantry Brigade amounted to more than 10 armored personnel carriers, up to 30 killed, several dozen wounded, and about a dozen captured.   As reported by ArmyInform, in the Kursk region the Defense Forces restrain the enemy, resorting to maneuverable defense.

Title: The situation remains difficult and has a tendency to worsen — the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed F...
Description: This was announced by the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine on the evening of November 9. -At the beginning of the conversation, I informed my American colleague about the situation on the front line. The situation remains difficult and tends to worsen. The enemy, using its numerical advantage, continues to conduct offensive actions and concentrates its main efforts on the Pokrovsky and Kurakhiv directions,- Oleksandr Syrskyi wrote. He noted that there are numerous data on the preparation of North Korean servicemen to participate in hostilities on the side of Russian troops. -During the conversation, the American side confirmed strict compliance with the commitments made to provide the Defense Forces of Ukraine with the declared nomenclature of weapons and military equipment. I took the opportunity to thank our partners for their consistent and steadfast support of Ukraine,- said Oleksandr Syrskyi. As reported by ArmyInform, the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces General Oleksandr Syrskyi pokazav-robotu-nashyh-voyiniv/->published a video that demonstrates the effective work of the Defense Forces of Ukraine to eliminate Russian invaders and their equipment.

Title: The Russians buried their ships at the bases
Description: This was notified by the Naval Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. In the Mediterranean Sea, 1 enemy ship, which is a carrier of -Caliber- cruise missiles with a total firing of up to 8 missiles. During the day, in the interests of the Russian Federation, passage through the Kerch Strait was carried out: to the Black Sea - 14 ships, of which 6 continued their movement in the direction of the Bosphorus Strait; to the Sea of ​​Azov — 11 ships, of which 2 were moving from the Bosphorus Strait. Russia continues to violate the International Convention for the Safety of Life at Sea of ​​1974 (SOLAS) by disabling automatic identification systems. As reported by ArmyInform, the future flagship of the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine demonstrates high combat capability Corvette -Ivan Mazepa- continues to successfully pass state tests.

Title: More than 1,300 soldiers and 30 artillery systems — the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine...
Description: This was reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The total combat losses of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 10.11.24 are estimated to be: -Data is being verified… Beat the occupier! We will win together!-, - said the message of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.   As reported by ArmyInform,

Title: As a result of nighttime Russian shelling of Odessa, 2 people were injured and a fire broke out
Description: This was reported by the State Emergency Service on the morning of November 10. To eliminate the consequences of the attack, 52 rescuers were involved, as well as volunteers and units of the Odesa City Council. Two victims are reported to have been injured. As reported by ArmyInform, the night before last Odesa and the surrounding areas again dity/-> were attacked by attack drones. As a result of the strikes, one person died, 13 more were injured, including two children.

Title: Living Russian dead appeared on the front - the occupier shot himself, but continued to fire
Description: The video was published on the Internet. The wounded invader, as is their custom, gave himself first aid in Russian: he shot himself in the head with a machine gun. He hit, but after that the body in convulsions continued to shoot with automatic weapons. -The world needs to see how katsaps fight,- commented one of the -Bureviya- fighters on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, the fighters of the presidential brigade -Storm- of the National Guard not only struck enemy armored vehicles, but also achieved detonations of ammunition and other beauty .

Title: The enemy attacked 18 times in Kurshchyna — the General Staff of the Armed Forces
Description: Operational information as of 22.00 on November 9 was published by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The defense forces are directing efforts to disrupt the execution of the Russian invaders' offensive plans and exhaust their combat potential. On the Kharkiv direction, Russian terrorists stormed the positions of Ukrainian units in the Vovchansk area twice in vain. Today, the invaders lost 65 servicemen killed and wounded in this direction, our soldiers also destroyed an armored combat vehicle, an artillery system, 20 UAVs, eight units of automobiles and three units of special equipment; significantly damaged three artillery systems, seven units of automobiles and a unit of special equipment. Eight times the enemy attacked our fortifications in the Kupyansk direction near Kucherivka, Kruglyakivka and Lozovoy. At this time, five clashes are ongoing. The enemy attack is currently being repelled by Ukrainian soldiers near Grekivka in the Limansky direction. Fourteen enemy assaults during the day were stopped near Grekivka, Nevsky, Torsky and Bilogorivka. In the Siverskyi direction, our units repelled an attack near Verkhnokamyanskyi. In the Kramatorsk direction, two attempts by the invaders to advance near Bila Hora and Stupochky ended in failure. In the direction of Toretsk, the occupiers stormed nine times today in the area of ​​Toretsk, Dilyivka, Shcherbinivka and Nelipivka. Fighting continues in four locations – the enemy is pressing, trying to advance in the Toretsk area. The enemy is intensively attacking the Ukrainian defenders in the Pokrovsky direction. During the day, in total, he carried out 36 assault and offensive actions. The Russian occupiers are most active in the districts of Promenya, Lysivka, and Hryhorivka. Three clashes are still ongoing. According to preliminary calculations, today our soldiers eliminated 180 and injured 210 occupiers in this direction. Three tanks, ten armored combat vehicles, 19 vehicles and four mortars were destroyed. Also nine units of automotive equipment and one artillery system. It is also hot in the Kurakhiv direction, at this time of the day there are 40 combat clashes. The terrorists tried to advance in the districts of Illinka, Novoselidivka, Novodmytrivka, Maksimilianivka, Dalnyi, Katerynivka, and Antonivka. The fighting is still going on. In the Vremivsk direction, Ukrainian soldiers repelled five attacks by enemy units in the areas of Bogoyavlenka, Trudovoy and Maksimivka. In the Orihiv direction, units of our troops repelled one enemy attack in the direction of Novoandriivka. In the Dnieper direction, three enemy assaults failed. In Kurshchyna, Ukrainian fighters hold the defense, repelling four enemy attacks; in total, the enemy made 18 attempts to attack our units today. There were no significant changes in the situation in other directions. Today we will celebrate the Ukrainian soldiers from the 128th Separate Mountain Assault Brigade of the Transcarpathia and the 68th Separate Hunter Brigade named after Oleksa Dovbush, who steadfastly restrained the onslaught of overwhelming enemy forces on the eastern front. -Let's beat the enemy and bring our Victory closer! -Glory to Ukraine!- - said in a message from the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, from the beginning of the day at the front there was /?utm_source=mainnews&utm_medium=article&utm_campaign=traficsource->108 combat clashes. The greatest activity of the occupiers is observed in the Pokrovsky and Kurakhiv directions.

Title: -Queen in the trenches- as -Thunder in the sky-: what movie news to expect this winter. Interview wi...
Description: In an interview with ArmiyaInform, their producer, reserve colonel Oleksandr Driz, told about these new movies. - Let's start with the nearest date - December 6. I am very pleased that for this holiday we have a gift in the form of a movie called -Queens in the Trenches-. This is a film about women in the army based on the example of three people who had very good jobs before the war. One of our heroines, Oreste Brit, studied at the Sorbonne University and lived in Paris. In 2006, she became a beauty queen, received the title of -Miss Kyiv-, her photo was decorated by the best foreign publications. Another heroine is Diana -Dana- Vinogradova, a very interesting person who stood near the origins of -Right Sector- and currently holds the position of deputy brigade commander. She is the only woman in the Armed Forces of Ukraine who holds a position of this level - the deputy commander of the brigade for moral and psychological support. Now she is studying at the National University of Defense, there is also a fragment about this in our film. The third heroine is a designer, participant and organizer of various music festivals. This is Yulia Sidorova, her call sign is -Kuba-. Everyone already knows her as a very famous medic who saved a huge number of servicemen and continues to do so in the 92nd Brigade in Kharkiv. She saves lives and has her own team that she has chosen. All this will also be told in our film. The main goal of this film is to use the example of these women to show both girls and men how to act in modern conditions. Oresta Britt is a well-known volunteer. She was an adviser to the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Valery Zaluzhny, now she is very active in volunteering, and is engaged in REEs. It has many different directions of assistance to the Armed Forces and we show it all. Our other two heroines officially joined the military during the large-scale invasion, signed contracts and are now very successfully serving in the ranks of the Armed Forces. We hope that this project will have a positive effect on the mobilization campaign, that people will see how these girls, having such serious successes before the war, went to defend Ukraine during a large-scale invasion. - You mentioned the mobilization campaign. What do you think can activate this process so that new people go to the army? – I think that only a positive example of others. By the way, Orestes Britt in our film tells what advantages a person receives when he now goes to the service, goes to war. Yes, it is very dangerous there, you can stay there both on the battlefield and on the shield, as they say, return. But the fact is that during such service, a person receives both recognition and status in the country that will win - a worthy place, honor and respect in society. And he will also find the best friends and will feel like a real citizen, a real patriot who did not hide, but followed the call of his soul and heart to defend our country. Therefore, in such a situation, of course, we cannot influence some administrative or organizational measures for mobilization, but in a spiritual way, in the fact that people may have a desire to leave after listening to these girls - I am sure. Many people are currently in a state of uncertainty, so this film of ours will, I think, help them orient themselves and make the right choice, because the Armed Forces of Ukraine currently offer a lot of vacancies. - And whose story impressed you the most? b> – All three of them are such extraordinary and very bright heroines. But I was personally impressed by -Dana- Vynogradova. She is an artist, she had exhibitions in Lviv. In addition, she writes poems, publishes patriotic books. She is involved in the army, starting from training and ideological work with personnel to purely military operational, operational-tactical matters, where she takes a direct part. I just wonder where she got such a range of knowledge, skills and abilities. She is very young, now a senior lieutenant, but she has held the positions of lieutenant colonel, and now she will probably have higher positions after the National Defense University. And it's not just like that. Even the brigade commander, who was her commander, was amazed at how she, being in the rank of lieutenant, handled all her duties very confidently. Therefore, this is really the kind of story that impressed me the most. - Now tell us about your second film - -Thunder in the clear sky-, the main character of which is the Hero of Ukraine Rostyslav Lazarenko, call sign -Thunder-. – We created a project called -Fighting Families-. The co-author of his idea is, together with me, the head of the Department of Public Relations of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Colonel Bohdan Senyk. Each series of this project is dedicated to a certain type of Armed Forces. The films have a career orientation load and also promote military professions. During the large-scale invasion, two series were created, dedicated to the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The first series was called -Defenders of the Sky- about the profession of military pilots. And the second - -Air defense is working calmly.- Rostyslav Lazarenko also took part there, but he was not the main character, there was another main character. After that, we decided that Rostyslav, as a Hero of Ukraine, as a very well-known and respected person, needed a separate film and we are currently creating -Thunder in the Clear Sky- as a portrait project. This is a portrait of a hero who experienced a lot and deserved a lot. Just imagine that today he has almost doubled the record of Ivan Kozhedub himself. Rostislav graduated from the military educational institution named after Kozhedub. He is an unsurpassed personality and the film is about him and partly about the team of those with whom he is. Because his boys, as he calls them, are a fighting family. They have their own corporate culture, their own awards, and tattoos, and bracelets, and many symbols that are fundamentally important to them. This film reveals more broadly the life of the hero, the leader of the stormtrooper pilots. Undoubtedly, there are also tragic stories about his brothers who have already died. How difficult it all is for him these days... He says: -For me, when the war ends, it will be a very difficult period, because then I will be able to remember everyone. And not like now, because now there are constant sorties-. He has already destroyed an insane number of enemies and continues to destroy them. Unfortunately, this is already the history of today. Despite everything, he believes in Victory and aims his boys at the victorious activity of destroying the enemy. - When will you be able to see the films? - Both of these projects were commissioned by the Ukrainian Cultural fund where we won the competition. -Queens in the Trenches- is scheduled to premiere on Armed Forces Day on Channel 24. After that, the film will go to other TV channels, streaming platforms and other sources. And the second project -Thunder in the Clear Sky- has, in our opinion, a cinema perspective. That's why we want to launch it in cinemas in January first. Even now, the -Planet Kino- chain and some cinemas want to rent it. Therefore, only after the film is shown in cinemas, it will be released on television. - Tell us about your creative plans. - Today we want to continue the aviation theme. Apart from Rostislav Lazarenko, there are many other worthy people there. By the way, the Hero of Ukraine Vadym Voroshilov, call sign -Karaya- and the pilot, squadron commander, who is currently also studying at the Defense University of Ukraine, Ivan Smerechansky - -Smereka-, also participate in the film -Thunder in the Clear Sky-. We want to expand the palette of these heroes, so we are planning another film about attack aircraft. And then we want to talk about bomber aircraft and fighter jets, which we have in all projects. That is why we have very good prospects in aviation, I believe. But we will not forget about other troops. Perhaps it will be possible to continue the -Fighting Families- cycle. We did about the infantry, marines, assault troops, special operations forces. In the continuation of -Fighting Families- we would like to touch on other military professions.

Title: How to survive in battle, or What useful things will be taught at BZVP: life hacks from a DSHV instr...
Description: ArmyInform asked the instructor about how paratroopers are prepared for war with the enemy, as well as how to communicate with society so that people stand up for the defense of Ukraine. -The deeper you dig into the ground and properly arrange the dugout, the more likely you are to survive the battle,- Comroty Roman explains the importance of engineering training to the mobilized. Theoretical block: instructors talk about the nuances. They explain to people at the classes how to act and what to do during enemy attacks with guided aerial bombs: - the Russians use anti-aircraft missiles on the front, aim them directly at our positions. Guided aerial bombs are divided into different types and types, that is, they have different charge equivalents. People in positions must understand: in order to survive, deep holes must be dug, overlaps must be arranged, and so on. In the winter of this year, the 79th DSHV brigade, Mariinsky direction. Then the Russians made 13 KAB strikes against our advanced positions. After that, I talked with my brother, the boys survived because they dug in well. Everything was -according to - according to-, there were no -two hundred-, two - -three hundred-, concussions. This is a real-life example of how the ability to dig in well saves the lives of defenders on the front line. These are tactical, fire, engineering, intelligence training, work with/against UAVs and tactical medicine, communications. We focus on night classes using drones. Interaction is important on the battlefield. The mobilized work as part of tactical groups, divisions and platoons. Let's see which of them is the leader to determine the commander of the department. Actions in defense and attack, assault actions, tactical movements inherent in various types of combat. Small group tactics: hit and roll. Repelling an enemy sabotage and reconnaissance group, how to counter the meaty assaults of the Rashists. That is, all working moments that are in a real combat situation. Due to the fact that the enemy is now massively using drones with resets, we show them what elements can unmask them during missions. That they can give out during the day, or in the dark. Working with weapons and shooting is, of course, a priority.- The key point of training: the instructors in the classes share their own combat experience. Again, there are different terrains: an urbanized area, a plantation, a field, some kind of body of water. Accordingly, the combat tasks are different: - In 2023, during the counteroffensive in the south, I, as part of the 46th Airmobile Brigade, performed tasks in the -fire sack- near Robotyny in Zaporozhye. The task was to keep two plantations and approaches to them for 6-7 days. Our group consisted of 8 servicemen. In principle, there were no fixed positions there, but there were, as we called them - -coffins- - small pits, where we held the defense. SPs were set up, sectors of fire were determined. To say that it was very hot there is an understatement. The enemy worked around the clock for us: Vasylok, LPG, AGS, aviation with anti-aircraft guns, and barrel artillery. In short, solid trash. Plus the enemy used small group tactics, launching groups of three at night to determine where we were. Of course, we destroyed them on the approaches. The drones hung in the air by themselves. One day, a command came from the management: storm the next landings. Disguising smoke was launched to indicate the direction of the landings and the starting point of the assault. I don't know how, but our tanks somehow got into positions in this area, until that time none of our heavy equipment had left at that point, and they worked on the enemy. After which there was an assault, another unit from our brigade took these two landings. Next was to be our replacement. We already realized that the enemy had hacked our radio communication and knew the evacuation point already during the withdrawal from the positions. They flew at us with -fan- mines, then drones joined. But all my soldiers were prepared for any close approach, they all knew what they had to do, followed by always voice commands and onward movement, on turns at a run, no one stopped anywhere. We walked the entire route (several kilometers in fact), although we also had our own weapons and shells, we took everything as befits paratroopers. Somehow we reached the trenches of our neighbors. They flew there. Hecked out. Got in touch. They waited Our driver was injured then, so there had to be another car. The enemy struck again with mortar fire. Aimed at 120 mines for 15 minutes, and it seemed like an eternity. There was darkness in everyone's eyes, screams, it is clear that the head was bursting from pain, contusion. Our brother's leg was torn off by shrapnel, already in the dugout they provided him with medical assistance, they wanted to save him. But, unfortunately, the heart couldn't stand it… What am I leading to? In battle, the main thing is not to lose control and the ability to manage people during combat. Quality training saves the lives of military personnel on the front lines. Therefore, using such personal examples, we explain to the mobilized what reality awaits them and why it is so important to be ready for anything. The contingent of mobilized people are completely different people in terms of psychotype, social status, with different life problems and the like. We determine the degree of motivation of each person, for this we conduct testing, and we continue to work with them in classes on national and patriotic training. When working with recruits, psychological preparation is also important. Their combat effectiveness directly depends on the emotional health of servicemen. After all, we understand very well that things happen differently in war, in moments of panic, in stressful situations, a person can go -into a stupor- and, unfortunately, die. Therefore, we teach how to cope with stress and pressure, make decisions and, most importantly, work in battle as part of a team. So how to master yourself in crisis situations. There is such a simple exercise -Square-. It is quite effective. To calm down, a serviceman must breathe. He visualizes a square, on inhalation he moves his gaze to the right corner, on exhalation lowers it, on inhalation to the left corner and again on exhalation to the upper corner. In such a simple way, a person distracts himself, focuses on breathing and calms down over time. Next, it is important to teach the unit commander how to act in similar situations. He is the commander, the leader. And he should not shout at a subordinate when he is not in his right mind. The great war has been going on for three years, and the people who are coming now, unfortunately, are not prepared at all. Many people do not even know elementary things, this is primarily some basic knowledge of tactical medicine. There is YouTube: there are a lot of video courses on tactical medicine, which demonstrate in detail what the MARCH algorithm is. See how the machine is disassembled and assembled. There are shooting ranges, airsoft training that everyone loves, it's all available. People should study before they join the army. It will be easier for instructors in training centers to prepare you, because there will already be some basis. And, again, even if you've already joined the army, don't feel sorry for yourself. Especially during the preparation period. Work at the maximum, at 200%, at 300%, so that it will be easier for you in the future. Absorb as much information as possible, ask questions, always be interested in everything. It will be easier for you in battle. I will give an example. We had a set where we conducted BZVP for contractors. The youngest was only 18, and the oldest was probably 27 years old. So, they came to us already charged, hungry for knowledge. You know, it's like a blank slate on which you can write your best story. Or like the clay from which you mold that perfect fighter. To this day, thank God, the boys are unsubscribing, thanking them for the training. And as always, the next guys are asked to -pump- even more. Every Ukrainian man must protect his family and country. This is an axiom. You are either here in the army or, due to your health, you work for defense in the rear. There are many professions in the Armed Forces where you can be useful. Now there are recruiting centers, they will help you choose your profession. Prepare yourself for the fact that Ukraine must be defended. It will not be the case that some fight and others sit and wait for the war to end by itself. Will not end. We have such a category of citizens who say: they will come to my home, to my city or village, then I will go to fight. But it will be too late. The military, who were in the war, they understand this perfectly. They say that many Ukrainians are simply afraid of dying in the war. Yes, people are afraid, everyone is afraid. A person who is not afraid is just crazy, I think. Fear is good. If there is no fear, it is bad, especially when you are at war. Some say they are afraid of TCCs. We have already found a solution for you: allow military units to mobilize people directly, bypassing the TCC and SP. In my opinion, this should be done much earlier. There would be fewer negative stories, which Russian propaganda is very fond of spreading in order to discourage mobilization in our country. Mobilization is a matter of state survival. It is necessary to change the military at the front, who have been fighting there for almost 1,000 days.

Title: They no longer know how to scare: the Russians have seen Poles in the TCC
Description: However, this is a fake, said the UNITED24 platform, because it has never published such ads or posted such a video. In the fake video, they say that approximately 47% of the staff of the TCC are Polish citizens who have signed contracts with the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. Such a step is apparently necessary in order to fight corruption during mobilization in Ukraine and to increase the efficiency of the TCC. The video itself was assembled by propagandists from footage that has nothing to do with the so-called -mass service of Poles- in the TCC. For example, with the help of a reverse search fact checker -Vox Ukraine- united24-> found a photo of the former head of the Odesa regional TCC and SP Oleksandr Okhrimenko, on which the Ukrainian chevron is visible. The photo was taken on December 12, 2023, during his press conference in Ukrinform. First, the Russians showed Okhrimenko's real chevron, and then a redacted one with the flag of Poland. In the original pictures, only the Ukrainian flag is present. There are also grammatical errors in the video. For example, -territorial center of recruitment and social support- was translated as TRSSCs, but it is correct TCR and SS (Territorial Centers of Recruitment and Social Support). The main goal of this and similar fakes is to disrupt the mobilization campaign in Ukraine. Russians no longer know how to scare Ukrainians so that they do not join the army. Each time their lies are more and more detached from reality.

Title: Even the bridge to the Crimea is protected by the Russians not by quality, but by quantity
Description: The spokesman of the Naval Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, captain of the 3rd rank, told about this on the broadcast of the -Suspilne Novosti- marathon Dmytro Pletenchuk. — The enemy is indeed taking steps to strengthen the defenses of this facility. Accordingly, it is impossible to say that these actions have absolutely no result. Whatever quality, whatever principles these weapons are used, in any case, of course, quantity matters, he said. So even in the case of the Kerch bridge, Russians traditionally try to increase quantitative indicators for themselves and do not improve quality. — Just in the case of the so-called -Crimean- bridge, we see that the Russians very often take precisely the quantitative indicator. Because, as practice shows, it is quite difficult for them to repel attacks of even not the most modern weapons with the systems they use, the spokesman explained. However, the number of weapons collected to protect the bridge is still capable of producing results. — Given the amount of anti-aircraft they have attracted, they can still do this from time to time. They try to protect it both from the air and from the water. For this, they use various hydrotechnical structures and aviation patrols, Dmytro Pletenchuk said. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that threat of strikes -calibres- from the Caspian are not zero, but extremely insignificant.

Title: Maneuver defense and -meat- assaults: the operation in Kurshchyna continues
Description: told about this on the telethon -Edyny Novy- > spokesman of OTU -Siversk-, Colonel Vadym Mysnyk. — The enemy continues to maintain the intensity of shelling along the entire strip of the northern border. These are Chernihiv, Sumy and part of Kharkiv regions in our area of ​​responsibility. By terrorizing the local population, in addition to this, they are thus tying up our combat units. These are hundreds of kilometers of the border so that we cannot concentrate them or use them in the hottest areas of the front, he said. The occupiers hit the territory of the Kursk region most intensively. — The greatest concentration of shelling and fighting, [concentration] of enemy forces on the territory of the Kursk region is where fierce battles are currently taking place. They have a nimble nature on our part, the spokesman said. Instead, the enemy tries to fight not with skill, but with the number of personnel and equipment, in the usual way. - They are constantly forced to bring various reserves here - both from the depths of their territory and from other areas of the front. -When they run out of armored vehicles, they send small groups of infantry to attack,- he said. The Russians use the accumulated forces and resources extremely inefficiently. — The enemy uses the tactics of meat assaults. We do not see anything new. They accumulate manpower, equipment and try to use their advantage precisely in this with assault actions. But our soldiers in defense are very good and the enemy's losses in the last two days have been significant, Vadym Mysnyk said. The Russian invaders treat their own civilian population on the territory of Kurshchyna just as ruthlessly. - Just demolishes all its settlements to zero. Over the past day, the enemy used 46 anti-aircraft missiles in Kurshchyna, and 15 anti-aircraft missiles this afternoon. Dropped 60 UAVs, 32 [hits] by FPV drones, the spokesman said. The occupiers are also actively using artillery and mortars. Over the past 24 hours, 264 shellings and about 1,200 explosions have been recorded in the Kursk region controlled by the Defense Forces. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that voyuvaty-po-inshomu-rosiyany-ne-vmiyut/->Russians -take their own settlements to zero and hit their own population-, because they don't know how to fight in any other way.

Title: The number of KAB drops in Kharkiv region has increased: the purpose of the enemy has been explained...
Description: A representative of the communications service told about this on the air of the -Suspilne Novosti- marathon with the public of the -Charter- brigade of the National Guard of Ukraine, Sergeant Volodymyr Degtyarev. — The beginning of the Kursk operation had a certain result, for example, in the fact that the number of used anti-aircraft guns in Kharkiv region significantly decreased. If there could have been dozens in May-June, then they practically disappeared, he said. However, in recent weeks, the number of guided aerial bombs dropped by the enemy on Kharkiv region has increased significantly. — In the last few weeks, the enemy has started using guided aerial bombs again. -Mostly in the city, on civilian infrastructure, mostly in the evening or at night, although there are also daytime shellings,- said the guardsman. — It is very difficult to find logic in the application of [CABs]. Sometimes they just hit the highway. Sometimes, like last night, in the center of the square, in Derzhprom, which is a UNESCO monument, or simply in suburban buildings. It is very difficult to find any logic, apart from the fact that these are obviously attempts to intimidate the population, Volodymyr Degtyarev noted. He said that the detonation of a guided aerial bomb is truly depressing. — Those who have watched even the video of detonation of guided aerial bombs, see that the blast wave from them reaches hundreds of meters. Their impression is simply incredible. And, in fact, now it is one of their main means of such, one might say, massive destruction, - emphasized the representative of -Charter-. ArmyInform previously reported that lyudyna-distala-poranen/->Russian troops shelled Kup'yansk again: two people were killed, one more person was injured.

Title: The threat of strikes - calibers - from the Caspian: not zero, but extremely insignificant
Description: The spokesman of the Naval Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, captain of the 3rd rank, told about this on the broadcast of the -Suspilne Novosti- marathon Dmytro Pletenchuk. — There are currently no confirmed facts of the Caspian Sea being used to launch missiles that could fire at our territory. There are cruise missile carriers there, that's a fact. Their technical characteristics allow them to be used from such a distance - this is also a fact. However, there are currently no confirmed examples of such use - and this is also a fact, he emphasized. The military noted that there are at least two Caliber carriers in the Caspian Sea who fled there from the Black Sea. -There are at least two carriers that are being tested for the Black Sea Fleet, which were forced there from the Azov-Black Sea region,- the spokesman said. In view of this, the danger of using -Caliber- sea-based missiles from the Caspian Sea is not zero, but extremely small. — The danger can be considered to be present, but the distance is quite large and it will allow to react in time to such launches. Considering the technical characteristics of these missiles, the probability of their destruction is very high, Dmytro Pletenchuk emphasized. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that enemy fleet The Black Sea fleet is on deaf defense: defenseless Russian ships are protected from drones by aviation.

Title: Enemy KABs in the South significantly increased: the results of disappointing statistics
Description: About this on the air of the national telethon -Edyny Novyny- mentioned the spokesman of the OUV -Tavria - Colonel Vladyslav Voloshyn. — From the beginning of September, the Russians made certain changes in the design of guided aerial bombs and these bombs began to fly further. They hit with these bombs, struck even in the center of Zaporozhye, he said. The military gave the following statistics of the dropping of KABs in the South for October. -In October, in the Southern direction, the Russians used about 500 guided aerial bombs specifically on Ukrainian positions and on populated areas near the line of combat,- said a military officer. About a third of these 500 CABs occur in the last week of October. — Already this month, during the first 9 days of November, the enemy also used about 150 guided aerial bombs. That is, the enemy began to use guided aerial bombs more, because they bring him a certain result and it is very difficult to fight with this type of weapon. It is better to fight him when these bombs are still on the ground, and not somewhere in flight or already on the ground, Vladyslav Voloshyn emphasized. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in the South the occupiers are preparing for assaults and have named which areas are most at risk.

Title: The number of enemy assaults in Toretsk decreased, but Russian losses increased
Description: Major Anastasia Bobovnikova, spokeswoman of Luhansk OTU, told about this on the broadcast of the Suspilne Novosti marathon. — The number of assaults has decreased in this direction. However, if we look at the nature of these assaults, it has [also] changed. -We can see that the enemy is using more personnel,- she said. This leads to a significant increase in the casualties of the occupiers. — They suffer much greater losses. Today, every day we see that the enemy loses 50-70 people killed and wounded, which is about 5% of the total losses of the Russians per day, the officer noted. This is how the spokeswoman described the Russian assaults in the urban development of Toretsk. - You can imagine what these assaults are like: there are a lot of Russian personnel in the urban development. They are hiding somewhere, sitting somewhere. And we, of course, detect them and try to destroy them as efficiently as possible. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in the area of ​​Chasovoy Yar and Toretska, the enemy is preparing to intensify assaults: the units of the occupiers are well equipped contractors.

Title: Strike drones of the 12th brigade - Azov - work in New York
Description: The corresponding video was published by the brigade's official page. Rapid and remote destruction of enemy personnel is the key to preserving the infantry of the Defense Forces, which participates in contact battles. No matter how well the enemy hides, drone pilots will find them anywhere. Previously ArmyInform reported that the Armed Forces of Ukraine are holding defense in the hottest areas of the front.

Title: How the channel helps to protect Chasiv Yar was explained in OTU -Luhansk-
Description: Major Anastasia Bobovnikova, spokeswoman of Luhansk OTU, told about this on the broadcast of the Suspilne Novosti marathon. — The canal next to Chasiv Yar is a natural fortification that protects Chasiv Yar. In order to cross this channel, [the enemy] needs to build certain crossings and bridges. In order to bring the bridge, at a minimum, there should be no active fire [from the Defense Forces], she said. Gunners of units of the Defense Forces keep the canal under fire control. — We, in our turn, protecting this channel, of course, will not give such an opportunity [to the enemy] and we will take every opportunity to stop the crossings and keep this channel under the watchful eye of our artillery, — Ukrainian drones will also not allow vehicles to cross the enemy channel . — Also, FPV drones work very skillfully. Our drone operators have a very high level of training and also have a very high level of creativity. They are constantly inventing new and new ways that Russia can't chew,- Anastasia Bobovnikova stressed. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in the area of ​​Chasovoy Yar and Toretska, the enemy is preparing to intensify assaults: the units of the occupiers are well equipped contractors.

Title: Russian troops shelled Kupyansk again: two people were killed, another person was injured
Description: The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office informs you about this. The pre-trial investigation established that on November 9, at approximately 11:00 a.m., the Russian Federation launched an airstrike on the city of Kupyansk. Private homes and multi-apartment residential buildings, utility premises were damaged, 15 garages were destroyed, etc. A 61-year-old man was injured. As a result of the shelling, two passers-by - a man and a woman - were hit by wires from the electrical network. A fire broke out. Unfortunately, people died on the spot. Their bodies were badly burned. The data of the dead are being established. Previously, the occupiers hit the city with KAB-1500. Despite the difficult security conditions, prosecutors, together with police investigators, are taking all appropriate measures to document war crimes committed by Russian military personnel. Previously ArmyInform announced that at the TOT of Luhansk Oblast, students' admission to the Kremlin -movement of the first- will become mandatory.

Title: All day long, the aggressor hit Nikopol region, using heavy artillery and kamikaze drones
Description: About this informs the head of Dnipropetrovsk OVA Serhiy Lysak. A fire broke out - rescuers extinguished the fire. 16 private houses and 12 commercial structures were damaged. A gas station and an agricultural company were mutilated. Several cars and power lines were affected. People were not injured. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that artillerymen of the -Hart- brigade worked on the positions of the occupiers near Vovchansk.

Title: Polish paratroopers mercilessly destroy the 810th brigade of marines in Kurshchyna
Description: The corresponding video was made public by the Airborne Assault Troops of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. -The boy is grounded! Everything will be Ukraine!- - says one of the paratroopers of the 95th brigade of the DSHV. Previously ArmyInform She reported that The Armed Forces maintain the defense in the hottest areas of the front.

Title: President: The mark of the first one hundred units of missile weapons this year has been crossed
Description: This was announced by the Head of State in his evening address. -This year, we were able to achieve significant results in several areas. This is also our Ukrainian artillery - our shells, our guns. These are drones — of different types, for different tasks — that not only help the front to defend positions and destroy the occupier, but also strike Russia at ever greater depths. We will increase it. We crossed the mark of the first hundred units of missile weapons this year,- Volodymyr Zelenskyy emphasized. Also today, the President listened to the reports of the military and the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, Oleksandr Syrskyi, Anatoly Barhylevych, and Rustem Umyerov. In addition, he stated that the most attention is currently being paid to the Kurakhiv direction. -Unfortunately, this week brought to Ukraine brutal Russian attacks on Kharkiv, Donetsk region, Sumy region, Odesa, Zaporizhzhia. Virtually daily drone strikes. Also missile strikes. And every meeting, every negotiation with partners who have appropriate air defense systems is always a conversation about additional protection of Ukraine against Russian terror. Thank you to everyone who works for Ukraine, and everyone who fights for our country and our people! Glory to Ukraine!- - added the Head of State. Previously ArmyInform reported that the Armed Forces are holding the defense in the hottest areas of the front.

Title: In the area of ​​Chasovoy Yaru and Toretsk, the enemy is preparing to intensify assaults: the units ...
Description: Major Anastasia Bobovnikova, spokeswoman of Luhansk OTU, told about this on the air of the Suspilne Novosti telethon. — They gather, as before, a considerable grouping of troops near the time of Chasovoy Yar, as well as near Toretsk. There's a staff unit there, staffed with contractors, and they're well staffed, she said. This indicates that the Russians are able to raise a sufficient number of reserves. — That is, we can say that they are able to bring in reserves, raise personnel, replenish losses in manpower and, unfortunately, have a high level of staffing, she explained. With sufficient manpower, the enemy is trying to build up in the Temporal Ravine area. -They are accumulating personnel who are crossing the canal [in the Chasovoy Yar area], trying to hide in hiding places, gathering in this way for assault actions,- the spokeswoman said. Also, the occupiers are raising equipment, but the enemy does not have the ability to use it on this section of the battle line. -We also see that they are accumulating equipment, but there are no conditions for them to advance with equipment in this area,- noted Anastasia Bobovnikova. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that on the Toretsk direction, the enemy is constantly replenishing its personnel - every night it brings in -live meat- and delivers weapons, but it has problems with the supply of food.

Title: Corvette -Ivan Mazepa- during the tests on -excellent- shot at targets
Description: This was announced by the Commander of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Vice Admiral Oleksiy Neizhpapa. During artillery fire, the corvette demonstrated excellent results, accurately hitting air, sea and ground targets. The ship is equipped with modern weapons systems that significantly increase its combat capabilities. All previous technical comments have been taken into account, and the modernization is focused on ensuring maximum efficiency and protection in battle. In particular, anti-aircraft defenses have been strengthened. -Ivan Mazepa- is not only the latest technology, but also a symbol of the indomitable Ukrainian fleet. Confidence in our forces is growing, and we are ready for new challenges of war. Ukraine is an invincible maritime state capable of repelling any threats. ArmyInform told what we should expect an enemy from ADA-type corvettes -Hetman Ivan Mazepa- and -Hetman Ivan Vyhovskyi-, which are being built in Turkey for the needs of the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

Title: In the South, the occupiers are preparing for assaults: which areas are most at risk
Description: The most endangered areas on the air of the national telethon -Edyny Novyni- named the spokesperson of the OUV - Tavria- Colonel Vladyslav Voloshyn. — At the moment, the situation in general is not much different from the situation that has been here for two or three weeks. The enemy continues shelling, continues strikes. They are shelling not only the positions of the Defense Forces of Ukraine, but also the cities located in the front-line zone and in the South of Ukraine in general, he said. The officer reported that the Russian command is accumulating forces and means with the aim of intensifying assault operations on certain sections of the battle line. — Russian troops, according to our intelligence, are quite actively preparing to conduct assaults on certain sections of the demarcation line. They are carrying out and some have already carried out the occupation of [positions], they have pulled up the replenishment. Ammunition has been received and is being replenished, and engineering and aerial reconnaissance of our positions is being actively conducted, the spokesman said. All this indicates that the enemy is preparing for assaults, and some assault groups have already been moved to advanced positions. — They are preparing to start assault operations. Some assault groups have already been moved to forward positions. This indicates that sometime in the near future the enemy will start storming our positions, the military officer explained. However, according to him, we are talking about some kind of large-scale offensive, namely assault actions in separate local areas. -I don't mean any big offensive, but assault operations will begin on one of the sections of the combat line,- said Vladyslav Voloshyn. Also, the spokesman of the -Tavria- military command center named the most threatened sections of the combat confrontation line in the South. — The most dangerous look, and we know about it, that the opponents are preparing to carry out assaults there, this is the area in the Vremivsk direction, where the settlements of Levadne and Rivnopil are located. This is a plot near Gulyaipol. This is a section of the battle line, the so-called Robotynsky salient, where our counteroffensive took place and certain territories were liberated, the military said. There, the enemy will try to align the battle line. -In addition, there is certain information that on the coastal territory on the left side of the Dnieper, where Kamianske is located, the enemy is also concentrating a certain amount of forces and means for the preparation of assault groups with further assault actions,- said the spokesman of the -Tavria- OUV . Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in the zone responsibility of the -Tavria- military command center, the Russian command uses a wide variety of units from different military districts of the Russian Federation, the quality of personnel training in which differs significantly.

Title: The defense forces eliminated T-90M and BMP-2 in the Siversk direction
Description: The corresponding video was published by the Luhansk border detachment. Also, the selection of videos illustrates how aerial reconnaissance units of the -GALA drones company- unit of the -Revenge- brigade identify points of accumulation of enemy infantry, their routes and successfully eliminate targets. Previously ArmyInform notified that SBU soldiers in two weeks, 16 Russian -Grads- were hit.

Title: Survival and Fear of the Commander: The motivation and drive of the occupiers remain unchanged
Description: A representative of the communications service told about this on the air of the -Suspilne Novosti- marathon with the public of the -Charter- brigade of the National Guard of Ukraine, Sergeant Volodymyr Degtyarev. -Their basic motivation is survival, their basic driver is fear of the commander and the barriers,- he said. Soldiers of the Russian army do not trust their own commanders and do not expect any help when wounded. Their only chance to stay alive is to surrender in captivity. — They understand that if they are injured, they have virtually no chance of evacuation or quality tactical medicine. Therefore, most of those who come to us to surrender, they come with injuries, expecting that at least here they have a chance to survive, - said the soldier. However, despite a low level of critical thinking and only basic training, the enemy remains dangerous due to its sheer numbers. — The mere fact of having such a mass of people allows them to be used as consumables. In principle, they have minimal functions: to get here and there, to shoot in this direction, - explained Volodymyr Degtyarev. Earlier, ArmyInform reported, who and how who and how is Russia fighting in Kharkiv Oblast.

Title: Corvette - Ivan Mazepa - continues to successfully pass state tests
Description: reports Oleksiy Neizhpapa.

Title: The last personnel reserve of the Russian Federation: the enemy is recruiting teenagers
Description: notifies the Service of Foreign intelligence of Ukraine. The number of vacancies for teenagers aged 14 to 18 increased by 76% during the year. From July to September 2024, the demand for young professionals increased several times. Minors are most actively employed in large companies. In particular, the number of employees under the age of 18 increased ninefold in the -Magnet- retail chain. At the same time, the number of minors working informally is increasing. There are 6 million citizens aged 15 to 17 in the Russian Federation, but a little more than 1% of them work. By the end of 2023, the number of employed persons aged 15 to 17 increased by 40% to 87,000. In 2022, their number was 61.6 thousand. persons The total shortage of personnel in the Russian Federation reaches 5 million people. The involvement of minors is facilitated by the state policy of the Russian Federation aimed at simplifying the employment procedure for them. Employers, in conditions of acute shortage of personnel, are forced to create jobs that involve part-time employment and a flexible schedule especially for young people. A draft law on easing the admission of minors to harmful and dangerous work has been submitted to the -State Duma- of the Russian Federation. Thus, under the conditions of the war, underage workers became a personnel reserve for the Russian Federation against the background of a serious labor shortage. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that construction of new facilities began to stop at TOT.

Title: Expendable material goes on foot and carries everything on itself: who and how is Russia fighting in...
Description: A representative of the communications service told about this on the air of the -Suspilne Novosti- marathon with the public of the -Charter- brigade of the National Guard of Ukraine, Sergeant Volodymyr Degtyarev. — For a long time now, they have mostly been walking. It's about walking quite a long distance to get into the forest strips they still control, he said. The -foot tactics- of the enemy are evidenced by various data, in particular, the losses of the enemy in the area of ​​responsibility of the -Charter- brigade. — If we look at the figures of enemy losses on our site for the past month, we will see that 200 enemies have been destroyed and a total of 20 pieces of equipment. These are mainly light vehicles and light vehicles, motorcycles, ATVs, just one tank. This indicates that, at least in this area, for certain reasons [the technique] is not used, the military said. It is possible to learn about the reasons for the enemy's refusal to use the equipment only on the basis of objective data, since the prisoners that the -charters- manage to capture have an extremely low level of situational awareness. - Why exactly, what are these reasons, we can only make hypotheses, because the captives we take are usually expendable material. All the prisoners we have taken in the last few months are yesterday's prisoners with a very low level of critical thinking. They have no connection with the world, any means of communication is taken away from them. All they know is what their commanders tell them. They get minimal information, the guard explained. The tasks of the enemy soldiers are simple, if not to say primitive - to run to a certain point, deliver some cargo. - Their task is to try to get from point to point where they are met by the next guide and sent on. The calculation is that out of ten, at least a few will make it, and eventually, somewhere in the accumulation point, there will be enough people to make some kind of movement in our direction, Volodymyr Degtyarev said. Equipping such -disposable- enemy combatants is easiest with basic soldier gear. — Basic soldier equipment. Given that they have to carry basically everything on their person, this is the basic small arms. In the forest areas, where they have been for a long time, they have accumulated quite a lot of weapons, which we are trying to track down and destroy. However, in the main, those with whom our fighters face in battle, if we are talking about some shooting battles, are equipped only with basic shooting weapons, the -charter- said. Earlier, ArmyInform explained why the occupiers are saving equipment for Kharkiv Oblast.

Title: Artillerymen of the Hart brigade worked on the positions of the occupiers near Vovchansk
Description: Relevant video published by the State Border Service of Ukraine. Artillerymen of the -Hart- brigade in the Vovchansk direction inflicted fire damage on enemy positions. The invaders' strongholds, trench lines and personnel shelters were hit. The destruction of six occupiers was confirmed, and six more were wounded.

Title: At TOT, schoolchildren will be shown a performance by the Russian dictator
Description: This is reported by Center of national resistance. At the so-called -talks about important things-, the occupiers planned a mandatory review of the main theses of the Russian dictator during his speech in Valdai. Naturally, in this way, the enemy develops a cult of personality among the young generation and at the same time distorts reality by shifting the responsibility for the war to the victim. We remind you that at the TOT of Luhansk region bcyazkovym/-> entry of students into the Kremlin -movement of the first- will become mandatory.

Title: Skala fighters destroy the Russians, the future flagship of the Navy fired: a stream from a front-li...
Description: During artillery fire, it accurately hit air, sea and ground targets. In the Pokrovsky direction, fighters of the 425th OSHB -SKALA- cleared the trenches from the Russians. During the assault, the Russians hit our Bradley BMP twice, but the vehicle withstood the blows, landed the infantry and returned to our positions. Fighters of the Belarusian regiment named after Kastus Kalinovsky defeated the Russian assault group. In this they were helped by the automatic grenade launcher Heckler & Koch GMG. Since the Russians are increasingly attacking with infantry without the cover of armored vehicles, automatic grenade launchers are very effective in destroying them. These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - lieutenant colonel Serhii Misyura and captain Artem Golub.

Title: At the TOT of Luhansk Oblast, students' admission to the Kremlin - movement of the first - will beco...
Description: About this reports Center of National Resistance. Previously, joining the Kremlin's youth control movement was optional, although it was planted in various ways. In particular, students outside the movement were deprived of participation in recreational activities and created obstacles in their studies. However, even this could not attract a large number of participants. Now all students will automatically become members of the movement - the organization responsible for massing during propaganda events. We remind you that drones have become key a> element of success on the battlefield.

Title: Soldiers of the SBU in two weeks hit 16 Russian -Hradiv-
Description: The relevant video was published by the Security Service of Ukraine. Thanks to the fine work of the operators of the attack drones of the CSO -A- of the SBU, these MLRS and their crews will no longer destroy Ukrainian cities and villages. Previously ArmyInform reported that Oleksandr Syrsky showed the work of our soldiers.

Title: Who is in the boat, who is under it: five men tried to conquer the Tisza on a two-seater watercraft
Description: About this reports State Border Service of Ukraine. The incident happened in the evening when the border patrol noticed a group of people moving quickly towards the border. The attackers had already tried to board the boat, but the craft was too small for everyone, so some men jumped into the river, trying to swim across it on their own. Border guards pulled the men out of the cold water, detained them and took them to a unit where they were able to warm up. The detainees were residents of Mykolaiv, Dnipropetrovsk, Cherkasy and Zakarpattia regions. The men said they paid between $8,000 and $11,000 for a -safe- border crossing. After receiving the funds, the shippers reported that they would have to cross the Tisza River in a two-seater rubber boat. Administrative protocols have been drawn up against the detainees for illegally crossing the border. Currently, the identification of persons involved in the organization of this offense is ongoing. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: The enemy is increasing its attacks: the Armed Forces are holding the defense in the hottest areas o...
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. During the day, a number of settlements of the Sumy and Chernihiv regions were affected by enemy terrorist attacks. The enemy fired artillery at Pavlivka, Volfyny, Velyka Pisarivka, Zhuravka, Bezsalivka, Ugroida and Leonivka; Myropyllya was under air strikes. According to available information, the Russian occupiers carried out nine airstrikes on Kurshchyna today, shooting down 15 anti-aircraft missiles. Also in this direction, Ukrainian soldiers repel enemy attacks, of which there are already 13 today. In the Kupyan direction during the day, the enemy tried to advance to our positions in the areas of Kucherivka, Kruglyakivka and Lozovoy. Two enemy attacks are still ongoing. In total, four clashes were recorded in the direction. Enemy aviation struck Kupyansk with five guided aerial bombs. The aggressor increased the number of attacks to 14 in the Limansky direction. Fighting took place near Grekivka, Nevsky, Torsky and Bilogorivka. Four clashes are ongoing. Enemy bomber aircraft struck in Terni and Yampolivka districts. In the Siversk direction the enemy advanced near Verkhnokamyansk, carried out airstrikes with guided aerial bombs in the Siversk region. In the Kramatorsk direction, our defenders repelled the attack of the occupiers in the Bila Hora area. The enemy continues to destroy Chasiv Yar with airstrikes, has already dropped nine anti-aircraft missiles today and struck with unguided air missiles. On the Toretsk direction the invader attacked six times in the Toretsk, Dilyivka, Shcherbinivka and Nelipivka regions. Four attacks have been repulsed, two battles are still going on. The enemy dropped two anti-aircraft missiles on Kostyantynivka. High activity of the enemy is currently maintained in the Pokrovsky direction. Clashes of varying intensity have started here 28 times today. Fighting is currently ongoing in the Promenya area. The tense situation remains in the Kurakhiv direction. Sixteen assaults were repulsed near Illinka, Novoselidivka, Novodmytrivka, Maksimilianivka, Dalnyi, Katerynivka, and Antonivka, and seventeen battles are currently underway. In the Vremivsk direction, the aggressor is trying to attack the positions of Ukrainian defenders near Bogoyavlenka, Trudovoy and Maksimivka. In the Dnieper direction our defenders repelled one enemy assault. In other directions, the enemy carries out airstrikes and artillery fire at the positions of our troops and populated areas. Ukrainian troops are exhausting the enemy along the entire battle line and in the rear. As reported by ArmyInform, the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces General Oleksandr Syrskyi pokazav-robotu-nashyh-voyiniv/->published a video that demonstrates the effective work of the Defense Forces of Ukraine in eliminating Russian invaders and their equipment.

Title: Both during the day and at night, in the snow and in the rain: Oleksandr Syrskyi showed the work of ...
Description: He published footage of combat work on his channel. The video shows how the Ukrainian military successfully destroys enemy vehicles, equipment and personnel of the occupiers. In his comment on the video, General Oleksandr Syrsky emphasized that the Defense Forces continue to operate confidently and continuously, regardless of any weather conditions. -Let's destroy the enemy both during the day and at night, and in the snow and in the rain- Glory to Ukraine!- - emphasized the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces. As reported by ArmyInform, the battalion of unmanned attack air systems -Achilles- of the 92nd assault brigade named after the basket chief Ivan Sirk hit two TOS-1A -Solntsepok- heavy flamethrower salvo systems at once.

Title: Construction of new facilities began to stop at TOT
Description: informs about this Center of national resistance. Because of the crisis in Russia, the state stopped subsidized mortgages and removed interest control. In this way, developers began to stop the construction of objects. In the TOT of Crimea and Eastern Ukraine, the construction of residential buildings has already stopped. At the same time, construction workers brought to the east from other regions are currently not allowed outside their settlement (dormitories). Earlier ArmyInform reported that the occupiers are returning Luhansk region to the era without mobile communication.

Title: Soldiers instead of armor: why the occupiers save equipment in Kharkiv region
Description: This was told on the air of the national telethon -Yedini Novyni- the spokesman of the OTU -Kharkiv- Lt. Col. Yevgeny Romanov. — We observe that the enemy is trying to recruit people to replace the losses he has suffered. He also accumulates ammunition, concentrates equipment in certain areas, but does not use it, but uses infantry assaults. He takes care of equipment, unlike people, he said. The spokesman explained why the Russian command acts in this way. - Because he doesn't have enough equipment. The Ukrainian Defense Forces destroyed a huge number of his armored combat vehicles and he has a shortage of this equipment. He is trying to repair old models, but this process is slower than they burn on Ukrainian soil, Yevgeny Romanov explained. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that the Russians stormed five times in the Vovchansk district under the cover of airstrikes.

Title: The Armed Forces responded to Serhiy Sternenko's provocations
Description: The Land Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported this. The department noted that in the conditions of confrontation with the enemy, which prevails in manpower and equipment, such assistance is vitally necessary, especially in providing combat units with drones of various modifications.
