According to detailed information, during the day, the enemy launched two missile strikes against the positions of Ukrainian units and populated areas using three missiles, as well as 64 airstrikes, dropping 146 anti-aircraft missiles. In addition, he carried out more than 4,000 attacks, 83 of them from rocket salvo systems. The aggressor carried out airstrikes in the areas of populated areas, in particular, Mali Prohody, Liptsi, Borivska Andriivka, Zagryzove, Novoplatonivka, Terny, Yampolivka, Liman, Minkivka, Privillia, Nikonorivka, Shcherbynivka, Toretsk, Druzhba, Chasiv Yar, Dachenske, Dachne, Suhy Yali, Urozhayne, Kamianske and Novodarivka. Six battles were fought in the Kharkiv direction. The defense forces repelled enemy assaults near Vovchansk and Staritsa. Twelve skirmishes took place over the past day in the Kupyansk direction, in particular, near Kucherivka, Petropavlivka, and Kruglyakivka. According to specified information, the enemy attacked ten times near Druzhelyubivka, Grekivka, Torsky, Terni and Dibrova in the Lymansk direction. Ukrainian defenders repelled four attempts to push them from defensive lines near Beilohorivka and Grihorivka on the Seversky direction. Near the settlements of Chasiv Yar and Klishchiivka, in the Kramatorsk direction, two clashes took place during the day. With the support of assault and bomber aircraft in the Toretsk direction, the Russians attacked four times near Toretsk, Dilyivka and Shcherbinivka. In the Pokrovsky direction, our defenders repelled 39 enemy assaults in the districts of Myrolyubivka, Promenya, Novogrodivka, Krutoy Yar, Selidovoy, Lysivka, and Novooleksiiivka. On the Kurakhiv direction, Ukrainian positions near the settlements of Illinka, Kreminna Balka, Novoselidivka, Novodmytrivka, Maksimilianivka, Antonivka and Katerynivka were attacked 93 times in the past day. Our defenders repelled six assaults by the occupiers near the settlements of Trudove and Maksimivka, which are in the Vremivsk direction. An attempt to attack our positions in the direction of Novoandriivka in the Orichivsk direction turned out to be a failure for the invaders. The enemy was defeated three times, attacking the defensive lines of the Ukrainians on the Dnieper direction. In the Gulyajpil direction the situation has not changed much. No signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected in the Volyn and Poliske directions. We will remind you that last day the total losses of Russian the invaders numbered 1,400 people. Also, our soldiers destroyed 10 tanks, 20 armored combat vehicles, 24 artillery systems, 42 UAVs of operational-tactical level, 78 vehicles and eight units of special equipment.

Title: The Ministry of Defense commented on the possibility of creating a ranking of commanders
Description: She gave her answer in the new project Army TV. Kateryna Chernogorenko emphasized that for the digital team of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, an obvious priority is the growth of commanders, the launch and operation of -social elevators- in the Defense Forces. -We will be very motivated to make a digital tool , which will allow our commanders to grow quickly: the way they grow according to the success of their military operations,- explained the Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine. At the same time, she noted that in this matter, a very balanced approach to the creation of tools should be taken - such an assessment should be made anonymous, any possibility of potential pressure should be eliminated and, of course, a balance should be maintained so that commanders do not lose motivation. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense and the General Staff of the Armed Forces have heard the servicemen's request for the possibility of transfer to another unit and are already developing a mechanism for the defenders to be able independently choose a part for service.

Title: Zaporozhye shuddered almost 300 times a day from Russian strikes
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of the Zaporizhzhya OVA. Russian troops carried out 8 airstrikes on Vasylkovo, Lugovoi, Novodarivka, Vilnyantsa, Malya Tokmachka and Omelnyk. In addition, 161 UAVs of various modifications attacked Lobkovo, Gulyaipole, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Robotine, Malynivka, Mala Tokmachka, Biloghirya, Novodarivka, and Olhivske. Also, 10 shellings from MLRS were carried out on the territory of Robotyny and Novodarivka. According to Ivan Fedorov, 120 artillery strikes fell on Lobkovo, Gulyaipol, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodarivka, Robotyn, Olhivska, Biloghiri, Malya Tokmachka and Malynivka. -We received 19 reports about the destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure facilities. Peaceful residents were not harmed,- added the head of the OVA. As reported by ArmyInform, the consequences of drone strikes on Kyiv: houses are on fire in the city, a medical facility and a business center are damaged.

Title: -Peace through strength-: Volodymyr Zelenskyi supported Donald Trump's policy on the global stage
Description: About this the head of state declared during the evening address. Volodymyr Zelensky noted that during previous meetings with Donald Trump, important issues related to defense, economy and post-war reconstruction of Ukraine were discussed. The president also emphasized the importance of the principle of -peace through strength- for global security, comparing the policy of Donald Trump with the policy of Ronald Reagan, and expressed hope for further strengthening of the alliance between the United States and Ukraine. Tomorrow, Volodymyr Zelenskyi will take part in the summit of the European Political Community in Budapest at the invitation of the Prime Minister of Hungary, Viktor Orbán, and the President of the European Council, Charles Michel. He plans to discuss security challenges and new opportunities for partners with European leaders. In addition, the President of Ukraine held a series of meetings with Prime Minister Denys Shmygal regarding the stability of the country, Chairman of the Verkhovna Rada Ruslan Stefanchuk regarding the interaction of the legislative and executive powers, and also with the Minister of Strategic Industries Oleksandr Kamyshin regarding supplies to the front. The President noted the contribution of the Ukrainian military to the Kursk operation, which has been ongoing for three months, and emphasized that Ukraine continues to put pressure on the aggressor by demonstrating its strength on the battlefield. In addition, Volodymyr Zelenskyy had a wonderful telephone conversation with President Donald Trump and congratulated him on the historic and a convincing victory - this result was made possible by his impressive election campaign. In particular, the President of Ukraine praised his family and team for their excellent work. -We agreed to maintain a close dialogue and develop our cooperation. The strong and steadfast leadership of the United States is vital for the world and for a just peace,- the head of state added.

Title: Art systems, BBM and 1,400 infantrymen: the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine announced t...
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. The total combat losses of the enemy from February 24, 2022 to November 7, 2024 are approximately: okupanty-aktivizuvalysya-v-kurskij-oblasti/->145 combat clashes took place at the front. The defense forces are directing efforts to disrupt the execution of the Russian invaders' offensive plans and exhaust their combat potential.

Title: The Armed Forces held back 145 Russian assaults: the occupiers stepped up in the Kursk region
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. The enemy launched one rocket (3 rockets), 35 air strikes (in particular, used 90 anti-aircraft missiles) and 513 kamikaze drone strikes, carried out 3,125 attacks on the positions of our troops. Near Staritsa and Vovchansk in the Kharkiv direction, Russian terrorists stormed the positions of Ukrainian units six times. Estimated losses of the enemy in the direction were 69 occupiers killed and wounded, 28 UAVs, three units of a vehicle and a unit of special equipment, the artillery system and four units of automobile equipment were also damaged. Eight times the enemy attacked our fortifications in the Kupyansk direction near Kucherivka, Petropavlivka and Kruglyakivka. At the moment, one battle is ongoing. The positions of Ukrainian defenders in the districts of Druzhelyubivka, Grekivka, Torskyi and Terniv in the Lyman direction were stormed ten times by Russian troops over the past day. There are still five enemy attacks going on. In the Seversky direction our soldiers stopped three attempts by the enemy to improve the tactical position near Beilohorivka, one enemy attack continues. Two attempts by the invaders to advance in the Kramatorsk direction ended in failure near Chasovoy Yar and Klishchiivka. In the Toretsk direction the occupiers stormed four times in the Toretsk, Diliivka and Shcherbinivka districts. The opponent had no success. The battle continues in Toretsk. In the Pokrovsky direction the invaders carried out 38 assault and offensive actions. The greatest activity of the Russian occupiers remains in the districts of Promenya, Lysivka, and Selidovoy. Twelve skirmishes in the direction are still ongoing. The enemy is intensively attacking our units on the Kurakhiv direction. Currently has 52 attacks. Terrorists tried to advance in the districts of Illinka, Kreminnaya Balka, Novoselidivka, Novodmytrivka, Maksimilianivka, Antonivka, and Katerynivka, currently fighting is going on in 28 locations. Two skirmishes are ongoing near Trudovoy in the Vremivsk direction, during the current day the aggressor stormed the front edge of our defenses near Trudovoy and Maksimivka six times. The enemy's attempt to advance in the direction of Novoandriivka on the Orichivsk direction ended in vain. On the Dnieper direction three enemy attacks were repulsed, the enemy had no success. The operation of the Defense Forces of Ukraine in the Kursk region continues. In just one day, Ukrainian defenders repelled seven attempts by the occupiers to dislodge our units from their positions. The department honored Ukrainian soldiers from the 126th Separate Territorial Defense Brigade and the 3rd Operational Brigade named after Colonel Petro Bolbochan of the National Guard of Ukraine, who steadfastly restrained the onslaught of overwhelming enemy forces. As reported by ArmyInform, the fighters of the 5th Kyiv Assault Brigade successfully countered the Russian tactics of infiltration by small infantry groups.

Title: What do you think, Comrade Kim: The Republic of Korea presented a -monster rocket- weighing 36 tons
Description: For a long time, official Seoul kept its new development - the Hyunmoo-V missile - a secret. Now it was officially presented at a military parade in South Korea (ROK), ArmyInform reports. In the words of X platform user Mason (@mason_8718) who reports regularly and in great detail about South Korea's defense industry, the Hyunmoo-V is classified by the ROK military as a -super-capable ballistic missile- (UPBM). Although the Hyunmoo-V was previously announced profile publication The Defense Post, the South Korean military has not yet provided any precise or definitive information about its characteristics. Usually, such information is deliberately withheld in order to make it difficult for an adversary to obtain information about new developments. However, the experts of the Army Recognition defense portal made some technical explanations. With a height of 15 to 16 meters, a diameter of 1.6 meters and a weight of 36 tons, the Hyunmoo-V has the dimensions of an intercontinental ballistic missile. For comparison: the modern American ICBM Minuteman III has a length of 18 meters, a diameter of 1.7 meters and a weight of 35.3 tons. Intercontinental ballistic missiles are usually equipped with nuclear warheads and have a range of more than 10,000 kilometers. In Minuteman III, the nuclear warhead weighs 400 kg; the missile can cover a distance of 13 thousand kilometers. For the Hyunmoo-V, the corresponding figure should be only 3 thousand kilometers - and that is under the conditions of using a warhead of reduced weight. Weapons experts have estimated that the range is only 300 kilometers when fully loaded. But the explosive power of the rocket is huge. The heaviest warhead reportedly weighs up to 9 tons. This means that the Hyunmoo-V may now be the most powerful conventional (non-nuclear) weapon in the world when it comes to explosive power. Until now, the American GBU-43/B aerial bomb was considered as such a weapon, better known as MOAB, which contains 8.48 tons of explosives. Ballistic missiles cannot even come close to such parameters. They are designed for nuclear warheads that cause great destruction at a much smaller mass than conventional explosives. The closest to the Hyunmoo-V in terms of parameters is the Chinese Dongfeng 21C, which can carry a 2-ton conventional warhead at a distance of up to 1.7 thousand kilometers. This begs the question: Why would a weapon as large and bulky as an ICBM but with a much shorter range be needed because it has an extremely large payload? The point is that Hyunmoo-V was built for a specific purpose and to be used against a specific opponent. The warhead, which reportedly weighs up to 9 tons, is so heavy because it is a penetrating part, also known as a -bunker destroyer.- Her kinetic energy must penetrate walls and the ground before exploding. North Korea's fortified facilities are the target. These include command centers in the mountains, weapons factories in tunnels, command bunkers and underground nuclear facilities where North Korea is stockpiling nuclear materials. At the beginning of 2024, South Korea announced the successful test of Hyunmoo-V missiles. According to preliminary data, the tests probably took place in December 2023, when the missile was launched from the west coast and hit a group of islands located at a distance of about 185 kilometers from the launch point. This distance is comparable to the distance between Seoul and Pyongyang, which underlines the missile's importance to South Korea's defense. In theory, Hyunmoo-V could also be used as a hypersonic glider, for example, to destroy ships. South Korea is working on one of them, but it has not yet been unveiled. Photo 5. South Korean strategic missile system Hyunmoo-V on parade in Seoul (ROK). Photo: Hanwha Aerospace It is planned to launch missiles not only from cargo launchers, but also from a new type of ship. The Joint Strike Ship (JSS) is currently in the concept development stage. It is designed to be able to launch as many cruise missiles of different sizes and for different purposes as possible. Construction of the three ships is scheduled to begin in 2030. Official Seoul plans to purchase at least 200 Hyunmoo-Vs. They are manufactured by the South Korean company Hanwha Aerospace, which is a key player in missile development of the Republic of Korea. South Korean strategic missile system Hyunmoo-V on parade in Seoul (ROK). Video: TaiwanPlus News

Title: Consequences of drone strikes in Kyiv: houses are on fire in the city, a medical facility and a busi...
Description: This was reported by the head of KMVA Serhii Popko. According to him, a fire broke out on the 33rd floor on an area of ​​50 m², which led to the partial destruction of the building structures of the 34th technical floor. The fire has been extinguished, there are no casualties, residents are being evacuated. Debris from drones was also recorded in Obolonskyi and Solomyanskyi districts. In the Obolonsky district, debris caused a fire on the upper floor of a business center, there is no information about the victims. In Solomyansk, debris fell on the territory of an industrial enterprise and a medical center. So far, medics have hospitalized one victim from the territory of the enterprise. In addition, a two-story private house is on fire in the Podilskyi district, and units of the State Emergency Service were dispatched to the scene. As reported by ArmyInform, as a result of the attack by drones of the Russian armed forces on Kyiv, in the Holosiivsky district, an apartment in a residential building was damaged. Also in this area, a fire was registered on the territory of the garage cooperative. Rescue services are already working at the scene. In addition, next to the garages that caught fire in the Holosiivskyi district, a fire broke out at a nearby service station. The total area of ​​the fire is 300 square meters.

Title: War in the sky: an expert spoke about the enemy's new developments in the field of UAVs
Description: And now it is important to understand what is in the enemy's arsenal in order to effectively implement new developments to actively counter the enemy's drones. A well-known expert, former deputy chief of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, lieutenant general, spoke in more detail about this Ihor Romanenko: -After the events of 2014, we saw that unmanned aerial vehicles have a future. And what's more, by 2014, under my leadership, we developed the concept of combating the enemy's unmanned aerial vehicles, which was approved by the then Minister of Defense of Ukraine Yezhel. But due to the fact that his position, I I understand that it changed under the influence of the Russians, so this matter did not go beyond the concept. That is, this Minister only verbally promised to further promote this direction. But then, after all, our group from the Central Research Institute of Weapons and Military Equipment of the Armed Forces of Ukraine worked in this direction. It was in 2015-16 at the front, already during the Anti-terrorist operation. The group consisted of two parts. The first was involved in the implementation of our drone developments, which we had: Stork, Fury and a number of others. The second part of the group, which I headed, resolved the issue of how to fight the enemy's unmanned aerial vehicles. And at that time we focused on the means of radio-electronic warfare. The Russians were also developing all this, they worked out their developments. Unfortunately, at the end of 2022, the situation changed: the enterprises of the military-industrial complex of Russia overtook us in this direction. On our side, all this time the development of electronic warfare tools, which were supposed to suppress Russian drones, was going on. > This year, the enemy has modernized its drones in a number of directions. The first thing he did was apply artificial intelligence. What we are talking about here: when the enemy's FPV drone is aimed at an object that is covered by our electronic warfare means, at this stage the drone loses control and does not hit the target. And in order to overcome this, the Russians began to use elements of artificial intelligence. That is, they control the drone to the appropriate distance, and then the control passes to artificial intelligence, and EW tools do not affect it. So then the drone -captures- the target and then automatically points to it. The Russians have also modernized and are installing fiber optic cable on the drones. Optical fiber follows the drone, and it is controlled via a cable. Accordingly, our means of radio-electronic warfare do not affect the enemy drone. And this is how the target is hit. And now, from our side, there are developments that will fight with such means: in addition to fire damage, other options are offered. We must also say that due to the fact that we affected the enemy's A-50 long-range radar reconnaissance aircraft, the Russians have now switched to the use of tactical-level strike-reconnaissance systems. That is, they use a reconnaissance drone that can operate at a range of more than 100 kilometers. It scouts and drops data for the -Iskander- battery, which is working on purpose. ... Our Defense Forces, in turn, during 2023-2024 are actively scaling up the production of drones. Maybe we don't have much money for it, but there are talented developers. And by the way, the private sector is also now actively and effectively helping the army in this area. Well, there is always a question of time. We don't have time for everything yet, but the main thing is that we have the latest developments.-

Title: UBD benefits: as a participant in hostilities, you can park for free in the capital
Description: ArmyInform tells about how combatants can take advantage of this benefit. According to the rules of improvement of the city of Kyiv, the right to free parking of vehicles is used: As reported in -Kyivtransparkservice-, at the moment, when parking, participants in hostilities need only attach a document entitling them to benefits to the lower left corner of the windshield. In particular, a copy of this document can be made and attached, and personal data can be redacted. In the future, the system of preferential parking should change. A corresponding algorithm is being developed. It is not yet known when exactly it will become operational. Therefore, it is worth following updates on the -Kyivtransparkservice- website. Please note that parking at municipal lots is paid only on weekdays from 8:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m. At other times on weekdays and during the day on Saturdays and Sundays, parking is free. In total, 3 zones with parking lots are defined. You can read more about the addresses of the locations of such sites on the Kyivtransparkservice website.

Title: Counterfeiters issue humanitarian aid for support from the state: why should they?
Description: However, this is a fake, are written in the VoxCheck project. Despite the fact that the order shown in the video is real, the help shown in the video is unlikely to have been provided by the Ukrainian authorities. Most likely, this is humanitarian aid. After all, among the demonstrated items, there is not a single one that would be produced or sold in Ukraine. Instead, propagandists passed it off as state support for the families of fallen soldiers. The goal of such fakes is quite obvious - to devalue the life of a Ukrainian soldier and discredit the state authorities of Ukraine. We remind you that the families of Ukrainian soldiers who died at the front receive a one-time payment of 15 million hryvnias from the state. If a soldier died during the period of service, but not during hostilities, his relatives are provided with monetary assistance in the amount of 750 subsistence minimums. As of January 1, 2024, the subsistence minimum is UAH 3,028 for able-bodied persons. That is, the family of a fallen soldier receives almost 2.3 million hryvnias. However, this amount may change with changes in the size of the subsistence minimum. These sums, 2.3 million or 15 million, are divided equally between all members of the deceased's family. The following have the right to receive funds: parents of the deceased; one of the spouses who did not remarry; children under 18 years old; dependents. Also, families of soldiers who have gone missing, in addition to maintaining monthly payments for a soldier (postal salary, salary according to military rank, allowances for years of service, other monthly additional types of financial support), are provided with an additional payment, which was assigned to a soldier for participation in hostilities, in the amount of 100,000 hryvnias. The family is deprived of such payments if the soldier voluntarily surrendered, deserted or voluntarily left the military unit or place of service.

Title: A drone hit a residential building in Kyiv
Description: reported this by Serhiy Popko, head of the Kyiv City Military Administration. According to preliminary data, no fires have been recorded, and no information about the victims has been received yet. Operational services continue to clarify the details of the incident. A fire was also registered in this area on the territory of the garage cooperative. Rescue services are already at the scene. In addition, next to the garages that caught fire in the Holosiivsky district, a fire broke out at a neighboring service station. The total fire area is 300 square meters. As reported by ArmyInform, the victims among the civilian population: ta-kupyansku/->occupiers inflicted devastating blows on Kharkiv and Kupyansk.

Title: Without pants at the kobzon concert - the Russians were caught undressing their own dead
Description: The looting video was released on November 6 on the brigade's channel. Our pilots were recording the numerous bodies of the slain occupiers scattered in the bushes, when they accidentally came across a group of three living Russians. These three tried to pull off the pants of the murdered brother. Another naked Russian was lying nearby, whose pants had already been taken off. After a long struggle, the Russians were finally able to pull off the pants of the second comrade, after which they happily carried the loot to the dugout. It is not known why the Russians urgently needed the pants of the murdered. Perhaps the temporarily living occupiers were so impressed by the combat work of the Defense Forces of Ukraine that they urgently needed to change clothes.   As reported by ArmyInform, the fighters of the 60th mechanized brigade of Ingulets, together with their comrades from the 66th mechanized brigade named after Prince Mstislav the Brave, struck well stopped another enemy assault.

Title: -It turned out inconveniently, it demagnetized the worm - another batch of dead invaders from -Birds...
Description: The video was published on the battalion channel. The invaders died in various ways, some in the bushes, some in the ruins, some on the roads. The disposal of the enemy took place in the Donetsk direction. The death and maiming of the Russians was commented on, as always, by the battalion commander, Captain Robert Brovdy. -Please limit the viewing of the video by children,- the combatant warned.   As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 414th battalion of unmanned aerial systems -Birds of Magyar- as part of the Marine Corps hit in October 1552 individual Russian targets.

Title: Ukrainians will have the opportunity to re-update their data in Rezerv+
Description: Kateryna Chernogorenko, Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine for Digital Development, told about this in a new project Army TV. She reminded that according to the law that came into force on May 18, Ukrainians had the opportunity to update their contact information, including the actual address of residence. -Already today, this month, our team is working on making it possible to re-update such data,- said the Deputy Minister of Defense. According to her, as soon as this possibility is implemented, each change of the actual place of residence will be possible in a few clicks. We will remind, in the first week through the Reserve+ application the Ministry of Defense received 2500 applications from those willing to join the Defense Forces.

Title: Three agents of the Russian Federation who aimed Russian missiles at Prykarpattia received 13 years ...
Description: This was reported by the Security Service of Ukraine. SBU officers detained the attackers in the western region of Ukraine in the first days of the full-scale war. The accomplices of the aggressor turned out to be three residents from Kyiv, Kharkiv and Zaporizhzhia, who were recruited by Russian intelligence back in 2021. The agents acted as part of a group and -locked in- to several Russian curators, with whom they communicated through anonymous chats of the popular messenger. According to the instructions of the occupiers, those involved were supposed to prepare data for a missile attack on the airfield in Prykarpattia, and after the enemy attack to -report- on its consequences. In order to carry out the enemy's task, the agent from Kharkiv acted under the guise of a -travel blogger-, who used a drone to make a video of a panoramic view of a strategic object and posted the recorded files on Instagram. Another agent, a resident of Kyiv, settled near the airfield on the eve of the full-scale invasion of the Russian Federation in order to record aircraft takeoffs and landings in real time. She provided the received information to a third member of the Russian agency to forward the intelligence to the occupiers. On February 24, 2022, agents tracked the consequences of a missile attack on an aircraft facility and sent relevant information to the Russian special services. SBU officers detained the traitors when they were preparing for -evacuation- across the western border. According to the materials of the Security Service, the court found the detainees guilty under Part 1 of Art. 111 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (treason). As reported by ArmyInform, a spy from Sloviansk received 15 years in prison.

Title: -Tigers and BMPs drove by, but they burned down very quickly - Combatant Genii about the battles in ...
Description: A soldier with the call sign Genii, the commander of the 47th mechanized brigade battalion, told about this on the ArmyTV stream on November 6. -The tactics of the enemy here are specific, different from the areas where we worked before. More infantry work here. The enemy mainly uses his so-called summer troops, which work on foot. They are mostly paratroopers and marines,- said Genii. According to him, in comparison with the battles in Donetsk region, there are times less enemy artillery in Kurshchyna. At the same time, enemy aviation is actively operating, dropping anti-aircraft missiles. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 47th mechanized brigade -bijczya-ochyen-gniloj-brigady/->captured a Russian from the 155th Marine Infantry Brigade of the Pacific Fleet on the territory of Kurshchyna. According to him, he witnessed the execution of soldiers of the Defense Forces.

Title: One shell, and five invaders — the destruction of an assault group of Russians in the Pokrovsky dire...
Description: The video of the combat operation was released on November 6 on the brigade's channel. A Russian assault group of 5 fighters sat down among the trees, preparing to attack our positions. But it was spotted by aerial scouts who aimed artillery. The first shot was accurate and hit the stormtroopers. Reinforcements advanced towards them, but were hit by a drop from a drone-bomber. -Each attempt by the enemy to send reinforcements is foiled thanks to the skill of our operators, who time and again accurately eliminate new waves,- the brigade commented on the video.   As reported by ArmyInform, the fighters of the 5th assault Kyiv brigade in the southeast of Bakhmut found destroyed a whole mortar battery of the enemy.

Title: Operation Gabriel: details of Russia's war crime against Ukrainian children
Description: This is reported by the Security Service of Ukraine. We are talking about the commander of the 205th separate motorized rifle brigade of the Russian Armed Forces, Dzhabrail Yusupov, with the call sign -Gabriel-. According to the investigation, in July 2022, under his command, a group of 20 armed invaders broke into the Novopetriv special school and kidnapped 15 children. The children, together with the school principal and her husband, were taken to the Crimea, and later to Anapa, Krasnodar region of the Russian Federation. For a month, they were kept in a boarding house, where the children were forced to sing the Russian national anthem. Only in November 2022, thanks to one of the charitable organizations, it was possible to take the children from the Russian Federation through third countries and return them to their homeland. Based on the collected evidence, Yusupov was notified in absentia of suspicion for violating the laws and customs of war (Part 2 of Article 28, Part 1 of Article 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). Currently, measures are being taken to search for him and bring him to justice. This is not the first time that the SBU investigates such crimes. Earlier, an occupation official of the Kherson region was exposed, who also participated in the deportation of Ukrainian children. The investigation is being conducted under the procedural guidance of the Prosecutor General's Office. As reported by ArmyInform, he stole bison, deer and a horse from Russia: occupational director of the reserve -Askaniya-Nova- was exposed.

Title: - They let them in and detonated the mine. So there, out of 15 people, 13 immediately fell - - our e...
Description: The video about military engineers was released on November 6 on the brigade's channel. The engineering unit is fighting in Luhansk region. Thanks to the coordinated work of the unit and the command of the battalion, which actively supports new developments, it is possible to be one step ahead of the overwhelming enemy. See a great report on those who pave the way for our troops on offense and build defenses on defense. Those who combine brute strength with a sharp mind. The work of engineers, people with nerves of steel and hands of gold is sometimes invisible, but so important. As reported by ArmyInform, during the repulse of the assault, the Presidential Brigade burned more than 20 units of enemy equipment.

Title: The enemy lost 60 UAVs and a drone control point in the Kharkiv direction over the past day
Description: Details of the situation in the Kharkiv direction and enemy losses were informed at Kharkiv OTU. Over the past 24 hours, the enemy has unsuccessfully attacked near Vovchansk 8 times. the Russian occupiers carried out one missile strike, 11 airstrikes using 12 guided aerial bombs and 45 unguided aerial missiles, 49 kamikaze drone strikes. Also, the Russian invaders fired 318 shots at the positions of the defenders of Ukraine. The defense forces respond adequately to the actions of the enemy and continue to effectively destroy the manpower, weapons and military equipment of the Russian occupiers. The enemy's losses during the past day amounted to 119 creatures, of which 40 were irretrievable, 78 were sanitary, and 1 were captured. Also, the enemy lost 83 units of weapons and military equipment destroyed and damaged, in particular: In addition, in the Kharkiv direction, the Defense Forces of Ukraine destroyed 52 shelters for personnel, one ammunition storage place and one enemy UAV control point. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that during the last few days, as a result of the change in weather conditions in the north of Kharkiv Oblast, the number of military clashes decreased by almost a third, the enemy began to use less equipment, in particular UAVs.

Title: Kateryna Chernogorenko: We understand that a referral to the VLK can be obtained online
Description: She voiced her answer in the new project Army TV. Kateryna Chernogorenko explained that it takes time to implement all tasks and plans to improve the service: -There is such a task in our plan.- -We understand that in order to get a referral to the VLK, you don't need to stand in line, because it can be done conveniently, in a couple of clicks in Reserve+,- added the Deputy Minister of Defense. She noted that her team is already conducting thorough consultations with the Ministry of Health and the National Health Service of Ukraine in order to implement this functionality as soon as possible. The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine has already a digital reform model of military medical commissions has been developed, and it has already provided to partners and government. As reported by ArmyInform, the number of applications from those willing to join the Defense Forces through the Rezerv+ application grew to 4 thousand.

Title: the Kremlin will create centers of Russification at the TOT of Ukraine
Description: This is reported by Center of national resistance. the Kremlin Führer set the task of equipping offices of Russian celebrities in the Donetsk region, Luhansk region, Zaporizhzhia, Kherson region destroyed by the Russian occupiers as a matter of priority. Such Russian linguistic aggression is connected with Moscow's defeat in terms of hopes for the total loyalty of the local population to the occupiers. On the other hand, it is a policy of complete assimilation of Ukrainians into the -Russian measure-. Russian -language- centers will be created in every school library. It was the schools that became centers of Kremlin propaganda on the TOT of Ukraine. For this, their -teachers- are trained here. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that the Russians executed at least 109 unarmed Ukrainian military.

Title: They are walking in waves over the corpses - the enemy is trying to push the Ukrainian defense in To...
Description: Artyom Dzhepko, spokesman for the assault unit, told about this on the -Suspilne Novyni- broadcast. brigade of the National Police -Lyut-. In addition, according to Artem Jepko, the situation in Toretsk is very dynamic. The occupiers are pressing, the Ukrainians are counterattacking — battles are going on for every entrance, for every building. The Russians do not count on losses. -They are walking in waves over these corpses of destroyed infantry. In fact, this is such a conveyor belt - they are constantly going, we destroy them. They don't count on losses at all,- said Artem Dzhepko. Previously, ArmyInform already reported that the occupiers are storming just over the bodies of their dead.

Title: Three types of postponements will appear in the Reserve+ application in November
Description: She did this in the new project Armiya TV, where she answered questions from social networks. Kateryna Chernogorenko reported that three types of postponements will appear in the Reserve+ application in November: -We see that the issue of postponements is very important for our users. Every day we receive a lot of requests for this service. That is why we are already conducting tests and planning a full release of the new functionality in November,- said Kateryna Chernogorenko. The Deputy Minister emphasized that her team strives to transfer absolutely all deferrals online, as well as for Reserve+ to become a full-fledged alternative to TCC. -So that Reserve+ provided a full-fledged opportunity to receive all the services that you receive physically at the TCC,- added Kateryna Chernogorenko. She also stated that postponements in Reserve+ should be very simple: it will be enough to enter the application, send a request and receive the status of the postponement, which will be uploaded to the electronic military registration document. As reported by ArmyInform, it will be possible to check /a> information about the subpoena.

Title: Meat without water, fish without glaze, milk from a cow — the Ministry of Defense has tightened the ...
Description: About this reported on November 6 by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. During inspections of the supply of food products for the needs of military personnel in the military units of the Armed Forces, individual cases were found when suppliers deliver frozen chicken with an excessive moisture content. In response to this, the Ministry of Defense established requirements for the mass fraction of moisture that remains after thawing frozen poultry meat, as well as the mass fraction of glaze in frozen fish. Also, the ministry banned the supply of dairy and sour-milk products made from other than cow's or sheep's milk to the Armed Forces. Corresponding changes to the -Description of products according to the Catalog of Food Products- was approved by the Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine Dmytro Klimenkov. -‎We strive to provide our servicemen not only with a sufficient amount of food products, but also to guarantee their quality and security. Improving the requirements for nutrition is an important step on the way to raising the standards of provision of our military,- noted Dmytro Klimenkov. The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine is taking comprehensive measures to improve quality military food. We will remind you that from 2025 it is planned to -fermerskoyi-produkczyiy-z-2025-roku->increasing purchases of farm products , which will provide the military with fresh seasonal fruits and vegetables. In addition,requirements for the caloric content of food products have been introduced, which guarantees compliance with their energy value to the needs of military personnel. These changes are aimed at significantly improving the quality of food and supporting the combat readiness of the army. -vymogy-do-kalorijnosti-produktiv-dlya-zsu/->introduces new requirements to the calorie content of products for the ZSU.

Title: A full grid of -maviks- — footage of a new method of hunting enemy copters has appeared
Description: The video of the combat operation was published on the Internet. It recorded numerous cases of shooting down enemy UAVs using nets At the same time, our copter remains intact. There are more and more such recorded cases, but it is still too early to talk about widespread use. The video is marked with Ptashka Drones, a Ukrainian drone manufacturer. The company's channel confirm that they are working in this direction. As reported by ArmyInform, the Defense Forces started to shoot down with drones the Russian analogues of the -shaheds-.

Title: -I destroy enemies with joy- - fighter -Athos-
Description: The story of the fighter was made public by the 128th Separate Mountain Assault Transcarpathian Brigade.

Title: - Trump will be more decisive, he will resolve the battle deep into Russia, and the end of the war-,...
Description: Some commentators were outraged, because -not a single US president has done anything good for Russia. Everyone contributed to the collapse of the Soviet Union, and now Russia.- Other swamp dwellers are outraged by the fact that -no one wants to work in our country- everything is not the same, and Trump will be more decisive. In his name, he will resolve the battle in the depths of Russia. And that's the end of the war.- Some -narrow-minded- tried to push the narrative that -Trump has traditional values, and that means Russia.- However, such a wretched man immediately received answers in the form of -He was shooting white tomahawks over the heads of our base in Syria, and then he said that his daughter had advised him so and he decided to strike!- Why do we need such a traditionalist who is ready to start a nuclear war?-. The rest of the Muscovites were very excited, because -under Trump, we received the most crippling sanctions-; he also gave more weapons to Ukraine than Obama. Israel also supports Trump, and therefore Russia's ally, Iran, will also be bad. It's not worth rejoicing.- One of the representatives of the Mokshan filth writes that -The elections will end and they will not go to the next one. If they go to the M-2 highway between Kursk and Belgorod, then they will shoot the road, and Belgorod will be in a semi-encirclement.- Some Russians say that -Politics is an eta bolshoy bardel, not a club of noble gentlemen.- For such a reckless decision and the death of our soldiers, all commanders-atsov, we need to go to a tribunal. Trump will start to prove that he is the best and then he will show how to talk to Putin.-

Title: The Ministry of Defense is testing new samples of women's winter uniforms and introducing elements o...
Description: This was discussed during the meeting devoted to issues of inclusivity and barrier-freeness, held under the chairmanship of the Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine, Brigadier General of Justice Serhiy Melnyka. Yes, field trials of demi-season uniforms for women are currently underway. And the first samples of the winter uniform are prepared for scientific and research tests. -The introduction of women's form is important, in particular, because the dimensional grid of the form for men is not relevant for women,- Serhiy Melnyk said. At the same time, he added that the process is slowing down due to the low interest of manufacturers to provide test samples for the tests necessary to develop technical conditions for production. The Ministry also takes into account the results of field testing of summer uniforms and underwear. Changes to the technical conditions of certain elements of military clothing are already planned, taking into account the feedback of female military personnel. Serhii Melnyk also emphasized the need to provide women's bulletproof vests that would meet the protection requirements when reducing the weight of armor plates. Also within the scope of the -Wounded Package- project initiated by the Ministry of Defense this year, requirements for adaptive clothing that will be provided to wounded servicemen are being developed. According to the plan, from 2025, a set of such clothes will be issued irrevocably and free of charge at stabilization points and during inpatient treatment. The project covers all units of the Defense and Security Forces, therefore it requires interdepartmental agreement and the adoption of the relevant resolution of the Cabinet of Ministers of Ukraine. In addition, as part of the implementation of the National Barrier-Free Strategy of Ukraine The Ministry of Defense will reconstruct part of its buildings by the end of 2024. -For this year, work on 10 medical facilities of the Ministry of Defense was planned and financed. Elevators, ramps and other equipment will be built and put into operation there, which will make life easier for servicemen who have received disabilities and have corresponding needs. We are already planning further steps in this direction for next year as well,- noted Serhiy Melnyk. The Deputy Minister of Defense added that a list of the Ministry's facilities, which will be subject to reconstruction in 2025, as well as the dates of the start and completion of works and sources of funding are determined. vprovadylo-novi-standarty-yakosti-formy/->introduced new standards of form quality.

Title: First they lay down, then they lay down - the marines destroyed the lazy invaders
Description: The video of the defeat was released on November 6 on the unit's channel. why did the Russian attack aircraft lay down right on the road. They pretended to be dead, but they could not fool our pilots. An FPV drone flew in and hit the cluster of Russians just in time. The next drone has already recorded the death of the invaders. -Katsaps came to earn a few rubles, and they earned an FPV drone,- the unit commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the -Griffon- unit of the 501st separate battalion of marines -kurshhyni/->collected a selection of lesions of the occupiers trying to hide in the cellars.

Title: President Trump: great risks or great opportunities for Ukraine?
Description: -During the months leading up to the US presidential election, I was asked many times the question: 'Who is better for us: Trump or Kamala?' The following answer seemed the most correct: Thus, with the victory of Donald Trump, we find ourselves on the threshold of a period of change. Despite the flurry of despair in the popular media, there is good reason to hope that the new administration's actions will be favorable to us. Let's find out why this is so. The years of Joe Biden's administration (2021-2025) will go down in history as a catastrophically unsuccessful period for the United States in the context of foreign policy. The surrender of Afghanistan to the Taliban, the large-scale Russian-Ukrainian war, the aggression of Iran and its proxy forces against Israel, the deepening of ties along the -axis of evil- Russia-China-Iran-North Korea - this is just a list of the main failures committed by Washington in previous years. Against this background, Trump's first term (2017-2021) was distinguished by an exemplary foreign policy strategy. Let's recall how in the mid-2010s terrorist attacks by the Islamic State took place in different parts of the world. Under Trump, the US military, together with its allies, eliminated the IS threat. At the beginning of 2020, the legendary (and infamous) Iranian general Qassem Soleimani was eliminated. Several Arab states signed a peace treaty with Israel (the Abrahamic Pact). A treaty was signed between North and South Korea. Currently, three actions of the Biden administration that prompted Vladimir Putin to attack Ukraine can be singled out: Donald Trump is now promising to do two things on his first day in office: close the southern border and restore oil production permits to make the United States the world's largest oil producer again. This should collapse the price, which has been holding for a long time at the level of $70-80 per barrel, favorable to the Russians. We have heard Trump's statements many times that he will stop the Russian-Ukrainian war in 24 hours. He even said several times that he would do it even before the inauguration, which is scheduled for January 20, 2025. Obviously, this will not happen so quickly, but the fact is that the newly elected president sees the Russian-Ukrainian war as a problem that needs to be solved as soon as possible. It is not for nothing that he, unlike Kamala Harris, mentioned Ukraine during most of his speeches on the eve of the elections. At the beginning, the priority of the new administration will be to stop hostilities, that is, to freeze the front line in current positions. Of course, one should not hope that Trump will immediately convince Putin to release all Ukrainian lands. But it is worth recalling his words a few months ago: -If Putin does not obey me, I will arm Ukraine to such an extent that he will regret it.- That is, the acceleration of the pace of arms delivery is considered by Trump as a way to deter Moscow. Let's not forget that it was during Trump's first term that Obama's embargo on the supply of lethal weapons to Ukraine was lifted. An extremely important factor is the fact that the Republicans won a majority in both houses of Congress. Full one-party control will ensure a high speed of decision-making, in particular regarding new aid packages for Ukraine. Broad bipartisan support for pro-Ukrainian initiatives will remain in the Senate and the House of Representatives. A negative factor can be Trump's entourage, led by his vice president JD Vance, Tulsi Gabbard, Robert Kennedy and others. Vance is known for his statements regarding the inappropriateness of large-scale US intervention in the Russian-Ukrainian war. He outlined his vision in an article for the New York Times, where he described the optimal scenario, in his opinion: freezing the front line and starting negotiations. However, it is worth noting that Vance never spoke about openly handing Ukraine over to Moscow. The activation of US foreign policy in other directions should be positive for Kyiv, in particular: Over the past four years, Washington has made many mistakes that need to be corrected immediately. We hope that an exemplary foreign policy strategy will be a feature of Trump's second term as well. Be that as it may, the main difference between the Trump administration and its predecessors should be the determination to achieve the chosen strategy, whatever it may be. Biden, Blinken and other incumbent officials have always made loud statements about supporting Ukraine to the very end, ensuring victory, etc. But their actions differed significantly from what they said: the weapons always arrived with many months of delay and in insufficient quantities. The USA did not provide Ukraine with everything it needed when we could develop success in the second half of 2022 (the Kharkiv operation and the liberation of Kherson), or when we were preparing for an offensive in the summer of 2023. Currently, the main task of President Zelensky is to direct Trump's determination in the direction we need. The Victory Plan presented by us should become the main argument during Trump's talks with Moscow. A period of indolence and indecision on Capitol Hill is being replaced by a time of great change and great opportunity. Opportunities that we should take advantage of. Olexandr Chupak for ArmyInform

Title: Attack on the Caspian flotilla, the Reb did not help the Russians, Magyar and the wormhole: a stream...
Description: In particular, we are talking about probably missile ships -Tatarstan- and -Dagestan-, small missile ships of the flotilla were also damaged. Drone pilots of the -Rarog- unmanned systems battalion of the 24th OMBr shared a video clip of how they hunt Russians. Our fighters find the occupiers in various situations; some of them hoped to be protected by EW, some tried to run away, some shot back, or pretended to be dead. As a result, everyone died. The Russians tried to escape from our FPV drone on a -loaf-. The evacuation group of the occupiers could not break away from the pursuer, so they came up with nothing better than to throw out their -three hundredth- in order to gain speed. Apparently, the -three hundredth- was lucky, because FPV did catch up with the -loaf-. These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - Major Andriy Makarenko and Captain Artem Golub.

Title: The more assaults, the more enemy we destroy - gunner -Smoke-
Description: The relevant information was published by the brigade's official page.

Title: $4,000 each from a swindler — in Transcarpathia, the head of the regional TCC and the deputy command...
Description: The Security Service of Ukraine reported this on November 6. According to the materials of the National Police investigators, both figures acted separately, but used similar -schemes-: in exchange for bribes, they offered conscripts to avoid conscription on the basis of forged documents about -bad- health. To do this, officials provided potential conscripts with fictitious medical reports of the VLK about the presence of serious diseases. In the future, evaders used a forgery to remove themselves from military registration and could illegally leave Ukraine. The cost of such -services- was from $4,000 per client. On the basis of the received evidence, both officials are suspected (according to the crimes committed) under two articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine: An investigation is ongoing to establish all the circumstances of the crime and bring the perpetrators to justice. Perpetrators face up to 10 years in prison with confiscation of property. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: The General Staff of the Armed Forces explained why they are creating new brigades instead of replen...
Description: The conversation with Dmytro Lykhoviei was published on November 6. -Recently, the enemy has increased the number of regiments, brigades and divisions and the number of personnel by almost 100,000 people. The length of the front line also increased. In order to close the front, new brigades must be created within the Armed Forces,- Dmytro Lykhova said. According to him, there is simply no other effective way to counter the enemy who prevails, as today there are 1,300 km of frontline with active combat clashes. He also noted that the Russian occupiers have a significant advantage, sometimes fivefold, on the battle line. -Therefore, when during hostilities there is a threat of losing the positions and lines of defense of certain brigades, the redeployment of individual battalions of other military units is used here. This is a logical and regulated method of action to strengthen the defense: when there is a threat of a breakthrough in problematic areas of the front, units from unattacked areas are transferred to it,- Dmytro Lykhova assured. He noted that in conditions of insufficient forces and means, this is the optimal way to counteract the prevailing enemy forces, thus reducing the risk of a breakthrough. Also, according to the spokesman, it should be taken into account that currently the Armed Forces do not have the opportunity to quickly replenish the brigades with personnel. -Such a need is scheduled a month in advance. It is also necessary to understand that the people who join the unit must undergo adaptation and coordination in it, and this takes time. That is why, to strengthen the section of the front, where there is a threat of a breakthrough, an already formed unit is used, which is ready to perform the task in a short time,- explained Dmytro Lykhova. In addition, Lykhovi emphasized that brigades are also needed for rotation and replacement of already existing brigades. -You can't limit yourself to the simple replenishment of brigades that have suffered significant losses either - because they need combat coordination. New brigades are needed to replace them and withdraw them from the area of ​​hostilities,- noted Dmytro Lykhovi. As reported by ArmyInform, the spokesman of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Captain Dmytro Lykhovii kinczya-roku/->told about the consequences of the audit for the IT sphere in the Armed Forces.

Title: The number of combat encounters increased to 99
Description: This is reports the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

Title: EW works - our pilots miraculously escaped from an enemy FPV drone
Description: The video of the rescue was released on November 6 on the brigade's channel. -At the beginning of the Kharkiv operation, we collected a portable reb. Today, near Pokrovsk, he saved us again. While moving between positions, an enemy aircraft flew at us, and its control was interrupted by our miracle backpack. Having flown on hold (automatic settings, — ed.) 200 meters, the drone fell, and we moved on, under a reliable dome of protection from the rear,- commented the video -Sharp cartridges-. As reported by ArmyInform, the -Sharp Kartuz- UAV unit of the National Guard of Ukraine showed burnt Russian armored vehicles that tried to expand the bridgehead around Selydovym.

Title: Ukraine expects a new tranche of aid from the EU in the amount of 1.9 billion euros — Rustem Umyerov
Description: He wrote about this on his Facebook page. In addition, Rustem Umyerov expressed his gratitude to the head of the Committee, Mrs. Delphine Pronk, and the EU ambassador to Ukraine, Katarina Maternova, for their constant help and support. Thanks to European partners, Ukraine is successfully implementing a number of important security initiatives, in particular as part of the EUMAM Military Assistance Mission, which since October 2022 has already provided training for more than 62,000 Ukrainian military personnel in EU countries. By the end of the year, this number will increase to 75 thousand. The minister welcomed the EU ambassadors' decision to extend the mission's mandate for another two years and expressed hope for conducting exercises directly in Ukraine, which would speed up the training of Ukrainian defenders. The Minister of Defense also called on European countries to invest in military production in Ukraine, proposing to conclude long-term contracts for the joint production of drones, long-range weapons and ammunition. He emphasized the expectation of a new tranche of aid from the EU in the amount of 1.9 billion euros at the expense of frozen Russian assets, as well as the importance of allocating an additional 6 billion euros from the European Peace Fund to strengthen the Ukrainian army. Rustem Umyerov emphasized that the future of Ukraine lies in the European Union and NATO, and the country will continue to strengthen cooperation for a joint fight against the coalition of dictatorships led by Russia. As reported by ArmyInform, the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov congratulated Patrick Turner in Kyiv on his first official visit as the head of the NATO Representation in Ukraine.

Title: -Hatiel will hide from the command-: border guards captured a Russian soldier
Description: About this informs the State Border Service of Ukraine. It happened during the repulse of an enemy assault on our positions. A serviceman of the occupation forces decided to surrender during an unsuccessful attack by the Russians. According to him, he -decided to hide from the command.- During the conversation, he said that he joined the war at the end of September, having signed a contract, was a private and served as a rifleman. The captured occupier was handed over to employees of the special services for the formation of an exchange fund and the return of Ukrainian servicemen from captivity. Previously ArmyInform reported that the Russians cannot dislodge Ukrainian troops from Kurshchyna.

Title: I saw how the heads of our prisoners were cut off - in Kurshchyna they captured a soldier - a very r...
Description: The brigade reported about the prisoner on November 6 on its channel. After interrogation, it turned out that this Pitkevich has quite a long combat experience. In October 2022, while serving a sentence in one of the Russian colonies, he agreed to sign a contract with the private military company Wagner. As part of the units of the PKK, he initially participated in the storming of the settlements of Soledar and Bakhmut. In June 2023, he took part in the -hike- to Moscow, which was then organized by the leader of the -Wagner- PMK. In June of this year, he signed a new contract and entered the service of the 155th Marine Infantry Brigade of the Russian Federation. In August, when the brigade was transferred to Kurshchyna, he took a direct part in the hostilities as an assistant grenade launcher. At the end of September, he witnessed the murder of two Ukrainian prisoners of war near the settlement of Hlushkove. According to him, the order for the execution and subsequent removal of the heads from the bodies was given by the commander of the unit. -The prisoner of war gave his name, as well as the names of the soldiers - the direct perpetrators of this war crime!!! According to intelligence reports, currently the 155th separate marine brigade of the Russian Pacific Fleet has suffered very significant losses in Kurshchyna, due to which the personnel of the unit often leave combat positions and refuse to carry out orders. All criminals will be punished!-, said the message of the 47th brigade. As reported by ArmyInform, Russians executed at least 109 unarmed Ukrainian military.

Title: -No one takes infantry from North Korea seriously-: the Russians cannot dislodge Ukrainian troops fr...
Description: The commander of the 95th airborne platoon told about this on the broadcast of the telethon -Edyny Novyny- - of the Polish Assault Brigade Stanislav Krasnov. According to Krasnov, the aggressor's losses are huge — dozens of killed Russians remain lying on the defense line every day. That is why, he believes, it was necessary to attract foot soldiers from North Korea. Although Ukrainian defenders perceive Koreans more as a joke. -No one takes the infantry from North Korea seriously as a combat unit. Everyone perfectly understands that this will be another cannon fodder, a complete waste, which is unlikely to be able to have any impact,- the representative of the 95th Airborne Assault Brigade shared his impressions. As reported by /a> ArmyInform, pilots of the -Kryla- unit of the 95th Polish Airborne Assault Brigade of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine spectacularly hit the Russian Tiger armored vehicle.

Title: Tanks burned, and -Typhoon- — a column of destroyed Russian equipment near Selidov burned down
Description: The photos were published on November 6 on the unit's channel. -The Defense Forces of Ukraine are doing an incredible job even in such difficult conditions. The enemy column consisted of two tanks and two Typhoon armored fighting vehicles. All the -boxes- were broken by the Ukrainian defenders,- commented the video -Sharp Cartridges-. As reported by ArmyInform, the -Sharp Cartouche- UAV unit of the National Guard of Ukraine showed what the route of the Russians looks like for entering their combat positions near the village of Liptsi in the Kharkiv region.

Title: The weather is bad, but the Russians are good - the cloud cover did not prevent the drones from dest...
Description: The video of combat work was published on November 6 on the brigade's channel. Taking advantage of the bad weather, the occupiers on armored vehicles tried to quickly approach our fortifications, but they were met by dense fire from scouts. Even at the entrance, the enemy was accompanied by a drone-bomber, which waited for an opportune moment and dropped a grenade on the heads of the Russians. Three occupants were wounded, the rest tried to hide in the landing nearby. In the end, the drone pilots and scouts finished the job — destroying the enemy BMP and the remnants of the infantry. As reported by ArmyInform, drone operators of 71 separate hunting brigades monitor the positions of the occupiers around the clock and destroy enemy infantry and equipment.

Title: the Russians executed at least 109 unarmed Ukrainian soldiers
Description: This was reported by the National Information Bureau with reference to an interview with the head of the Department for Combating Crimes Committed in of the armed conflict, Office of the General Prosecutor Yuriy Belousov. According to him, the number of executions of captured Ukrainian soldiers began to increase significantly at the end of last year. Prior to that, the facts of torture prevailed. Yuriy Belousov emphasized that the physical destruction of Ukrainian soldiers in captivity, in particular through executions, torture and terrible conditions of detention, shows the elements of genocide. Ukraine collects evidence of the aggressor's crimes from all possible sources. These are the data of our military, intelligence, information from interrogations of Russian prisoners of war, etc. Despite all the complexity of investigating cases, caused by the impossibility of access to the scene of the crime, bodies and conducting an examination, there are real sentences for war criminals. In the future, not only the perpetrators will be brought to justice, but also the entire vertical of the organizers of such crimes: those who incited, gave orders and did not respond to such crimes. As reported by ArmyInform, the occupiers shot 6 of our prisoners a> in the Pokrovsky direction.

Title: In the Rovenkiv district of the Luhansk region, an ecological disaster caused by the Russian occupat...
Description: About this informs the head of Luhansk OVA Artem Lysogor. The industrial sites of three coal-mining enterprises are located near the settlement - mines -Rovenkivska-, -71-sha-, -Luhanska-. Until a certain time, they were engaged in pumping out mine waters to prevent poisoning of the surrounding soil. After the liquidation of these mines by the Russians, water pumping also stopped. An ecological disaster is approaching in the community and district. Next year, the Russians will leave Luhansk Autodor without large orders and, accordingly, without additional funds. Because contracts with this company are concluded only for the maintenance of highways. Repairs, in particular, and capital ones, will be carried out by contractors from Russia. Currently, five enterprises from the regions of the Russian Federation have already been selected, which will be involved in the work in the so-called LNR. The occupiers do not need foreigners. The quality will also be appropriate. Previously ArmyInform reported that the Defense Forces repelled mass attacks in 10 directions: the invaders lost more than 400 fighters.

Title: -Just a pensioner-: The SBU detained an ex-militia woman who was passing on information about the po...
Description: informs the Security Service of Ukraine about this. According to the case materials, the suspect was a local pensioner, a former employee of the disbanded militia. She worked for the enemy through a -liaison-, an old acquaintance of hers, who was also an ex-militia. In 2014, he joined the DPR terrorists, and after the start of a large-scale war, he became a combatant in one of the reconnaissance and assault brigades of the Russian Armed Forces. According to the instructions of the Russians, the agent leaked the locations of fortified areas and firing positions of Ukrainian troops in the Kramatorsk direction to the -liaison-. First of all, the enemy was interested in the coordinates of the rocket artillery of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, as well as the routes of movement of tanker trucks with fuel, which were supplied to the front. In order to collect intelligence, the perpetrator drove around the area in her car and secretly recorded military objects. The counterintelligence officers of the Security Service exposed the traitor in time, established her location and arrested her. Investigators of the SBU informed the accused about the suspicion under part 2 of Art. 111 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (treason committed under martial law). The perpetrator is in custody. She faces up to life in prison with forfeiture of property. As reported by ArmyInform, three more henchmen of the Russian Federation were detained, who cooperated with the occupiers in the Kherson region, in particular the occupation -vice mayor-.

Title: The Caspian Sea is not yours - footage of a drone attack on the Russian fleet in Dagestan has appear...
Description: The videos were released on November 6. They show how several UAVs break through to their targets at once, regardless of the operation of anti-aircraft guns. The Ukrainian military leadership has not yet commented on these strikes. The distance from the Ukrainian territory to the places of strikes is more than a thousand kilometers. As reported by ArmyInform, the Defense Forces showed weapons for strikes on the far rear of the Russian Federation.

Title: Noticed, arrived, shot - our tank destroys the position of the Russians at close range
Description: The video of combat work was released on November 6 on the brigade's channel. Our tank drove straight to the positions of the Russians along the forest road, and then shot them from a distance of several tens of meters. And calmly drove back. -Tanks are power!-, the brigade commented on the video, and it's hard not to agree with that. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ukrainian large drone-bomber Nemesis and its operators from the unmanned systems battalion of the 63rd mechanized brigade made a successful raid behind the Russians.

Title: The occupiers decided to -remodel- the Mariupol church, which entered the Book of Records of Ukraine
Description: This is notified Mariupol City Council. Now the occupiers decided to -bring the temple into conformity with the canons of the RPC-. For this, -Orthodox volunteers- were sent to the city. They will change the decoration of the building. It should be noted that before the full-scale invasion, the temple was restored by volunteers at the expense of patrons. The building is located in the Primorsky district. The painting of the temple was done by Lviv craftswoman Olga Cheryomushkina. During the blockade of Mariupol, in 2022, the temple became a refuge for peaceful residents. After the capture of Mariupol, a commission from the Russian Orthodox Church came to the church and declared that the decoration of the building did not meet the requirements of the Russian Church, and all this should be redone. We remind you that the enemy has increased the use of barrel artillery in Luhansk region .

Title: The occupiers shelled Donetsk region: more than a dozen buildings were damaged, civilians were evacu...
Description: reports this by the head of Donetsk OVA Vadym Filashkin. In Pokrovsky District, the enemy shelled Kurakhove and Hannivka, damaging private houses. The communities of Marinska and Hrodivska also came under fire. In Kramatorsk district, in Torske village of Lymanska hromada, a residential building was destroyed, and in Kostyantynivka, a coffee shop, a power line and two cars were damaged. Two private houses were damaged in the Bakhmut district of Siversk, and five private houses, two high-rise buildings and an industrial building were damaged in the Chasovoyarsk community. In total, according to information of the military, Russian forces carried out seven attacks on populated areas of Donetsk region. In connection with the shelling, 187 people, including 20 children, were evacuated from the combat zone to protect them from the threat of shelling. As reported by ArmyInform, during the past day Kharkiv region suffered a series of shelling from the Russian occupiers, resulting in civilian casualties.

Title: Stole bison, deer and a horse from Russia: the occupation director of the reserve -Askania-Nova- was...
Description: The Prosecutor General's Office informs about this. The investigation established that the suspect in collusion with representatives of Russian reserves, in particular the Rostovsky Biosphere Reserve and the Steppe Wildlife Association, illegally transferred rare animals from the occupied reserve to the specified institutions. Among the transferred animals are individuals of Chapman's zebra, American bison, David's deer and Przewalski's horse, the latter of which are listed in the Red Book of Ukraine and are subject to special protection. Losses from the looting of the reserve amount to more than 22 million hryvnias. The Askania-Nova Biosphere Reserve, included in the UNESCO international network of biosphere reserves, is protected by the Hague Convention from plunder. The illegal transfer of animals violates the IV Geneva Convention and the IV Hague Convention for the Protection of Civilian Population in Time of War. The investigation continues, other participants in the crime are being identified. The investigation is being conducted by the investigative department of the National Security Service of Ukraine in the Kherson region. As reported by ArmyInform, SBU detained an FSB agent who was active in Mykolaiv and Odesa. He prepared coordinates for missile and drone strikes on both cities and formed a new agent network of the aggressor country.

Title: Russian troops continue to cover the Kherson community with fire: there are wounded
Description: notifies of the Kherson Regional Military Administration. A 68-year-old man was taken to the hospital in a serious condition, having received an explosive injury, eye, shoulder and leg injuries. Another local resident, 54 years old, was diagnosed with an explosive injury and contusion. He was also hospitalized. Also, the -ambulance- team on the spot provided medical assistance to a 52-year-old woman who received an explosive injury and contusion. In addition, at approximately 11:20 a.m., the Russians struck Antonivka. Due to enemy fire, a 55-year-old man received an explosive injury and a contusion. He is currently in the hospital. Previously ArmyInform reported that the Armed Forces against 45 thousand Russians: the operation in Kurshchyna did not allow the Russian Federation to implement a new offensive.

Title: -Cockroaches- broke through to the front: four more developments passed codification
Description: This was reported by the Deputy Prime Minister for Innovation, Education, Science and Technology, Minister of digital transformation of Ukraine Mykhailo Fedorov. According to him, Brave1 now has more than 220 developments codified, including four new ground complexes that are designed to change the situation on the battlefield. According to the General Staff, robotic units make it possible to reduce casualties among the Ukrainian military by 30%. The new complexes are designed to perform a wide range of tasks: Each of these robots reduces the risk to the military, who at the front become the main target for the enemy. Ukraine continues to strengthen its position on the frontline with the help of advanced technologies, because technological superiority is one of the key components of defense today. As reported by ArmyInform, within the limits of the development of the Ukrainian market of ammunition and explosives, the platform -vyrobnykiv/->Brave1 together with the Ministry of Strategic Industries held an event with the participation of 50 domestic manufacturers and representatives of the Security and Defense Forces.

Title: -The occupiers stomp in place -: they failed to take new positions, but they do not stop trying
Description: Oleksandr Nevidimy, press officer of the 46th separate airmobile brigade, told about this on the air of the -Yedini Novyni- telethon. The enemy, according to Alexander the Unknown, tries to act in small groups on foot, and also moves on motorized vehicles. Armored vehicles are used point by point. -For this, the infantry is trying to infiltrate into the forest belt, outline new positions there and gain a foothold. The infantry is carrying out demining to advance equipment and assault groups,- said the press officer of the 46th Separate Airmobile Brigade. Yesterday, Oleksandr Nevidimy noted, 14 units of equipment were deployed at the brigade's position - 8 of them were destroyed, 6 were damaged. As reported by ArmyInform , fighters of the 46th separate airmobile brigade of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine repelled two successive attempts of assaults by the Russian invaders.

Title: The Ministry of Defense is launching an updated psychological rehabilitation program for military pe...
Description: informs the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine about this. The department noted that specialists from the Combat Stress Control Group will assist with recovery guidance when a military unit is undergoing recovery. -The complex of psychological rehabilitation services will be available to all servicemen who need it after participating in hostilities. Psychological rehabilitation will be provided for military personnel and their family members. This is a step towards strengthening the high-quality psychological protection of our defenders,- emphasized the head of the Department of Psychological Support, Valentina Obolentseva. By the end of the year, a pilot project will be launched in cooperation with local self-government for further scaling of the program. A working group of representatives of the Ministry of Defense, the Armed Forces, public organizations and foreign partners, including the Security Promotion Group of Ukraine (SAG-U), is working on the development of updated standards. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense opens the first Center for reintegration for released military prisoners.

Title: The Armed Forces against 45,000 Russians: the operation in Kurshchyna did not allow the Russian Fede...
Description: reported this by the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine General Oleksandr Syrsky According to him, this was supposed to be a continuation of the Russian operation in the Kharkiv direction. That is why it was decided to conduct an offensive operation to overtake with the transfer of hostilities to the territory of the enemy in the Kursk region. For almost three months of the operation, as of November 5, 2024, the losses of the enemy in the Kursk direction in terms of personnel amounted to 20,842 people, of which: liquidated - 7,905, wounded - 12,220, captured - 717. During the same period, 1,101 units of enemy weapons and military equipment were destroyed . Of them: 54 tanks, 276 armored fighting vehicles, 107 guns and mortars, 5 anti-aircraft guns and 659 units of motor vehicles. Now Russia wants Ukrainian troops to withdraw from this territory. The enemy has concentrated about 45,000 troops there. And it is trying to increase their number. Russia's own troops are not enough for this direction, so they are trying to attract troops from North Korea there. The Russian occupiers wanted to seize more territories in the north of Ukraine in the Sumy region. However, the Defense Forces of Ukraine took a preventive step and continue to destroy the enemy on its territory.
