About 2,000 Ukrainian servicemen were awarded state awards for their heroism and successful actions during the Kursk operation. As ArmiyaInform reported, the enemy tried to storm our positions 140 times: the Armed Forces of Ukraine held back the offensive.

Title: -The paths of advancement are completely covered with the corpses of their predecessors-: the occupi...
Description: The commander of the 49th Yevgeny Skoryna of the separate assault battalion -Karpatska Sich-. Now, according to Yevgeny Skoryna, more and more enemies are using units that have been preparing for the past two months. Traditionally, preparation for Russians takes place in just such a time. Then the stormtroopers are sent to the position. -They go out, move along conventional guidelines. These progression paths are completely covered with the corpses of predecessors who traveled the same route. Well, they supplement their numbers in our fields,- said the commander of the -Karpatska Sich- battalion. Previously ArmyInform reported that the -meat assaults- in Toretsk are winding down, because the Russians are gradually running out and need replenishment

Title: Russians are planning to brainwash TOT residents with the help of futurologists
Description: This is reported by Center of National Resistance. This time, the Russians resorted to the services of pocket futurologists, fiction writers and forecasters, who, as part of the -creating the future- campaign, plan to send them on a tour of temporarily occupied cities. Of course, in their predictions there will be a traditional delusion about a happy future under the leadership of the Kremlin dictatorship, where it is necessary to -wait a little-. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that the Defense Forces damaged the command post of the occupiers .

Title: Casualties among the civilian population: the occupiers inflicted devastating blows on Kharkiv and K...
Description: This was reported by Oleg Synegubov, the head of the Kharkiv Regional Military Administration. In particular, in Kharkiv at 16:53 the enemy struck with a drone, as a result of which two women aged 56 and 72 were injured. As a result of the attack, two cars, windows in two apartment buildings, a car shop, a furniture shop and an educational institution were damaged. Also, in the city of Kupyansk at 15:48, one car was damaged as a result of an FPV drone strike. Earlier, at 9:49 a.m., in the village of Kapitolivka in the Izyum district, the territory of a civilian enterprise was targeted by shelling. A warehouse building and a private house were damaged. Three men aged 40, 47 and 60 were injured. At 8:40 a.m., a 48-year-old man and a woman were killed in the village of Hlushkivka, Kupyan district, as a result of shelling from an anti-aircraft missile system. Also, during the day, 153 people were evacuated from the Kupyan and Boriv directions. We would like to remind you that yesterday, November 5, the Russian troops czentri-mista/->carried out several attacks on the Kharkiv region, which resulted in the deaths and injuries of civilians. As reported by ArmyInform, Zaporizhia was attacked by Russia more than 300 times a day: a rocket attack took the lives of 7 people, 25 were injured.

Title: A new survey in Army+ will help solve another problem of the military
Description: This was reported by Kateryna Chernogorenko. From now on, changing the place of service will be available in Army+. The military will be able to submit reports that will be processed within 24 hours. However, so that the new procedure does not run into a bureaucratic wall, but actually works, a survey is now being launched through the Army+ application. It will last until November 10 and will contain 12 questions. The anonymous results of your answers should improve the future translation algorithm. -The main questions will be: actual service status, duties, military experience. Reasons for wanting to change a part. For example, the desire to transfer to the front or to the rear, or to change the commander. Have time to express your opinion, share this news with your loved ones, friends-protectors! Thanks to your involvement, we will be able to create an army in which every soldier will feel comfortable,- stressed the Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that the President signed laws on the extension of martial law and mobilization.

Title: The president signed laws on the extension of martial law and mobilization
Description: This is discussed in the cards of draft laws No. 12151 and No. 12152. Thus, martial law and general mobilization in Ukraine from November 10 are extended for 90 days and will last until February 7, 2025. The Verkhovna Rada supported these draft laws for the thirteenth time on October 29. Volodymyr Zelenskyi submitted the documents for consideration the day before. 311 People's Deputies voted for the continuation of martial law, 304 voted for mobilization. Secretary of the National Security and Defense Council Oleksandr Lytvynenko reported on the draft laws. He said more than 160,000 more people needed to be mobilized. This will make it possible to complete parts by more than 80%. Now more than a million people have been mobilized. As reported by ArmyInform, the Verkhovna Rada as a whole supported revised government draft law No. 11417 on increasing budget expenditures by 500 billion hryvnias.

Title: The enemy increased the use of barrel artillery in Luhansk region
Description: About this informs the head of Luhansk OVA Artem Lysogor. In particular, near Makiivka, Tverdokhlibovo and Grekivka. The enemy also tried to storm Bilogorivka. The occupiers increased the use of barrel artillery, hitting Makiivka 12 times and Balka Zhuravka six more times. They aimed at Makiivka from the rocket salvo system. Seven invader drones carried out drops near these two villages. An airstrike was carried out on Tverdokhlibovo. Earlier ArmyInform reported , that the enemy tried to storm our positions 140 times: the Armed Forces restrained the offensive.

Title: The share of women in humanitarian demining of Ukraine increased to 33%
Description: notifies the Main Administration of Mine Action, Civil Defense and Environmental Security. Representatives of international organizations, together with experts from Ukrainian departments, including the Main Department of Mine Action, the Ministry of Economy, the Ministry of Veterans Affairs, and the State Emergency Service, discussed opportunities to promote gender equality, diversity, and inclusiveness in the field of demining. Abigail Jones, GICHD's gender program manager, said the organization has already achieved success in involving women in demining in countries such as Colombia, Cambodia and Iraq. In Ukraine, GICHD plans to assess the capacities of state bodies for the development of gender and social integration and prepare a national action plan -Women, peace, security-. Lieutenant Colonel Olena Danyliuk, Deputy of the Main Department of Mine Action, reported that the number of women among demining operators in Ukraine has increased from 25% last year to 33% this year. The participants of the event also participated in interactive discussions and tasks that helped to analyze the social and gender aspects of mine action. As reported by ArmyInform, since the beginning of the large-scale invasion of the Russian Federation into Ukraine 1,068 people, including 100 children, were injured by mines and explosive remnants of war.

Title: Night shelling of Nikopolshchyna: Russian -Hrads- hit Marganets
Description: reported this by the head of the Dnipropetrovsk OVA Serhiy Lysak. The communities of Nikopol, Marganetska and Pokrovska were under attack. As a result of shelling, the sports facility was damaged. On the night of November 6, the Russian army continued its shelling, hitting the Marganets community with Grad anti-aircraft missiles, firing 10 shells. Fortunately, there are no victims or victims. In other areas of Dnipropetrovsk region, it passed without enemy strikes. As reported by ArmyInform, an attack on the energy infrastructure of the Mykolayiv region: subscribers were disconnected, a child was injured.

Title: The defense forces damaged the control post of the occupiers
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Urayna informs about this. However, our soldiers inflict significant losses in manpower and equipment on the occupying troops and actively undermine the offensive potential of the enemy in the rear. Over the past day, aviation, missile forces and artillery of the Defense Forces hit 7 areas of concentration of personnel, weapons and military equipment, two UAV ground control stations, one control point and one field ammunition depot of the invaders. We will remind, last day of loss Russian invaders numbered 1,250 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 6 tanks, 11 armored combat vehicles, 20 artillery systems, 57 UAVs of the operational-tactical level, 55 cars and one unit of special equipment of the occupiers. As reported by ArmiyaInform, the enemy tried to storm our positions 140 times: the Ukrainian Armed Forces held back the offensive.

Title: Five wounded due to shelling in the Kherson region: residential areas and infrastructure are under f...
Description: reported this by Oleksandr Prokudin, the head of Kherson OVA. Last day, Bilozerka, Kizomys, Veletenske, Chornobayivka, Mykilske, Shiroka Balka, Naddniprianske, Chervyn Mayak, Beryslav, Osokorivka, Stanislav, Zelenivka, Monastyrske, Antonivka, Prydniprovske, Sadove and the city of Kherson came under enemy fire and airstrikes. In particular, the Russian military targeted critical infrastructure facilities, administrative buildings, and a banking institution. A high-rise building and 26 private houses were damaged in the residential quarters of the population centers of the region. The occupiers also mutilated the gas pipeline, agricultural machinery and private cars. According to information of the Kherson OVA, the Russian army attacked Zelenivka at night. One of the shells hit a residential building. Two women, 61 and 82 years old, received mine-explosive injuries. In addition, at night, the occupying forces attacked the hospital in Bilozerka. As a result of two -arrivals-, windows were broken in one of the buildings and in the technical room, the kitchen and offices were mutilated. As reported by ArmyInform, an attack on the energy infrastructure of the Mykolayiv region: subscribers were disconnected, a child was injured.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, fortitude, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , I decree: to start holding a nationwide minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, to be announced in all mass media regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: The enemy maintains a military presence in the Black Sea: a total salvo of up to 4 missiles
Description: This is reported by the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. There are no enemy ships in the Sea of ​​Azov. There is one enemy ship in the Mediterranean Sea, which is a carrier of Kalibr cruise missiles with a total salvo of up to 8 missiles. During the day in the interests of the Russian Federation, passage through the Kerch Strait was carried out: The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention for the Safety of Life at Sea of ​​1974 (SOLAS) by turning off automatic identification systems. As reported by ArmyInform, the Black Sea Fleet of the Russian Federation continues to stay away from the Sea of ​​Azov, in fact all the time the ship depot, which can be called combat-ready, is in Novorossiysk.

Title: Zaporozhye was attacked by Russia more than 300 times a day: a rocket attack killed 7 people, 25 wer...
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of the Zaporizhzhia OVA. Russian troops carried out 8 airstrikes on Orikhov, Novoandriivka, Novodarivka, Biloghirya, Malya Tokmachka and Temyrivka. In addition, 154 UAVs of various modifications attacked Lobkovo, Gulyaipole, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Robotine, Mala Tokmachka, Biloghirya and Olhivske. Also, 4 shellings from RSZV were carried out on the territory of Lobkovo and Novodanylivka. As Ivan Fedorov noted, 134 artillery strikes fell on Lobkovo, Gulyaipol, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Robotyn, Malya Tokmachka, Biloghiri, and Olhivskoe. In addition, 8 reports were received about the destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure facilities. We will remind, the Russians attacked Zaporizhzhia by hitting the infrastructure object.

Title: The enemy tried to storm our positions 140 times: the Armed Forces restrained the offensive
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Urayna informs about this. In addition, the Russians used 1,370 kamikaze drones to destroy them and fired more than 4,000 shots, including 79 from multiple rocket launchers. The aggressor carried out airstrikes in the areas of the settlements of Velika Pisarivka, Bilovody, Popivka, Zarutske, Kiyanitsa of the Sumy region; Pitomnyk, Kozacha Lopan, Bochkove, Bayrak, Petropavlivka, Pristin of the Kharkiv region; Hard bread of Luhansk region. Also under attack were Terny, Chasiv Yar, Stupochki, Toretsk, Kostyantynivka, Druzhba, Petrivka, Sukha Balka, Oleksandropil, Valentinivka of the Donetsk region; Novodaryivka, Biloghirya, Mala Tokmachka, Orihiv, Novoandriivka of the Zaporizhzhia region. On the Kharkiv direction the enemy unsuccessfully tried eight times to penetrate the defense of our defenders near Vovchansk. In the Kupyan direction, there were eight attacks by the occupiers during the day. The defense forces repelled enemy assaults near Zagryzovy, Sinkivka and Kruglyakivka. In this direction, the enemy actively used aviation. On the Lyman direction, the enemy, supported by aviation, attacked eight times. Tried to penetrate our defense near Grekivka, Tverdokhlibovo, Novomykhailivka, Makiivka, Ternivka, and Katerynivka. In the Severskyi direction, Ukrainian defenders repelled one assault by Russian invaders near Bilogorivka. With the support of aviation, the occupiers attacked twice in the areas of Bilogorivka in the Kramatorsk direction. Actively using bomber aircraft in the Toretsk direction, the enemy launched two attacks near Toretsk. In the Pokrovsky direction, our defenders stopped 33 assaults of the aggressor towards the settlements of Promin, Lysivka, Novogrodivka, Krutyy Yar, Selidove and Grodivka. In the Kurakhiv direction the defense forces repelled 56 attacks. The occupiers most actively tried to advance in the districts of Vovchenka, Stepanivka, Illinka, Berezka, Kreminnaya Balka, Katerynivka, Novoselidivka, Novodmytrivka, Gostrogo, Maksimilianivka, Antonivka, and Elizavetivka. In the Vremivsk direction, the enemy carried out ten assaults on our positions in the Kostiantynopolsky, Rozdolny, and Trudovoy areas. In the Gulyajpil direction, the enemy did not conduct offensive operations, but actively used assault aircraft in the area of ​​the settlement of Biloghirya. In the Orichov direction the occupiers unsuccessfully attacked once in the direction of Orichov. In the Dnieper direction, over the past day, our defenders stopped three attempts by the Russian invaders to advance, received a tough repulse, and retreated after suffering losses. In the Volyn and Poliske directions no signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. We will remind, last day of loss Russian invaders numbered 1,250 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 6 tanks, 11 armored combat vehicles, 20 artillery systems, 57 UAVs of the operational-tactical level, 55 cars and a unit of special equipment of the occupiers.

Title: A blow to the energy infrastructure of the Mykolaiv region: subscribers were cut off, a child was in...
Description: notifies the head of Mykolaivska OVA Vitaly Kim about this. Due to the attack on the energy infrastructure, there was a blackout of subscribers. Energy companies have already restored a significant part of the supply, work is ongoing. There are no casualties. In the Mykolaiv district on November 5, the enemy attacked the Kutsurub community with FPV drones, and also carried out artillery fire. In the villages of Solonchaky and Dmytrivka, cars and an outbuilding were damaged. No people were hurt. The town of Ochakiv was also under artillery fire. A 13-year-old girl and a 39-year-old woman were injured. The condition of the victims is stable. A fire broke out in a residential building in the city, which was promptly extinguished by rescuers. In addition, seven Shahed 131/136 drones were destroyed by air defense forces over the region. As reported by ArmyInform, Russian troops yesterday, November 5, carried out several attacks on the Kharkiv region, which resulted in the death and injury of civilians.

Title: Massive attack on Ukraine: shot down 38 enemy drones in different directions
Description: This is reported by the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The air attack was repulsed by anti-aircraft missile forces, aviation, units of electronic warfare, mobile fire groups of the Air Force and the Defense Forces of Ukraine. As of 07:30, the downing of 38 enemy UAVs in Odesa, Mykolaiv, Kyiv, Sumy, Kirovohrad, Zhytomyr, Cherkasy, Chernihiv and Zaporizhia regions was confirmed. In addition, 20 enemy drones were lost in different regions of Ukraine, two more in the airspace of Ukraine. Currently, combat work is ongoing. As reported by ArmyInform, dva dozens of artillery systems and 1,250 occupants: the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine announced the losses of the enemy.

Title: Two dozen artillery systems and 1,250 occupants: the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine an...
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. The total combat losses of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 06.11.24 are approximately: As reported by ArmyInform, the Defense Forces repelled massive attacks in 10 directions: the occupiers lost more than 400 fighters.

Title: Consequences of the attack on Kharkiv: the Geran-2 drone struck the center of the city
Description: This is reported by the Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office. It is noted that around 16:45 the enemy launched a drone attack in the Shevchenkiv district of Kharkiv. The Geran-2 UAV hit the road surface, as a result of which three civilians were injured and stressed. The glazing of nearby residential buildings, a shop, an educational institution and two civilian cars were damaged. The same day, around 8:15, the occupiers fired at a tractor brigade in the village of Glushkivka, Kupyan district. Two civilians, a 48-year-old man and a woman, died as a result of the shelling. About At 3:50 p.m., an enemy FPV drone was hit in Kupyansk, which damaged a civilian car. Fortunately, there were no casualties. As reported by ArmyInform, airstrikes in Kharkiv region: two women and teenagers were injured, residential buildings were damaged.

Title: The defense forces repelled massive attacks in 10 directions: the occupiers lost more than 400 fight...
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The invaders carried out two missile and 71 air strikes on the territory of Ukraine, using two missiles and 101 anti-aircraft missiles, in addition, they struck 596 kamikaze drone strikes, and carried out more than three thousand attacks on populated areas and the positions of our defenders. In the Kharkiv direction the enemy attacked the defensive lines of our soldiers near Liptsi, Vovchansk and Staritsa seven times. All attacks were repelled, the enemy had no success. In the Kupyansk direction the enemy concentrated the main offensive efforts in the areas of Novoosynove and Lozova settlements, where they attacked seven times, one attack continues until now. In the Lyman direction Russian invaders attacked Ukrainian positions near Zagryzovy, Grekivka, Novomykhailivka, Terni and Torsky nine times. All attacks were successfully repelled by our defenders. In the Seversky direction our troops repulse one enemy attack near Beilohorivka, the situation is under control. In the Kramatorsk direction, our defenders repelled two assaults near Orichovo-Vasylivka, in addition, the enemy launched airstrikes on Chasovoy Yar and Stupochki. In the Toretsk direction the Russians once attacked the defense forces near Toretsk. In the Pokrovsky direction, the occupiers tried 31 times to break through our defenses near the settlements of Promin, Lysivka, Novogrodivka, Krutiy Yar, Selidove, and Grodivka. Three clashes in the Selidovoy district are still ongoing. The enemy suffers significant losses - 219 occupiers were neutralized in this direction, 85 of them irreversibly. Two vehicles and one mortar were also destroyed. In addition, the enemy's armored personnel carriers were damaged. In the Kurakhiv direction the enemy attacked our positions 51 times near Vovchenka, Stepanivka, Illinka, Berezka, Kreminnaya Balka, Novoselidivka, Novodmytrivka, Gostroy, Maksimilianivka , Antonivka, Elizavetivka and Katerynivka. According to the updated information, 24 fights continue. 191 occupants were neutralized in this direction, 76 of them permanently. Also destroyed was one car, one armored combat vehicle, one electronic warfare trench station, one motorcycle and one enemy mortar. In the Vremivsk direction the invaders carried out nine offensive actions near populated areas Kostiantynopolske and Trudove. So far, one battle is ongoing. In the Gulyajpil direction, the settlement of Biloghirya was hit by unguided missiles. In the Orichov direction there was one futile attempt by the enemy to advance in the direction of our positions near Orichov. In the Dnieper direction there were three enemy attacks, which our defenders successfully repelled. In other areas, the situation has not undergone significant changes. The department recognized the soldiers of the 65th separate mechanized brigade, the 38th separate brigade of marines, the 68th separate hunter brigade named after Oleksa Dovbush and the 126th separate territorial defense brigade, who effectively destroy the enemy, causing him significant losses in manpower and techniques As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the -Perun- unmanned systems battalion of the 42nd mechanized brigade were able to hit the Russian anti-aircraft missile complex -Tor-.

Title: Against infantry and tanks: what is known about the M136 Volcano remote mine system
Description: As write the authors of the Taiwanese magazine The Liberty Times, created by American designers back in the 80s of the last century, the M-136 Volcano remote mine laying system is still in demand on the world arms market, ArmyInform reports. At least the military from this island immediately ordered 14 sets of these installations from the United States. The relevant agreement entered into force last year after the US State Department approved a proposed $180 million arms package that included Volcano systems and M977A4 HEMTT trucks. But in September of this year, Taipei received a message that these -remote miners- will not be delivered to the island until 2026. The M136 Volcano is an automated mine delivery system that can rapidly deploy large minefields in a variety of environments using prepackaged containers. This weapon is capable of quickly laying both anti-personnel and anti-tank mines over a large area, creating deterrents against potential enemy landings and vehicles. Defense publication experts Army Recognition underline the universality of the deployment of this weapon. -Volcano-, which is how the name of the installation is translated, can be both ground-based (Ground Volcano) and air-based (Air Volcano). The system is quick to assemble and disassemble and uses modified GATOR mines available in active or inactive canisters. The Ground Volcano modification is optimal for setting deep and tactical minefields. This system uses an M139 dispenser and an easy-to-operate dosage control unit. Ground Volcano uses modified GATOR mines, available in both combat and training versions. The system includes three main components: M87A1 ammunition, M88 and M89 training ammunition. Each M87A1 container contains six anti-tank mines and one anti-personnel mine. Anti-tank mines are equipped with magnetically induced detonators that are activated when objects with metal components move. This makes the mines particularly effective against armored vehicles. Anti-personnel mines, in turn, are activated with the help of strings that can reach up to 12 meters in length. The mines are 12 cm in diameter, 6 cm high, and each mine contains about 605 g of explosives. Mounted on an Oshkosh Defense HEMTT A4 M977A4 truck, the Volcano system can carry 960 anti-tank and anti-personnel mines, deploying a minefield up to 1,100 meters long and 120 meters wide within 4-12 minutes. This factor ensures operational protection of important facilities and strategic points on the battlefield. Mines are equipped with a self-destruct mechanism after a specified time, which ensures that unexploded ordnance does not pose a long-term threat. The M977A4 truck used to transport the Volcano system is equipped with a number of modern technologies that make it a reliable and maneuverable vehicle. Its features include a 500-horsepower Caterpillar C15 diesel engine, traction control, anti-lock braking and air suspension. These characteristics ensure high passability, including overcoming water obstacles up to 1.2 meters deep. The M136 Volcano system is a powerful tool for creating minefields, providing reliable protection against enemy offensive operations. Its mobility, speed of deployment and high efficiency make it an integral part of the arsenal of modern armed forces. M-136 Volcano remote mining system. Video: Defense Now's

Title: Financial assistance for burial: about the amount of payment
Description: On the basis of which documents the specified payment is made and what are the features, ArmiyaInform says. Monetary assistance is provided in the amount of five subsistence minimums per month per person, established by law on the date of death (death) of a serviceman. From January 1, 2024, the subsistence minimum is UAH 3,028. Today, this assistance amounts to UAH 15,140. In the draft budget for 2025, the living wage remains the same. The Department of Social Security of the Ministry of Defense informs that the executor of the will of the deceased or the person who undertook to bury the deceased (husband/wife, parents/adoptive parents, children, sister/brother, grandfather/grandmother, grandson/great-grandson) in accordance with the procedure established by law on the day of the application are issued: Burial allowance is paid to one of the family members of a serviceman or the person who performed the funeral, based on the application, an identity document and the above documents. Funds are calculated by the military unit in which the serviceman served. It should also be added that in Kyiv, financial assistance is also paid to the family members of Kyiv citizens who participated in the anti-terrorist operation who died (died) as a result of injuries, contusions or mutilations received during participation in the anti-terrorist operation, as well as to the family members of the deceased (deceased) defenders of Ukraine. compensation for the manufacture and installation of tombstones.

Title: -Our -Caesar- has already fired 1,500 shots-: the commander of the French self-propelled guns on com...
Description: The first batch of such vehicles arrived from Denmark, which handed Ukraine all 19 self-propelled guns it had in service. Currently, these self-propelled guns are used in units of the 148th separate artillery brigade of the Zhytomyr Airborne Assault Troops of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The gun commander with the call sign -Chrom- was among the first Ukrainian artillerymen to master this technique in Denmark. >He talked about the advantages of French self-propelled guns and their use in the conditions of modern warfare in a conversation with the correspondent of ArmiyaInform. He also worked in this specialty abroad. He says that he joined the Military Commissariat at the end of spring 2022, but in the end he was accepted for military service only at the beginning of summer. – I got a position as a driver-mechanic in the 95th Brigade of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, I worked on the self-propelled artillery howitzer 2C1 -Gvozdika-. After the training center, he arrived in the eastern direction, the Svatovo-Kreminna district. Already two weeks after my arrival, I was put in the crew, - recalls the gunner. Then the crews were constantly on trips and there were not even close to such a number of enemy drones. - Only the first time they saw -Lancet-, they didn't know what it was yet. He then hit the equipment, at first we thought it was an RPG projectile. The intensity of the work was much higher, our self-propelled guns stood at a distance of 2-5 km, they fired along the front, it was possible not to hide very much, - says -Khrom-. About six months later, he received a concussion, already during hostilities in Serebryansky forest in Kharkiv region. A mine flew next to his ACS, so close was the crew to the front line. For a while, Khrom dropped out of the crew, and at the same time he was offered to go for training on the CAESAR ACS. - I said that there are guys with more experience, but the combatant answered: -Their experience is for these guns. And you will do better for CAESAR,- he recalls. In Denmark, Ukrainian gunners trained for only two weeks, but this time was enough to master the machine. Every day there were classes from 8 in the morning to 9 in the evening. Then there was an accelerated course to train people before the arrival of the first batch of these self-propelled guns in Ukraine. Now the training period has increased. — At the time of training, I was a driver-mechanic, but after returning to Ukraine I was appointed a gun commander. At the same time, I was transferred to the 148th artillery brigade, which was being formed at the time, - adds -Khrom-. At the beginning of the summer of 2023, -Khrom- and its crew used the French self-propelled guns for the first time in the Zaporizhzhia region. They mainly fired in the direction of Robotyny, where there were enemy fortifications. He mentions that even there there weren't as many drones as there are now in the East. - Now we interact with the air reconnaissance unit, they report enemy -birds-, then we determine when to work. The main advantage of this machine is mobility. We can make a march of 100 km, shoot back and leave, - explains the commander of the gun. But in combat conditions, the weather sometimes makes corrections, the self-propelled gun weighs 35 tons and it is more difficult for it to move in the mud. Also, due to its considerable size, it is more difficult to disguise. - Before arriving in Ukraine, our machine fired 55 shots, it was actually new. We have already fired about 1,500 shells. Some machines have 3-4 thousand rounds, says Chrom. Among the other advantages of the CAESAR self-propelled guns are an armored cabin and anti-mine protection, as well as a French guidance system known throughout the world. > —We mostly work in the rear, throw shells at them behind the front line. The optimal shooting range is 18-20 kilometers, but we also shot at 34 km. However, accuracy is lost from the range, the crew adds For the self-propelled guns, different types of projectiles are provided, the crew chooses them depending on the task and the targets identified for hitting. The division says that most of the repair works on French self-propelled machines are carried out by their own efforts. — For example, our mechanic Oleksandr, who used to repair combines. He determines the problem by the sound, these guys are the ones who keep these machines. He could already tell the French manufacturers about all the nuances in combat conditions and how these self-propelled guns can be improved, - praises his brother -Chrom-. According to him, there are enough people in the division, they are quite willing to join the artillery . A new addition has arrived recently, young guys. Now the new recruits are undergoing training in Ukraine, the training center has such a machine and there is an opportunity to get basic knowledge. At first, newcomers work in parallel with other crew members and gain experience. Gradually, independent trips begin, for example, to shoot at the ban, -Khrom- explains. It is not difficult to master the machine, the gunners say. Already in the brigade, experienced colleagues will tell and show everything. In the same way, specialization will be determined on the spot. A person can come as a gunner, but in the commander's opinion, a novice can be more effective as a loader. - Everything is checked in practice, otherwise no way. Currently, Ukraine has the largest combat experience of using these self-propelled guns. Their application was developed without taking into account EW, drones. Drones have changed everything and we are already learning how to use CAESAR in a new way, -Khrom- summarizes. Photo by Natalia Kravchuk

Title: Elections in Moldova and Georgia: what they have in common and how it will affect the situation in U...
Description: Oleksandr Chupak, an expert of the non-governmental analytical center -Ukrainian Studies of Strategic Research-, tells about this in an exclusive comment to ArmiyaInform. -Both in Georgia and Moldova, the elections were accompanied by numerous reports of interference by Russia and violations of democratic standards. In both countries, there were cases of falsification and manipulation at the polling stations, which were noted by observers of the OSCE and other international organizations. Pro-Russian political forces in both countries used propaganda and tools to pressure the electorate, emphasizing the dangers of rapprochement with the EU. Both countries have significant pro-European segments of society, especially among the youth and urban population, who aspire to integration with the EU. These people took part in mass demonstrations in both capitals to express their support for pro-European leaders and to resist pro-Russian pressure. In Moldova, this support helped the pro-European candidate Maia Sandu win, and in Georgia, despite significant resistance, pro-European forces continue their struggle.- -Despite the common features, the elections in these countries had significant differences. In Moldova, the victory was won by the pro-European force led by Maya Sandu, who was able to unite the electorate around the idea of ​​European integration, in particular thanks to the support of the Western diaspora and urban centers. In Georgia, the ruling Georgian Dream party, which is supported by the pro-Russian oligarch Bidzina Ivanishvili, maintains power thanks to administrative resources and extensive falsifications, according to the opposition. Her next victory in the parliamentary elections caused public protests that continue to this day. The general political climate is also different. In Moldova, the president has significant influence on political processes. In Georgia, President Salome Zurabishvili, although he supports pro-European values, has limited power, which allows the government to act in favor of pro-Russian interests; she condemned the falsifications during the elections.- -The events in Moldova and Georgia have a direct impact on Ukraine, as those countries are facing challenges similar to ours on the road to European integration. Ukraine, waging a full-scale war against Russia, should actively work with countries that can become our allies in the fight against the occupier. Especially with Moldova and Georgia, which, like us, suffer from the occupation of their territories by Russia. The situation in Georgia is a reminder of the risks that arise when pro-Russian forces hold power. A parallel can be drawn between Ivanishvili's rule and Yanukovych's time, when a clear oligarchic vertical of control over power and business was established in Ukraine. Under such conditions, the perspective is to approach the current status of Belarus, and the Georgian opposition understands this well. In the context of Moldova, the situation with Transnistria is always interesting for us. The Russian enclave should have been liquidated at the beginning of 2022, but then Maya Sandu did not want to spoil relations with Moscow. Sandu's victory means that Ukraine has the opportunity to strengthen its influence (political, economic, etc.) on Chisinau with the aim of preventing Moldova from returning to the Russian orbit.-

Title: Propagandists justify the involvement of the DPRK in the war: they invented a new fake
Description: Responding to this, Russian Telegram channels began to write that there were -infiltrators- behind the controls of this military equipment. This is allegedly due to the fact that among specialists in the Armed Forces there are colossal losses and the training period of the Ukrainian military is shortened. So, according to the propagandists, taking this into account, the appearance of the North Korean military in the Russo-Ukrainian war is natural, and this should not be surprising. Propagandists seek to fuel the narrative by reporting on the -Nativs- who control Western military equipment. about a possible war of the Russian Federation against the entire NATO bloc, and not only against Ukraine. That Ukraine is allegedly only a puppet in the hands of the -NATO masters- and -NATO bases and troops- are located on its territory. For example, the -Nativites- are fighting on the side of Ukraine, so soldiers from the DPRK can supposedly fight for Russia.

Title: From convicts to marines: which Russians are fighting in the South of Ukraine
Description: Colonel Vladyslav Voloshyn, the spokesman of the -Tavria- OUV, told about this on the air of the national telethon -Edyny Novyny- : — Our south is quite large and there [are] various Russian units of its connection. For example, representatives of Russia's -Northern Fleet- are stationed at Tenderivska Spit at the mouth of the Dnieper. These are the marines, there are also various units that the Russians also use in hostilities. Next are mainly representatives of their combined armies of the southern district. Closer to the east are the representatives of the Eastern Military District. In addition, we have several units of their -airborne troops-. The spokesman noted that the training of fighters of different units and units differs significantly. — As for their training, it is different. There are also professionals, -specialists-, and there are their so-called mobilized, who already have a certain level of training. In addition, there are small units, mainly in the assault squads, which are units of former prisoners. This phenomenon is not widely used, but it exists, said the spokesperson of the -Tavria- OUV. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in the south The Russian army of Ukraine has concentrated about 200,000 troops, these forces also include the occupation troops in Crimea.

Title: Cold and wind: how they have already affected the battlefield in Kharkiv region
Description: toldabout how the change in weather conditions has already affected the battlefield in Kharkiv Oblast on the air of the national telethon -Yedini Novyni- /a> spokesman of OTU -Kharkiv- Lt. Col. Yevhenii Romanov. — The enemy now attacks mostly with infantry. We know that the enemy is constantly accumulating forces and resources. He imports ammunition, equipment, food, warm equipment, fuel and lubricants. He is preparing for the winter, he said. Answering the presenter's question about the possible accumulation of tanks by the enemy in the area of ​​the village of Hlyboke of the Lypetsk community, north of Kharkiv, the spokesman noted that the Defense Forces are monitoring all the actions of the enemy and are ready for any development, and tanks are a very vulnerable target in this regard. part of the battle line. — We are aware of our enemy's actions, but for obvious reasons we will not say what our troops are preparing for him in this direction. But I will note that tanks are a very vulnerable target in this direction and we are ready for it, the spokesman emphasized. The officer said that in recent days the nature of hostilities was significantly affected by the weather. — If we talk about the last two days, the weather had a very significant effect. The number of combat engagements and losses on the part of the enemy decreased by almost a third, the number of displaced equipment decreased, and their activity decreased. It snowed, it rained, it got colder, and the change in weather is making significant adjustments at the moment, the military officer said. The impact of changing weather conditions on the enemy's use of light UAVs is particularly noticeable. — Very strong wind. What flies in the air is quite vulnerable. Speaking about small FPV drones, -maviks- and similar unmanned aerial vehicles, the weather significantly affects them, Yevgeny Romanov said. Earlier, ArmyInform reported, which remains the main consumable of the occupiers in Kharkiv Oblast.

Title: The occupiers again resort to forced medical examinations
Description: This is reported by Center of national resistance. Inspections will be carried out in villages with the help of mobile medical complexes. Collaborators from district administrations are responsible for attending these inspections. During examinations, doctors will campaign to conclude a health insurance contract, for which you must have a passport of the Russian Federation. That is, one of the goals of these reviews is to identify those who have not received passports. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that the enemy shelled Donetsk region again.

Title: A correctional officer of the Russian Federation and two collaborators were detained in Kherson
Description: The Security Service of Ukraine reported this on November 5. Another detainee turned out to be a resident of the regional center, an agent of the Russian military intelligence (better known as GRU), who adjusted enemy fire on the Defense Forces. To do this, the defendant traveled around the territory of the community on a scooter and tried to identify the locations of Ukrainian troops involved in hostilities at the front. The priority targets of the enemy were camouflaged headquarters, firing positions and strongholds of units of the Armed Forces. The agent sent the received information to the Russian game via messenger in the form of screenshots with the markings of military objects on Google maps. During the special operation, the Security Service detained the traitor in her own apartment and carried out comprehensive measures to secure the positions of the Defense Forces. Another detainee is a 60-year-old ex-law enforcement officer from Kherson, who after the capture of the community joined the local occupation administration of the Russian Federation. There, the former mayor of the city, Oleksandr Kobets, appointed the collaborator as his -deputy on legal issues.- Among his main tasks was the preparation of a pseudo-referendum of the Rashists regarding the accession of the region to the aggressor country. The third suspect, who was detained by the SBU together with the National Police, is also a resident of the regional center, which during its occupation was part of the so-called -Main Directorate of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of the Russian Federation in the Kherson region.- In the ranks of the pseudo-institution, the collaborator was engaged in the -passportization- of local residents through forced registration of Russian citizenship. Investigators of the Security Service informed the detainees of the suspicion (according to the crimes committed) under two articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine: The perpetrators are in custody. They face from 15 years in prison to life imprisonment with confiscation of property. As reported by ArmyInform, a spy from Sloviansk received 15 years in prison.

Title: Everything will be repainted: how winter will affect the palette of war
Description: Colonel Vladyslav Voloshyn, the spokesman of the -Tavria- OUV, told about this on the air of the national telethon -Yedini Novyni- . — Cold weather always brings certain corrections, first of all, it increases the importance of various thermal imaging tools. That is, it is better to see where what warms whom, he said. Also, the cooling and approach of winter will lead to the fact that the battlefield will be repainted in the literal sense of the word. — In addition, when it is a cold season, firstly, the palette of the battlefield changes. This very arena, it turns a different color. In particular, if it was green, then it turns gray, yellow, then white. That's why camouflage and, shall we say, quality camouflage is essential. And not only for a person as camouflage, but also to hide equipment, the spokesman emphasized. The change in weather will also affect the fighters. - In addition, when such weather changes, it becomes much more difficult for a person to be in such a temperature field. Therefore, there are many different nuances of the changes that will occur when the colder period begins, the military explained. So far, the temperature regime in the South of Ukraine is quite comfortable, but cooling is inevitable. — But for the past few weeks in the south, the weather has been dry and we now have a temperature there of 3-4 plus at night, and 15-17 during the day, well 15, let's say, quite comfortably, Vladislav Voloshyn reported. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that during assaults in the South, the enemy uses vehicles almost exclusively as a means of delivering infantry.

Title: The victim -Perunu- — our drones burned down an enemy air defense system for $25 million
Description: The hit video appeared on November 5 on the battalion channel. Our pilots were able to catch the enemy anti-aircraft guns during the change of fire position and hit the -Tor- right in motion on the field road. In addition, enemy BMPs and a Ural truck were hit. The strikes were carried out by drones provided by one of the volunteer communities. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 42nd mechanized brigade arranged the distribution of leaflets in Russian with an appeal to Russian soldiers to surrender. The American Switchblade 600 destroyed the Russian ZRK TOR.

Title: 105 creatures and 15 pieces of equipment: what remains the main consumables of the occupiers in Khar...
Description: Details of the situation in the Kharkiv direction and enemy losses were informed at Kharkiv OTU. During the past day, actively using aviation in the Kharkiv direction, the enemy attacked 10 times near Vovchansk. the Russian invaders carried out 4 airstrikes using 11 guided aerial bombs and 13 kamikaze drone strikes, carried out 205 attacks on the positions of defenders of Ukraine. The defense forces respond adequately to the actions of the enemy and continue to effectively destroy the manpower, weapons and military equipment of the Russian invaders. The enemy's losses during the past day amounted to 105, of which 39 were irreversible, 66 were sanitary. Also, the enemy lost 15 units of weapons and military equipment destroyed and damaged, in particular: In addition, in the Kharkiv direction of the Defense Forces of Ukraine destroyed 42 shelters for enemy personnel. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that the Defense Forces explained the main goal of the occupiers in the north of Kharkiv Oblast.

Title: The first battles with North Korean soldiers open a new page of instability in the world - the Presi...
Description: His appeal was made public on the evening of 5 November. -Unfortunately, terror can spread like a virus when it is not met with sufficient resistance. Now the resistance should become sufficient. Strong enough. The first battles with North Korean soldiers open a new page of instability in the world. Together with the world, we must do everything so that this Russian step to expand the war, to a real escalation, so that this step of his becomes a losing one. Both for him and for North Korea. Thank you to everyone who helps!-, the President noted. According to him, today there was a lot of internal work on the points of the Plan for the internal strengthening of our state and our society. -Today there were military proposals - points regarding the front. Our strategy and tactics. We must direct all the resources of our state so that Ukrainian tasks are achieved. Held a long meeting. Military command, government. Central Committee, General Staff, Ministry of Defense, at the same time - Prime Minister, First Deputy Prime Minister, Deputy Prime Minister for Innovations and Technologies, Minister of Strategic Industry, Security Service of Ukraine, GUR and Foreign Intelligence Service. This front-line point of the Plan plus the defense industry are really fundamental things, and everything else in the life of our state depends on how it will be written. Therefore, a clear determination regarding the front — ways to achieve goals — and significant scaling of Ukraine's own defense-industrial complex, taking into account existing tasks, is what every step of the state must and will be calculated,- said Volodymyr Zelenskyi. Today, the President, together with the Minister of Foreign Affairs, discussed the candidacies of ambassadors of Ukraine for vacant positions in the respective countries, as well as the results of the work of our diplomats. Replacements and appointments are being prepared. As reported by ArmyInform, the President thanked the defenders of the Ukrainian sky.

Title: Means of delivery of infantry: in the South, the enemy uses vehicles as -taxi-
Description: Colonel Vladyslav Voloshyn, the spokesman of the -Tavria- OUV, told about this on the air of the national telethon -Yedini Novyni- . — Our situation has not changed much for several days, or weeks in a row. The enemy continues to launch rocket attacks on the positions of the Defense Forces of Ukraine and settlements adjacent to the battle line. The enemy continues to conduct a counter-battery fight. The enemy is conducting an assault, he said. Currently, the enemy's assault actions are mainly reconnaissance in nature. — We don't have as many assaults as in some other areas, but they do exist. The enemy is carrying out so-called combat reconnaissance in certain directions and is preparing to carry out assault actions in several directions, the military officer explained. The officer said that the tactics of the enemy's actions remain unchanged - these are assaults by small infantry groups. — Assault actions carried out by us are carried out by infantry forces, small infantry assault groups of 5 to 10 people. the Russians are not changing their tactics. During these assault operations, they use light vehicles such as motorcycles, ATVs, and buggies to cover the distance between the trenches as quickly as possible, the spokesman said. Armored vehicles are rarely used by the occupiers and mainly as a means of delivering manpower, not fire support for assault operations. — In addition, in certain directions, in particular, in the Vremiv direction near Levadny, the enemy also used armored vehicles several times, but not as a means of fire support for the actions of assault groups, but in order to transport these assault groups. The enemy drove them up, struck and destroyed them, Vladyslav Voloshyn explained. From this review, it is not possible to talk about the full participation of enemy armored vehicles in the assault. — It is currently not possible to say that the enemy used armored vehicles in offensive operations. However, it is on the battlefield and it is being prepared for use. In addition, in the Dnieper direction, the enemy is actively using such means, such equipment as boats, the officer said. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in the south The Russian army of Ukraine has concentrated about 200,000 troops, these forces also include the occupation troops in Crimea.

Title: A feat under fire - our stormtroopers were able to take away not only the wounded, but also the defe...
Description: The video of combat work was released on November 5 on the battalion channel. Under fire, the soldiers were able to take the knocked-out -Cossack- tow, and then they took the wounded soldiers as well. -Incredible courage and courage. It's an honor to serve side by side,- the battalion commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, the Russians another approach to rescue the wounded: the occupiers sacrificed a comrade to escape the drone.

Title: Fierce battles are taking place in the completely destroyed Vovchansk
Description: About this on the air of the national telethon -Yedini Novyni- spoken the spokesman of OTU -Kharkiv- Lt. Col. Yevgeny Romanov. — Heavy fighting continues in Vovchansk. They take place in a completely destroyed city. Ukrainian servicemen continue to conduct defense there, he said. In general, in the Kharkiv direction, the occupiers increased the use of the aviation component, shelling the positions of the units of the Defense Forces with guided aerial bombs and unguided aerial missiles. -The enemy is actively using aviation and striking with guided aerial bombs, trying to destroy the defensive positions of our defenders, and is attacking with small infantry groups,- the military officer said. After the airstrikes, the Russian invaders are trying to resupply, as the enemy suffered significant losses during the assault on Vovchansk. In the city, fighting continues on the ruins of houses. -These are rubble from the fragments of these buildings, in which the battles are taking place,- explained the spokesman. Previously, ArmyInform showed the destruction of a Russian BMP on a snowy landscape in the Vovchansk region.

Title: The enemy is accumulating under ponchos and REBs: what is happening in the area of ​​Chasovoy Yar an...
Description: Major Anastasia Bobovnikova, spokeswoman of Luhansk OTU, told about this on the air of the national telethon -Yedini Novyni- . According to her, there is currently relative calm in the Chasovoy Yar area. — At the moment, we see a slight decrease in the number of assaults compared to other directions. There the enemy accumulates its resources. Now we see that they are preparing for active hostilities, she said. The occupiers are stockpiling manpower and gearing up equipment. — Every night they bring in undercover personnel, put them in anti-thermal ponchos or raincoats. Also, they bring military vehicles as close as possible to the line of combat, [bring] weapons and prepare equipment - they install communication devices on it, install EW, - the military woman said. The occupiers are also accumulating in the Toretska district. — The Russians have gathered a serious group there. These are motorized rifle brigades, as well as other units, including special-purpose units of the Central Military District of the Russian Federation. Now we also see that they are accumulating equipment, accumulating resources, the spokeswoman said. From today, the number of assaults in the Toretska region began to increase. — Just today they started increasing the number of assaults. If literally just a few days ago it was relatively quiet, now the enemy is starting to push and the situation is getting complicated, said the officer. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that Russian prisoners in Donetsk claim that they have not seen any payments that they were promised before signing the contract.

Title: Does not go anywhere and burns well! What is it? — Russian armored vehicles in the Pokrovsky directi...
Description: The video of combat work was released on November 5 on the unit's channel. This is where the paratroopers dealt with Russian armored personnel carriers, hitting two and destroying one. And here they burned a lot of Russian equipment and soldiers. -We hug everyone, except the katsaps, the katsaps will burn,- commented the video in the unit. As reported by ArmyInform, the pilot of the -Alastor- unit of the 25th Sicheslav Airborne Brigade filmed how he a-prograv-rosijskyj-tank/->drone was overtaken by Javelin anti-tank missile, which hit enemy equipment.

Title: The time of the Shaheds - the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine explained why the time in...
Description: This was reported on November 5 by the General Staff of the ZSU. -A side effect of this impact is a violation of the accurate time system, which is used by mobile phones in the mode of automatic time correction. Taking into account the above, it is advisable to turn off the automatic time adjustment mode in the phone and take into account that during the announcement of air alarms, the accuracy of the satellite navigation systems may be disturbed,- explained radio-electronic warfare specialists at the General Staff of the Armed Forces. As reported by ArmyInform, the Defense Forces -vijny/->over 3 thousand -martyrs- were shot down in 3 months.

Title: A man from Kharkiv was detained in Lviv, who made evasioners -volunteers-
Description: This was reported by the Special Prosecutor's Office of the Western Region on November 5. The detainee entered data on -clients- into the -Shlyah- system, with the help of which they could enter the European Union countries without hindrance and not return back. It was established that he advised -clients, and sometimes helped to directly transport them through checkpoints in Lviv Oblast and Transcarpathia. The price of -services- ranged from 1 to 7 thousand US dollars. Several episodes of such criminal activity have been documented. The suspect was detained in accordance with Art. 208 of the Criminal Procedure Code of Ukraine and a preventive measure was chosen. The involvement of other persons in the scheme is currently being investigated. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: The number of training flights of cadet pilots will increase, the geography of flights will expand
Description: About the meeting reported on November 5 by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. As Serhii Melnyk noted, a decision has been made to strengthen the training of Ukrainian cadet pilots. As part of the new program, the number of training flights will increase and the geography of training will expand, which will allow training more highly qualified pilots. In particular, basic flight training for cadets of the Kharkiv National Air Force University will take place at an intensive pace. This is aimed at allowing graduates to move more quickly to training on modern military aircraft, including Western models. -The basic training program should be optimized. This will give us the opportunity to train more pilots to protect our country. Ukrainian combat aircraft should eventually gain air superiority. After all, this is precisely what opens the way to the success of our actions at the front in general,- Serhii Melnyk said. As reported by ArmyInform, during the meeting Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine Brigadier General of Justice Serhii Melnyk and representatives of the public discussed, in particular, the procedure for accounting and completing individual first-aid kits and medical backpacks, as well as certification of Ukrainian turnstiles taking into account actual combat experience.

Title: Rustem Umerov discussed the supply of air defense systems with the new NATO special representative i...
Description: About this Minister reported on November 5. -On our way to the Alliance, it is important to interact closely with its representatives to be able to receive advice and adjust our steps. Once again, I congratulated Patrick on his appointment and emphasized our openness to cooperation,- said Rustem Umyerov. According to him, the parties discussed the state of implementation of the agreements reached as a result of the NATO summit in Washington, in particular the issue of the supply of air defense equipment, as well as the implementation of the JATEC and NSATU projects. -I also familiarized the Senior NATO representative with the key priorities of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. He emphasized that we work in cooperation with other ministries as a single team, bringing our country closer to joining NATO. Patrick Turner noted significant progress in reforming the Armed Forces of Ukraine, noting that the Ukrainian army has undergone major changes that are obvious,- wrote Rustem Umyerov. The minister additionally informed his colleague about the participation of the North Korean military in the current escalation of aggression against Ukraine and proposed to hold the next meeting of the Ukraine-NATO Council at the level of defense ministers in Kyiv. -We continue the dialogue with NATO, synchronize joint plans for the end of this year and for 2025. Thank you Mr. Patrick for the important meeting. We will strengthen our cooperation in order to achieve the important goal of Ukraine's membership in NATO,- said Rustem Umyerov. Senior NATO representative in Ukraine at the NATO Representation in Ukraine Patrick Turner /->started his work in September. He headed the PNU and assumed the focus of NATO's interaction with the Ukrainian authorities in Kyiv. As reported by ArmyInform, the Minister of Defense of Ukraine met in Kyiv with a Lithuanian colleague.

Title: The occupiers shot 6 of our prisoners in the Pokrovsky direction
Description: reported this on November 5 Donetsk Regional Prosecutor's Office According to operational data, October 23 at 5:17 p.m. , representatives of the Soviet Union of the Russian Federation during the attack on the positions of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the area of ​​the city of Selidove captured three Ukrainian servicemen. After some time, the occupiers shot unarmed prisoners of war. In addition, on November 1 at 2:00 p.m., Russian troops committed another crime in the same Pokrovsky direction. During the assault on the fortifications of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, three of our soldiers were captured by them, after which they were killed with automatic weapons. -Killing prisoners of war is a gross violation of the Geneva Conventions and qualifies as a grave international crime,- reminds the prosecutor's office of the Donetsk region. As reported by ArmyInform, the ombudsman reacted to the alleged shooting two women as occupiers.

Title: - Russians are not thrown, but thrown out - the occupiers sacrificed the wounded in order to escape ...
Description: A video with another evidence of the developed empathy of the invaders was released on November 5. On it, the Russian -loaf- was running away from the Ukrainian drone at maximum speed. Imagine the surprise of our pilots when the Russians threw a wounded comrade out of their car at speed. This caused our drone to hesitate a little, but then it caught up and hit the Russians. The fate of the discarded one is unknown, but it is unlikely that anything good happened to him. ArmyInform told how the occupier in the intense struggle took a motorcycle from a wounded comrade.

Title: The head of the NATO Representation in Ukraine arrived in Kyiv
Description: About this Minister reported on November 5. -On our way to the Alliance, it is important to interact closely with its representatives to be able to receive advice and adjust our steps. Once again, I congratulated Patrick on his appointment and emphasized our openness to cooperation,- said Rustem Umyerov. According to him, the parties discussed the state of implementation of the agreements reached as a result of the NATO summit in Washington, in particular the issue of the supply of air defense equipment, as well as the implementation of the JATEC and NSATU projects. -I also familiarized the Senior NATO representative with the key priorities of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. He emphasized that we work in cooperation with other ministries as a single team, bringing our country closer to joining NATO. Patrick Turner noted significant progress in reforming the Armed Forces of Ukraine, noting that the Ukrainian army has undergone major changes that are obvious,- wrote Rustem Umyerov. The minister additionally informed his colleague about the participation of the North Korean military in the current escalation of aggression against Ukraine and proposed to hold the next meeting of the Ukraine-NATO Council at the level of defense ministers in Kyiv. -We continue the dialogue with NATO, synchronize joint plans for the end of this year and for 2025. Thank you Mr. Patrick for the important meeting. We will strengthen our cooperation in order to achieve the important goal of Ukraine's membership in NATO,- said Rustem Umyerov. As reported by ArmyInform, the Minister of Defense of Ukraine met in Kyiv with a Lithuanian colleague.

Title: One MiG and 8 bombs — in the South, Russians turned out en masse for the Kobzon concert
Description: The video of the strike was released on the Internet. It clearly shows how our plane releases American light high-precision cruise bombs, each of which can strike a separate target. From open sources, the maximum flight range of the GBU-39/B Small Diameter Bomb is 110 km. As reported by ArmyInform, the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine carried out an airstrike with high-precision American GBU-39 bombs on a platoon base in the Kursk region.

Title: A group of Ukrainian military personnel completed training in Germany on the Patriot air defense sys...
Description: This is stated in the message of the German Air Force in the social network Kh. -After the successful completion of the training, the air defense of Ukraine will be strengthened, as well as the protection against attacks from aircraft, missiles and cruise missiles,- the message says. The training of Ukrainian servicemen takes place within the framework of the EU mission, the purpose of which is to strengthen the Armed Forces of Ukraine. -The EUMAM Ukraine mission successfully trained servicemen to work with the Patriot air defense system, providing them with important skills for protecting the skies and infrastructure. This exercise from the German Air Force strengthens the ability to counter air threats,- the message reads. > missions in the social network X. As reported by ArmyInform, in August, September and October 2024, Russia used in Ukraine 4300 attack UAVs of the shahed type and other types of drones imitating real -shaheds-. Thanks to the coordinated combat work of the Air Defense Forces of Ukraine, it was possible to shoot down 3,063 enemy UAVs, which is 71%.

Title: -They burned riders on motorcycles-: near Kurakhovo, mechanized -rolling- the enemy is repulsed
Description: Press officer of the 79th Airborne Forces told Orest Drymalovskyi of the Taurian Assault Brigade. If the enemy suffers significant losses in armored vehicles during the assaults, Orest Drymalovskyi said, he can pause for a day or two, but continue to attack already with infantry forces. That is, on foot or on motorcycles and ATVs. -And just the day before, our paratroopers repelled one of these motorized attacks, destroyed several stormtroopers - these riders on motorcycles. Their vehicles were burned,- said the press officer of the 79th Tavriy Assault Brigade. Earlier ArmyInform reported that during the last days, the enemy has been actively resorting to mechanized assaults on the positions of the 79th separate amphibious assault brigade of the Taurian Brigade.

Title: The Cabinet of Ministers dismissed Yuriy Dzhigyr from the position of Deputy Minister of Defense
Description: This was informed the government representative in the Verkhovna Rada Taras Melnychuk. Defense Minister Rustem Umyerov signed On October 1, a submission to the Cabinet of Ministers for the dismissal of three of his deputies, in particular Yuriy Dzhigir, who had been in office since September 2023. On the same day, the government made a decision to release Stanislav Heyder from the post of Deputy Minister of Defense. He moved to the head of the Minister's Office. In addition, the government dismissed Lyudmila Daragan from the post of State Secretary of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. Nikita Nikitenko has been temporarily entrusted with the duties of state secretary. As reported by ArmyInform, on October 11, the government appointed two deputies of the Minister of Defense - Brigadier General of Justice Serhiy Melnyk and Serhiy Boyev, who previously worked as the Deputy Minister of Strategic Industries of Ukraine.

Title: The retired FSB agent dreamed of -evacuation- to Russia and solving material issues
Description: This is reported by the Security Service of Ukraine. According to the case materials, the defendant was a military pensioner from the Mykolaiv Oblast, who came into the view of the occupiers during his trips to the Russian Federation even before the large-scale war. After the start of a large-scale invasion, an FSB employee remotely approached the man and offered him cooperation. In exchange for helping the Russians, the man was promised -evacuation- to Russia with further resolution of his material issues. On the instructions of a Russian special service agent, the agent scouted the locations of the Defense Forces, on which the Rashists planned to carry out airstrikes using Shahed-type kamikaze drones and missile weapons. Also, the traitor conducted preliminary reconnaissance at the places of -arrivals- in order to inform the FSB about the consequences of enemy attacks. In order to expand the intelligence capabilities of the FSB and to receive additional intelligence, the person involved was looking for -candidates for new agents of the Russian Federation.- To do this, he tried to -darkly- use his acquaintances - former law enforcement officers, from whom, during everyday conversations, he asked about the mood of current employees. SBU counterintelligence officers documented the agent's crimes and arrested him at his place of residence. During the searches, SIM cards and two mobile phones were seized from him, one of which he used for conspiratorial communication with the occupiers. Investigators of the Security Service informed the suspect of suspicion under Part 2 of Art. 111 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (treason committed under martial law). The perpetrator is in custody. He faces up to life in prison with forfeiture of property. Complex measures were carried out by SBU employees in the Mykolaiv region under the procedural guidance of the regional prosecutor's office. As reported by ArmyInform, thanks to the evidence base of the Security Service 15 years of imprisonment with confiscation of property was received by an agent of the military intelligence of the Russian Federation (better known as Gru), who operated in Donetsk region.

Title: Waste feed! — in Feodosia, the stern of a large landing ship - Novocherkassk - was raised from the b...
Description: Photos of the remnants of the colors of the Russian Black Sea Fleet were published on the Internet. It is interesting that Russian official channels claimed that -Novocherkassk- only -received damage- in the course of repelling a missile attack. It turns out that breaking a ship into pieces in Russia is called -getting damaged-. With the rise of the remnants of -Novocherkassk-, the powerful underwater grouping of the Russian Federation decreased slightly. As ArmyInform reported, the Black Sea Fleet continues to stay away from the Sea of ​​Azov, in fact, all the time, the fleet, which can be called combat-ready, is in Novorossiysk.

Title: American bombs fly across Russia, the BMP burns out, the enemy dies: a stream from a front-line city
Description: The fighter launched eight high-precision winged bombs at the place where the assault groups were concentrated in the Orihiv direction. In general, this bomb can hit targets at a distance of 110 km. Constant assaults by the Russians in the Kurakhiv direction continue. This time, the 46th separate airmobile brigade repelled two assault attempts at once. The enemy threw into battle two tanks, 11 BMP, one -Shilka-, a total of 14 units. Fighters destroyed one tank and seven -boxes- with artillery and drones. Unfortunately, after damaging part of the Russian equipment, they managed to escape. The GUR drove the Russians into a barn, where they died. Fighters of the GUR of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine discovered a group of Russian attack aircraft hiding in a house on one of the areas of the front. When it flew over the building, the Russians tried to run into the barn and hide there, however, both the barn itself and the Russians inside were eliminated. These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - lieutenant colonel Serhii Misyura and captain Artem Golub.

Title: Over 3,000 shot down -shaheeds- in 3 months — the General Staff published the results of the air war
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported this on November 5. Thanks to the coordinated combat work of the Air Defense Forces of Ukraine, it was possible to shoot down 3,063 enemy UAVs, which is 71%. In addition, the Air Force's daily reports were marked as -locationally lost- — that is, disappeared from radar, presumably due to active countermeasures by EW or for other reasons. For the specified period — from August to October 2024 — 1,052 such drones, which is 24%. Therefore, direct hits by enemy UAVs amount to 5%. Also, destruction or damage can be caused due to the fall of UAVs shot down by anti-aircraft defense. It is worth noting that October became a record for the launch of attack enemy drones: – August: 818 – launched, 701 – shot down, 91 – lost in location; – September: 1410 – launched, 1156 – shot down, 201 – lost in location; – October: 2,072 – launched, 1,206 – shot down, 766 – lost to location. During the same period: May, June, and July 2024, 1,133 attack UAVs were launched on the territory of Ukraine. 1055 were shot down by anti-aircraft defense, 10 were lost in location. The percentage of shooting down for the period May–July 2024 is about 94%. Thus, the percentage of direct hits by enemy attack UAVs of the -Shahed- type and drones of other types imitating real -Shaheds- in May-July and August-October 2024 is 6 and 5 percent, respectively. As reported by ArmyInform, the President thanked the defenders of the Ukrainian sky.

Title: More than a hundred soldiers, 10 tanks and 12 BMPs defeated the enemy in the Siversk direction
Description: This was reported to ArmyInform by the operational-tactical group -Luhansk-. The Russian command, hoping for quick success, involved 10 tanks in the battle, including one modern T-90. The occupiers tried to attack in the gap between two Ukrainian armed forces brigades: the 10th mountain assault brigade and the 54th mechanized brigade. But this tactic turned out to be a disaster for them. The Ukrainian military responded promptly to the enemy's maneuvers. Fighters of OTU -Luhansk- delivered a powerful blow to the enemy, destroying 24 units of armored vehicles, of which ten tanks (T-62, T-72, T-90), twelve BMP (infantry fighting vehicles), two MTLB (multi-purpose light armored tractor) and one ZU-23-2 (23-mm paired anti-aircraft gun). The casualties of the occupying personnel are also impressive: more than a hundred Russian soldiers were disabled, more than sixty of them were killed, more than thirty were seriously wounded, and the rest quietly disappeared into the nearest forest or got lost. The decisive role was played by the professional work of Ukrainian artillerymen, who destroyed most of the enemy's armored vehicles with targeted strikes. Operators of anti-tank guided missiles were also distinguished, who eliminated several tanks with accurate shots. -Our fighters showed the enemy that his tactics of numerical superiority do not always work. Each of our soldiers knows what he is fighting for his people and has a clear goal. They once again proved to the Russians that Ukrainian land cannot be broken,- one of the officers of the 10th Mountain Assault Brigade emphasized. -This failure once again demonstrated the weakness of Russian tactics, which are based on numerical superiority and -massive attacks- that disregard the lives of soldiers. The Ukrainian defenders did not just repulse the attack — they once again proved the high level of combat skill and determination of our soldiers, who fearlessly defend every centimeter of Ukrainian land,- reported the Luhansk Technical University. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 10th motorized infantry battalion of the -Edelvejsy- mountain assault brigade made a selection of Russian -armor- burning in front of our positions.

Title: Two-thirds of the enemy's attacks fell on the Kurakhiv direction — the General Staff of the Armed Fo...
Description: Operational information as of 16.00 on November 5 was published by the General Staff of the Armed Forces. Border settlements continue to suffer from cynical shelling from the territory of the Russian Federation. Starykov, Obody, Pavlivka, Seredyna Buda, Slavhorod, Zarichne, Popivka, Iskryskivshchyna, Myropilske, Oleksandrivka, Novenke, Bachivsk, Bobylivka, Boyaro-Lezhachi of the Sumy region were hit by enemy artillery; Leonivka, Chernihiv region. The invaders carried out airstrikes in the areas of the settlements of Velika Pisarivka, Bilovody, Popivka of the Sumy region, dropping 5 KAB and 10 NAR. Also, the Russians have already dropped 21 guided aerial bombs on the Kursk region of the Russian Federation today. In the Kupyansk direction, the enemy carried out five assaults near Novoosynovo and Lozova. Three clashes have ended, two more are ongoing. In the Lyman direction, the invading army attacked twice near Zagryzovy. Ukrainian defenders repelled one attack, another one continues. The enemy did not conduct active operations in the Siversk direction. Two assaults on the positions of our defenders in the Kramatorsk direction near Orihovo-Vasylivka are still ongoing, in addition, the enemy launched airstrikes on Chasovoy Yar and Stupochki. The areas of Toretsk, Kostyantynivka, Druzhba, Petrivka and Sukha Balka settlements in the Toretsk direction suffered from enemy airstrikes, in total the enemy dropped 12 guided air bombs. Since the beginning of the day, with the support of aviation, the occupiers have made 13 attempts to dislodge our defenders from their occupied positions in the areas of the settlements of Promin, Lysivka, Novogrodivka, Krutiy Yar, Selidove, and Grodivka in the Pokrovsky direction. The defense forces restrained the onslaught of the enemy and repelled seven attacks, six clashes are still ongoing. Enemy losses are being refined. In the Kurakhiv direction, the enemy attacked 53 times near Vovchenko, Stepanivka, Illinka, Berezka, Kreminnaya Balka, Novoselidivka, Novodmytrivka, Gostroy, Maksimilianivka, Antonivka, Elizavetivka, and Katerynivka. There are currently 26 armed clashes. In the Vremivsk direction, the occupiers attacked the positions of our troops near Konstantinopolsky and Trudovoy five times. Three clashes are still ongoing. At the same time, the enemy, supporting offensive actions, actively used aviation, engaged 49 unguided missiles.
