According to the Minister of Defense of Ukraine, Rustem Umyerov, over two and a half years, Lithuania has provided military aid to Ukraine in the amount of more than 705 million euros. - Lithuania has committed to annually provide support in the amount of 0.25% of GDP. This is a significant contribution to our struggle, to our joint victory. Only in 2024, Lithuania handed us 155-caliber ammunition, M113 armored personnel carriers, anti-drone systems and other equipment. I thank Minister Kaschyunas (head of the Defense Department of the Republic of Lithuania - ed.) for his leadership and support, Rustem Umyerov emphasized. He noted that today our country received another aid package: - Lithuania purchased 230 cars and 240 metal detectors as part of the Coalition for demining. This Coalition was created at the initiative of Lithuania and united 21 countries to support our army and our people. Very grateful for this support and this leadership. We must understand that the longer this terrible war continues, the more territories will be polluted and mined. For this we need the support of our partners. In turn, the Minister of National Defense of the Republic of Lithuania, Laurinas Kaschyunas, noted that the large-scale invasion of Russia made Ukraine one of the most mined countries in the world. - Successful demining is a prerequisite for Ukraine's victory. The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine and its Armed Forces are responsible for a wide range of mine action activities and today perform both combat and humanitarian demining. This requires significant international support, said Laurinas Kasciunas. And he added that this first batch of demining equipment is much more than just a set of tools: - It symbolizes our steadfast support for Ukraine. The head of the Administration of the State Special Service of Transport, Major General Oleksandr Yakovets, assured that the received pickups will increase the power of engineer-mining and engineer-assault units, provide operative and humanitarian demining units and make our life safer. The Commander of the Support Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Major General Dmytro Gerega, conveyed words of gratitude from the rank-and-file sappers, who directly perform combat tasks on the contact line, using equipment, weapons and equipment provided by our partners. Author's photo.

Title: The second army of the world is again the first in looting - now in Kurshchyna
Description: This was reported by the Center for Countering Disinformation on November 4. According to the Center, the Kursk TV channel aired a story about residents of the Glushkiv district of the region who reported cases of robbery by the Russian military. Also, Kursk Regional Duma deputy Oleksiy Zolotaryov told how the Russian military stole cows from local farmers. It is characteristic that the Ukrainian military has never been in these areas. Stories about mass looting by the Russian military in the Kursk region also regularly appear in local communities on social networks. Even the Z-warriors admit it. Instead, the local authorities call this data -Ukrainian IPSO- and pretend that nothing happened. -Cases of looting by the Russian military on its own territory reveal the same -mysterious Russian soul- as best as possible, which does not know any values ​​and moral principles, but only seeks to make money,- said the message of the CPD. As reported by ArmyInform, Russian anonymous Telegram channels actively spread false information about the sale of organs of dead Ukrainian soldiers on the -black market-.

Title: - What do you have against a tank? Prayer! - Transcarpathians told how they stopped an enemy tank wi...
Description: The video about the fighters was released on November 4 on the brigade's channel. The fighters come from Transcarpathia, all of them are believers. During one of the assaults, an enemy tank was able to drive through a minefield and stopped just a few tens of meters from the boys' position. He was able to shoot at close range, but he suddenly stopped. -The tank became like a priest at confession!-, the fighters say. The enemy tankers tried to escape, but were hit by small arms and FPV drones. In the video, the memories of the fighters are combined with footage of that battle. -Be careful, the video contains an unsurpassed Transcarpathian dialect,- the team joked. As reported by ArmyInform, most of the Russians killed by the fighters of the 63rd mechanized brigade died during the night assaults in the Limansky direction.

Title: More than 170 -wings- in a week — Ground forces joined the sky channel
Description: This was reported on November 4 by the commander of the Ground Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, Lieutenant General Oleksandr Pavliuk. In particular, the following UAVs were shot down: In total, in October, air defense units of the Ground Forces units destroyed 729 UAVs, 464 of which were -Shahedy-. -Thank you to the soldiers for effective combat work!- - Oleksandr Pavlyuk concluded. As reported by ArmyInform, over the past week, the air defense of the Ground Forces sotni-bpla-stalo-menshe/->destroyed 183 means of air reconnaissance and attack of the enemy.

Title: They turned the enemy tiger into a nuclear mushroom — the paratroopers continue to create miracles i...
Description: The video was published on November 4. the Russians must have been transporting ammunition on an armored car, because after hitting the FPV drone there was a powerful mushroom-shaped explosion. -Disruption of Russian equipment,- the unit commented on the video. The impact took place with a drone provided to the paratroopers by one of the volunteer communities. As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the -Kryla- unit of the 95th Polish Airborne Assault Brigade of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine made a whole selection of enemy tank damage in the Kursk region.

Title: Autumn, tanks and the Third Assault, marines destroy the occupiers: a stream from a front-line city
Description: The infantry vehicle immediately began to leave the position, but it was not far away - it was overtaken and destroyed by an anti-tank missile. Enemy infantrymen were eliminated by artillery and drones. Paratroopers of the 79th separate airborne assault brigade of the Tavriyskaya brigade destroyed the Russian column in the Kurakhiv direction. Russians complain about North Korean missiles. According to the occupiers, only one out of five mines fires. In the video, enemy soldiers are cleaning solidol and rust from 82 mm mines handed over by North Korea. Ukraine tested its own Sich combat module on the new Varta-2 armored car. The module is equipped with a 30 mm automatic cannon, which is controlled remotely from inside the armored car. These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - Lieutenant Colonel Serhiy Misyura and Major Andriy Makarenko.

Title: - Are there no pomegranates? There will be grenades, I will blow your head off! - Azov captured pris...
Description: The video of the battle was released on November 4 on the brigade's channel. On it, Azov people -smoke out- Russians from basements, liquidate them in toilets and force them to surrender. --Breathe real Ukrainian air. We are used to this. And you will die- - the special purpose intelligence unit -Azov- cleans the streets of Nelipivka. Every house, every basement was filled with occupiers sent to their deaths. They have different levels of training and motivation, different experience. Someone underwent special training, and someone was promised easy money and rear positions. But all of them ended up in the Toretsk direction against -Azov-. Now they face capture or death,- Azov commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 12th special purpose brigade -Azov- we talked about -Ukrainian Vietnam- near Siverskyi Donets.

Title: The enemy became more active in the Lyman direction — the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukrai...
Description: Operational information as of 16.00 on November 4 was published by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Sumy and Kharkiv regions continue to suffer from artillery shelling from the territory of the Russian Federation. Thus, areas of border settlements came under the influence of enemy fire. Among them – Pavlivka, Oleksandrivka, Vidrodenivske, Rogizne, Zhuravka, Znob-Trubchevska. In the Kharkiv direction, four enemy attacks are currently underway in the Vovchansk region. Two more attacks have already been repelled. In the Kupyansk direction, the enemy started storming the positions of our units nine times near Kindrashyvka, Kucherivka, Petropavlivka, Kolisnykyvka, Zagryzovo, Veshnevo, Lozova, Kruglyakivka. Three of them are ongoing. In the Lymansky direction, the invading army carried out 18 attacks on Ukrainian positions in the direction of Cherneshchyna, Grekivka, Makiivka, Terniv, Zarichny, and Torsky during the day. Five clashes have ended, 13 are ongoing. On the Siverskyi direction, the invaders stormed the position of our defenders in the Beilohorivka area once in vain. In the Kramatorsk direction, the occupiers attacked five times in the Chasovoy Yar and Stupochky areas. Two clashes are still ongoing. In the Toretsk direction, the enemy, with the support of aviation, tried five times to improve their position in the areas of Dachne, Toretsk and Shcherbynivka settlements. Ukrainian soldiers gave a worthy rebuff. The occupiers dropped two aerial bombs in the Diliivka area. Since the beginning of the day, the invaders have already made eleven attempts to dislodge our defenders from their positions in the Pokrovsky direction. Fighting continues near Promeny, Lysivka, Selydovoy, Yuryivka and Vyshnevoy. Kalinove was hit by KAB and NAR. The hottest now is in the Kurakhiv direction, where 51 enemy attacks have already been recorded in the areas of Vovchenka, Illinka, Kreminna Balka, Novoselidivka, Novodmytrivka, Gostre, Maksimivka, Antonivka, Dalnye, Katerynivka and Elizavetivka settlements. In the area of ​​Kreminna Balka, the occupiers are making efforts — they have conducted 19 assaults, nine of which are ongoing. Two skirmishes are ongoing in the Vremivsk direction near Trudovoy. Three attacks today have already been repelled by Ukrainian defenders. In the Orihiv direction, the occupiers attacked five times in the directions of Novodanilivka, Novoandriivka, Stepovoy, and Orihiv. The enemy dropped five guided aerial bombs along Tavriyskyi and in the area of ​​Malaya Tokmachka. One enemy assault was successfully repulsed in the Dnieper direction. At the same time, the enemy carried out an airstrike on Mykolaivka by NARs. There are no significant changes in the rest of the directions. As reported by ArmyInform, over the past day klyuchovyh-napryamkah/?utm_source=mainnews&utm_medium=article&utm_campaign=traficsource->169 combat clashes took place.

Title: -Guys, where are you from? Americans? Yup..!- — knight medics showed archival footage of the rescue ...
Description: The video was published on November 4 on the brigade's page. The events took place during the offensive in the summer of 2023, when a few hours of sleep in a row was a luxury for medics. -While the infantrymen did everything possible and impossible, breaking through the enemy's defenses, our medics defied death itself to save as many lives as possible, both of our soldiers and everyone who needed help. This video is about true commitment to the Hippocratic Oath,- the team said. As reported by ArmyInform, foreign volunteers serving in the 28th mechanized brigade in the name of the Knights of the Winter Campaign, in /->repulse another assault of the invaders, who are trying to enter Toretsk from the flank and constantly climb into our positions in small groups.

Title: Called to kill our prisoners — a spy from Slovyansk received 15 years in prison
Description: The Security Service of Ukraine reported this on November 4. According to the case file, the attacker spied on the defenders of Slovyansk and was waiting for the complete capture of the region. She also called on the occupiers to brutally torture and kill Ukrainian prisoners. SBU counterintelligence documented the agent's crimes and detained her at her place of residence in May of this year. The accomplice of the aggressor is a 66-year-old local resident, an ideological supporter of racism, who remotely contacted the Russian special services through her acquaintance, a fighter of the occupation groups of the Russian Federation. According to the investigation, the agent gave the enemy -liaison- the locations of the temporary base and the movement routes of the Ukrainian troops in the Slavyansk direction. To collect intelligence, the traitor went around the frontline area and recorded military objects. In addition, she -with dark eyes- asked for the information she needed from her acquaintances during everyday conversations. Also, in her correspondence with the militant, the traitor asked him to commit physical violence against Ukrainian prisoners of war. According to the materials of the Security Service, the court found the enemy accomplice guilty under Part 2 of Art. 111 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (treason committed under martial law). As reported by ArmyInform, was detained in Vinnytsia pro-Russian bot farmers.

Title: In Kurshchyna, the first -snowshoes were mined - the Teroboron soldiers distinguished themselves
Description: The video was made public on November 4. The three Russians got into a crowd, but were clearly visible against the background of the snow that had fallen during the night. Our aerial scouts directed their FPV drone towards the enemy, which hit one of the invaders directly. The second one, who was a few meters away, tried to run away, but soon fell because he was injured. The third Russian just ran away. -The first snowmen. In Kurshchyna. One is 200, the other is 300,- our drone operators commented on the video. The damage was done by a drone provided by one of the volunteer communities. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 129th Brigade of the Territorial Defense Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine at night were able to hunt down a Russian who was making his way to our positions.

Title: The Defense Forces explained the main goal of the occupiers in the Kharkiv region
Description: A representative of the communications service told about this on the broadcast of -Social News-. with the public of the -Charter- brigade of the National Guard of Ukraine, Sergeant Volodymyr Degtyarev. According to Degtyarev, the assaults with the use of armored vehicles ended a few weeks ago. Now the occupiers are attacking -alone-. -The enemy's intentions remain unchanged on any part of the front. Their main goal is to advance, to occupy the dominant heights. So far, we manage to reject them,- assured Volodymyr Degtyarev, a representative of the public relations service of the -Charter- brigade. Previously ArmyInform reported that throughout October the enemy practically did not use armored vehicles in the area of ​​responsibility of the -Charter- brigade of the National Guard of Ukraine in the north of the Kharkiv region and stormed with small infantry groups.

Title: Rustem Umyerov: We invite veterans and veterans to join the reform of the system of support of the A...
Description: This was announced by the Minister of Defense Rustem Umyerov on his Facebook page. The Minister noted that almost 1 million veterans who return to civilian life after defending our country live in Ukraine today. -These are people who have not only invaluable combat experience , but also in civilian life, each was a professional in his field. That is why we invite them to join the reform of the system of providing the Armed Forces of Ukraine,- said Rustem Umyerov. During the two-month recruitment campaign, they will have the opportunity to take part in an open competition, choose the field of activity closest to them and undergo basic training of front-line workers. -Our key values ​​— openness, people-centeredness, professionalism and integrity — will be a priority in the selection process and during team work,- the Minister of Defense emphasized. So, if you are a veteran ready for new challenges, fill out the application on the official website of the DOT until December 15, 2024.

Title: Hundreds of fake accounts were created every day — pro-Russian bot farmers were detained in Vinnytsi...
Description: About this reported on November 4 National Police of Ukraine. For the sake of -easy earnings-, the perpetrators purchased specialized equipment and tens of thousands of SIM cards of Ukrainian mobile operators. Every day, dealers ensured the registration of hundreds of fake accounts in well-known social networks, including those banned in Ukraine. According to operational information, those involved with the help of payment services of the Russian Federation could sell newly created accounts to agents of the aggressor country, who later used them to conduct IPSO and spread calls to Ukrainians to evade mobilization. Law enforcement officers searched the premises of Vinnytsia residents and seized computer equipment and server equipment, including dozens of modems and 19 gateways, specialized software and almost 20,000 SIM cards of Ukrainian mobile operators. The police investigators declared the defendants suspect under Part 5 of Art. 361 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (Unauthorized interference with the operation of information (automated), electronic communication, information and communication systems, electronic communication networks). The sanction of the article provides up to 15 years of imprisonment. Currently, specialists of the Cyber ​​Police Department and the SBU are analyzing the data obtained during the searches, as well as establishing the origin of the money with which the suspects purchased equipment for the bot farm. Based on the results, additional qualification is possible. As ArmyInform reported, the Security Service and the National Police neutralized two bot farms that worked for the special services of the Russian Federation.

Title: Strengthening of anti-aircraft defense in the regions and development of solutions against KABs: the...
Description: This is stated in the message of the head of state in the Telegram channel. -There was a report in at. of the commander of the Air Force, Anatoliy Krivonozhok, on the fight against means of Russian aerial terror. Strengthening air defense in the regions that need it the most, developing new solutions in the fight against anti-aircraft guns, strengthening mobile fire groups,- the President said. The head of state emphasized that now Russia uses approximately ten times more Shaheds than last fall, so we must fully counter them. Also at Stavka there were reports on own production — projectiles, weapons, equipment, EW devices, drones. Results of contracting for the current year and planning for the next. -We considered the 3-5-year contracts that we offer to Ukrainian manufacturers of strategic-level drones. A long horizon of planning, development and investment is needed for manufacturers,- the President noted. There was also a report by the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, General Oleksandr Syrsky, regarding the use of such long-range drones, determining priorities, and planning operations. As reported by ArmyInform, President Volodymyr Zelensky held a meeting with the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine General Oleksandr Syrskyi, Chief of the General Staff Lieutenant General Anatoly Barhylevych and the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov regarding the situation at the front and the supply of Ukrainian-made drones.

Title: Ukraine wants to buy 10,000 guided drones
Description: This was announced by the Deputy Prime Minister for Innovations, Development of Education, Science and Technology, Minister of Digital Transformation of Ukraine Mykhailo Fedorov. -Developing homing modules is a technically challenging task. Despite this, more than 10 companies already produce them in Ukraine. Competition appears on the market, which makes it possible to purchase drones at the lowest price. Thus, the state has already contracted three thousand FPV-drones with the lowest cost thanks to the tender for Prozorro and is currently conducting another one for ten thousand such UAVs,- said Mykhailo Fedorov. According to him, the homing systems will allow less involvement of the UAV operators themselves, which means they will contribute to the safety of our drones. -It is also an opportunity to identify certain targets and hit them autonomously. And this is also an opportunity to work under the Internet. There are many advantages, so we see this technology as the future picture of combat. We will come to that sooner or later,- said Mykhailo Fedorov. As reported by ArmyInform, in October more than 10 private UAV schools in Ukraine successfully passed certification.

Title: One hundred thousand hryvnias for criminal proceedings - a cunning evasion scheme was exposed in the...
Description: This was reported by the State Bureau of Investigation on November 4. According to the investigation, a law enforcement officer organized the operation, which operated from March to May 2024. His accomplice, the mayor, in accordance with his authority, issued men summonses to the military commissariat. During the issuance of documents, he hinted that he could help with evasion of military service. According to the scheme, the law enforcement officer artificially opened criminal proceedings against the conscript, according to which he could be sentenced to a conditional sentence of 1-2 years. During the investigation and the fictitious serving of punishment, the -clients- avoided mobilization. The -service- cost UAH 100,000, but if the conscript was already wanted, the amount increased. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: Artillery and Javelin are better than just artillery - the burned Russians will confirm
Description: The video was published on November 4 on the brigades' channels. A column of Russian vehicles moved towards our positions. At the same time, the occupiers kept to the roads among the forest plantations. But our aerial scouts spotted the enemy in time, and the artillery opened fire. This stopped some of the Russian equipment, and some were hit by Javelin ATGM operators. In the morning, our pilots could enjoy the sight of the enemy's equipment, which had already burned out. As reported by ArmyInform, mortars of the 60th mechanized brigade demonstrated unique accuracy when working on enemy attack aircraft.

Title: Operation Interflex: in Britain, plans for the training of the Armed Forces of Ukraine for 2025 were...
Description: This was reported by General Staff of the Armed Forces. Representatives of the Center for Ground Operations, defense attachés of international partners, international cooperation officers and authorized representatives of international partners took part in the discussion, who could represent the interests of their countries regarding the country's future plans and participation in the Interflex training operation throughout 2025. This conference provided a platform to provide real-time updates on the mission, discuss upcoming changes to the Infantry Basic Course and leadership courses, and identify those parts of the mission that require additional support and cooperation from international partners. The presence of all invited parties allowed the Interflex headquarters to plan preparations for 2025 and identify areas for improved cooperation and efficient work. The military attaché of Ukraine for defense issues in Great Britain reported on the situation at the front and the needs that are necessary to improve the training of Ukrainian servicemen in the fight against the Russian aggressor. The commander of the Interflex multinational operation, Colonel Andy Boardman, spoke about the existing plans and opportunities for continuing the training of Ukrainians in Great Britain within the framework of Interflex. The representatives of the partner countries discussed the process of adoption and feasibility of the proposed changes, as well as the best ways to train the Ukrainian military in 2025. -The conclusion of the conference was unequivocal: the training of the Ukrainian military needs to be improved in accordance with the realities of modern hostilities, and the partner countries are ready to help in this. The Armed Forces of Ukraine are sincerely grateful to our international partners for their support, knowledge and experience, which they pass on to our military,- the General Staff said. ArmyInform published a series of materials about the training of Ukrainian servicemen in Great Britain as part of the Interflex operation.

Title: Recruiting centers provided consultations to more than 23,000 visitors
Description: The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine informed about this on November 4. Only last week, 833 Ukrainians applied to the centers, of which 185 are already at the stage of processing documents. Regions with the greatest activity: Kharkiv Oblast — 16.7% Dnipropetrovsk Oblast — 15.5% Kyiv — 14.9% Zaporizhia Oblast — 12.2% Lviv Oblast — 12.2% Currently, more than 10,000 vacancies are open in 44 recruiting centers across the country. The most popular positions are: drivers, UAV operators, staff and medical personnel. The Ministry of Defense reminds: recruiting centers are NOT involved in serving summonses. ArmyInform talked about new recruiting opportunities and experience of the 46th brigade of the DSHV of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

Title: They went on an assault, got to the kobzon - in the direction of Kurakhiv, the Russians were defeate...
Description: The video of the injuries was published on November 4 on the brigade's channel. The occupier has to complete his -special operation- without even starting it. -The plan for the disposal of the occupiers is being implemented. These shots show the brilliant combat work of our anti-tankers, operators of attack drones, sappers, and our indomitable paratroopers on the front line. Well done, warriors!- - commented on the video in the brigade. The paratroopers of the 79th brigade are collecting drones and the necessary equipment for their work on their channel.

Title: Life imprisonment instead of 30 silver coins — three traitors caught in Kurshchyna were informed of ...
Description: The Security Service of Ukraine reported this on November 4. According to the case file, the defendants were members of the 810th Marine Corps Brigade of the Russian Federation. In August and September of this year, they shelled the positions of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the Suji area. They were taken prisoner together with other surviving occupiers after the assault units of the Ukrainian troops, supported by artillery, completely crushed the enemy column near the city. Among those detained is a traitor from Crimea, who in November 2022 -mobilized- to the occupation groups of the Southern Military District of the aggressor country. Another traitor is a resident of the temporarily occupied part of the territory of Luhansk region, from where he fled to Russia, and signed a contract with the Russian Ministry of Defense in one of the Moscow Military Committees. The third figure is a resident of Chernihiv Oblast who, after the start of the full-scale war, left for Bryansk in the Russian Federation, where he received a Russian passport and voluntarily -enrolled- in the ranks of the occupiers. The SBU investigators informed the detainees about the suspicion under Part 2 of Art. 111 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (treason committed under martial law). The perpetrators are in custody. They face life imprisonment with confiscation of property. The investigation was conducted by SBU employees in the Sumy region under the procedural guidance of the regional prosecutor's office. As reported by ArmyInform, in Sumy detained the adjuster of -Shakhediv-, because of which three people died.

Title: -It is possible to return from the SZCH-: the brigades are ready to accept servicemen who have left ...
Description: This is stated in the message 47 OMBr and 53 OMBr. -The 47th separate mechanized brigade understands that there are various reasons for such an act. Some were tired and missed their relatives, others did not find a place in their brigade for the specialty they provided. We are ready to offer you decent conditions with a modern approach. Our goal is to provide an opportunity for every soldier to return to the formation and realize himself,- the 47th brigade said. It is noted that the recruiters of the 47th OMBr are ready to provide consultation and support at all stages of return by telephone. We can all make mistakes, it's a part of life. It is important to remember that one transgression does not completely define us. We support those who want to right the wrongs of the past. The 53rd OMBr emphasized that the door to return is now open for every serviceman who previously voluntarily left the unit. -We have one country, one goal, and we can win only together. It is important that everyone who is ready to defend our land can join the common cause, regardless of past decisions,- the message reads. Previously, in the Military Service of Law and Order in the Armed Forces of Ukraine vsp/->explained what conditions must be met to be exempted from liability for voluntary abandonment of a part. As reported by ArmyInform, servicemen who voluntarily left their units for the first time instead of imprisonment began to return to the front. ArmyInform explained about SZH and desertion: how to return to the service and not go behind bars.

Title: The winners of the 2024 Bohdan Khmelnytskyi Art Prize have been announced
Description: According to the results of the meeting of the Prize Awarding Committee, which included representatives of the national creative unions of Ukraine, which reviewed almost half a hundred submitted works, the laureates of 2024 became: In the nomination -Literary works on a military theme- the victory was won by a soldier of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, poetess Oksana Rubanyak for the poetry collections -The Road of Life- and -Towards Death -. In the nomination -Musical compositions of a military theme- the winnerem composer Yevgeny Stankovich was recognized for the symphonic and choral work -Ukraine. Music of War- in three parts. Its performers were the National Symphony Orchestra of Ukraine (artistic director and chief conductor Volodymyr Sirenko and Yevhen Savchuk) and the Dumka National Choral Chapel. Monovcast Lesia Ukrainka National Academic Drama Theater represented by actress Iryna Doroshevska (Buchko) -Be careful, mine- (based on the play by Yulia Gudoshnyk) received the most votes of the members of the Prize Awarding Committee and ranked first among works of theatrical art. In the cinematography nomination the award was awarded to the director-producer and co-author of the script of the full-length feature film -Sniper. White Raven- to Maryan Bushan. In the nomination -Works of fine art on a military theme- won artist Serhiy Smetankin - for a series of paintings -Thanks-, which the author painted on boards from ammunition boxes and on rocket fragments. The Bohdan Khmelnytsky Prize for the best coverage of military themes in works of literature and art is awarded every year for works of literature and art, journalism and journalism, aimed at raising the prestige of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, propaganda of military service, the formation of national self-awareness, dignity, spirituality and culture in servicemen and youth, a sense of patriotism, loyalty to the military traditions of the Ukrainian people, socio-psychological and military-professional readiness for service in the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Photo by Vitaly Pavlenko

Title: The President instructed the Minister of Defense to increase orders for Ukrainian drones
Description: This is stated in the message of the head of state in the Telegram channel. -In detail about the situation at the front. Pokrovsky direction, Kurakhivskyi, Toretskyi, as well as Kupyanskyi — the greatest attention. A separate report on the Kursk operation and the destruction of Russian forces in certain areas near our state border,- the President noted. Volodymyr Zelenskyi reported that there are important developments in the matter of supplies from partners for the front — an increase in supplies in accordance with support packages is recorded. The results in the supply of artillery became better. The Minister of Defense reported on the supply of Ukrainian-made drones for the Defense Forces. -The approved supply plans are being implemented, and I am grateful to all manufacturers for this. I instructed the Minister of Defense to additionally increase the order of Ukrainian drones for our respective operations,- the statement reads.

Title: -Vankam- from Buryatia lie about -golden mountains-: Russians are massively not paid according to co...
Description: The spokeswoman of the OTU -Luhansk- told about this on the -Suspilne Novyny- broadcast. Major Anastasia Bobovnikova. According to Anastasia Bobovnikova, the Russians have an advantage in manpower. In order to recruit this -living force-, the Kremlin authorities promise -mountains of gold- for signing the contract, that is millions of Russian rubles. -”Vanky” from the conditional Buryatia, they go for it and sign a contract with the troops of the Russian Federation. However, the prisoners who were taken in the area of ​​responsibility of the Luhansk OTU claim that many of them did not see these payments at all,- states the spokeswoman of the Luhansk OTU. Earlier, ArmyInform told that the situation in Toretsk was stabilized.

Title: A woman who justified the aggression of the Russian Federation and spread the symbols of the Soviet ...
Description: The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office informed about this. Prosecutors proved that the resident of the city of Valka, on her own pages in social networks, including those banned in Ukraine, distributed posts containing images of the symbols of the communist totalitarian regime. The pictures, in particular, depict the hammer and sickle, St. George's ribbon, five-pointed star, flag and coat of arms of the USSR. The woman accompanied the photos with captions, wishing her readers -Happy Great October-. After the start of the full-scale Russian invasion of Ukraine, the accused became an active participant in pro-Russian chats on Telegram. There, the woman shared her position — she assured other users that the president of the Russian Federation was -humane,- claimed that -Kharkiv will soon be Russia- and repeated propaganda. In turn, she called Ukrainian patriots -zombified and mentally ill people.- She spoke negatively about Ukrainian patriots and approved the actions of the Russian military on the territory of our country. The illegal nature of the perpetrator's statements was confirmed by the relevant expert opinion. At the court hearing, the defendant fully admitted her guilt and added that she had come under -negative influence.- The verdict was handed down by the Valkivsky District Court of the Kharkiv Region. The term for an appeal continues.

Title: - Wishful thinking-: the Russians have no advance in Chasovoy Yar and Toretsk
Description: The spokeswoman of the OTU -Luhansk- told about this on the -Suspilne Novyny- broadcast. Major Anastasia Bobovnikova. In addition, according to Anastasia Bobovnikova, the Russians are sending false messages about their -breakthroughs- to the Internet. In fact, there is currently no enemy advance in the area of ​​responsibility of the -Luhansk- OTU. -Yes, they're wishful thinking because they might want to get ahead, but they can't. And we will try to counter them as much as possible. Now we only see that the enemy is accumulating its resources,- said the spokeswoman of Luhansk OTU. Earlier ArmyInform reported , that if earlier the invaders stormed in the front and lost a lot of manpower, now they focused on other tactics.

Title: The government simplified the registration of volunteer cars for military personnel
Description: This is stated in the message on the Government portal. From now on, military personnel can register such vehicles in their name and use them legally until the end of martial law and three months after its cancellation or termination. The relevant resolution, the draft of which was developed by the Ministry of Social Policy of Ukraine, was adopted by the Cabinet of Ministers on October 29, 2024. The adopted decision is important for solving a number of problematic issues faced by servicemen when receiving such cars. First of all, the transparency of ownership of the vehicle is ensured, the procedure for traveling abroad and the transfer of such a car to brothers or step-sisters is regulated. Simplification and transparency of the procedure respectively increase the efficiency of distribution of humanitarian aid. From now on, in order to place such a car on temporary state registration, a serviceman must submit to the service center within 10 days of signing the act of acceptance and transfer (as required by the law in all cases of registration of imported cars): Military servicemen who received vehicles as humanitarian aid from at the beginning of December 2023 and until the decree enters into force, they can register them in service centers within the next three months (from the moment of adoption of this decree) on the basis of the above-mentioned documents (the act of acceptance and transfer can be of any form). The procedure for registration of vehicles given to military personnel as humanitarian aid will be additionally established by December 2023. In order to further simplify the re-registration of a vehicle recognized as humanitarian aid to other servicemen, in the act of acceptance and transfer, in accordance with the resolution, up to 5 servicemen who have the right to drive this vehicle and re-register it to themselves can be specified. Therefore, information about them is entered in the registration card in the -Special notes- column. After completing the registration process, the serviceman informs the military unit, body, unit in which he is serving that he has received and registered a vehicle recognized as humanitarian aid. The temporary registration of the transport is terminated in the following cases: In the event of these circumstances, the temporary state registration can be renewed at the request of one of the servicemen specified in the act of acceptance and transfer. If there are no data on military personnel who have a priority right to registration, the service center notifies the unit where the military personnel served about the need for departmental registration of the vehicle. As of the end of October 2024, more than 100,000 declarations for humanitarian cargo were registered in the Automated Humanitarian Aid Registration System developed by the Ministry of Social Policy, a large part of which are military vehicles. The automated system of registration of humanitarian aid of the Ministry of Social Policy has been operational since December 1, 2023.

Title: -Javelin decides-: Russian BMP scattered across Kurshchyna
Description: The video was published on the brigade's Facebook page. In the footage, you can see how the BMP transports the enemy landing force to the landing and on the way back, our anti-tankers destroy it with a shot from the Javelin ATGM. -Democracy in action! Total breakdown of the BMP assault group of the Russians in Kurshchyna by calculating the -javelin- of Mykolaiv marines. The landing force was defeated by the brigade's artillery and attack drones,- the brigade added. As reported by ArmyInform, the Russians are actively shelling Kurshchyna, they do not stop trying to storm and use their usual tactics of destroying settlements.

Title: The Ministry of Defense returned a property complex and a plot of land in Kyiv worth UAH 300 million
Description: This is stated in messages MOU. Almost 2.5 hectares of land, the businessmen planned to build apartment buildings, and premises with an area of ​​more than 6,500 square meters. m used for profit. The Commercial Court of Kyiv recognized their privatization as illegal. The ownership rights of the commercial structure on real estate have been terminated, and the state registration of the land plot has been canceled in cooperation with the State Geocadastre. Now they will be used in the interests of defense. The main administration of defense lands and funds of the Ministry of Defense emphasizes that such cases of illegal acquisition of military facilities and defense lands are not unique, but the defense department is constantly working to identify them and return them to the state.

Title: The same tactics: the Russians are destroying Kurshchyna in the same way as Donetsk region
Description: About this on the air of -Social News- told the spokesman of OTU -Siversk- Vadim Mysnyk. As for the northern border, the enemy continues to shell the border territories of Sumy, Chernihiv and Kharkiv regions. But in the last three days, according to Vadym Mysnyk, a significant decrease in the number of shellings has been recorded. -There are a lot of factors involved. There are also weather conditions, and they probably have problems with logistics and the fact that they do not have an unlimited resource to use here,- explained the spokesman of OTU -Siversk-. As for Kurshchyna, the most active shelling and bombing is there. the Russians do not stop trying to storm and use their usual tactics. -The enemy is simply destroying settlements, they are simply being wiped out below zero. It is the Russians, despite the fact that this is their population and their territory. They follow the same tactics as in Donbass and in the south of our country,- said Vadym Mysnyk. Earlier ArmyInform reported , that at a time when everyone is talking about the involvement of the Russian Federation in the fighting in the Kursk region of the North Korean military, only citizens of the Russian Federation continue to die in suicidal infantry assaults without any support from armored vehicles.

Title: The Defense Forces spoke about aggressive Russian attacks in the Kurakhiv direction
Description: About this on the air of -Espresso- the acting director told. press officer of the 33rd separate mechanized brigade Nazar Voytenkov. -The situation in the Kurakhiv direction is steadily difficult, intense combat clashes continue, both mechanized and on foot. The enemy does not lose his plans to move forward. We are in a complex defense and continue to repulse enemy attacks using all available means,- he said. The press officer emphasized that the aggressor has a huge human resource, a lot of equipment and shells, so the offensive command of the Russian Federation uses all this to achieve its plans. At the same time, units of the 33rd OMBr are using ta-perevagy-zahidnyh-tankiv/->Leopard tanks to destroy enemy dugouts, fortified positions or positions that the enemy managed to occupy temporarily. -We are also actively using artillery, and the infantry is working to prevent the occupiers from succeeding in their ambitious plans. The enemy is very aggressive, it should be recognized and understood. We are doing everything possible so that Kurakhove remains in the rear and the enemy cannot advance,- said Nazar Voytenkov. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Kurakhiv direction occupiers are risking everything, trying to remove damaged equipment from the battlefield - the change in tactics is due to the lack of armored vehicles.

Title: Trucks, vans, motorcycles are another prey of GUR drones
Description: This was reported to the GUR of the MOU. The scouts burned several trucks, vans, and cars that the Russian occupiers used to transport personnel, weapons, and equipment to the positions. We also managed to hunt down a motorcyclist from Muscovite who was moving through the field at dusk. -It seems that in the last minute of his shameful existence, he was able to make sure that riding around Ukraine on motorcycles is also strictly prohibited and deadly dangerous,- the GUR added. As reported by ArmiyaInform, the occupying Russian troops have already lost more than 700,000 servicemen since the beginning of the large-scale invasion of Ukraine.

Title: In Sumy, a correctional officer - Shahediv - was arrested, because of which three residents of the c...
Description: This was reported by the Sumy Regional Prosecutor's Office. In September 2024, the special services of the Russian Federation recruited a young man through one of the messengers. Having agreed to cooperate, the suspect drove around in his own car and recorded the locations of military formations, the presence of weapons, their movement through the territory of Sumy region, etc. He transferred the collected data to the curator from the special service. It was after the agent was conducting reconnaissance in one of the residential quarters of the city of Sumy that on October 22, the occupiers attacked him with a drone. Then the weapon hit a private house, -dytynoyu/-> a 14-year-old girl, her mother and aunt died. Currently, the detainee is in custody. The investigators informed him of the suspicion under Part 2 of Art. 111 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (treason committed under martial law). He faces life imprisonment with confiscation of property. The pre-trial investigation is carried out by the Security Service of Ukraine in the Sumy region.

Title: The enemy transferred all actions in the Black Sea to the air format - the Navy of the Armed Forces
Description: The spokesperson of the Naval Forces told about this on the air -Suspilne Novyny- Ukrainian Armed Forces captain 3rd rank Dmytro Pletenchuk. -the Russians conduct aerial reconnaissance, although the number of aircraft departures has decreased, primarily due to weather conditions. But for the Russians, the actions of their aircraft are now the main source of intelligence. They also perform patrolling and fire damage tasks. That is, in fact, they transferred all actions in the Black Sea to an air format,- the spokesman said. According to Dmytro Pletenchuk, Ukraine is a world leader in the use of unmanned naval combat systems. Marine drones are also successfully used for mine clearance and reconnaissance. -And this allows us to continue the work of our grain corridor. This is such a deterrent that changed the course of this war at sea. For many, this has become a new page in the history of world wars, especially wars at sea,- the spokesman said. Earlier ArmyInform reported that the level of training of the Russian so-called marines has significantly degraded due to the fact that, after the start of a large-scale invasion, the Defense Forces destroyed the main core of the Russian personnel army.

Title: They risk everything: the occupiers remove damaged equipment from the battlefield due to a lack of -...
Description: The head of the communications department of 46 separate Lieutenant Oleksandr Nevidimy of the airmobile brigade of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. According to him, all this is due to the painful losses of the enemy. In October alone, paratroopers of the 46th OAeMBr destroyed 34 tanks and 63 units of other armored vehicles. -Earlier, the enemy did not evacuate their equipment, we finished it off. Now we are observing that the enemy is really trying to evacuate the equipment, repair it and use it in further assaults,- said Oleksandr Nevidimy. As reported by ArmyInform, the Defense Forces continue to restrain the enemy in the Kurakhiv direction. On November 3, the occupiers 27 times in the districts of Illinka, Ostrivskyi, Dalnyi, Antonivka and Katerynivka tried to break through Ukrainian defense lines.

Title: A new stage of the project on the psychological rehabilitation of servicemen has begun in the Armed ...
Description: This was reported at the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The project is implemented with the support of the NATO People-Centered Approach Program within the framework of the Comprehensive Package of Assistance to Ukraine (CPA). Coordination of project activities in the troops (forces) is carried out by the Main Department of Psychological Support of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. From October 2024 to April 2025, it is planned to hold 70 three-day trainings on the psychological rehabilitation of personnel involved in the performance of tasks in combat areas. During the trainings, the main focus is on the participants' acquisition of theoretical knowledge and practice of practical skills in providing first psychological self-aid and assistance to comrades in combat conditions in accordance with recognized international practices and protocols. In the course of the trainings, work on overcoming negative mental states, training in the techniques of emotional and volitional mobilization, and individual psychological counseling of servicemen who need it are provided. This activity is also a significant contribution to the system of restoring the combat capability of the personnel of the Defense Forces of Ukraine, which is extremely relevant in the conditions of repelling armed aggression. The NATO project is a response to the need for training and psychological training of servicemen of the Defense Forces of Ukraine and is aimed at their acquisition of vital skills of psychological assistance in combat conditions. The practical implementation of the project is carried out by the NGO -Officers' League-, which since 2014 has been systematically working in the direction of psychological support for the military. As reported by ArmyInform, the first health care institution in the system of the Ministry of Defense received the status of the Reintegration Center for servicemen released from captivity.

Title: Shelling of the Russian Federation: in Kharkiv the number of victims has increased to 15, in Kivshar...
Description: reported this by Oleg Synegubov, the head of Kharkiv Regional State Administration. As a result of the shelling, the glazing of the windows of the infrastructure object, 4 trade pavilions, two supermarkets, a house, a laboratory, and a coffee shop were damaged. 21 trade stands, a shopping center, a cafe, two residential buildings, and 10 cars were also damaged. In addition, a 5-story residential building was hit on Sunday evening in the village of Kivsharivka, Kupyan district. The bodies of two women and one man were previously under the rubble. In the village of Mala Danylivka, 12 private houses and a railway crossing were damaged as a result of shelling. As reported by ArmyInform, on November 3, the occupiers rushinavannya/->made 304 blows in 14 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region. Two people were injured, there is destruction.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, fortitude, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , I decree: to start holding a nationwide minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, to be announced in all mass media regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: Defense forces destroyed 50 enemy UAVs during the night attack of the Russian Federation
Description: This was reported by the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. On the night of November 4, 2024 (from 7:00 p.m. on November 3), the enemy launched an Iskander-M ballistic missile attack on Dnipropetrovsk region (Puskiv region - Rostov region, Russian Federation). In addition, Russian troops attacked Kharkiv Oblast with guided aerial bombs and launched 80 Shahed-type attack UAVs and drones of an unspecified type from the directions of Bryansk, Kursk, Primorsko-Akhtarsk — Russia. The air attack was repulsed by anti-aircraft missile troops, aviation, electronic warfare units, mobile fire groups of the Air Force and the Defense Forces of Ukraine. 27 enemy drones were lost in various regions of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, last day losses Russian invaders numbered 1300 people. In addition, Ukrainian soldiers neutralized 11 tanks, 15 armored combat vehicles, 35 artillery systems, one rocket salvo fire system, 93 UAVs of the operational-tactical level, 77 vehicles and three units of special equipment of the occupiers.

Title: Four people were injured in the Kherson region as a result of Russian strikes
Description: This reported the head of the Kherson Regional State Administration Oleksandr Prokudin. Antonivka, Dudchany, Bilozerka, Chornobayivka, Tomarine, Shlyakhove, Komysany, Dniprovske, Beryslav, Zarichne, Lviv and the city of Kherson came under enemy fire and airstrikes last day. the Russian military targeted educational and medical institutions, a public transport stop. Three high-rise buildings and 19 private houses were damaged in the residential quarters of the settlements of the region. The occupiers also mutilated a gas pipeline and private cars. During a nighttime drone attack, the Air Defense Forces over the territory of our region destroyed one Shahed-131/136. As reported by ArmyInform, on November 3, the occupiers -rujnuvannya/->made 304 blows in 14 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region. Two people were injured, there is destruction.

Title: 169 combat clashes per day: the General Staff of the Armed Forces reported on the situation in key d...
Description: This is stated in operational information of the General Staff ZSU as of 08:00 on November 4. On the Kharkiv direction, the enemy carried out offensive and assault actions in the Vovchansk region four times. The number of combat clashes per day in the Kupyansk direction reached 16. The defense forces repelled the attacks of the occupiers in the areas of Golubivka, Sinkivka, Stepova Novoselivka, Kolisnikivka, Berestovo, Zagryzovo, Kruglyakivka, Vyshnevo, and Pershotravnevo. In the Lyman direction, our troops stopped nine enemy attacks. The invaders concentrated their main efforts in the areas of the settlements of Grekivka, Terna and Dibrova. The aggressor's aircraft bombarded the areas of Toretsk, Druzhba, Petrivka and Dilyivka in the Toretsk direction, and the enemy tried to advance four times in the Toretsk area. 27 attacks over the past day have been repelled by our defenders in the Pokrovsky direction. The enemy tried to advance in the vicinity of Myrolyubivka, Lysivka, Promeny, Sukhoi Yar, Novogrodivka, and Vyshnevo. The defense forces continue to restrain the enemy in the Kurakhiv direction. In the districts of Illinka, Ostrivskyi, Dalnyi, Antonivka and Katerynivka, the occupiers tried to break through Ukrainian defense lines 27 times. 12 of the enemy were stopped by our defenders in the area of ​​Trudovoy, in the Vremivsk direction. In the Orihiv direction enemy units once tried to advance in the direction of Novodanilivka. In the Dnieper direction, the invaders unsuccessfully attacked the positions of our troops three times. The operational situation on the Volyn and Polissky directions has not changed significantly. No signs of formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. On the border with Chernihiv and Sumy regions, the enemy maintains a military presence, conducts reconnaissance and artillery fire. Defense forces of Ukraine continue the operation in the Kursk direction, where the enemy launched 28 airstrikes over the past day, using 40 guided air bombs, Ukrainian defenders also repelled thirteen enemy attacks. In general, last day losses of the Russian invaders were 1300 people. In addition, Ukrainian soldiers neutralized 11 tanks, 15 armored combat vehicles, 35 artillery systems, one rocket salvo fire system, 93 UAVs of operational-tactical level, 77 vehicles and three units of special equipment of the occupiers.

Title: The troops of the Russian Federation shelled the Zaporizhzhia region more than 300 times, there are ...
Description: This was reported by the head of the Zaporizhzhya Regional State Administration, Ivan Fedorov. A 55-year-old woman and a 45-year-old man were injured as a result of an enemy attack in Pologiv district. Russian troops carried out 5 airstrikes on Yurkivka, Malia Tokmachka and Preobrazhenka. 133 UAVs of various modifications attacked Primorske, Lobkovo, Gulyaipole, Shcherbaki, Novoandriivka, Robotine, Mala Tokmachka, Olhivske, Novodanilivka and Biloghirya. 16 shellings from MLRS were carried out on the territory of Gulyaipol, Robotyny, Novodanilivka, Shcherbaki and Novoandriivka. 150 artillery strikes fell on Biloghir, Lobkovo, Orikhov, Gulyaipol, Shcherbaky, Novoandriivka, Robotyn, Malia Tokmachka, Novodanilivka, Biloghiru, and Olhivka. 23 reports were received about the destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure facilities. As reported by ArmyInform, on the evening of November 3, the enemy carried out airstrikes on Kharkiv and its suburbs as a result of shelling. -postrazhdalyh/->13 people were injured.

Title: 700 thousand occupiers have died in Ukraine since the beginning of the Russian invasion
Description: Total combat losses of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 04.11.24 published General Staff of the Armed Forces. They are approximately: The data is being clarified... As reported by ArmyInform, the situation in the Pokrovsky and Kurakhiv directions remains tense - the enemy concentrates the main offensive efforts there. In addition, the occupiers actively attacked in the Lyman direction yesterday.

Title: More than 700,000 occupiers have died in Ukraine since the beginning of the Russian invasion
Description: Total combat losses of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 04.11.24 published General Staff of the Armed Forces. They are approximately: The data is being clarified... As reported by ArmyInform, the situation in the Pokrovsky and Kurakhiv directions remains tense - the enemy concentrates the main offensive efforts there. In addition, the occupiers actively attacked in the Lyman direction yesterday.

Title: The KMVA spoke about the consequences of the night attack of Russian drones on the capital
Description: The Kyiv City Military Administration reported this. In the Obolonsky and Desnyansky districts, they fell in an open area. Local fires were recorded - burning grass and litter. No injuries or damage. -The enemy used usual tactics. But again he did not achieve the goal - our defense forces made maximum efforts to neutralize all the enemy's UAVs,- the KMVA noted. As reported by ArmyInform, on the evening of November 3, the enemy carried out airstrikes on Kharkiv and its suburbs as a result of shelling 13 people were injured.

Title: The enemy carried out airstrikes on Kharkiv, 13 were injured
Description: This was reported to the State Emergency Service of Ukraine. One of the hits was recorded near a residential building in the Shevchenkiv district of the city of Kharkiv. According to preliminary information, the enemy attacked the city with FAB-250 aerial bombs from the UMPK. Multi-story residential buildings, cars, a supermarket building and other commercial objects were damaged. In total, according to preliminary data, 13 people were injured. The final information is being clarified. Departments of the State Emergency Service worked at the scene and examined the damaged houses. As reported by ArmiyaInform, on November 3, at approximately 1:10 a.m., Russian troops attacked with two drones. Makaryh of Zolochivska OTG of Bogoduhiv district. The premises of the agricultural enterprise were damaged. Also, yesterday at approximately 5:20 am, the enemy shelled the village of Kupyansk-Vuzlovy. Private homes were damaged.

Title: The soldier who took over the company. The story of a combat officer -Maxon-
Description: This war has already brought up many worthy young commanders who went from soldier to officer, and today we will tell about one of them - Maksym Zaichenko, lieutenant of the Third Separate Assault Brigade. Correspondent of Armiya TV met with - Maxon- in the early fall near the combat mission area to ask him about 10 years of war, attitude to people and leadership in the current army. - You are from Zaporozhye. If you compare the city 15 years ago and now, what has changed? - I was born in Zaporizhzhia in 1992. He entered the football sector in 2007. Subsequently, repressive actions on the part of the then authorities against the fans began. This is me about the case of the Pavlichenkos. We supported the actions in Kyiv, for me it was a manifestation of my civic position. It happened that -Berkut- tried to put us on the asphalt simply because of the red and black flag. Both in Zaporizhzhia and at away matches. Therefore, it was precisely this press from the side of the state, from the side of law enforcement agencies, that forced us to unite. And when the revolution began, the fans came forward as a single force. Our city is very industrial, I had the impression that you only have to move along a typical vector: learn to be an electromechanic - school, vocational school, factory. It was important for me to think about my future so that it was determined by me, and not by the environment. I found like-minded people who believed that Zaporizhzhia is not only factories, but many different areas. Cossack spirit, how not to be cool. You just need to develop them. - Did you even then think that there would be a war? What will have to be fought for? — This became clear to me after the Revolution of Dignity. I was a student, I took an active part in the revolution both on the Zaporozhye Maidan and on the Capital Square. When all kinds of -militia- and Russians began to capture populated areas, of course, there was already an understanding that it was necessary to react. Ilovaisk became a critical moment. It was an understanding for me that the situation is not as rosy as I imagined. I understood that I had to join the army. I was supposed to go to the third year of the university, but I packed my things and went to Kyiv. We had a mobilization center at the Kozatsky hotel. He stayed there for several weeks, underwent training and went to the East. Arrived in Urzuf near Mariupol. Got weapons, got armor, it was a volunteer battalion of the Ministry of Internal Affairs. - How did those around you, loved ones, perceive your decision to go to war in 14th? - The family had a reaction that, they say, you can stay, you don't need to go - they can kill you there. But I have explained my position. And they supported me, saying that I was doing everything right. It was organic for me and my environment. Once again, I am an ordinary guy from Zaporozhye. — Tell us about your battle path. How did you end up here? - During the 2014-16 campaign, I was a grenade launcher, a machine gunner in an assault platoon, as it was then called. I was in the rapid response group, participated in the Shirokin operation. Stabilization actions were also carried out in Mariintka. Sometimes he performed the tasks of a unit commander, but he did not officially have a title. Retired as a senior soldier. Later in his civilian life, he began to delve into military topics. He formed a defense headquarters in our city, he immediately understood that it was necessary to acquire skills, not only in handling weapons, but also in medicine, tactics, and military management. Just before the large-scale invasion, he moved to Kyiv. And I knew that, in case of anything, the guys from Azov and I would gather at ATEK (plant in Kyiv). And on February 24, indeed, everyone was there. They say to me: -Maxon-, come on, you are a veteran yourself, gather people like you, people are coming from different regions, organize. So, literally on the first day, more than a hundred people gathered at my place. Some I knew, some just arrived. They came again. And in the evening they ask me how many people you have. At that time there were about one hundred and thirty. They put me in charge of a company, they say, deal with the distribution of personnel, structure, organize, think about support, think about combat training. For about a week, he was engaged in organizing this. Legally, it was just a group of people. At the same time, there were already situations when the enemy came very close to Kyiv. I gathered groups of people who were already ready to perform combat tasks and they went to perform such tasks already in those days. There was a kind of -commotion-, but work had to be done, for example, they helped one of the units of the 72nd brigade to hold the line on the Irpin River. There were a number of other similar combat missions. In just a few weeks, we were able to build a management structure, assign people roles according to their knowledge and skills. But there were also people who did not know much, they had to gain a basic level of training in these couple of weeks. In this way, we coordinated, formed a company, at that time it was a unit of territorial defense -Azov-Kyiv-. On the basis of this company, we later reformed into a company of the Azov-Kyiv SSO battalion. Being actually a company commander when he was drafted into the SSO, only then did he receive the rank of sergeant. - How did the events develop further? - Then we went to the Zaporozhye direction, where as a company we joined the battle and helped hold Vremivka. There was a difficult situation. The enemy then took possession of Neskuchny, there was very little left to enter Vremivka. We went there, reinforced our comrades from the territorial defense, from the Defense Forces. There was another episode when the enemy entered a settlement, and we immediately knocked it out: we were provided with three BMPs, our infantry drove into them and cleared this settlement. In this way, they worked to stop the advance of the enemy in the Zaporizhzhia direction. After that came the understanding that it was necessary to develop as a unit, because we did not have heavy weapons, armored vehicles, artillery, tanks. We realized that it is not promising to be permanently attached to someone. Therefore, it was decided to reformat and create a brigade within the Ground Forces. At that moment, I was offered to develop the battalion. That's how I got the primary officer rank - junior lieutenant. This is how I went from a senior soldier, then an actual company commander, I was still the head of intelligence in the Bakhmut direction, then I worked in the Avdiiv direction, Terny, and now I am here as a so-called acting officer. battalion chief of staff. - Are there people, commanders or soldiers that you look up to? - This is not about historical figures or any military leaders, but about the fact that there are a lot of guys around who look fear in the eyes. I understand for myself that everyone can have fear, but what distinguishes a brave person is not the absence of fear, but the ability to overcome this fear and fulfill the task that you have, that you have set for yourself. And it's not just about war, it's about life in general. And I am very glad that many of the guys we have here are, in fact, almost all of them are heroes. And everyone I see, I have a lot of respect for someone who is in our department and can be looked up to. In general, in response to this question, I can name many battalion commanders. We don't have -jackets-. The average age of the officers is probably somewhere in the region of 30 years. All of them grew up within the brigade, roughly speaking. Now we have reached the level where we have harmony between the officers and the rank and file, there is an understanding between the soldiers. And there are no questions, they say that an outsider came to command there. - If it were not for the Third Assault Brigade, in which brigade would you like to serve? - But there is no such brigade. It happens that people do not want to spend their own efforts, to come to everything ready-made. But the guys and I built this unit from scratch. Everything in the Third Assault Room was created from scratch. Created directly by the guys in this crew. Fighters of all levels. Both soldiers and command. And volunteers. Indeed, this is the child that we created, gave birth to together. I just can't say that I see myself anywhere yet. And it's not about us being perfect. We actually have a very wide range of areas that need to be developed. Nothing perfect exists. And even if somewhere we are the coolest, there is still room to grow. Therefore, everyone who comes, I am sure, will be able to realize himself with us. If the ideas are really competitive, then a person will show himself, and we will create all the conditions for this. - Tell us about how you prepare recruits? - We have recruiting centers. A person comes, asks what they are interested in, signs a contract. Next, our instructors provide basic skills, do everything to ensure that a person is first of all able to blend into the team. After a person has come to us, he also goes through adjustment. That is, it is not the case that a recruit arrived and was immediately sent somewhere. This is something that scares many. We don't do that. Because we would lose ground to an unprepared fighter. And it is not profitable for us to put an untrained fighter on the front line. We are interested in a person being ready to perform basic tasks. - Tell us about recent work (the conversation was recorded at the end of September, ed.). What is the current situation in your area of ​​responsibility? - If we talk specifically about our unit, the Second Assault Battalion, we have been in active defense since the spring, we were moved from the Avdiiv direction for recovery. But recovery takes place in combat conditions. And lately, the enemy has been trying to seize the bridgeheads, advance in the direction of Borova, to the Oskil River. The pressure is on several fronts. Including due to the range of responsibility of our brigade. But we are trying to dictate our own initiative. We suppress the enemy, accordingly, the defense is active, we carry out counterattacking actions. Somewhere we are helping other units. Right now, our soldiers are conducting active assault actions on the front. And the preparation for these actions was very exhausting, dynamic, it's a pity that I can't tell about it. According to our estimates, the main goal of the enemy is to seize specific settlements before winter. In order to cross the river on our site. So that they have a bridgehead and from it continue the offensive and seize Ukrainian territory further. - What was remembered during these days? - Is it that the enemy's infantry marches in droves every day. And now I sometimes have this feeling, especially in the morning, like a time loop, -groundhog day-. Almost every day the same thing. The enemy tries to climb, follows almost the same routes. We are waiting for him there, we meet him, inflict damage, squeeze like cockroaches. But they continue to do it the next day. And they use the same ineffective methods. - Do you expect that with the rains and cold weather the nature of the fighting will change? - There is a conceptual opinion, and there is a practical one. If you start from a practical point of view, it is always better to winter in basements, and not in dugouts in the ground. Therefore, purely from a practical point of view, the impression is that the enemy is trying to occupy populated areas in order to meet the winter normally. We faced the fact that actually wintering in the ground is a little more difficult than getting settlements. And from a more global point of view, the adversary needs to compensate for the reputational losses he has already suffered. Which were caused by the actions of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. I have in mind both the Kursk operation and the situation with the fleet at sea, how we knocked them out. Therefore, they use a large human resource, a significant amount of equipment. And he will achieve some results, and indeed, this winter and these geopolitical moments will shape the reality that will take place in the spring. - Do the military talk about potential negotiations, some kind of truce? - I believe that such thoughts appear more among the civilian population and in the mass media. Not so in the military. We are thinking about the combat mission that is immediately in front of us. This is directly my attitude. We have, regardless of what happens in the offices in Kyiv or other cities, other countries, to fulfill the task that is clearly issued as a combat order. Hold the line. Provide maintenance in general. Each brigade has a line of responsibility. We need to get used to the fact that everyone should be responsible for their own line of responsibility. After all, when you fail in yourself, you thereby set others up. The same probably applies to people who try to shift responsibility from themselves to someone else. There is a citizen, his responsibility, it is written in the Constitution, in addition to rights. Yes? But there is still a responsibility to protect one's Motherland. Why is it often said that the Third is stormy, it has an ideology, there is some high psychological level. Because our people, first of all, are ready to take responsibility for themselves. And when you understand that you have a specific task, you will fulfill it regardless of other circumstances. That is why we are thinking about this. - What are your plans after the war? Will it ever end? — In war, it is difficult to talk about plans. But I know for sure that I will return to my family, to my wife, to my son. I am in contact with them, now video communication helps. But what I know for sure is that as long as I am in the Armed Forces of Ukraine, I will do my duty. I will try to bring this point as close as possible, I don't know what to call it, but this point is a clear understanding that the eastern neighbor, I hope, will no longer be in the form of the Russian Federation, this fragmented structure will not threaten our state. And, accordingly, to my family. And to the families of my boys, my brothers. That is, it is a matter of survival. We are not fighting because we are simply stubborn. Or we were told by our Western partners that we should fight. This is a question of survival. So I want to make sure my child doesn't have to fight. That my wife will not be in danger. Until there is this understanding, I will use the most effective methods, which is to defend the state with weapons in my hands. And to protect those people, citizens who live in this state. This is what we are doing now.

Title: The Navy of the Ukrainian Armed Forces reported how many enemy missile carriers are in the Black Sea
Description: This was notified by the Naval Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. There are no enemy ships in the Sea of ​​Azov. In the Mediterranean Sea, one enemy ship, which is a carrier of -Caliber- cruise missiles with a total salvo of up to 8 missiles. During the day, in the interests of the Russian Federation, three vessels passed through the Kerch Strait to the Black Sea, which continued their movement in the direction of the Bosphorus Strait. 5 ships were heading to the Sea of ​​Azov, two of them were moving from the Bosphorus Strait. -the Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention for the Safety of Life at Sea of ​​1974 (SOLAS) by turning off automatic identification systems,- the Navy of the Ukrainian Armed Forces emphasized. As reported by ArmyInform, the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine liquidated more than 2.5 thousand Russian military personnel.

Title: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine: more than 70 combat clashes per day in the Kurakhi...
Description: This is stated in the operational information of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine as of 22:00 on November 4. In addition, the occupiers actively attacked in the Lyman direction yesterday. During the past day, 160 combat clashes took place. On the Kharkiv direction, Russian terrorists unsuccessfully stormed the positions of our units in the Vovchansk region four times, and also dropped aerial bombs on Muravske, Koval and Zrubanka. 16 times the enemy attacked our positions on the Kupyansk direction. In the vicinity of Golubivka, Sinkivka, Stepova Novoselivka, Kolisnikivka, Berestovo, Zagryzovo, Kruglyakivka, Vyshnevo, and Pershotravnevo, units of the Defense Forces repulsed ten assaults. Six clashes are ongoing. In the Lyman direction, Russian troops attacked Ukrainian defenders nine times in the areas of Grekivka, Terna and Dibrova settlements. In Toretsk and in the direction of Shcherbinivka, the enemy tried to improve its position four times, in addition, the aggressor's aircraft bombarded the areas of Druzhba, Toretsk and Petrivka settlements. In the Pokrovsky direction during the day, the aggressor attacked our positions 27 times in the areas of Myrolyubivka, Lysivka, Promeny, Sukhoi Yar, Novogrodivka and Vyshnevo. Four clashes are still ongoing. According to preliminary calculations, yesterday the occupiers lost 213 soldiers killed and wounded in the Pokrovsky direction. An artillery system, an armored combat vehicle and three units of the occupier's vehicles were destroyed. Ukrainian defenders also caused significant damage to four artillery systems and an enemy tank. 72 enemy attacks were recorded in the Kurakhiv direction. Fourteen of them are ongoing. Mainly, fighting continues in the districts of Novoselydivka, Vovchenka, Kreminnaya Balka, Antonivka and Katerynivka. 11 times today the enemy stormed the front edge of our defense in the direction of Trudovoy in the direction of Vremivsk, two attacks are ongoing. The enemy unsuccessfully tried three times to attack the positions of the Ukrainian defenders in the Dnieper direction. The Defense Forces of Ukraine continue the operation in the Kursk direction.

Title: Rocketman Kim's intercontinental antics: what is known about the ballistic missile he plans to launc...
Description: As informs the Army Recognition portal, intelligence received during a confidential briefing indicates that North Korea has completed preparations for a nuclear test at its Punggyeri test site, with a special equipment and launchers, probably for the launch of an intercontinental ballistic missile designed to demonstrate atmospheric reentry capabilities. As the authors of the portal note, the leader of North Korea, Kim Jong-un, has been increasing his show of force in recent months, accelerating missile tests and opening a secret military enterprise for the production of uranium in September. According to South Korean intelligence, North Korea has deployed a mobile launcher, likely the 12-axis model recently shown in state media, to launch intercontinental ballistic missiles that could potentially reach the US territory. The move comes in line with South Korean President Yoon Suk-yeol's warnings that Pyongyang could stage major military provocations around the US election to pressure Washington and its allies. The ICBM, probably the Hwasong-18 or a similar missile, will check durability of atmospheric re-entry technology, which is critical for the warhead to withstand the extreme heat and friction en route to the target.
