While previous North Korean intercontinental ballistic missile tests have been conducted with launches at steep angles to minimize distance and avoid hitting nearby territories, analysts suggest that a more standard trajectory would represent a major advance in North Korea's missile program. Such a test would confirm North Korea's ability to target remote locations, including the US mainland. Escalating tensions on the Korean Peninsula since 2022, particularly following Russia's invasion of Ukraine, have allowed North Korea to develop its nuclear and missile programs under less international scrutiny. In this context, recent reports from the authorities of the Republic of Korea leave no doubt about Kim Jong Un's intentions to continue developing weapons of mass destruction while strengthening alliances with states outside the Western sphere, such as Russia. For decades, North Korea has developed a nuclear capability to increase deterrence against perceived threats. Relying on asymmetric weapons strategies to offset the limitations of its conventional forces, Pyongyang has made significant progress in miniaturizing nuclear warheads and developing intercontinental ballistic missiles such as the Hwasong-14 and Hwasong-15 models. These capabilities position North Korea as a nuclear power capable of striking the United States, thereby increasing geopolitical pressure on the United States and its allies. As North Korea occupies a strategic position, the US and its regional allies continue to closely monitor these preparations to anticipate any potential threat. -The possibility of nuclear tests and the launch of intercontinental ballistic missiles during the election period in the United States creates an atmosphere of uncertainty, emphasizing the importance of maintaining international vigilance,- the authors of the article summarize. The launch of the North Korean intercontinental ballistic missile Hwasong-18. Video: KCNA

Title: About the great construction and the best servant of the soldier: why in Britain they teach the mobi...
Description: No matter how well trained and highly motivated the soldiers are, no matter how many they are, and no matter how well they are equipped with the right weapons and ammunition, the fighters will not be able to hold their positions if they are not properly equipped. The correspondent of ArmiyaInform tells about how they learn to set up individual shelters, observation and firing positions during the BZVP within the limits of the Interflex multinational training mission on the territory of Great Britain. The task of our two detachments is to occupy a circular defense in a house on the outskirts of a small settlement called Eastmere. This is one of the locations of the famous STANTA - Stanford Training Area in the county of Norfolk in the northeast of England. Based on the approximate population size by Ukrainian standards, Istmir can be called a village, because it is unlikely that more than a thousand people can live in the houses there. However, in terms of infrastructure, it is more of a town, because it even has its own hotel. Before leaving the camp for the so-called -Urban- - training in combat tactics in urban development - I had time and will be able to surf the Internet well, so I not only know the general history of the STANTA district and the town of Eastmere, but I can also navigate its streets . Eastmere was built in 1942 when, during the Second World War, the British Army needed a combat training ground to train soldiers for urban combat. It was on the territory of STANTA that soldiers were trained for combat after landing in Normandy during Operation Neptune on the famous D-Day. There are a lot of photos and videos from Eastmere Training Village on the Internet, including media publications about the recent training of Ukrainian servicemen from previous rotations. This makes it possible to recognize not only the streets and houses of the town, but even individual rooms inside the buildings. The most interesting fact turns out to be the fact that from the end of the 1960s to the mid-1970s, the famous TV series -Dad's Army- (-Dad's Army-) about the so-called Home Guard (The Home Guard), which was originally called Local Defense Volunteers (LDV). The Home Guard can be called local defense units or, in a more familiar wording for Ukrainians, territorial defense. Volunteers who could not join the army in any other way due to medical reasons or because they had professions from which specialists were exempted from conscription went to the British Terrodefense during the Second World War. Most often, the British could not join the army in any other way, except for service in the Home Guard, because they were older than the mobilization age. Hence the title of the series -Dad's Army-, which jokingly plays on the age of the volunteers, most of whom are over 50 years old, while others are not supposed to serve for medical reasons or because of their civilian profession. The TV series -Dad's Army- became extremely popular in Great Britain, having a huge impact on society and popular culture. During its run in the 1970s, it regularly drew an audience of 18 million viewers, its characters became recognizable, and many of its catchphrases became catchy. In 2000, Dad's Army was ranked thirteenth in the British Film Institute's list of the 100 Greatest British Television Programmes, and in 2004, Dad's Army was ranked fourth in the BBC's poll of the UK's best sitcom. In the end, the extraordinary popularity of the series prompted the British in 2016 to make a full-length film -Dad's Army-. After reading about STANTA and -Dad's Army-, you involuntarily begin to associate yourself with the heroes of the series and British soldiers of the Second World War. So when we finally get to the town of Eastmere, its modern look is somewhat surprising, because we expected to see something from the 80s. But no, Eastmere has been renovated, updated and partially rebuilt. The middle of the last century is evidenced only by the rusty skeleton of an armored car left in the backyard of a city hotel. It has such an ancient appearance that it appears to be a message not even from the Second World War, but from the even earlier First World War. It is the two-story hotel building that our second and fourth units are to protect, while the first and third units are set up in the house across the street. There are a lot of rooms on two floors and in the solid basement of the hotel, so there are two fighters for each position. We are given the task of setting up observation and firing positions in a limited time and with the means at hand in such a way as to be able to repel the training assault that will be carried out by the instructors. Time is short, so we get to work right away and work non-stop right up to the deadline. I am lucky to work with -The Chinese- - he is younger than me and has some experience in military training, so he can orient himself better and faster than me. I myself am more useful in earthworks - rural childhood and the experience of archaeological expeditions are in evidence, but I feel less confident in urban development and with building materials. Our building material is bulky and inconvenient to carry wooden pallets, heavy sandbags and heavy clumsy stone building blocks, much larger in size than the standard bricks we are used to. We also find some fragments of metal structures, boards, netting - everything goes. Our -big construction- continues, the outskirts of Istmir have turned into an anthill, on the streets of which dozens of soldiers in pixels are dreaming, dragging everything that will help to set up positions. Our unit continues to work even when some fighters from neighboring platoons have long since finished their work and are resting. Only after the deadline, when the instructors are already leaving to evaluate our work, -The Chinese- and I have time to run around and inspect the work of our brothers and sisters. The quality is impressive, and -Grandfather- and his partner actually managed to build a real -Great Wall of China- - an impenetrable barricade. -Grandfather- in civilian life is a builder, so he knows what he's doing. The instructors praise our unit, and our position thanks to the -Chinese- is one of the best - comfortable, well protected, with a good field of view and firing. Instructor -Thomas- gets into position with the machine gun and nods his head approvingly - we did a good job. Then, when we go to inspect the positions of neighboring platoons, we will see positions that are even better than ours, and, unfortunately, significantly worse positions. Those who completed the work much earlier than us did it precisely because they neglected their own safety and built the fortifications badly. While we are visiting the neighbors, I remember the world-famous tale of the three little pigs, which, by the way, originally originated in England and goes back to the depths of folk folklore of the Middle Ages. The first piglet made a house out of straw. But the evil wolf blew - and the lightweight straw weaving flew behind the wind. The second piglet made a house out of branches, sticks and verbolos. However, the predatory beast tensed up - and destroyed the shaky weaving of the mouth. And only the third piglet built a real tenement with strong walls. So no matter how much the attacker tried to break his fortress, he could not even move a single brick or move even a single pebble. The third pig stubbornly struggled, while his fellows, hastily making a shelter out of straw and sticks, rested, played, sang and danced and passed the time in every other way. However, later, when it came to the fight with the enemy, it turned out that only the house of the third piglet was able to reliably protect the inhabitant. Instead, the straw and adobe -fortifications- crumbled to pieces at the slightest enemy pressure. The instructors do not read us notations, they only silently pay attention to certain shortcomings that are obvious even without their prompts. Only later, already during other classes, one or the other of them make small remarks, from the combination of which a simple but important moral emerges: -A good soldier always takes care of himself, his safety and his comfort. After all, how well he feels, how well rested, how safe and comfortable his shelter and position are, directly depends on both his survival and the performance of the combat mission. A soldier has no servants to do everything for him. He is his own best servant, who can and should take care of himself in the best possible way. So never be lazy, because your life depends on your work.-

Title: The battle for the White House: what is known about the strategic communications of Kamala Harris an...
Description: Donald Trump's election campaign is built on the images of a -savior of the common people- and a national hero. His communication strategy is to consistently emphasize Trump's role as the only defender of citizens against the -system.- His slogan is-They didn't come for me, they came for you. I'm just standing in their way- resonates with thousands of American citizens, especially among supporters of the Republican Party. The key theses of Donald Trump's campaign are collected in Agenda 47, which includes ten priorities and twenty promises focused on the security and financial well-being of Americans. Trump's staff has made extensive use of micro-targeting, attracting support among specific groups such as parents, veterans and athletes through promises addressed to each audience separately. Opinion leaders are another important tool during election campaigns. As of today, 49 celebrities, including Elon Musk, Mel Gibson, Tucker Carlson, Kanye West and Fifty Cent, have expressed their support for Donald Trump. This greatly strengthens his position among voters, for whom the opinion of these people is authoritative. In response to Donald Trump's hero image, Kamala Harris' staff chose the archetype of a leader who faithfully serves the country and leads it to change. Her campaign builds on Harris' previous experience as vice president of the United States and California attorney general, emphasizing her accomplishments and work already done. The main audience of Kamala Harris' information campaign is middle-class citizens. In its strategy, it relies on the support of such famous persons as Arnold Schwarzenegger, Jimmy Carter, Barack and Michelle Obama, Eminem and Taylor Swift. In total, she was supported by 81 famous people, which is a significant advantage for attracting the attention and trust of voters. The information campaigns of both candidates were also influenced by the publication of -Project 2025- by the think tank -Heritage Foundation-, which highlights the potential first steps of Donald Trump if he wins the election. The project has become a sensation and has caused concern among many US citizens, as its recommendations are considered a threat to democracy and civil rights. Donald Trump distanced himself from the project. At the same time, Kamala Harris began to use it as a tool for conducting -offensive actions-, forcing Trump to take a reactive position. Donald Trump and Kamala Harris' strategic communications show consistency and a clear structure. Both candidates go to great lengths to maintain their chosen image and to maintain the tone of their own brand. Kamala Harris is benefiting from the powerful support of opinion leaders, as well as the effect of the sensational release of -Project 2025-, which significantly increases her chances of winning the presidential election. At the same time, time and circumstances leave room for change, which adds uncertainty to the race for the White House. Author: Serafim Sych for ArmiyaInform

Title: The heart of a soldier of the Armed Forces for $70,000: Russians on the darknet are lying about -bla...
Description: But as informs the Countering Disinformation Center, these messages are part of a long-running campaign by enemy propagandists, known as Black Transplantology. It dates back to 2014. Its main goal is to discredit the Ukrainian military and political leadership and to create a negative image of Ukraine on the international stage. This fake also works as a tool of psychological warfare, causing distrust in the Ukrainian authorities, speculating on emotionally complex topics and creating an image of the Ukrainian military as -victims of the system- rather than Russian aggression. The manipulation is aimed at destabilizing Ukrainian society and weakening the country's support from the international community. Propaganda often uses similar disinformation tactics to tarnish Ukraine's reputation as a corrupt state with a disregard for human rights. Ukraine, on the contrary, always adheres to international norms of humanitarian law and ensures proper treatment of fallen soldiers, strictly fulfilling international obligations.

Title: During the day, the enemy made 266 strikes on 10 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region
Description: About this informs the head of Zaporizhzhya OVA Ivan Fedorov. 129 artillery shells were fired on the territory of Lobkovo, Gulyaipol, Novoandriivka, Robotyno, Mala Tokmachka, Malynyvka, Novodarivka, and Preobrazhenka. 6 reports were received about the destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure facilities. Civilians were not injured. We remind you that law enforcement documented the consequences of enemy shelling in the Kharkiv region .

Title: The occupiers attacked Bilozerka in the Kherson region
Description: About this informs the head of Kherson OVA Oleksandr Prokudin. People have mine-explosive and craniocerebral injuries, contusions. The paramedic also received a shrapnel wound to the leg. The men were taken to the hospital for medical assistance. An ambulance was also damaged as a result of the attack. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that the Russians strengthened the countersubversion regime in Berdyansk .

Title: the Russians strengthened the countersubversive regime in Berdyansk
Description: This is reported by the Center of National resistance After successful damage to the infrastructure of the port, the occupiers looked for gunners among the residents of the surrounding houses, because the enemy did not understand that every Ukrainian in the temporarily occupied territories helps to liberate his native land. Also, in the port area, the number of checks of cars and passers-by has increased, the occupiers pay special attention to phones and the presence of Russian passports. Earlier ArmyInform reported that the occupiers are preparing to the holding of the -People's Unity- propaganda holiday.

Title: Law enforcement officers documented the consequences of enemy shelling in the Kharkiv region
Description: reports this by the Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office. According to the investigation, on November 2, around 11:00 p.m., Russian troops launched an airstrike on the city of Chuguiv. The auxiliary building of the educational institution was damaged. Fortunately, there were no casualties. Previously, the attack on the city was carried out by the hybrid ammunition -Thunder-. On November 3, at approximately 1:10 a.m., Russian troops attacked the village with two drones. Makaryh of Zolochivska OTG of Bogoduhiv district. The premises of the agricultural enterprise were damaged. Also today at approximately 5:20 am, the enemy shelled the village of Kupyansk-Vuzlovy. Private homes were damaged. Prosecutors and police investigators are taking all possible and appropriate measures to document war crimes committed by the Russian military. Previously ArmyInform reported that the Russians are looking for any underground shelters to hide from drones.

Title: During the day, the enemy's terror of Nikopol continued
Description: About this informs the head of Dnipropetrovsk OVA Serhiy Lysak. The communities of Nikopol, Marganetska and Pokrovska were under attack. It did not pass without consequences. A private building caught fire due to shelling. The fire was extinguished. The administration building of the sanatorium, a dozen houses, three outbuildings, and the same number of greenhouses were mutilated. Power lines were also damaged. People were not affected. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that DSST discovered and destroyed 1,404 explosive objects in a week.

Title: Knowledge, fire and creativity - this is how frontier engineers work on the front lines
Description: The story of the fighter was made public by the State Border Service of Ukraine. Today, he puts his technical skills to work and lays mines to counter the enemy. His commander with the call sign -Agent- confirms that engineering specialists are always in demand - both demining for protection and demining for security are needed. Previously ArmyInform reported that the Russians began to actively use aviation on Luhansk Region

Title: There is no public transport or heating at the TOT of Luhansk region
Description: This reports the head of Luhansk OVA Artem Lysogor. Adding to the problems is the lack of public transport, due to which the trip to the kindergarten takes about an hour on average. A month ago, in Aydar (formerly Novopskov), with the support of builders from Voronezh, an updated -multifunctional center for the provision of public services- was opened. Active hostilities and destruction bypassed this settlement. Nevertheless, the reconstruction and opening made an event of national scale. However, customers are accepted there on a first-come, first-served basis. Because the Russians did not implement electronic recording in Aydar. We would like to remind you that in 2018, a modern European-level medical center with an electronic queue and new software for this area was opened in Novopskov. The institution worked until the occupation of the village. But Russia has always liked to stand in line. Even by civilization. Earlier ArmyInform reported that the occupiers are preparing to the holding of the -People's Unity- propaganda holiday.

Title: An army of burrows and cellars - the Russians are looking for any underground shelters to hide from ...
Description: Andrii Polukhin, a soldier of the 24th mechanized brigade named after King Danylo, told about this in the ArmyTV stream. -The enemy is using small infantry groups to storm our positions in order to cross the canal. The attacks of the Russians are more like the work of the DRG, when the enemy tries to get unnoticed either to the rear of our positions or close to them, climb into some hole or basement and try to accumulate. But our pilots quickly find such holes and cellars and try to destroy them,- Andriy Polukhin said. . According to him, the situation is difficult and tense, the enemy continues to attack. (video from 50:05) As reported by ArmyInform, sappers of the 24th mechanized brigade named after King Danylo help destroy the enemy with the help of mines and engineering barriers.

Title: Liptsi at a height: the main goal of the enemy is to hit Kharkiv with direct aim
Description: A representative of the public relations service of the -Charter- brigade told about this on the broadcast of the -Suspilne Novosti- marathon - Sergeant Volodymyr Degtyarev of the National Guard of Ukraine. -The main place they are trying to capture in our zone is Liptsi, a village in the north of Kharkiv Oblast, which is located at a height from where it is possible to shell Kharkiv with barrel artillery with almost direct fire,- he said. In May, the enemy offensive was stopped at the approaches to this important village. — When we entered Kharkiv Oblast in May and began to repulse the offensive and stop the front, which was already moving back, we met them on the outskirts of Liptsi, and our fighters engaged in shooting battles right there in the city, — reported the representative of -Charter-. Then the guards, together with the adjacent units and units, managed not only to stop the enemy, but also to repel the enemy. -During these months, we managed to push them back several kilometers, occupy this commanding height and continue to move on,- said the soldier. However, the enemy did not give up his initial intentions. — However, of course, Liptsi and Kharkiv are their main goals in this direction. We can see this, in particular, by the way they shell Kharkiv every day from tactical aircraft, in particular with anti-aircraft missiles, where their target is simply civilian infrastructure, - said Volodymyr Degtyarov. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that as a result of Russian shelling of populated areas points of the Kharkiv region last day people were injured, livestock died.

Title: Underground helps destroy the enemy
Description: About this informs the Center of National Resistance. Crimea, Kherson region, Zaporizhzhia, Luhansk or Donetsk regions - it doesn't matter, the enemy will be destroyed. Thanks to high-precision weapons, enemy equipment is burning in Skadovsk, Berdyansk, Donetsk and Luhansk. Behind every strike is the titanic work of the underground, which helps to identify the positions of the occupiers and reports on the consequences of the strikes. Each strike complicates the logistics of the occupiers, which affects the intensity of hostilities. Earlier, ArmyInform reported , that the assets of the Russian Federation are at the service of the EU: frozen and ready for use.

Title: In the Kurakhiv direction, the enemy practices daily mechanized assaults, — press officer 79 ODSHBr ...
Description: About on the air of the national telethon -Yedini Novyni-, said press officer of the 79th ODSHBr Orest Drymalovskyi. -The Russians involve a wide variety of equipment. These are tanks, MTLB and various armored vehicles. Constant pressure. However, our paratroopers give the occupiers a ``warm welcome''. Just yesterday, one of the enemy attacks ended for the invaders with the loss of three BBMs at once, which were eliminated along with the landing party,- said the press officer. Summing up this week's combat results, the officer recalled that on one of the days at the beginning of the seven-day week, the 79th paratroopers burned 12 armored vehicles at once during one of the enemy assaults. -I would like to emphasize separately that during that particular attack, our anti-tankers first managed to damage, and the drone operators managed to finish off, the BMPT ``Terminator,'' praised by the Russian defense industry. This tank support combat vehicle has both powerful cannon weapons and missile systems. We hunted it for a long time and finally destroyed it,- said Orest Drymalovskyi. The press officer also noted that enemy units are actively using unmanned aerial systems for attacks and reconnaissance. In this way, the Russians are trying to find weak points in our defense. However, according to Drymalovskyi, so far such attempts are limited only by the intentions of the enemy: the Tauri paratroopers continue to hold positions in the extremely difficult Kurakhiv direction. Earlier ArmyInform reported that the occupiers are preparing to the holding of the -People's Unity- propaganda holiday.

Title: the Russians began to actively use aviation in Luhansk region
Description: This reports the head of Luhansk OVA Artem Lysogor. They tried to target the fortifications of Ukrainian defenders and populated areas. From artillery installations, they hit Zhuravka and Makiivka on Balka. The drones were directed in the direction of Makiivka. Fighting took place in the Grekivka area and in the Serebryansky forest. Our Defenders are holding their ground. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that the enemy shelled Donetsk region three times in a day: 2 people were killed.

Title: 110 attacks on the positions of the Defense Forces: the hottest on the Kurakhiv and Pokrovsky lines
Description: This is reports the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

Title: The USA financed the creation of 800 mobile fire groups in Ukraine
Description: The US Embassy in Ukraine informs about this. -I am proud that the State Department's Bureau of International Narcotics and Law Enforcement has funded 800 such groups, which have shot down more than 200 drones since January 1, 2024,- said Bridget Brink. Earlier ArmyInform reported , that the SAP system helps the Ministry of Defense control and automate supply and financing processes.

Title: DSST discovered and destroyed 1,404 explosive objects in a week
Description: This is reported by the State Special Service of Transport.

Title: The occupiers are preparing to hold a propaganda holiday -people's unity-
Description: About this informs Center of national resistance. Thus, in a number of captured schools, Ukrainian children will be given lectures by militants, with the rights of -their own veterans-. Teachers will also talk about the -friendship of enslaved peoples- in propaganda lessons (called -conversations about important things-). In addition, tourers from the Kremlin movements are preparing campaigns for placing flowers at monuments, with the involvement of local collaborators. All this will create a media picture, which will be illuminated by the pseudo-media created by the Kremlin. Previously ArmyInform reported that the four-time MMA world champion is serving in the State Security Service.

Title: More mines, fewer occupiers — Ukrainian ground drones increase payload
Description: A fighter with the call sign Istek of the 13th brigade of operational assignment of the National Guard -Charter- reported this on the ArmyTV stream. -It is very wrong to have as few measures as possible per position and per load. The drone drove in once, loaded up and went to lay mines,- Eastek said. According to him, this is far from the first modification of the drone. -We communicate well with the manufacturer, so he is constantly improving something,- Eastek said. Ground drones are engaged not only in demining, but also in logistics: they bring ammunition, food and water to places where ordinary transport cannot reach. (video from 28:45) As ArmyInform reported, during October the enemy practically did not use armored vehicles in the area of ​​responsibility of the -Charter- brigade of the National Guard of Ukraine in the north of Kharkiv region and stormed in small infantry groups.

Title: It was yours, it became ours - the marines won a Russian tank
Description: The video about the trophy was published on the brigade's page. During the enemy assault in the Kurakhiv direction in Donetsk region, fighters of the 137th Marine Infantry Battalion destroyed the enemy crew of the T-72 tank with the help of FPV drones. -With joint efforts, marines from the logistics battalion, 18 and 137 battalions organized the evacuation of the trophy tank. It will be restored, and then the Ukrainian crew will use the trophy against the occupiers!-, the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, former prisoners, and now fighters of the 35th marine infantry brigade named after Rear Admiral Mykhailo Ostrogradsky from the Shkval unit, the final stages of the training of military personnel are taking place.

Title: The occupiers once again mutilated the Kherson region: one person died and 10 were injured
Description: announces Oleksandr Prokudin, head of Kherson OVA. Zelenivka, Inzhenerne, Antonivka, Sadove, Prydniprovske, Dniprovske, Bilozerka, Stanislav, Kizomys, Tomyna Balka, Mykilske, Novodmytrivka, Berislav, Havrylivka, Tomarine, Krupytsia and the city of Kherson came under enemy fire and airstrikes last day. the Russian military targeted educational institutions, a library, a church, a post office, and shops; 5 high-rise buildings and 14 private houses were damaged in the residential quarters of the settlements of the region. The occupiers also mutilated gas pipelines, garages and private cars. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that the enemy shelled Donetsk region three times in a day: 2 people were killed.

Title: Steel and power: how a tank run-in hardens our defenders
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this.

Title: Mines for -dear guests- — under Chasov Yar they are preparing -gifts- for enemy stormtroopers
Description: The video of the sappers' work was released on November 3 on the brigade's channel. The video was released for the Day of Engineer Troops, which Ukraine celebrates on November 3. Land mining and timely installation of engineering barriers are the key to successful defense in the conditions of the steppe terrain of Donbas and the offensive of significantly superior enemy forces. In this report, you can see the combat output of sappers of the 24th brigade with the installation of TM anti-tank mines, the tensioning of non-explosive barriers, the sounds of constant shelling, archival footage and stories of soldiers. As reported by ArmyInform, the Minister of Defense congratulated military engineers on their professional holiday.

Title: Assets of the Russian Federation at the service of the EU: frozen and ready for use
Description: This is reported by Foreign Intelligence Service of Ukraine. The purpose is to cover losses related to the consideration of cases in Russian courts about the -illegality- of sanctions. In early 2023, the EU entered into an agreement with the said company, according to which 10% of the windfall from these assets is reserved for legal expenses, in particular in the event of legal actions from sanctioned parties. According to the latest data, since February 15, the company received about 3.9 billion euros from the frozen reserves of the Central Bank of Russia. -Euroclear- stated that it currently has numerous lawsuits in Russian courts regarding the cancellation of sanctions and compensation for seized assets. While Russian courts cannot compel the company to return dollar and euro assets, it risks losing its own funds held in Russian financial institutions and owned by Western institutions and companies. These companies will then have the right to make compensation claims against Euroclear. We remind you that in GUR told the Japanese about our naval drones.

Title: The Russian army is forbidden to travel - in Kurshchyna, our drones issue fiery fines to Russian vio...
Description: The video of combat work was released on November 3. Motoblocks, -loaves-, cars, motorcycles, a truck - our drones did not ignore all possible enemy vehicles. Each lesion was recorded and checked. As reported by ArmyInform, the shooter of the UA_REG TEAM unit of the Special Operations Forces of the Armed Forces scored several bloody dots in an attempt by the Russians to storm our positions.

Title: More than 10,000 soldiers and 1,500 units of equipment — enemy losses in a week
Description: This was reported by the commander of the Ground Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, Lieutenant General Oleksandr Pavliuk. According to his data, the enemy lost 10,050 occupiers and 1,550 units of weapons and military equipment in a week. Weapons/military equipment of the Russian troops suffered significant losses: — 69 tanks — 168 armored combat vehicles — 265 artillery systems — 4 anti-aircraft guns — 10 air defense systems — 600 vehicles — 42 special vehicles In addition, our defenders destroyed 4 enemy missiles and 388 UAVs promptly - tactical level. As reported by ArmyInform, last week losses of the enemy amounted to more than 10 thousand occupants, 244 BBM and 66 tanks.

Title: The enemy shelled Donetsk region three times in a day: 2 people were killed
Description: About this informs the head of Donetsk OVA Vadym Filashkin. In Pokrovsk, 4 houses and a gas pipeline were damaged. A person was injured in Myrnograd. In Ivanopil of the Kostyantynivska community, 2 people were killed, 4 private houses, a power line and a gas pipeline were damaged. In the Chasovoyarsk community, 2 high-rise buildings, 2 private houses and an industrial building were damaged. Earlier ArmyInform reported that in Kharkiv Oblast the enemy is being -helped- to dig into the other world faster.

Title: From hopelessness: whom Russians fear the most and why they surrender
Description: A representative of the public relations service of the -Charter- brigade told about this on the broadcast of the -Suspilne Novosti- marathon - Sergeant Volodymyr Degtyarev of the National Guard of Ukraine. - Almost every week we manage to capture someone from the Russians. They fear their commanders in some places more than us, he said. The military said that Russians most often surrender because of hopelessness and hoping for medical help from the Ukrainians. - It is usually rare that they surrender themselves. Most often, we create certain conditions for them when, for example, they are injured and understand that they will not receive help from their own, and then they start to show signs or go towards our soldiers, - said the guardsman. Russian servicemen of the same units who have long been in that part of the Kharkiv direction, which belongs to the area of ​​responsibility of the -Charter- brigade, are mostly captured. - Basically, these are the same units, but they have been recruiting former -convicts- for a long time, who sign a contract with the Ministry of Defense of the Russian Federation. This is a new form of the -Wagner- army, only now instead of -Wagner- they come and representatives of the Russian Ministry of Defense communicate with them, - explained Volodymyr Degtyarev. Earlier, ArmyInform reported what are -hartiyi/->October losses of the Russian occupiers in the area of ​​responsibility of the -Charter- brigade of the National Guard of Ukraine.

Title: A living rebuke to the evasioners — 60 Czechs received permission to join the Armed Forces
Description: About this informed the Czech radio spokesman for the president, Philip Platosh. Petr Pavel received a total of 181 such requests for permission to join the Armed Forces. The satisfied statements were approved by the ministries of defense, interior and foreign affairs of the Czech Republic. According to Czech law, if a Czech citizen wants to legally join the war on the side of Ukraine, he or she must first ask the president for permission to serve in foreign armed forces. Otherwise, the Czechs face criminal liability. Citizens can also retroactively apply for a service permit. As reported by ArmyInform, the Law of Ukraine was adopted, which allows foreigners and stateless persons to serve in the Armed Forces, the National Guard and the DSTU under a contract in officer positions.

Title: In the fall, the Russians were counted, but they will not be cured: the October losses of the occupi...
Description: The representative of the public relations service of the -Charter- brigade named the representative of the public relations service of the -Charter- - Sergeant Volodymyr Degtyarev of the National Guard of Ukraine. — If we look at the losses of the enemy only in the area of ​​responsibility of our brigade, we will see that we disabled up to 200 Russians. 89 of them will never see this world again, he said. Another 97 occupiers managed to be injured, and some of them also, most likely, eventually fell into the category of irreversible losses, given the extremely low level of training of enemy soldiers in tactical medicine and the almost unorganized evacuation. — Evacuation is very badly organized, there is practically no training in tactical medicine. It can be concluded that even this hundred will not survive. That is, 200 Russians were destroyed in a month - that's two full-fledged infantry companies. This is a lot, as for the section of the brigade, - remarked the soldier. Also, the representative of -Charter- reported that in October, the Guardsmen destroyed or damaged 20 units of enemy equipment, mostly cars. — Of course, this may indicate that they are preparing an accumulation, and we are ready for it, we are watching, we are preparing our anti-tank means. However, so far we can see that the ability for us to see deep and far enough thanks to drones and shoot through these roads does not allow them to use the technique, - explained Volodymyr Degtyarev. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in Kharkiv Oblast, the enemy intensively spends manpower, but saves military equipment.

Title: The defense forces repelled 173 enemy attacks during the day — the General Staff of the Armed Forces...
Description: Operational information was published by as of 08.00 on November 3 General Staff of the Armed Forces. The aggressor carried out airstrikes, in particular in the areas of Yunakivka, Zhuravka, Basivka settlements of the Sumy region; Slatine, Kozacha Lopan, Mali Prohody, Pishchane, Sinkivka, Golubivka, Terny of the Kharkiv region; Toretsk, Kurakhove, Illinka, Uspenivka, Bogoyavlenka, Maksimivka, Velika Novosilka of the Donetsk region, Lobkovo, Novodaryevka, Mala Tokmachka, Yurkivka of the Zaporizhia region. Over the past day, aviation, missile forces and artillery of the Defense Forces hit six areas of concentration of personnel, weapons and military equipment, one artillery vehicle in a firing position and two ammunition depots of the invaders. With the support of aviation in the Kharkiv direction, the enemy stormed eight times in the area of ​​the settlement of Vovchansk. There were 13 attacks by the occupiers in the Kupyansk direction during the day. The defense forces repelled enemy assaults near Pischany, Zagryzovy, Petropavlivka, Zeleny Gay, Kruglyakivka, Kolisnykyvka, and Lozova. The enemy attacked 14 times in the Lyman direction. He tried to penetrate our defenses near Grekivka, Terni, Yampolivka, Torsky and in Serebryansk Forest. In addition, the enemy actively used aviation, used 30 unguided missiles and dropped 6 anti-aircraft missiles. During the day, the enemy carried out seven offensive operations in the Ivano-Daryivka and Vyimka areas in the Siverskyi direction. In the Kramatorsk direction, the occupiers attacked once in the area of ​​Predtechyny. In the direction of Toretsk, the enemy, supported by aviation, carried out eight attacks near Toretsk and Shcherbinivka. Most of the enemy's attacks were directed at Toretsk. In the Pokrovsky direction, our defenders stopped 23 offensive actions of the aggressor towards the settlements of Mykolaivka, Promin, Krutiy Yar, Selidove, Sukha Balka, Myrolyubivka, Suhiy Yar, Krutiy Yar and Novogrodivka. In the Kurakhiv direction, the Defense Forces repelled 51 attacks. The occupiers most actively tried to advance in the areas of the settlements of Illinka, Novoselidivka, Novodmytrivka, Gostre, Maksimilianivka, Antonivka, Kostiantynivka, Kreminna Balka, and Katerynivka. In the Vremivsk direction, the enemy carried out 12 assaults on our positions in the area of ​​Trudovoy and Maksimivka. Actively involving aviation, the enemy attacked in the area of ​​Novoandriivka, Robotyny, and Mala Tokmachka in the Orihiv direction. In the Dnieper direction, our troops repulsed three enemy attacks in the areas of the Cossack Camps, the Dnieper and the Cossack Island, the enemy was unsuccessful. No signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected in the Volyn and Poliske directions. On the border with the Chernihiv and Sumy regions, the enemy from the territory of the Russian Federation is actively using artillery and aviation in the areas of Ukrainian settlements. The operation is ongoing in the Kursk region. Our soldiers inflict significant losses in manpower and equipment on the occupying forces and actively undermine the offensive potential of the enemy in the rear. In general, the Russian invaders lost 1,410 people last day. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 12 tanks, 36 armored combat vehicles, 10 artillery systems, 70 operational-tactical UAVs, 1 cruise missile, 46 cars and a unit of special equipment of the occupiers. As reported by ArmyInform, the General Staff of the Armed Forces marked the soldiers of 5 brigades.

Title: The SAP system helps the Ministry of Defense to control and automate the processes of procurement, s...
Description: About this in the interview Youtube channel The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine was told by Oksana Ferchuk, adviser to the Minister of Defense of Ukraine on logistics and IT. She reminded that SAP is the leading international system in the field of resource management, which is used by 28 NATO countries. This program was provided to the Armed Forces of Ukraine by colleagues from the USA and specially adapted for our country. The system automates supply processes, generates information about the balance in warehouses, orders, allows you to see the real need, procure and provide the army with everything necessary on time. About 240 large Ukrainian companies use SAP software to control and allocate their resources. -SAP is the digital core and will help us provide the most modern defense resource management process and is an integrated solution with other systems,- said Oksana Ferchuk. Also, thanks to SAP, control over the supply and accounting of weapons and military equipment at the main bases was automated. This also applies to spare parts for equipment that we receive as part of international technical assistance. According to Oksana Ferchuk, this system is implemented by a joint team with the General Staff and the command of the Logistics Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. And now it is already used in 600 military units in the directions of 6 security services. -The result of the final implementation of the system should be the full automation of logistics processes and the complete rejection of paper document flow in logistics operations,- concluded Oksana Ferchuk, adviser to the Minister of Defense on digital development, digital transformations and digitization. As reported by ArmiyaInform, the IT coalition since its creation in September 2023 accumulated 157 million euros to support Ukraine.

Title: 18 enemy ships were hit - the GUR told the Japanese about our naval drones
Description: This was reported by the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense on November 3. In the material about the newest Ukrainian weapon for combating enemy ships and other purposes, its technical characteristics are described: length 5.5 meters, speed over 80 kilometers per hour, payload - 250 kilograms. The Ukrainian MAGURA is recognized as the most effective naval attack drone: during the full-scale invasion of Russia, with the help of this weapon, the soldiers of the GUR of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine successfully hit 18 Russian ships, 9 of which were completely destroyed. -I have never seen such a fast drone as MAGURA,- said the Thirteenth. He added that it is very important for Ukraine to continue the development of unique and technological weapons, including unmanned ones, as well as to strengthen the military-industrial complex in general. -We are progressing with the development of new weapons and achieving results. As hostilities continue, it is very important to be independent, and not only rely on the support of other countries,- said the intelligence officer. As reported by ArmiyaInform, Kyrylo Budanov exchanged experience of combat operations with veteran generals of the US Army.

Title: The ground is freezing: in the Kharkiv region, the enemy is being -helped- to dig deeper into the ot...
Description: A representative of the public relations service of the -Charter- brigade told about this on the air of the -Suspilne Novosti- marathon - Sergeant Volodymyr Degtyarev of the National Guard of Ukraine. - The situation is difficult. The enemy is trying to continue to take advantage of deteriorating weather or low cloud cover to advance and build up in small groups, he said. At the same time, the Russian invaders are trying to gain a more reliable foothold on the borders they have already captured. — In principle, we can say that winter has already come, there are very few leaves left, the ground is beginning to freeze and, of course, this is felt by the enemy, who is in a hurry to strengthen somehow, especially in those areas north of Liptsi, north of Kharkiv, which we actively attacking, said the military. He reminded that the enemy's actions are influenced by the threat of continuation of the recent successful Ukrainian offensive in this area. -The enemy understands that our possible actions may be related to the further advance and is trying to bring down their rigging groups in order to prepare for the winter,- the spokesman explained. The defense forces actively oppose the attempts of the Russians to reliably fortify and prepare for the winter. - We, in turn, are actively working to prevent this, in particular, with the work of our night drones, our large vampire drones. They are used to bombard their fortifications at night, Volodymyr Degtyarov said. He said that during October alone, -Charter- guardsmen destroyed or damaged more than 240 enemy shelters in the brigade's area of ​​responsibility. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in Kharkiv Oblast, the enemy intensively spends manpower - a third of the occupiers' personnel losses are permanently irreversible, but spares military equipment.

Title: A French kiss with a bomb — our pilots buried Russian drones
Description: The video of the hit was released on the ArmyTV stream. The strike was made by a MiG-29 aircraft, the French bomb showed good accuracy. AASM HAMMER is an ordinary free-falling bomb to which an engine and a guidance unit were attached, due to which it became a -smart- bomb that can hit targets at given coordinates. (video from 0:40) As reported by ArmyInform, former DJ Hryhoriy prepared already over a thousand air bombs and missiles on the heads of the Russians.

Title: She hit with her fists, now she hits with drones - the four-time MMA world champion serves in the DS...
Description: The video about the defender was made public on the brigade's channel. Fights in Miami and Thailand, expensive parties, prestigious tournaments, successful career. Phoenix left all this for the sake of the trenches of Donetsk region, where she had already achieved a lot. Now on her account are not sports awards, but dozens of burned Russian tanks, armored personnel carriers, BMP, liquidated enemy infantry. She mastered FPV in a matter of weeks - without any additional courses, but with a great desire to protect her home, her state. She does not lack motivation. She knows why and for whom she walks this way. And she knows that her path is the right one. -If I hadn't gone to the front, I would have betrayed myself,- says Fenix. ArmyInform talked about day at the position of the 79th brigade of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, which holds the Kurakhiv direction.

Title: A third are permanently irreversible: in the Kharkiv region, the enemy is wasting manpower and savin...
Description: Details of the situation in the Kharkiv direction and enemy losses were informed at Kharkiv OTU. During the past day, the enemy stormed eight times in the area of ​​the settlement of Vovchansk. the Russian occupiers carried out 8 airstrikes using 18 guided aerial bombs and 19 kamikaze drone strikes, carried out 266 attacks on the positions of the defenders of Ukraine. The defense forces respond adequately to the actions of the enemy and continue to effectively destroy the manpower, weapons and military equipment of the Russian occupiers. The enemy lost 120 lives over the past day, of which 42 were irretrievable, 77 were sanitary, and 1 were captured. Also the enemy lost 25 units of weapons and military equipment destroyed and damaged, in particular: In addition, in the north of Kharkiv Oblast, the Defense Forces of Ukraine destroyed 37 personnel shelters, an ammunition storage area, and a UAV control post. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that as a result of Russian shelling of populated areas points of the Kharkiv region last day people were injured, livestock died.

Title: From a lawyer to an artilleryman — how a lawyer received the Silver Cross
Description: On November 3, the Sumy Regional Military Administration announced about the defender. Before the beginning of the large-scale invasion, the man from Sumy worked as a lawyer, and in April 2022 he voluntarily mobilized to the ranks of the Armed Forces to defend his hometown and the state. Bohdan was awarded the medal -For Military Service to Ukraine- from the President of Ukraine and the -Silver Cross- from the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine for the successful performance of combat missions. As reported by ArmyInform, the President of Ukraine set a new date for Missile Day troops and artillery.

Title: 66 enemy UAVs and an х-59/69 missile were shot down — Air Force
Description: The Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported this on the morning of November 3. The air attack was repulsed by anti-aircraft missile forces, aviation, electronic warfare units, mobile fire groups of the Air Force and the Defense Forces of Ukraine. As of 09:00, the downing of the Kh-59/69 guided air missile and 66 enemy UAVs in Kyiv, Sumy, Khmelnytskyi, Zhytomyr, Cherkasy, Chernihiv, Kirovohrad, Poltava, Dnipropetrovsk and Kharkiv regions was confirmed. 27 enemy drones were lost in location, 1 UAV flew to Belarus. -There are two attack UAVs in the air. Combat work continues! The information is being clarified and updated,- the Air Force said in a statement. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Air Force explained about -locationally lost- enemy UAVs.

Title: Kharkiv region under Russian UAV strikes: people injured, livestock killed
Description: informed about the consequences of shelling Bily Kolodyaz of the Vovchan community. Two civilian men aged 60 and 33 were injured as a result of a drone hitting a car. The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office reported that the occupiers attacked the car with an FPV drone, both men were stabbed. The occupiers also shelled the city of Chuguiv. As a result of the impact, the glazing of the auxiliary building of the educational institution was damaged. In the Bohodukhiv district, the farm of an agricultural enterprise in the village of Makaryha of the Zolochiv community was hit by an enemy attack. The Main Department of the National Emergency Service of Ukraine in the Kharkiv region reported that two calves were killed as a result of strikes by Russian drones , the farm buildings were partially destroyed, there was a fire on an area of ​​more than 50 square meters. Also, in the Zolochiv community of the Bogodukhiv region, the Russians struck the territory of the field between the villages of Baranivka and Snihy. In the Kupyansk district, the Russian occupiers shelled the urban-type settlement Kupyansk-Vuzlovy. Information about the victims and destruction is being clarified. There were 13 attacks by occupiers in the Kupyansk direction during the day. The defense forces repelled enemy assaults near Pischany, Zagryzovy, Petropavlivka, Zeleny Gay, Kruglyakivka, Kolisnykyvka, and Lozova. With the support of aviation in the Kharkiv direction, the enemy stormed eight times in the area of ​​the settlement of Vovchansk. As a result of intensifying evacuation measures, 77 people (among them 2 children) were evacuated from the Kupyanskyi and Borivskyi directions during the day. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that occupiers strengthened shelling of Kharkiv Oblast.

Title: To burn under the tricolor - the Russians attached their flags to the equipment, but they could not ...
Description: The video of the battle was released on November 3 on the channel of the 109th Mountain Assault Battalion. Artillery, -Stugna- ATGM, and drones worked against the enemy. -Thanks to the coordinated work of our artillerymen, ATGMs, reconnaissance and drones, the approach of the enemy was detected in time, and his assault groups were stopped on the approaches to the positions. As a result of the battle, 6 tanks and 9 BMPs were destroyed, the enemy suffered losses in manpower: 19 were eliminated, 23 were wounded. The rest of the losses are being clarified. Our defenders have no casualties,- the battalion commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, a Russian armored vehicle stormed the positions of the 10th mountain assault brigade -Edelweiss-, burned together with the landing party.

Title: The Air Force assured that the transfer of their people to the infantry does not reduce the percenta...
Description: Yuriy Ignat expressed his position in a post on his own page. /a> -Yes, I confirm, they are directing! Not from the good times... and a lot, and it is very painful for PS of that direction. And, of course, this affects the overall picture in a certain way. But there are appropriate decisions, we have to implement them, and you understand why!- - said Yuriy Ignat. He assured that the percentage of -martyrs- killed has not decreased at all, as evidenced by daily official reports. Therefore, the lie about being beaten less is obvious. -Better explain, Maryana, how, being an active member of the specialized committee for so long, it was possible to fail the most important things - mobilization and motivation, so that it came to the point that people from aviation, air defense and medics were sent to the front?! Look in the mirror, Maryana, you can see everything there!-, Yuriy Ignat turned to the People's Deputy. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Air Force explained about -locationally lost- enemy UAVs. ​

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , I decree: to start holding a nationwide minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, to be announced in all mass media regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: Kalich regiments - the Russians force the wounded to go into battle
Description: Maksym Bilousov, the head of the communications department of the 60th mechanized brigade, told about this in the ArmyTV stream. He was commenting on a video in which the pilots of the brigade fighting in the Lyman direction hit Russian attack aircraft heading towards our positions with FPV drone strikes. -I think that these comrades will replenish the Russian Kalich regiments.- Recently, we saw a conversation with a Russian man who said that he was concussed, he doesn't understand what to do, and he is being sent to storm,- Maksym Bilousov said. According to him, the accuracy of the brigade's drones is largely due to the fact that the boys used to play a lot of computer games. -On the video, the Russians were lying down and pretending to be dead in the hope that they would not be seen. And our boys see very well. Before that, they played computer games and are very good at using a joystick. Therefore, there is no problem for them to hit,- Maksym Bilousov said. (video from 14:05) As reported by ArmyInform, mortars of the 60th mechanized brigade demonstrated unique accuracy when working on enemy attack aircraft.

Title: I congratulate the military engineers on their professional holiday! — Rustem Umerov
Description: The greeting was posted on the page of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. -Every day you are entrusted with extremely important tasks, which are the basis for a successful offensive and defense. It is thanks to you that engineering reconnaissance of the enemy and the terrain is carried out, reliable fortifications, bridges and crossings are built. You lay safe paths through minefields, remove obstacles, clear debris, ensuring the preparation of bridgeheads for the actions of the Defense Forces. Thank you for your courage, dedication and daily service in the most difficult conditions. Eternal memory to those who gave their lives for our freedom and independence. Glory to Ukraine!- wrote Rustem Umyerov. A special video was prepared for the Engineer Forces Day, which tells about their contribution to the defense of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense prepares for logistical challenges in extremely difficult weather conditions

Title: - Molded from shit and sticks - - the Air Force explained about - locationally lost - enemy UAVs
Description: The head of the service explained the situation in his post of public relations of the Air Force Command of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Colonel Yuriy Ignat. -I'll explain again - together with the Shaheds, for the second month in a row, something else is flying, made, as they say, -of shit and sticks-, which we call -UAV of an unspecified type- in our reports. Half of them are labeled as -locationally lost,- Yuriy Ignat wrote. As reported by ArmyInform, on the night of November 2, 2024, the enemy -syly-ppo-znyshhyly-bilshu-chastynu/->strike with 71 attack UAVs of the Shahed type and drones of an unspecified type from the directions Orel, Kursk — Russian Federation. 21 UAVs were lost in location.

Title: More than 1,400 soldiers and 12 tanks — the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine announced t...
Description: Total combat losses of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 03.11.24 were made public General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. They are approximately: The data is being refined… As reported by ArmyInform, the General Staff of the Armed Forces honored the soldiers of 5 brigades.

Title: The enemy took one ship with 4 calibers into the Black Sea
Description: This was notified by the Naval Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. There are no enemy ships in the Sea of ​​Azov. There is 1 enemy ship in the Mediterranean Sea, which is a carrier of -Caliber- cruise missiles with a total firing of up to 8 missiles. During the day, in the interests of the Russian Federation, passage through the Kerch Strait was carried out: to the Black Sea - 5 ships, of which 2 continued their movement in the direction of the Bosphorus Strait; to the Sea of ​​Azov - 7 ships, of which 1 was moving from the Bosphorus Strait. Russia continues to violate the International Convention for the Safety of Life at Sea of ​​1974 (SOLAS) by disabling automatic identification systems. As ArmiyaInform reported, the Navy of the Armed Forces liquidated more than 2.5 thousand Russian military personnel.

Title: From the BMP to the grave - hunters showed a typical life cycle of a Russian attack aircraft
Description: The video of the combat work was published on the brigade's channel. First, our pilots immobilized the Russian BMP with the landing party. As the Russians began to disperse, the FPV drones went to work on them. One of the Russians turned out to be quite quick and managed to run far away through the sunflower field. But the drone caught up with him. Then the Russian attacked our -efpevishka- with his machine gun. And he was able to knock her down at the cost of his own life. -Moscalyka, remember - you will run away from the drone, you will die tired!- - commented on the video in the mouth. As reported by ArmyInform, interesting behavior of the Russian attack aircraft was recorded by fighters of the -Shershni Dovbush- strike drone company of the 68th Oleksa Dovbush hunting brigade.

Title: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine honored the soldiers of 5 brigades
Description: Operational information as of 22.00 on November 2 was published by the General Staff of the ZSU. Ukrainian defenders continue to resolutely repulse the enemy's attempts to advance deep into our territory, inflict effective fire damage on him, exhausting him along the entire front line. In total, 167 combat clashes took place since the beginning of this day. The Russian invaders launched one missile and 56 air strikes on the territory of Ukraine, using one guided missile and 81 anti-aircraft missiles. In addition, the Russians used 437 kamikaze drones to destroy them and fired more than 3,000 shots at the positions of our troops and populated areas. In the Kharkiv direction, our troops repelled 8 enemy attacks in the Vovchansk and Gatysh areas — 7 attacks were repelled, 1 more attack is ongoing, the situation is under control. In the Kupyansk direction, the enemy stormed the positions of our defenders 13 times in the areas of Pischany, Zagryzovy, Petropavlivka, Zeleny Gayu, Kruglyakivka, Kolisnykyvka, and Lozova. Ukrainian defenders repelled seven attacks, six more are currently underway. In the Lyman direction, Russian invaders attacked Ukrainian positions 16 times during the day near Grekivka, Terni, Yampolivka, Torsky and Serebryansky forests. There are currently two battles going on. In addition, the enemy actively used aviation, carrying out twenty-four airstrikes with unguided missiles. During the day, the enemy carried out seven offensive operations in the Ivano-Daryivka and Vyimka areas in the Siverskyi direction. In the Kramatorsk direction, one combat clash was recorded near Predtechyny, which was successfully repulsed by our defenders. Having dropped three guided aerial bombs in the direction of Toretsk, the Russians attacked the positions of the defense forces eight times. The occupiers concentrated their main offensive efforts near the settlements of Toretsk and Shcherbynivka. Currently, one combat clash continues. Since the beginning of this day, in the Pokrovsky direction, the Russians have tried 11 times to break through our defense near the settlements of Mykolaivka, Promin, Krutiy Yar, Selidove and Vyshneve. One battle is still ongoing near Krutoy Yar. The enemy is suffering significant losses - today 229 occupiers were neutralized in this direction, 87 of them - irreversibly. Two tanks and two BMPs of the enemy were also destroyed. In the Kurakhiv direction, the enemy is also active - 51 times attacked our positions near the settlements of Illinka, Novoselidivka, Novodmytrivka, Gostre, Maksimilianivka, Antonivka, Kostyantynivka and Katerynivka, nine battles - continuing. According to updated information, 180 occupants were neutralized, 66 of them – irreversibly, in addition, one vehicle was destroyed and two armored fighting vehicles and one artillery system were damaged. In the Vremivsk direction, the invaders carried out 14 offensive actions near Trudovoy and Maksimivka. Four clashes are still ongoing. The enemy carried out an airstrike in the areas of Novodar'ivka, Bogoyavlenka, Maksimivka and Velika Novosilka, dropping six anti-aircraft missiles and using 30 anti-aircraft missiles. In the Orihiv direction, our troops repelled 4 enemy attacks near Novoandriivka, Robotyny, and Malaya Tokmachka. Until now, one attempt by the enemy to advance in the direction of our positions near Novoandriivka continues. In the Dnieper direction, our troops repulsed three enemy attacks near the Cossack Camps, Dnipro and Kozatskyi Island, the enemy was unsuccessful. In other areas, the situation has not undergone significant changes. As reported by ArmyInform, the Defense Forces of Ukraine stopped more than 100 attacks of the enemy and caused significant losses to the occupiers.

Title: Will North Korea go further than Kurshchyna: the expert named the country that can stop it
Description: About how the actions of Putin and Kim Jong-un are perceived in Beijing, the expert on the history of Ukrainian-Chinese relations, candidate of historical sciences, leading researcher of the Institute of History of the National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine, Volodymyr Golovko, told in the ArmyInform commentary: -China is not very satisfied with this Russian-Korean initiative It should be remembered that it is with North Korea that China has an Agreement on Cooperation and Friendship, which provides for the provision of urgent assistance from the PRC if necessary, that is, in fact, a military alliance. Therefore, involving the only country to which China has such alliance obligations is a serious challenge for Beijing. Obviously, China will put pressure on both North Korea and the Russian side to limit the North Koreans' participation in hostilities against Ukraine. Obviously, Beijing will seek to ensure that the use of North Korean troops is limited in nature. Most likely, Russia and North Korea will be watching for China's reaction. And for the time being, the Koreans will not enter the Kursk region in large units. Further, both the Russian Federation and the DPRK will take into account both the reaction of China and the reaction of the Western world. If the reaction of China, as well as the Western countries, is strong, then the participation of the North Korean military will be limited to the Kursk region. If not, then the Russians will dare to transfer the Koreans to internationally recognized Ukrainian territory.-

Title: Invisible heroes of a complex operation: how engineers of the Support Forces of the Armed Forces bro...
Description: Lieutenant Colonel Ivan Veretko is the deputy commander of the 48th Kamianets-Podilskyi Engineering Brigade for psychological support of personnel. He devoted his whole life to service in the engineering troops. He started serving in the special forces in 1998, graduated from the Military Engineering Institute at the Podilsk Agrarian and Technical University in 2005, and the National Defense University of Ukraine in 2024. Went through the ranks from deputy platoon commander to deputy brigade commander. Now its military unit is one of those operating in the Kursk region together with other components of the Defense Forces. ArmyInform asked a military officer about the difficulty of an engineer's work during a breach of the state border, the special psychological training of a sapper, and much more. We are talking about this very thing today, November 3, when Ukraine celebrates the Day of the Engineering Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. - Do the specifics of your brigade's actions differ from actions on the territory of Ukraine and Kurshchyna? - On the territory of Kurshchyna itself, the specifics of actions do not differ from the tasks performed by our brigade on the territory of Ukraine. The only thing that was new was overcoming the border and engineering barriers of the enemy located on the border. — How did you interact with the units of the DSHV, SV ZSU? — We interacted in such a way that the sapper units of our brigade were placed under the command of the amphibious assault units, namely: battalions, companies, and directly our means of communication were adjusted under their communication. - Is there special psychological training for sappers? Briefly explain how this happens. — The sappers go through an obstacle course that simulates the conditions on the battlefield. Servicemen of the sergeant rank underwent combat stress courses to be ready to respond to critical situations in their units during combat missions. - How did your unit commanders prepare (psychologically, morally) their people for operations on the territory of the Kursk region? The deeper the knowledge and confidence in one's skills, the calmer and more confident a fighter acts in stressful situations. When a person clearly knows how to react in extreme conditions, in combat operations under KAB strikes, his body and psyche are less affected by panic or uncertainty. First, you need to learn to reduce your anxiety level. The work of a sapper is a constant risk, and if you keep it to yourself, you won't last long. We learn to control our breathing, quickly -switch- after tasks and maintain emotional calm, even when everything around us is turbulent. Secondly, it is important to be able to adapt quickly to a new team. When a sapper is attached to another unit, everyone has to understand each other's words, because there is no time for explanations in battle. Therefore, we often conduct joint training with other units in order to be -on the same wavelength-. Last but not least is exposure. The life of a sapper is a constant stress, and you need to be able to cope with it, recover quickly and stay focused. Conversations and explanatory conversations were held that this task is necessary for the army and the state as a whole. However, people were motivated to take these actions. — Were there ready-made engineering and fortification structures on the border with the Russian Federation? How was the border with the Russian Federation fortified (and was it fortified at all)? - There were high-quality engineering fortifications on the border with the Russian Federation, the border was fortified in terms of engineering. In addition to the fortifications, there were many mine-explosive and non-explosive barriers combined as a whole in the line of defense. — Due to what, in your opinion, did the Defense Forces manage to break through the state border: equipment, people, training? — The border was managed to break through due to the effect of unexpectedness, the training of people who had some combat experience and were equipped with good armored vehicles. —In the network, information is already spreading that the Russians are entrenched in Kurshchyna. Is that so? And the Defense Forces of Ukraine? - Almost from the very beginning, the Russians began to carry out fortification works for the defense of Kurshchyna. The Defense Forces of Ukraine, in their turn, also began to carry out fortification works in order to consolidate and defend units on this territory. —Is your crew adequately staffed? And the techniques? (for actions in Kurshchyna and in general). Do you need people who are specialists in civil life? - This is always a difficult question. On the one hand, we have a team that shows its strength, professionalism and confidence every day. But, on the other hand, motivated, goal-oriented people are always needed - because engineering forces have their own specifics, and there is always a need for those who are ready to work under constant drive. We do not have monotonous days: sometimes we are laying roads for equipment, sometimes we are clearing mines for special forces. And every new task needs those who can withstand the stress and make quick decisions. Therefore, even when it seems that there are enough people, new, motivated professionals will definitely not get in the way. - What would you advise civilians who have not yet decided to mobilize or not to join the Defense Forces of Ukraine - But come to us! Everything awaits you: drive, friendship, and, as they say, real tests of spirit and body. The work we are doing is not just a service, it is a battle for the future. At the front, we are not just defending the land, we are standing up for the right to live freely, for the lives of our relatives, for Ukraine, as we want to see it. Everyone who joins becomes a part of this struggle. It's a real challenge, yes, but is there anything more epic than fighting for your country and winning? In the engineering troops, there is not enough work only for sappers! Specialists of various profiles are needed in our team, because engineering troops are engaged in a wide variety of tasks - from the construction of defensive fortifications to the creation of routes for combat vehicles. And even after our victory, the engineering troops will still have a lot of work to do in demining, cleaning, and decontamination of our motherland of Ukraine from explosive objects. - What inviolable values ​​and principles guide you in your work? - In my work, I am always guided by the principle of justice, because it is the basis of true leadership. It is important to me that subordinate personnel feel supported and cared for. A fighter who has to perform combat tasks must not only be professionally trained, but also provided with everything necessary: ​​clothing, food and timely payment of financial support in full. These are basic needs that must be met so that a serviceman can fully perform his duties, knowing that he has reliable support. The job of a sapper is not just to carry out combat tasks, but to be always ready to be near any unit (airborne assault troops, special forces groups, tank units) that needs their help. Since sappers are usually attached to other combat units, they must be able to quickly adapt to new conditions and quickly establish contact with a foreign team. It is not easy, but this is the specificity of our work. - What does it look like in practice? Sappers do not always work in their usual team - they are constantly assigned to other units. This means that each sapper must be able to quickly get used to a new environment, understand the task, and at the same time be responsible for the safety of the entire unit. The work of a sapper is always a difficult and dangerous process, but, as they say, there are nuances. It's one thing to clear a path for tanks. This task is clear, understandable: the sappers know that there is an armored vehicle in front of them, which is ready to withstand a certain level of danger. The main thing here is to lay a safe corridor and to react promptly to a change in the situation. Demining for special forces and more is a completely different story. This is filigree work, where the life of the sapper depends not on the armor, but on the people who will then follow invisible paths to the enemy's rear. It requires absolute precision, accuracy and silent work without the right to make a mistake. You usually have to work at night or in unfamiliar territory, and any little thing can be decisive. At such moments, sappers must be psychologically prepared for high responsibility: they go first, providing a way for those who carry key tasks on the front line, and often become the invisible heroes of a complex operation. After all, it is not for nothing that the motto of our brigade is ahead of the first. - Whose exploits from among the personnel of the brigade would you single out, in particular, during the actions in Kurshchyna? Two servicemen of the brigade were awarded the Order of the -Golden Star- posthumously. These are Lieutenant Oleksandr Borshulyak and Junior Sergeant Denys Dorofeyev. In particular, several times Denis Dorofeev's unit was able to stop the advance of the enemy thanks to the minefields they installed. In total, they had thousands of installed mines on their account. Photo from the personal archive of Ivan Veretko

Title: F-16, Tom Cruise and -Top Gun-: how -Maverick- helped Ukraine and whether it can help more
Description: Why didn't Pete -Maverick- Mitchell choose the newest dual-lightning F-35 Lightning II for the mission, but was forced to fly the older -Rhino---Hornet- - -Rhino- F-18 Hornet? What is the most important component in a fighter plane and why can't a fighter pilot think? ArmiyaInform tells about how -Maverick- has already helped and whether it can still help Ukraine. The combat sequences of many, if not the vast majority, of feature films are more fairy tales than actual depictions of combat. However, the influence of the world of cinema, especially the masterpieces of world fame, on real life is undeniable and it applies, including international politics and the military sphere. This also applies to -Top Gun- - a dilogy of Hollywood films about the pilots of fighter jets. Its first part was published way back in 1986, and the second was published 36 years later - in the spring of 2022. The first -Top Gun- not only became extremely popular, collected more than 350 thousand dollars in theaters, made the actor of the main role Tom Cruise a superstar, and made the American heavy carrier-based fighter F-14 Tomcat famous. The 1986 film also significantly influenced the perception of military service in American society in the mid-to-late 1980s. At that time, Americans, in view of the detente in relations with the USSR and traumatic memories of the war in Vietnam, viewed the prospect of a military career rather negatively. Instead, -Top Gun- made military service popular again, causing a veritable boom in new recruits in 1986. About 90% of those who aspired to serve in the US Navy indicated that they had watched a feature film about fighter pilots with Tom Cruise. The second -Top Gun- also became a sensation at the American and global box office. Collecting more than $1 billion worldwide, it left behind such films as Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness (just over $950 million), Batman (around $770 million) and Jurassic Park 3 (around $750 million). The very names of the films indicate that -Maverick- had to compete for the audience's attention with very powerful rivals. It was possible to win the battle for the audience thanks to the cooperation of forces and means - from the nostalgia of the fans of the first -Top Gun- and the star galaxy led by Tom Cruise to the dashing plot, talented direction and extremely realistic location shooting. The influence of this part of the dilogy also went far beyond the world of cinema, affecting world politics and international relations. First of all, he significantly raised the morale of Ukrainians and strengthened the anti-Russian position in the whole world. The main villains of the film flew precisely on Russian Su-57s and used the Mi-24 attack helicopter. This left no doubt that the unnamed country was at least on friendly terms with the Russian Federation. The way in which the latest American F-18 Hornet fighters and even the legendary, but already decommissioned F-14 Tomcat confidently crushed the latest Russian weapons left no doubt that the Russian aggressors can and should be defeated. To defeat the aggressor state of the Russian Federation, it is enough to provide Ukraine with the necessary weapons and train the Ukrainian military to use them - and the Armed Forces of Ukraine will ensure the desired result.
