The film, which was watched or at least well known by the citizens of all pro-Ukraine states and all the politicians there, did its job even when it was not mentioned. When it was possible to include the issue of providing Ukraine with the F-16 Fightin Falcon to the agenda, reminiscences from the dilogy began to work with triple efficiency. The spirit of -Top Gun- was felt in everything from quotes from the film in media publications to visual solutions. After all, the President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyi took a photo in the cockpit of the -Fighting Falcon- in the same way that Tom Cruise did many times in many American fighter jets. It was in the F-16 that Tom Cruise was photographed on December 6, 2001 during a visit to the Joint Reserve Naval Aviation Base in Fort Worth (Texas). Volodymyr Zelenskyy did this at the Skridstrup Air Base in Vojens (northern Denmark) on August 20, 2022. It took more than two years for the first F-16s to enter service with the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. -Fighting Falcons- in the Ukrainian sky, the President of Ukraine presented > August 4, 2024. The next day Volodymyr Zelensky published several photos of the fighter jets, noting that -the F-16 is truly a reality, a reality in our skies.- Between the two August series of photos - in Denmark in 2022 and in Ukraine in 2024 - there is a gap of hundreds of hours of negotiations and thousands of hours of training of Ukrainian pilots, during which -Top Gun- was not only in the air, but also repeatedly mentioned directly by instructors and their students . -Did you see the last movie, Top Gun, where Tom Cruise says, 'If you think, you die,'- cites the American media Politico as saying Tom Richter, a former US Marine Corps F/A-18 Hornet pilot who later transferred to the F- 16. -No matter how Hollywood it is, it's true.- Watching films in the original language with subsequent discussion is always an important component of language training. It was urgently needed and received by Ukrainian pilots during F-16 training. Also, films are an important motivational tool that can, with the help of bright emotional images, establish certain thoughts in the audience, postulate certain theses, and form stable beliefs and principles. -Top Gun- is the best for this. The thesis -it's not about the plane, but who is the pilot- that is repeatedly repeated in the film emphasizes, first of all, the training, skill and fighting spirit of military pilots. The F-16 is a perfect fighting machine, but its main component is the pilot in the cockpit. It is thanks to the pilot that the fighter turns from a set of tools and functions assembled into a single body into a living organism capable of acting as a single entity with a person. In the hands of a well-trained military pilot, the F-16 becomes a direct extension of his consciousness, a part of his body, like an arm or a leg. It is at the moment when this union can be achieved and firmly established that the training can be considered complete. None of the parts of -Top Gun- show how Tom Cruise's character flies exactly on the F-16 - this would make the parallels between the films and life even more obvious. However, Pete Mitchell instead has the globally recognized callsign Maverick, named after the AGM-65 Maverick air-to-surface missile. AGM-65 Maverick is the standard, one might even say classic, ammunition for the F-16 Fightin Falcon multipurpose fighter. This missile is intended for Close Air Support aircraft during an all-out battle. -Maverick- is an extremely effective missile capable of hitting and destroying a variety of tactical targets - armored vehicles and ground vehicles, fuel and ammunition depots, stationary fortifications and enemy air defense facilities. However, the AGM-65 Maverick also has a weak point - a range of only 40 km. In view of this, using it over the battlefield in Ukraine under the current conditions is too risky, since to launch it, the F-16 will have to fly too close to the line of combat engagement. The risk of losing a plane due to the action of enemy air defense is too high and in the vast majority of cases it is absolutely not worth the destroyed enemy targets. So at the moment there is no need to talk about the transfer of AGM-65 Maverick to Ukraine. Under the current conditions, other air-to-ground munitions should become more important, primarily high-precision, medium-range glider guided bombs AGM-154 JSOW. However, one should not forget that the modern war has already surprised many times with non-standard solutions and changed the rules of the battle. Therefore, you should not completely forget about the AGM-65 Maverick - by changing a number of parameters, they may well turn out to be an effective means of combat. Similarly, in the fictional world of Top Gun: Maverick, the F-18 Hornet is not the latest F-35 Lightning II, disabled by enemy GPS jammers, but chosen for the mission. What's more, the old F-14 Tomcat puts up a decent fight and even comes out victorious in a confrontation with two enemy Su-57s. For all its fabulousness, the cinematic -Maverick- never crosses the fine line between realism and fantasy definitively. The chances that the dogfights shown in the movies could have happened in reality are extremely slim. But they are not absolutely zero. The chances that the AGM-65 Maverick can be effectively and safely used over the battlefield in Ukraine are extremely slim. However, Ukrainians know how to surprise and impress no worse than Pete -Maverick- Mitchell. Because -it's not about the plane, but who the pilot is.- Earlier, ArmyInform talked about JSOW guided aerial bombs from the USA: what kind of weapon is this and how will it help the Defense Forces of Ukraine and thought, what will be the task of Mirage 2000 in Ukraine, and also explained why they are fighting on the side of Ukrainestrong peanut John McClain, John Rembo, Luke Skywalker, Han Solo and Indiana Jones, Angus McGyver, T-800 terminator, Neo and John Wick and other movie heroes of world fame.

Title: They twisted the essence: fake workers of the Russian Federation created a manipulation about the co...
Description: Actually, in the interview, an excerpt from which the Russians seem to be spreading, Sergeant Tymochko did not say anything about -plans for the mobilization of women-, but only expressed an opinion about the need for civilians, in particular women, to undergo military training courses. Civilian training centers operate in Ukraine, engaged in both general military and specialized military training of civilians. Civilian women and men take the course in these centers voluntarily as part of preparation for military service and resistance to Russian aggression. So the propagandists, in their characteristic manner, twisted the essence of the message and made a short manipulation out of it. Since 2014, no woman in Ukraine has been forcibly mobilized. However, Russian propaganda regularly spreads fakes that Ukraine is about to start mobilizing women. This is one of the most favorite topics of propagandists, to which a certain number of gullible Ukrainians are -led- every time. We remind you: the service of women in the Defense Forces of Ukraine was and is exclusively voluntary. And the goal of such destructive narratives is to cause a split in society, to sow distrust in the Armed Forces and state authorities.

Title: Billions for a new BMP: the US will replace the world-famous M2 Bradley
Description: According to the information distributed by the author of the defense publication Army Recognition, the Pentagon allocated to General Dynamics (GDLS ) and American Rheinmetall for $800 million for the development of prototypes of this machine as part of the Optionally Manned Fighting Vehicle (OMFV) program, ArmyInform reports. The total cost of the rearmament program is estimated at $45 billion, and the United States Army plans to purchase approximately 3,800 units of new armored vehicles. In June 2023, GDLS and American Rheinmetall were selected from five competitors for the final stage of detailed design, while Point Blank Enterprises, Oshkosh Defense and BAE Systems were eliminated from the competition. Evaluating the concepts of the future BMP, experts from IKK Defense Express in particular stated that in fact we are talking about more than a classic modern BMP with a forward location of the engine and transmission department. And also deliberately emphasized armor protection in the form of, most likely, elements of dynamic protection in the lower frontal part of the hull and details on the sides, which are additionally reinforced with overhead elements. Specialists from the Army Recognition defense portal analyzed the novelty more thoroughly. The authors of the site believe that the XM30 will bring significant changes to the infantry fighting vehicle (IPV) category, having a 50x228mm gun in a remote-controlled turret, dual anti-tank guided missiles (ATGMs), an AI-enabled fire control system, and a hybrid powertrain. The XM30 will have a crew of two (mechanic driver and commander) and will carry six infantrymen. The vehicle's size and capacity were designed to maintain a balance between firepower and mobility, while preventing it from becoming too large or heavy, as was seen in some previous BMP designs. The combat vehicle will be designed to work alongside future versions of the M1 Abrams main battle tank and is expected to include protection against unmanned aerial systems (UAS). Digital engineering is central to the development of the XM30. In the early stages of the program, the five aforementioned contractors were awarded approximately $60 million each to create digital projects based on Army requirements. Through this process, which facilitated design, development and possible future upgrades, the US Army clarified the requirements for the armor and ensured that they were achievable, avoiding the problems that led to the cancellation of previous programs. For example, by using 3D models and simulations in the early stages of design, the Army has obtained assurances from contractors that all requirements and subsystems, including sensors and fire control mechanisms, are agreed upon before physical prototypes are built. This approach has minimized development costs and helps contractors and the Army quickly resolve any design issues that arise during the process. The XM30's modular design supports future technological upgrades, allowing new systems to be integrated with minimal changes to the vehicle's core architecture. Equipped with a hybrid-electric drive and various weapon systems, including a 50 mm cannon and anti-tank guided missiles, the XM30 is configured to meet current operational requirements while maintaining flexibility for future needs. The XM30 program is a continuation of the US Army's efforts to replace the M2 Bradley, which has been in service since the 1980s. Despite several previous attempts, including the Ground Combat Vehicle and Future Combat System, such initiatives were not successful. Mainly due to problems with requirements alignment, funding, manufacturing technology and prototyping schedule. Colonel Geoffrey Jurand, the XM30 project manager, emphasized that the current program is consistent in these areas and is supported by the use of digital technologies. This approach allows the vehicle to be designed and tested using digital models, avoiding some of the problems faced by previous programs. Both General Dynamics and Rheinmetall have been selected to move forward in the competition, with the US Army currently in the third phase of a five-phase schedule. These contractors will deliver prototypes to the military by the end of 2026, and the Pentagon will conduct a critical analysis of the design by the first half of fiscal 2025. The final selection of a single supplier for production will occur around the first quarter of fiscal year 2028 after testing and evaluation of prototypes. The program is also supported by a -digital trinity- approach that includes model-based systems engineering, digital engineering and development, security and operations (DevSecOps). This digital approach improved tracking and communication between contractors and the Army, and errors were identified and corrected early in the design process. XM30 is one of six programs identified by the Pentagon to demonstrate the benefits of digital technology. The US Army's use of digital technology for this project aims to improve design efficiency, reduce costs and ensure the armored vehicle's modularity and adaptability to future needs. The program has earned the trust of senior United States Army leadership, who have expressed support for its goals and its potential to deliver long-term benefits, including cost savings through its open architecture. As the program progresses, other phases will focus on prototyping, testing and evaluation. The US Army plans to begin testing prototypes in 2026, with a final production decision expected in 2028. Implementation of the program to create the BMP XM30 Mechanized Infantry Combat Vehicle. Video: Weapons of The World

Title: Russia uses Western components for attacks on Ukraine — the President
Description: Volodymyr Zelenskyy stated this in his evening address on November 2. -Today, first of all, gratitude to our soldiers. To everyone who protects Ukraine from the daily attacks of -shaheed- and rockets. In the month of October, more than 2,000 -martyrs- were against Ukraine, against our people. Literally every day. This number of -shahedis- is more than 170 thousand components that should have been blocked for delivery to Russia. Microcircuits, microcontrollers, processors, many different parts, without which this terror would simply not be possible,- said the President. According to him, all this is supplied to Russia from abroad. -And this, unfortunately, from companies from China, Europe, America - many micro-contributions to the constant Russian terror. This brings the world back again and again to the need to work much harder to control the export of specialty parts and resources. In order not to give Russia the opportunity to circumvent the sanctions that have long been imposed against Russia for this war,- said Volodymyr Zelenskyi. In his opinion, the situation is similar to that of the Shaheds and Russian missiles. -They all contain components from other countries. Fighting against Russian strikes means fighting, including for the strength of sanctions against Russia. Sanctions should increase and be effective. And every scheme to circumvent sanctions is a crime against people and the world. And it is precisely such schemes that allow Russia to also help the regimes in Iran and North Korea build up their muscles. This is a global threat. And only global, special pressure can overcome this,- the President assured. As reported by ArmyInform, the President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy once again ataku/->emphasized that constant terrorist attacks on Ukrainian cities indicate insufficient pressure on Russia and its allies.

Title: Long live Belarus (not Russia)! — Belarusian volunteers destroy the occupiers in the Kharkiv region
Description: The video of the combat operation was released on November 2 on the regiment's channel. The fire support group of the regiment trained on the Russians with MK-19 and H&K GMG automatic grenade launchers. Surveillance was conducted from the drone, which recorded hits on the Russians. As reported by ArmyInform, Belarusians liberate Kharkiv Oblast.

Title: Kursk massacre by drones - paratroopers hunt enemy armored vehicles
Description: The video of combat work was posted on November 2 on the brigade's channel. -Kryl- drones hit enemy armored vehicles on the move, often together with landing forces. Drones provided by one of the Ukrainian volunteer communities were used for combat work. The defeat of the Russian armored personnel carrier was particularly successful. It was a real pyrotechnic art. As reported by ArmyInform, the soldiers of the 95th Polish Airborne Assault Brigade of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine repelled the assault of marines of the 155th brigade of the Russian Federation, leaving their corpses on the battlefield in Kurshchyna.

Title: Loud and unsuccessful escape at the border: shippers and -customers- detained at gunpoint
Description: About this reported the State Border Service of Ukraine. Suspicious movement near the border was recorded by a video surveillance camera. The border guards reacted immediately and set out to search for violators. The fugitives were apprehended after several warning shots. It turned out that the detainees were residents of Kyiv, Kyiv and Lviv regions. During further search activities, border guards detained the 55-year-old organizer of the crossing and his accomplice, a female driver who transported illegal immigrants to their destination. As the law enforcement officers found out, the man organized illegal crossings through social networks, offering his services for 9-10 thousand dollars per person. The detained men were taken to the border unit, where administrative and procedural documents were drawn up against them for attempting to cross the border illegally. The organizers face criminal liability for h. 2 Art. 332 of the Criminal Code (-Illegal transportation of persons across the state border-), and the driver was also prosecuted for maliciously disobeying the legal requirements of border guards. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: Dropping drones - the Russians use tourer drones in the direction of the main strike
Description: Senior Lieutenant Andrii Bezsonov, head of the radio-electronic warfare service of the 18th Slavic Brigade of the National Guard, told about this on Army TV. -In my private opinion, there are Russian UAV crews that move from place to place, from direction to direction. And through this, they strengthen the direction that is most interesting to them at the moment. We have also had such people visit us and we can see it, first of all, by the quality of piloting. That is, we intercept the video and see how it flies, how it bypasses trees, how it approaches the target, how it counteracts our EW means,- said Andriy Bezsonov. According to him, the situation with enemy drones has improved somewhat in his brigade's area of ​​operation near Chasovoy Yar, mostly local operators are working, which our pilots call -husks- because they demonstrate very low efficiency. (video from 28:44) As reported by ArmyInform, the occupiers are crossing the channel near the Time Yar, they are unable to gain a foothold, but they continue to attack.

Title: Over one and a half thousand hit targets in a month! — -Birds of Magyar- had a great October
Description: The summary video appeared on November 2 on the battalion channel. -Waking up in the morning to find that the pilots of the -Birds of Magyar- have hit 50 more worm targets in the past day,- commented the video combatant Captain Robert Brovdy. Among them are Russian guns and armored vehicles, beloved by the -Birds- and enemy vehicles and personnel. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 414th unmanned battalion aviation systems -Birds of Magyar- as part of the Marine Corps we have already hit 150 enemy guns in the Pokrovsky direction.

Title: The drone sneaked up unnoticed - in the Luhansk direction, an enemy air defense system was bombed -O...
Description: The video of combat operation was released on November 2 by the Forces of Unmanned Systems of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The -Wasp- air defense system was found at night, and our bomber drone immediately flew to it. Although the -Wasp- is designed to attack air targets at low altitudes and was on combat duty, it failed to notice the danger. Then our drone calmly hovered over the enemy air defense system and made two accurate drops that hit the air defense system. -Step by step, we are destroying every level of the enemy's echeloned anti-aircraft defense,- the SBS of the Armed Forces commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 412th battalion of unmanned systems Nemesis of the Forces of unmanned systems of the Armed Forces of Ukraine destroyed in one operation the storage place of enemy ammunition and transport.

Title: Two people died in Donetsk region as a result of Russian shelling
Description: This was announced on the evening of November 2 by the head of the Donetsk regional military administration, Vadym Filashkin. According to him, a 60-year-old man and a 54-year-old woman died. 4 private houses, a power line and a gas pipeline were damaged. -The Kostiantyn community regularly suffers from Russian shelling. Do not expose yourself to danger! Evacuate in a timely manner!-, urged Vadym Filashkin. As reported by ArmyInform, as of the morning of November 2, casualties and serious damage as a result of Russian shelling were recorded at three districts of Donetsk region.

Title: A miracle in Kurshchyna — four Russian attack aircraft turned into wounded from one drop
Description: The video of the hit appeared on the group's channel. Four enemy stormtroopers were walking through the ruins, and an ammunition was dropped on them from above, which exploded in such a way that it hit the whole group. -Pay attention: after the reset, dust rises on each Russian infantryman - this is the impact of metal balls. Such a group is no longer capable of storming. At least one is seriously injured, the rest were still able to move at the time of the shooting, but what will happen to them in half an hour is unknown,- commented the video in -Black Swan-. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 225th assault battalion destroyed the occupier, seconded to the 810 brigade of the Russian army. A video was found on his phone about the extent of Russian losses.

Title: Just from the street to the marines: what has the Russian marine corps turned into
Description: About this on the air of the national telethon -Edyny Novyny- told the spokesman of the Naval Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, captain 3 rank Dmytro Pletenchuk. — The quality composition changes. The Marine Corps is an elite, and its elite is not only in the name, but also in the level of training. Just today I came across a material in which a former prisoner turned out to be a marine. That is, now the qualitative composition of these units does not differ significantly, he said. Now, there is no special training for Russian marines. — In fact, the organizational core of the marine corps is used, that is, the command structure, which, of course, is not directly applied on the battlefield. These units have become ordinary infantry units that fill up just off the street without any special training. Because [real] Marines is amphibious training, it's jumping, it's conquering the three elements, the spokesperson explained. Unfortunately, a similar situation is observed in the Armed Forces of Ukraine, although the Armed Forces of Ukraine still try, despite intensive combat operations, to better train marines. — If we take the training from us, the training of the marines continues periodically, despite the fact that they are in combat conditions. But, nevertheless, and there we can notice that now it can actually be called simply infantry, said Dmytro Pletenchuk. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that the 155th Separate Guards Marine Brigade of the Pacific Fleet of the Russian Federation is known for its war crimes, it was even characterized as -very rotten brigade-.

Title: Artificial intelligence against the -heavenly river-cutter- - the Russians are trying to keep their ...
Description: Video appeared on November 2. After the Russian -wing- noticed the approach of our kamikaze drone, it began to maneuver sharply to escape. This time it was difficult for our operator, but he managed to get close to the Russian UAV and destroy it. But in the future it will be more difficult. Perhaps our drones will have to use new attack tactics, enter from the blind spots of additional cameras, or increase the combat part of our FPVs. Previously, the Russians tried to reduce the consequences of the -sky cutter-, the mass destruction of their reconnaissance -wings- by camouflage painting them, but this did not give results. Now they are trying to use artificial intelligence. As reported by ArmyInform, the Defense Forces began to shoot down with drones the Russian analogues of the -shaheds-.

Title: If Global Positioning Is Hacked: Satellite Imaging Company Maxar Is Working on a 3D Mapping Tool to ...
Description: -Maxar's nascent Pinpoint tool will use the drone's video feed to identify its surroundings in 3D, then match it to maps created with the company's P3DR , for accurate 3D registration,- stated the chief product specialist of the Maxar Corporation, Peter Vilchynski, ArmiyaInform reports. While most mapping technologies -focus on flat representations of the world,- Wilczynski said, Pinpoint will address -how you use that 3D representation to help drones determine their positioning, to help aircraft pilots navigate, to help understand when you're getting drone video or from the plane, what position is he actually looking at.- A representative of the firm noted that it could be an alternative to GPS, which could be vulnerable to adversary interference. That's important in part because of -all the obstruction issues we've seen in Ukraine,- he said. -I think what we're going to see in the next few years is a transition from this absolute GPS navigation system to a much more reference navigation system, more like what happened when you could sort of be in the middle ages on a ship and make your route through the stars-. Pinpoint plans to complete several pilot programs with domestic and foreign drone manufacturers next year, and then make the technology widely available. -We work with various companies throughout the project creation chain. Some companies produce suspensions, some produce completely (unmanned aerial vehicles). There are a bunch of different development options: free, more expensive, some with more durable UAVs. So we are trying to experiment with this market,- Vilchynskyi said. -This is a really fast-growing market right now as people in the defense community realize that the GPS we've relied on for so long may not be available in the next conflict,- said a Maxar spokesperson. Presentation of Maxar's fleet of mapping satellites:

Title: The situation in Toretsk was stabilized: where the enemy was stopped
Description: Major Anastasia Bobovnikova, spokeswoman of Luhansk OTU, told about this on the broadcast of the Suspilne Novosti marathon. — In Toretsk, we somewhat stabilized the battle line. The enemy, as before, is on the eastern outskirts of the city. We stop all attempts of the enemy to advance and, at this moment, all assaults on Toretsk are repulsed. There are strong units of the Defense Forces and they are not allowing the enemy to move, she said. At the same time, the spokeswoman noted that the occupiers are accumulating and concentrating forces and means with the aim of intensifying offensive actions. — We now see that the enemy is withdrawing reserves, the enemy is establishing manpower at the front line, replenishing military personnel, installing anti-aircraft missile systems. We see that they are preparing for some active hostilities, the spokeswoman said. The officer also reported on which divisions and units of the occupiers operate in the area of ​​responsibility of the Luhansk OTU. — If we talk about Chasiv Yar, then the Airborne Division of the Central Military District of the Russian Federation is stationed there. In other directions, these are motorized rifle units of the same military district, Anastasia Bobovnikova said. Earlier, ArmyInform explained, why the occupiers focused their efforts on capturing Toretsk and Chasovoy Yar.

Title: It's like zombie mode in Call of Duty, when you kill and they keep crawling - National Guardsman on ...
Description: Senior Lieutenant Andriy Bezsonov, head of the electronic warfare service of the 18th Slavic Brigade of the National Guard, told about the situation near Chasovoy Yar. -You kill them, and they keep climbing and climbing. Another wave, another wave, more... Their human resource is inexhaustible,- said Andriy Bezsonov. According to him, the Russians are actively manipulating the logistics routes of the Defense Forces in order to disrupt supplies. The Russians are also persistently looking for ways to protect themselves from our FPV drones. -I didn't see EW shoulder pads, instead there are a large number of EW rifles, and such modifications, about which there is no information. Apparently, this is a small garage production, not very efficient, because in my eyes the Russian worked with an electronic warfare rifle and received an epfivishka,- Andriy Bezsonov said. (video from 26:07) As reported by ArmyInform, the fighters of the 18th National Guard brigade showed what the occupiers have transformed Chasiv Yar.

Title: The Ukrainian MiG-29 destroys the occupiers, the marines defeated a Russian tank: stream from the fr...
Description: Marines captured the T-72 tank of the occupiers. The fighters of the 35th separate marine infantry brigade named after Rear Admiral Mykhailo Ostrogradsky thanked the Russians for the -Lend-Lease-, and promised to return the projectiles from the tank. A SSO sniper destroyed a group of enemy fighters in Kurshchyna. The Russians were ambushed, and then the surviving occupiers were methodically eliminated by a sniper of the Special Operations Forces. In the Kharkiv region, during the rotation of the Russians at their positions, shells from our artillery and drops from drones flew at them. As a result, the occupiers had to leave their positions urgently. These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - lieutenant colonel Serhii Misyura and captain Artem Golub.

Title: In time for the cold weather: the occupiers concentrated their efforts on capturing Toretsk and Chas...
Description: Major Anastasia Bobovnikova, spokeswoman of Luhansk OTU, told about this on the broadcast of the Suspilne Novosti marathon. — The enemy is most active near such cities as Chasiv Yar and Toretsk. Near Chasovoy Yar, the enemy is trying to cross the channel. No success at this point, she said. However, the Russians take into account previous experience and change their tactics. — Now they have focused on the use of sabotage and intelligence groups and the so-called -secrets-, when one, two, three people run across the channel, hide in urban buildings, in basements, in holes and wait for replenishment or, rather, for the accumulation of sufficient forces for assaults. However, at the moment, such attempts are detected and the groups are affected and destroyed, the officer said. The spokeswoman explained why the named cities are important for the invaders. — These cities are a priority for the Russians, they want to capture Donetsk and Luhansk regions before the cold. As far as we know, the enemy is not preparing for the winter period, because they believe that they will achieve their goals before the onset of frost. Therefore, they focused their strikes on these cities, the officer said. However, the concentration of the enemy's main efforts on Chasovoy Yar and Toretsk does not mean that the occupiers have curtailed their activity in other areas. -In particular, in the Seversky direction, the enemy is also advancing with the use of equipment and simply infantry groups to one unit,- the spokeswoman said. However, currently all enemy assaults are successfully repulsing units of the Defense Forces. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in the area of ​​Chasovoye Yaru, the drones of the Defense Forces destroyed the naval jet bomber of the occupiers.

Title: Defense forces of Ukraine stopped more than 100 enemy attacks and inflicted significant losses on th...
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Border settlements continue to suffer from cynical shelling from the territory of the Russian Federation, including Pogrebky, Grabovskoe, Iskryskivshchyna, Obody, and Volfyne of the Sumy region; Tymofiivka, Kharkiv region. The invaders carried out airstrikes in Yunakivka, Zhuravka and Basivka districts of Sumy region, dropping 5 aerial bombs. One attack was repulsed, another one is ongoing in the Vovchansk district in the Kharkiv direction. The Russians also carried out airstrikes on Slatina and Kozachi Lopan, using seven air defense systems. In the Kupian direction, the enemy carried out seven assaults near Pishchany, Zagryzovy, Zeleny Gay, Kruglyakivka, Kolisnykyvka, and Lozova. Two skirmishes have ended, five more are ongoing. Pišchane was hit by airstrikes by unguided missiles. In the Lyman direction, the invading army attacked 13 times near Grekivka, Terni, Yampolivka, Torsky and Serebryansky forests. Three enemy attacks remained unfinished. One attack is ongoing in the Seversky direction near the settlement of Ivano-Daryivka. The defense forces stopped one Russian attack near Predtechny in the Kramatorsk direction. With the support of bomber aircraft in the direction of Toretsk, the enemy attacked seven times near the settlements of Toretsk and Shcherbinivka. Two battles ended without success for the occupiers, five more are ongoing. In the Pokrovsky direction since the beginning of the day, the occupiers have made eight attempts to dislodge our defenders from their positions in the Mykolaivka, Promin, Krutiy Yar, Selidove and Vyshneve settlements. The defense forces are holding back the enemy's onslaught and have repulsed three attacks, five engagements are still ongoing. Enemy losses are being refined. Today's hottest Kurakhiv direction — the enemy attacked 35 times near the settlements of Illinka, Novoselidivka, Novodmytrivka, Gostre, Maksimilianivka, Antonivka, Kostyantynivka, and Katerynivka. 18 fights completed, 17 more are still ongoing. In the Vremivsk direction, the occupiers unsuccessfully attacked the positions of our troops near Trudovoy and Maksimivka four times. The enemy carried out an air strike in the Novodarivka, Bogoyavlenka, Maksimivka and Velika Novosilka areas, dropping six anti-aircraft missiles and using 30 anti-aircraft missiles. In the Orichivsk direction the enemy continues shelling the positions of our troops and civilian infrastructure, our defenders repelled two attacks in the Nesteryanka area, in addition, the enemy launched an air strike with unguided missiles on Lobkovo and dropped aerial bombs on Mala Tokmachka, Yuryivka and Novopavlovka In the Dnieper direction Russian invaders stormed the positions of our defenders twice without success. The situation is under control. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 425th assault battalion -Skala- shturm-na-donechchyni/->carried out an exemplary attack in the Pokrovsky direction.

Title: The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine expands equal opportunities in mine countermeasures for women and...
Description: About this was discussed during the workshop -Equal opportunities: involving people with disabilities in employment in mine protection activities-, which was held in Kyiv with the financial support of the Swedish government. -Today, much attention is paid to the implementation of policies that ensure equal access to work in the field of mine action, the creation of specialized training programs that will include both technical and non-technical skills necessary for work in this field and the creation of conditions that ensure comfortable and safe employment -, said the head of the mine countermeasures department, Colonel Oleg Shuvarskyi, deputy head of the State Department of mine countermeasures, civil protection and environmental security. The program for employment of people with disabilities, including war veterans, is implemented in Ukraine by the UN. Within the framework of this project, the first four Ukrainians who were injured by explosive objects got a job in the international organization The HALO Trust. They will analyze images from satellites and UAVs to identify and map mine-contaminated areas. The Ukrainians received a job offer already a month after completing the relevant course involving persons with disabilities to employment in emergency activities. The participants of the seminar were also introduced to approaches to employment and organization of workplaces for persons with disabilities in emergency activities, practical classes were held. As reported by ArmyInform, representatives of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine and the Armed Forces of Ukraine -lytvi/->received certificates for successful completion of the international online course -Protection of the environment during tactical field exercises-.

Title: Survived FPV drone and rocket! Bradley infantry fighting vehicle ensured a successful assault on Don...
Description: The video of the battle appeared on the battalion channel. First, the landing party on the Bradley went towards the enemy positions. Smoke was placed to cover the assault. Bradley was able to approach the enemy positions at close range and landed an assault group. The stormtroopers began to clear the positions, and the Bradley began to return. On the way, he was hit by an FPV drone, which got stuck in the net and did not explode. Then the BMP was hit by a missile from an ATGM. But this did not prevent Bradley from continuing the movement and returning to his own positions. Meanwhile, the attack aircraft cleared the positions and occupied them. -Our fighters took enemy positions without any losses. What can you say about the Katsaps: all 200 of them... Every day we destroy the enemy and force them to flee from our land,- the battalion commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 425th assault battalion -Skala- showed risky raid of their scouts, who were preparing the way for our offensive under fire.

Title: It looks futuristic, it burns even better: the jet bomber of the occupiers was destroyed in the area...
Description: Major Anastasia Bobovnikova, spokeswoman of Luhansk OTU, told about this on the broadcast of the Suspilne Novosti marathon. - Usually, the enemy uses the tactics of small assault groups, as mentioned earlier. However, there are other methods, using technology. For example, it is the transportation of the occupiers to the forward positions and the work of artillery, the work of drones and aviation, she said. Voyskova informed about the interesting fact of the use of a jet naval bomb launcher by the Russian invaders. This testifies to the occupiers' lack of weapons and military equipment and an attempt to use anything on the battlefield. — the Russians pulled up a Soviet RBU-6000 or -Smerch-2- jet sea-launched bomber in the direction of Chasovoy Yar. It looks pretty futuristic because it's a ship weapon. However, we can say that the occupiers are dragging everything they have onto the battlefield. Including the ship's bomb launcher, which was not destroyed by our Navy, the drone fighters of the operational-tactical group -Luhansk- did finish off. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in the East the Russians are resorting to rat race tactics.

Title: Out-of-the-way bunny — the Teroboron troops won the race with the Russian attack aircraft in Kurshch...
Description: The video of the combat operation was released on November 2. Our aerial scouts spotted two Russians walking across the field at night towards our positions. Our FPV drone took off on the spot. The Russians, hearing his approach, decided to run. But the kamikaze drone turned out to be more agile and spectacularly impressed the Russian. ArmyInform told about Vadim and Vitaly - brothers who have been serving in the same battalion of the 129th brigade of the TrO Forces since the first days of the large-scale invasion.

Title: Medvedchuk's media pool was destroyed: the SBU exposed a new Kremlin agency
Description: notified the Security Service of Ukraine. As a result of operations in Kyiv, Vinnytsia, Zhytomyr and Chernihiv regions, criminals were exposed who worked for the Russian special services and spread Kremlin narratives, in particular, aimed at discrediting the mobilization and justifying armed aggression of the Russian Federation. In Kyiv Oblast they detained a -polite expert- who previously appeared on Medvedchuk's TV channels and was connected to the Russian intelligence network coordinated by Serhii Stepanov. After the start of the large-scale invasion, this agent tried to hide in Ukraine, changing places of residence. In Vinnytsia, a 39-year-old administrator of several channels on YouTube and Telegram was detained, who not only spread anti-Ukrainian propaganda, but also embezzled funds collected to aid the Armed Forces. In Zhytomyr Oblast three people were exposed who called for violence against representatives of military commissariats and passed on information about Ukrainian military patrols. In Chernihiv region they blocked the activities of a group of five people who were transmitting information about the bases and routes of the armed forces. All detainees are suspected under the following articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine: The operations were carried out by SBU employees under the guidance of the prosecutors' offices of the respective regions. As reported by ArmyInform, 57-year-old a Kharkiv resident will stand trial for spreading information about Ukrainian military locations.

Title: No one survived a raincoat-coat - Russians wearing thermal imaging raincoats die en masse in night a...
Description: About on the ArmyTV stream said the head of the public relations service of the brigade, Rostyslav Yashchyshyn. According to him, the Russians switched to night assaults to reduce their losses from our drones. But the night and special raincoats did not help much in this. -The thing is that when the raincoat is sufficiently heated from the inside due to body heat, it is quite clearly visible in the thermal imager... We studied their raincoats and got some information,- said Rostyslav Yashchyshyn. According to him, only in October, the enemy lost 500 soldiers from the brigade. Some of them were killed, some were wounded. -A large percentage of them were destroyed by drones and at night, when they tried to storm our positions in those raincoats,- Rostyslav Yashchyshyn said. (video from 10:25) As reported by ArmyInform, pilots of the unmanned systems battalion of the 63rd mechanized brigade we hit a Russian tank that was firing at our positions.

Title: Ukrainian military personnel mastered NATO environmental standards at courses in Lithuania
Description: reports this by the Main Directorate of Mine Action of Civil Defense and Environmental Security. This course was organized by the Lithuanian Armed Forces Combat Training Center named after General Adolfas Ramanauskas. The course, designed for military officers and civilians involved in environmental security, aims to increase knowledge of environmental requirements related to the conduct of military exercises. It also contributes to the harmonization of the organization of environmental protection between different levels of management. The course syllabus focuses on the requirements of NATO standardization agreements and best practices for the environmental management of military exercises and training. Colonel Yuriy Sytnyk, head of the environmental security department of the Main Directorate of Mine Action, Civil Defense and Environmental Security, said that the Lithuanian Armed Forces Combat Training Center has been conducting these courses every year for the past 15 years. At the courses, participants study NATO environmental standards related to the planning and conduct of military exercises, as well as aspects of environmental protection activities during and after the exercises. After completing the final testing, the trainees received certificates. More than 500 Ukrainian military personnel and civil servants have already completed a similar military environmental education. As reported by ArmyInform, military ecologists together with civilian colleagues -mizhnarodnyh-sudiv/->investigate environmental damage caused by Russian shelling in the Mykolaiv region.

Title: The Ministry of Defense opens the first reintegration center for released military prisoners
Description: This was reported by the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov. The medical facility operates in the central region and already provides medical, rehabilitation and psychological assistance to our heroes after returning from captivity. The institution received the relevant status by order of the Ministry of Defense. The reintegration center is a specialized complex that provides all services in one place: medical, rehabilitation and psychological assistance, as well as reintegration measures and assistance in obtaining certificates and restoring documents. Currently, it is designed for 100 places with the possibility of expansion to 200 or more due to rehabilitation beds. Rustem Umyerov also reported that the medical facility has already received the first proposals from servicemen and medical personnel regarding the further improvement of the Center's work, and these proposals will be taken into account by the Ministry of Defense. -This is an important step in our work. We are improving the system every day in cooperation with the Office of the President, the Government and relevant departments. Our duty is to provide comprehensive support to those who sacrificed their health for the defense of Ukraine,- the Minister of Defense emphasized.

Title: The Tavria combat module with a large-caliber machine gun is now in service with the Ukrainian army
Description: About this informs Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. The module can be installed on armored combat vehicles or serve to equip ground robotic platforms. The machine gun turret captures and accompanies targets with the help of a control system, and can conduct aimed fire at moving objects. Can work both day and night. The entire module is protected by armor protection capable of withstanding the impact of bullets from small arms and protecting against debris. When installed on an armored vehicle, the control panel of the combat module and the operator's monitor are located inside the armored combat vehicle. This provides additional protection for the serviceman-operator of the module in battle. We remind you that manufacturers and developers of anti-aircraft samples with additional questions about the process of codification of products can contact the Main Directorate for Life Cycle Support of Armaments and Military Equipment by e-mail: mdalc@mil.ua As reported by ArmyInform, during 9 months of 2024 the Ministry of Defense codified and authorized 175 models of motor vehicles for use in the Defense Forces, including 76 of domestic production.

Title: Alcoholic? — our attack aircraft showed that the Russian soldiers are burning well
Description: The video of combat work was made public on November 2 on the brigade's channel. In addition to the burned manpower, the stormtroopers destroyed 2 more enemy armored personnel carriers (one of them was directly hit by a sniper in the tower) and the shelter of Russian mortars. -Napalm fallout in landings of Kharkiv Region: FPV-terror against the occupiers continues!… Another group of Russians burned out like a Polynesian bonfire,- the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, the contract occupants, captured by the fighters of the 3rd Assault Brigade, were ready to shoot their own, and now going in the Russian volunteer corps and want to stay in Ukraine.

Title: Three rockets and more than 20 anti-aircraft missiles: the enemy increased the shelling of Kharkiv r...
Description: Details of the situation in the Kharkiv direction and enemy losses were informed at Kharkiv OTU. During the past day, the enemy tried to storm once in the Vovchansk region, but was unsuccessful. The defense forces respond adequately to the actions of the enemy and continue to effectively destroy the manpower, weapons and military equipment of the Russian occupiers. The enemy's losses during the past day amounted to 94, of which 32 were irreversible, 62 were sanitary. Also, the enemy lost 46 units of weapons and military equipment destroyed and damaged, in particular: In addition , in the north of Kharkiv Oblast, the Defense Forces of Ukraine destroyed 42 personnel shelters, 6 ammunition storage sites, and 1 UAV launching position. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that Russian troops continue to shell Kharkiv region on a massive scale: there are dead and wounded.

Title: To hell and back on a quad bike - our scouts cleared the road from enemy mines under intense fire
Description: The video was released on November 2 on the battalion channel. Two scouts on an ATV went out at night to remove anti-tank mines that the enemy had scattered on the road along which they expected our equipment to advance. On the way, the scouts were spotted by the enemy, who started shelling. But thanks to the speed of movement, ours were able to leave the firing zone. In two places, they cleared the road of mines. When they were returning, they came under fire again. The debris damaged the tank of the ATV, because the scouts had to cover a large part of the route on foot. The shelling did not stop even for a moment, but the fighters were able to run to the hiding place. -On these shots, fighters are demining the road to enemy positions under fire. Despite the shelling, hit vehicles and barrage of fire, they complete the task and move to the shelter. Later, ours took the enemy's positions,- the battalion commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 425th Skala Assault Battalion captured heroic battle of his brother, who repelled the assault of the enemy group in the Pokrovsky direction.

Title: The Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces discussed with the Czech delegation the situation at the ...
Description: He wrote about this on his page on Facebook. General Syrskyi informed his Czech colleagues about the difficult situation on the front line, where active combat operations continue in separate areas, which requires constant updating of the resources of Ukrainian units. He noted that the Armed Forces of Ukraine are currently holding back one of the most powerful offensives of Russian troops since the beginning of the full-scale invasion. The Czech Republic has proven itself as a loyal ally of Ukraine and the initiator of a number of important initiatives. Among them are coalitions that contribute to the development of capabilities in the field of artillery, armored vehicles, aviation and the integrated air defense/missile defense system. At the end of the meeting, General Oleksandr Syrskyi thanked Lieutenant General Karel Rzehka, as well as the government and people of the Czech Republic for supporting Ukraine, expressing hope for further implementation of joint initiatives. As reported by ArmyInform, Alexander Syrsky and Charles Brown discussed the next stages of military support.

Title: Artillery covered the Kherson region: three children with serious injuries are in the hospital
Description: This was notified by Oleksandr Prokudin, head of Kherson OVA. Rescuers unblocked the body of a dead 40-year-old woman from under the rubble. She received injuries incompatible with life. Two more children were injured as a result of the shelling. They are a 10-year-old boy and an 11-year-old girl. They were diagnosed with explosive injuries, shrapnel wounds and a fracture. They were hospitalized. A 67-year-old woman was also injured. She has blast and brain injuries, as well as a broken tibia. We will remind, as a result of shelling, 16 were wounded -year-old child. She has polytrauma. The girl was hospitalized in serious condition. Doctors are giving her all the help she needs. As noted by the head of Kherson MBA Roman Mrochko, a 59-year-old man was hospitalized. He came under fire in the central part of Kherson. The victim has a contusion, explosive and closed craniocerebral injuries, multiple shrapnel injuries. As reported by ArmiyaInform, Russian troops launched large-scale strikes on the Kherson region last night, attacking both populated areas and critical infrastructure. As a result of shelling, 8 people were wounded people.

Title: - Don't die in Ukraine! Surrender! - drones drop not only bombs, but also leaflets on the occupiers
Description: A video of such work was released on November 2 on the brigade's channel. The leaflets are attached to the drone, which flies to enemy positions, where it is dropped on the heads of the Russians. !Our brigade uses leaflets as one of the means of information warfare, scattering them over enemy positions. These leaflets contain calls for surrender, guaranteeing humane treatment and safety for those who lay down their arms. The purpose of such actions is to reduce the morale of the enemy and avoid losses on both sides,- the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, soldiers of the 42nd separate mechanized brigade thanks to unmanned aerial vehicles destroy enemy targets.

Title: In the Kyiv region, an elderly woman was injured by enemy drones: she suffered a shrapnel wound to t...
Description: reported the head of Kyiv OVA Ruslan Kravchenko. from district hospitals. The condition is satisfactory. All necessary medical assistance is provided. As of 12:00, 8 private houses, an apartment in a multi-story building, and two outbuildings were damaged in four districts of the region. The damage is minor - broken windows, doors, damaged facades and roofs. In addition, power lines were damaged. Currently, 1,860 subscribers in one of the settlements of the region are left without electricity. Also, as a result of falling fragments of downed targets, a combine burned in a private household. It became known that as a result of an attack by Russian drones on Kyiv, debris was recorded falling in the Dnipro district on the territory residential building. Two cars were damaged. As ArmiyaInform reported, on the morning of November 2, Kyiv was again attacked by Russian troops. As a result of the drone attack of the armed forces rf across Kyiv, the fall of debris has already been recorded in six districts of the capital — in Solomyansk, Svyatoshynsk, Shevchenkovsk, Holosiivsk, Pechersk and Dniprovsk.

Title: Rustem Umerov and Lloyd Austin discussed the involvement of North Korean soldiers by Russia
Description: He wrote about this on his Facebook page. Rustem Umyerov expressed gratitude to the American partners for their constant support of Ukraine in its struggle for independence. The main topic of the negotiations was the discussion of hostilities in the Pokrovsk and Kursk directions, as well as Russia's involvement of troops from the DPRK in the war against Ukraine. In addition, the parties focused on further US support in the development of Ukraine's defense industry. Rustem Umyerov emphasized that Ukraine is actively developing its own production of weapons and is grateful to the United States for assistance in this direction. The ministers confirmed that cooperation between Ukraine and the United States remains an important component of success on the battlefield, and joint efforts are aimed at further strengthening Ukraine's defense capabilities. As reported by ArmyInform, the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov held negotiations in Kyiv with the bipartisan delegation of the US Congress, which was headed by the Chairman of the House of Representatives Committee on Armed Forces, Congressman Mike Rogers. The US Ambassador to Ukraine Bridget Brink also took part in the meeting.

Title: Russia sent more than 70 drones to Ukraine this night: Air defense forces destroyed most of them
Description: This was reported by the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The air attack was repulsed by anti-aircraft missile forces, aviation, electronic warfare units and mobile fire groups of the Air Force and the Defense Forces of Ukraine. As of 11:00 a.m., 39 enemy UAVs were shot down in the Kirovohrad, Kyiv, Sumy, and Poltava regions. 21 drones were lost in location, 5 UAVs returned to Russia. There are about 5 attack UAVs in the air. Combat work continues. The information is being clarified and updated. According to preliminary data, as a result of the Russian attack, due to falling debris, apartment buildings and private buildings were damaged in Sumy region, Poltava region, Kyiv region, and Odesa region. As reported by ArmyInform, -it is necessary to liquidate the storage bases of the Shaheds-: The President reacted to the night attack.

Title: -Prove that it's yours-: at TOT, the occupiers force property owners to appear with Russian passport...
Description: This was reported by Artem Lysohor, head of the Luhansk OVA. Cars are stopped at roadblocks for a thorough inspection, with particular attention given to men. As a result of such inspections, traffic jams are formed on some highways. In addition, the occupation authorities are actively engaged in the -nationalization- of non-residential real estate in the region. In Seversko-Donetsk, such objects are determined by addresses. And in Starobil region, they took a different route: the occupiers publish photos of real estate, the owner of which has to prove his right to it within 30 days. For this, it is necessary to provide documents and have a Russian passport. After the expiration of the term, ownership will be transferred to the occupying administration. Such actions indicate increased control and active confiscation of property in the occupied regions. As reported by ArmyInform, the invaders in Siverskodonetsk are actively block the mobile signal even in remote places that local residents used in emergencies.

Title: - It is necessary to liquidate the storage bases of the martyrs: the President reacted to the night ...
Description: He wrote about this in his Telegram channel. Today, from four o'clock in the morning, an air alert was announced in Ukraine due to an attack by Russian drones, which resulted in damage and casualties in various districts of Kyiv. Strikes were also recorded in Poltava Oblast, Sumy Oblast and Kharkiv Oblast. Volodymyr Zelenskyy expressed his gratitude to the Ukrainian defenders of the sky, who daily prevent the attacks of the -Shaheed- drones. He emphasized that this year the threat of -shaheeds- has become permanent, because these strike drones, provided to Russia by Iran, have become one of the main tools of terror against Ukraine. The president called for increased international pressure on Russia to destroy its ability to produce such weapons. He emphasized the need to eliminate the storage bases of -shaheed- and the infrastructure of their production and logistics. -Terrorists know how to use the time given to them by the indecision of the free world,- he emphasized. As reported by ArmyInform, the consequences of the attack on Kyiv: a partially destroyed high-rise building in one of the districts.

Title: Russians' money is burning: the Ministry of Defense announced how much enemy equipment was destroyed...
Description: About this informs the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. This cost the budget of the aggressor country the equivalent of at least half a billion US dollars. In addition, the irretrievable and sanitary losses of the Rosarmy in personnel during this period amounted to 41,980 people. This exceeds the number of conventionally more than three motorized rifle divisions. In October, the Defense Forces also destroyed and damaged 279 enemy tanks. These are conditionally 9 tank battalions (a tank battalion has 31 vehicles). The estimated cost of such a number of tanks is at least 400 million US dollars. the Russian Air Defense Forces lost 31 vehicles destroyed and shot down in a month. Among the most expensive is the latest 55Zh6M Nebo-M system. This is a multifunctional mobile radar complex for detecting aerodynamic and ballistic objects at medium and high altitudes. Her estimated worth is at least $100 million. The list of -fat targets- includes at least 5 anti-aircraft missile systems of the occupiers from the -BUK- family. The cost of one such, depending on the modification, ranges from 40 to 50 million US dollars. In October, the Russian army also suffered significant losses in artillery. Defense forces destroyed and engaged more than 1,184 enemy artillery systems. And this is conventionally about 65 art divisions. The estimated cost of this amount of artillery is more than 900 million US dollars. In total, more than 20,000 pieces of artillery have already been destroyed and damaged since the start of the large-scale invasion. If we estimate the total losses of the enemy's ATS for the month of October, their value will reach more than 2.7 billion dollars. What can you buy for that amount? For example, 33,000 school buses for children in the Russian countryside. But Russia chose to finance war and murder. As reported by ArmyInform, dozens of vehicles and BBM, almost 1,300 infantrymen: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine announced the losses of the enemy.

Title: Oleksandr Syrskyi and Charles Brown discussed the next stages of military support
Description: He wrote about this on his Facebook page. Oleksandr Syrsky informed his American colleague about the situation on the front line, which remains difficult. The enemy does not cease assault actions in several directions, using air superiority and long-range firepower, and also has a significant advantage in artillery shells. They also discussed in detail the urgent needs of the Defense Forces of Ukraine to deter the Russian invaders and the next stages of military support. The Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces thanked General Charles Brown and the US Government for another package of military aid and for consistent support to Ukraine. In his turn, the Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff of the US Armed Forces assured of full support for the Defense Forces of Ukraine and continued practical assistance in our fight against the Russian aggressor. As reported by ArmyInform, the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov held negotiations in Kyiv with the bipartisan delegation of the US Congress, which was headed by the Chairman of the House of Representatives Committee on Armed Forces, Congressman Mike Rogers. The US Ambassador to Ukraine Bridget Brink also took part in the meeting.

Title: Attacks in Donetsk region: deaths and serious damage in three districts
Description: This was reported by the head of Donetsk OVA Vadym Filashkin. In Pokrovsky District, in the village of Suhi Yaly of the Kurakhiv community, two people were killed, and another person was injured. An administrative building was damaged in Novotroitskyi. In Kramatorsk district Liman was under fire, where a two-story residential building and an administrative building were damaged. In the village of Zakitne, one house was destroyed, two more were damaged. Four private houses and two industrial buildings were damaged in Kostyantynivka, and a residential building was damaged in the village of Virolyubivka. Four houses were damaged in the Bakhmut district, in Siversk, and in the Chasovoyarsk community, one person died due to shelling, nine private houses and a multi-storey building were also damaged. During the day, Russian troops carried out nine shellings on populated areas of Donetsk region. 1,554 people, including 38 children, were evacuated from areas near the front line. As reported by ArmyInform, during last day, numerous shellings were recorded in Kharkiv Oblast, as a result of which civilians and representatives of security forces were killed and injured.

Title: Ukraine and the United States are coordinating actions to strengthen defenses before winter
Description: He wrote about this on his Facebook page. -We discussed our common goal of defeating an enemy that has significant territorial, industrial and human resources. We have been defending our freedom for more than 10 years, and this is possible, in particular, thanks to the support of the United States,- the Minister of Defense of Ukraine emphasized. Rustem Umyerov thanked American partners for their leadership and large-scale assistance to Ukraine. -During the visit, we presented the capabilities of our defense-industrial complex and discussed areas where the US can help strengthen our production,- added the Minister. The Ukrainian side informed the delegation about the situation on the battlefield. the Russian enemy, in particular with the support of North Korea, continues to build up its forces and equipment. To strengthen the defense of Ukraine, additional ammunition, artillery systems, engineering equipment and air defense systems are needed. Among the important issues discussed at the meeting is the lifting of restrictions on the use of Western weapons on the territory of the Russian Federation, which will allow Ukraine to gain an advantage at the front, especially before the onset of winter. The meeting was another important step in strengthening the Ukrainian-American partnership and coordination to ensure the security and stability of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, the US Department of Defense unveiled military aid package (PDA) for Ukraine in the amount of $425 million.

Title: Russia continues its attacks on the Kherson region: a 16-year-old girl is in serious condition
Description: informs Kherson OVA about this. Around 8:30, enemy artillery hit the Korabelny district of Kherson. A 63-year-old man was injured as a result of the shelling. He was diagnosed with a blast injury, a contusion, a traumatic amputation of his right forearm and fractured both lower legs. The victim was hospitalized in serious condition. Also, around nine o'clock in the morning, the Russian army struck Zelenivka with artillery. Previously, a 16-year-old child was wounded as a result of the shelling. She has polytrauma. The girl was hospitalized in serious condition. Doctors provide her with all the necessary help. In addition, medics provided assistance to a 62-year-old resident of the city of Stanislav, who was injured in the morning as a result of an attack by a Russian drone. The woman received an explosive injury, a craniocerebral injury and a shrapnel injury to her forearm. She is under the supervision of doctors. The shelling of the Kherson region continues, local authorities call on residents to observe safety measures and, if possible, stay in shelters. As reported by ArmiyaInform, Russian troops launched large-scale strikes on the Kherson region last night, attacking both populated areas and critical infrastructure. As a result of shelling, 8 people were wounded people.

Title: The President of Ukraine has set a new date for the Day of Missile Troops and Artillery
Description: This Decree No. 748/2024 dated November 2, 2024 was published on the website of the head of state. The previous Presidential Decree of October 31, 1997, according to which the professional holiday of gunners was celebrated on November 3, became invalid. This date had Soviet roots and was associated with the events of World War II. The new day of celebration, December 4, symbolizes the connection with the Ukrainian Christian tradition, because St. Barbara is considered the patron saint of artillerymen in many countries. The legend of St. Barbara, where lightning and thunder became a symbol of her protection, symbolically represents the power and destructive power of artillery weapons. According to medieval European tradition, Saint Barbara became the patron saint of all those dealing with explosions and destructive force. She is honored as the patron saint of gunners in the armed forces of Spain, France, Poland, the United States, and from now on in Ukraine.

Title: The Security Service of Ukraine detained officials who sold tickets to the rear for evaders
Description: This is reported by the Security Service of Ukraine. In particular, the organizers of frauds were arrested in the Kyiv, Kharkiv, Rivne and Kirovohrad regions. Among those detained are officials of military medical commissions, employees of medical and social expert commissions (MSEK), as well as the owner of a private university and recidivist fraudsters. The organizers of the schemes took from 5 to 20 thousand dollars for helping conscripts avoid the draft due to forged documents. In Kyiv region, the deputy head of the VLK was exposed for forging medical certificates of unfitness for service, and in Kharkiv Oblast, the head of the VLK was detained, who was selling fake certificates. In the Rivne region, five participants in the corruption scheme were suspected, including an official of the MSEK and doctors. All those detained face up to 9 years in prison. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law or risk your life, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces and recruiting centers.

Title: -Special Buryats- on the border: what Russia armed the North Korean soldiers with
Description: This is reported by the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. According to information, North Korean soldiers are armed with 60-mm mortars, AK-12 assault rifles, RPK/PKM machine guns, SVD/SVCH sniper rifles, Phoenix anti-tank missile systems, and RPG-7. Some of them were given night vision devices, thermal imagers, collimator sights and binoculars. In the Russian army, North Korean soldiers were nicknamed -special Buryats-. Preparation of North Korean forces for participation in the war against Ukraine takes place at five training grounds in the Russian Far East. As reported by ArmyInform, North Koreans will be passed off as Kalmyks, Tuvans and Buryats: it is planned to be used near Suji. We will remind, the President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky declared that North Korea has already started to play an active role in the war on the side of Russia, which poses a serious threat not only to Ukraine, but also to the whole world.

Title: Russian troops continue massive attacks in the Kharkiv region: there are dead and wounded
Description: Kharkiv OVA Oleg Synegubov informs about this. In Kharkiv, in the Osnovyansky district, around 16:08, the enemy struck a powerful blow. 26 buildings and 12 cars were damaged. 13 civilians were injured, one policeman was killed, and another 36 policemen and one employee of the State Emergency Service were injured. In Kupyansk, a five-story residential building was hit in the evening. Three people were injured: a 44-year-old man and two women aged 68 and 75. In the village of Vilkhuvatka of the Kupyan district, a residential building was partially destroyed as a result of shelling. Three local residents were injured - two men aged 59 and 87 and an 84-year-old woman who suffered an acute stress reaction but did not require hospitalization. Several villages of the Kharkiv district were also shelled at night. In the village of Slatine of the Dergachyv community, as a result of the fire, private houses and farm buildings were damaged, the fire engulfed one of the buildings. In the village of Kozacha Lopan, residential buildings and farm buildings were damaged. Also, as part of the evacuation measures, 133 people, including 4 children, were evacuated from the Kupyanskyi and Borivskyi directions during the day. As reported by ArmyInform, the troops of the Russian Federation /->launched a rocket attack on the place of deployment of the police in Kharkiv, as a result of which one policeman died.

Title: the Russians shelled the Kherson region: missile strikes on educational and medical institutions
Description: This was reported by Oleksandr Prokudin, head of Kherson OVA. Beryslav, Mykilske, Tomyna Balka, Stanislav, Shiroka Balka, Tyaginka, Tomarine, Kachkarivka, Bilozerka, Havrylivka, Komysany, Antonivka, Prydniprovske and Lviv came under enemy shelling and airstrikes. The enemy also directed two missile strikes on Kherson. According to the head of the OVA, the Russian military targeted educational and medical institutions, a factory, a railway company and a maintenance station. Three high-rise buildings and 26 private houses were damaged in residential areas. The occupiers also destroyed gas pipelines, farm buildings, construction equipment and private cars. As reported by ArmyInform, during the day occupiers inflicted 237 strikes on 9 settlements of the Zaporizhzhia region.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , I decree: to start holding a nationwide minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, to be announced in all mass media regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: The defense forces damaged the control post of the invaders
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. An operation is also underway in the Kursk region. Our soldiers inflict significant losses in manpower, equipment and actively undermine the offensive potential of the enemy in the rear to the occupying forces. Over the past day, missile troops and artillery of the Defense Forces hit one radar station, one air defense vehicle, three personnel concentration areas, one UAV control post, one UAV warehouse and one more control point of the invaders. We will remind you that last The loss of the Russian invaders amounted to 1,270 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 8 tanks, 17 armored combat vehicles, 37 artillery systems, 28 UAVs of operational-tactical level, 76 cars and 4 units of special equipment of the occupiers. As reported by ArmyInform, bloody clashes in Donbas: the enemy unsuccessfully storms our positions near Toretsk.

Title: Zaporizhzhia is under fire: the occupiers struck 237 strikes on civilian infrastructure
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of the Zaporizhzhya OVA. Russian troops carried out an air strike on Novoandriivka. In addition, 88 UAVs of various modifications attacked Lobkovo, Gulyaipole, Novoandriivka, Robotine, Mala Tokmachka, Novodarivka, and Malynyvka. According to Ivan Fedorov, Mala Tokmachka and Robotyne were covered by 8 rounds of anti-aircraft fire. Ivan Fedorov noted that 140 artillery shells were fired on the territory of Lobkovo, Gulyaipol, Novoandriivka, Robotyno, Malaya Tokmachka, Malynyvka, Novodarivka, Orikhov and Preobrazhenka. -We received 32 reports of the destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure facilities. Civilians were not harmed,- he added. As ArmiyaInform reported, on the morning of November 2, Kyiv was again attacked by Russian troops. Currently, falling debris is recorded in two districts of the capital.

Title: Bloody clashes in Donbas: the enemy is unsuccessfully storming our positions near Toretsk
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. In addition, it carried out 3,674 attacks, 106 of them from rocket salvo fire systems, and also used to destroy 1,043 kamikaze drones. The aggressor carried out airstrikes, in particular in the areas of Krasnopillya, Velyka Pisarivka, Zhuravka, Khotyn, Turya, Myropillya, Dergachi, Kupyansk, Bochkovye, Riznikove, Hoptivka, Kalinove, Vilkhuvatka, Nadiya, Siversk, Toretsk, Kostyantynivka, Petrivka, Oleksandropil, Stara Mykolaivka, Myrolyubivka, Kurakhove, Dalnye, Suhy Yaly, Velyka Novosilka, Novoandriivka and Lviv. In the Kharkiv direction, the enemy once tried to storm in the Vovchansk region, but was unsuccessful. In the Kupyansk direction, there were five attacks by the occupiers during the day. Defense forces repelled enemy assaults near Petropavlivka, Lozova, Kruglyakivka and Zagryzovo. In the Lyman direction the enemy attacked 16 times. Tried to move forward in the direction of Druzhelyubivka, Katerynivka, Grekivka, Makiivka, Ternivka and in Serebryansk forest, one skirmish is still ongoing. In the Kramatorsk direction, the occupiers attacked three times in the Stupochky area. All nearby attacks were stopped. On the Toretsk direction, the enemy launched three attacks near Toretsk and Shcherbinivka, the enemy suffered losses and retreated. In the Pokrovsky direction our defenders stopped 39 assaults and offensive actions of the aggressor towards the settlements of Sukha Balka, Suhy Yar, Myrolyubivka, Mykolaivka, Lysivka, Krutiy Yar, Novogrodivka and Selidove. The greatest concentration of enemy attacks was near Selidovoy and Premen, where the Defense Forces repulsed 16 attacks. The most tense situation remains in the Kurakhiv direction, here the Defense Forces repelled 52 attacks on positions near Ostrivskyi, Illinka, Novoselidivka, Kreminnaya Balka, Novodmytrivka, Vovchenka, Maksimilianivka, Dalnyi, Antonivka, and Katerynivka. The occupiers most actively tried to advance in the regions of the settlements of Antonivka, Novoselidivka and Illinka. In the Vremivsk direction, the enemy launched four assaults on our positions in the Trudovoy and Maksimivka districts. In the Dnieper direction, the operational situation has not changed significantly. The enemy conducted four unsuccessful assaults. In the Volyn and Poliske directions no signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. We will remind you that last The loss of the Russian invaders amounted to 1,270 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 8 tanks, 17 armored combat vehicles, 37 artillery systems, 28 UAVs of the operational-tactical level, 76 cars and 4 units of special equipment of the occupiers.

Title: Russia took the missile carrier to the Black Sea
Description: This is reported by the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. There are no enemy ships in the Sea of ​​Azov. In the Mediterranean Sea, 1 enemy ship, which is a carrier of Kalibr cruise missiles with a total salvo of up to 8 missiles. During the day in the interests of the Russian Federation, passage through the Kerch Strait was carried out: The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention for the Safety of Life at Sea of ​​1974 (SOLAS) by turning off automatic identification systems. As reported by ArmyInform, the Black Sea Fleet of Russia is forced to hide to Novorossiysk or take a risk by going out into the open sea to meet Ukrainian drones.

Title: Dozens of vehicles and BBM, almost 1,300 infantrymen: the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukrai...
Description: This is informs the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The total combat losses of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 02.11.24 are approximately: -In connection with the constant arrival of refined intelligence data, there was a need to adjust some positions of the total losses of the enemy - UAVs. The total figure has been adjusted, and daily losses are reported as normal,- the agency said. As reported by ArmyInform, the Defense Forces repelled 126 attacks: Ukrainian soldiers restrain the advance of Russians in all directions.

Title: A drone attacked a high-rise building in Sumy: a pregnant woman was injured
Description: This is reported by the Office of the Prosecutor General. The attack took place on November 1, 2024 at around 19:40. The drone struck a nine-story building, causing significant damage.
