Title: Чекав на росію та допомагав бомбити Сумщину: СБУ затримала ексрегіонала
Description: Про це інформує Служба безпеки України. The attacker, who is 48 years old, is accused of spying for the Defense Forces and calling for Russian occupiers to strike the city. The investigation established that the suspect was covertly monitoring the movement of Ukrainian military echelons and the locations of the units of the Armed Forces defending Sumy Oblast. To collect information, he drove his own car, recording data on photos and videos. The traitor also tried to get additional information from acquaintances during conversations. The ex-deputy transferred the collected data to an FSB staff member, whose identity has already been established by the Ukrainian special service. In his reports, he not only provided coordinates, but also called for the acceleration of shelling of the city, in particular, on the buildings of territorial assembly centers. The SBU documented the agent's subversive activities and detained him at his residence in Shostka. Зловмисник був завербований фсб дистанційно в липні цього року. During the search, law enforcement officers seized a mobile phone with evidence of his criminal activity. Йому оголошено підозру за статтею про державну зраду в умовах воєнного стану. Ексдепутату загрожує довічне позбавлення волі з конфіскацією майна. As reported by ArmyInform, the SBU and cyber police a 47-year-old local resident was detained in Kharkiv, who worked for the Russian space forces, helping to configure the Condor-FKA and Obzor-R spy satellites.

Title: -Bomb- into the ground: Night drone attacks effectively deter the enemy
Description: Ruslan Gabinet, deputy commander of the 5th separate assault brigade of Kyiv, told about this on the air of the -Yedini Novyni- marathon. Ruslan Gabinet noted that the effectiveness of the use of drones increases at night, because it is easier for Russians to detect them during the day. -Night bombing protects our drones. During the day, the enemy can spot drones, visually identify them and shoot them down with small arms. He cannot do this at night. That's why we have this - we plan a fire attack at night. We mainly use the night to destroy more of the enemy's shelters,- said Ruslan Gabinet. As reported by ArmyInform, -meat assaults- in Toretsk expire, because the Russians are gradually running out and need to be replenished.

Title: -Help will be provided in spite of all circumstances-: The President praised the heroes who save our...
Description: This was stated President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy. The head of state thanked everyone who goes to the places after the Russian strikes in all our regions, dismantles debris, puts out fires, and provides first aid. And in general - ensures the salvation of our people. -Emergency services, police, medics, volunteers, everyone who joins in to save lives, Ukraine is proud of you,- added the President. As reported by ArmyInform, the attack of drones in Poltava Oblast: -budynku/->firefighters took two people out of the burning house.

Title: Our paratroopers told what losses the Russians suffered in Kurshchyna
Description: informs about this by the Command of Airborne Assault Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Thus, sanitary and irreversible losses among the Russian occupiers amounted to 7,980 people. As for the enemy's equipment and weapons, there were also serious gains here. A total of 58 tanks, 162 BMPs, 46 armored personnel carriers, 136 artillery systems, 2 rocket salvo systems, 592 vehicles, 46 EW stations and other special equipment were destroyed and damaged. In addition, 3 rotorcraft and 146 enemy drones of various types were destroyed in the air. Namely: Ka-52 combat helicopters — 2, Mi-8 — 1, reconnaissance drones — 111 of various types, attack drones — 34 (-Shakhed,- -Lancet-) and 1 Orion reconnaissance-strike UAV. It is worth emphasizing the number 9874 - that's how many enemy fpv drones were suppressed (disrupted the execution of missions) by paratroopers' EW. Significant successes of the maroon berets and in the realm of trophies. So, almost 300 enemy servicemen were captured, as well as 9 tanks, 4 armored personnel carriers, 9 guns, 6 mortars, etc.

Title: Residents of the People's Republic of Ukraine on the verge of isolation: new rules for mobile commun...
Description: This was reported by Artem Lysogor, head of the Luhansk OVA. Even on the roofs of high-rise buildings, the signal is now unavailable, making it difficult to try to stay in touch. Smartphones can be used only by representatives of the occupation administration and persons close to them. In addition, from January 2026, new restrictions on access to medical services will apply to residents of the so-called LNR. Many hospitals have already been repurposed as military hospitals, which makes access to doctors difficult. From next year, not only a Russian passport, but also a health insurance policy will be needed to receive medical care. Without insurance, only emergency medical services will remain available. As reported by ArmyInform, the Kremlin is considering a draft law which -lnr/->classifies information about the activities of the occupation authorities, in particular on the territory of the so-called lnr. This will make it possible to hide numerous crimes, including war crimes.

Title: -We are slowly burying them all-: the cemetery of the occupiers in Toretsk is growing in geometric p...
Description: Mykhailo Stoykevich, Deputy chief of staff - head of the planning group of the headquarters of the 49th separate assault battalion -Karpatska Sich-. In particular, the spokesman debunked the myth about the infinity of the Russian army and emphasized that the enemy's manpower is also running out and needs to be replenished. -They also expire, they are also replenished. We know that they have areas where they accumulate and settle. If there is a pause, it means one thing - they bring in new people, train them. And then we meet them,- said Mykhailo Stoykevich. Earlier ArmyInform reported that Ukrainian troops are holding Toretsk - the enemy has not yet advanced beyond the eastern outskirts of the city, the number of assaults is decreasing.

Title: The safety of servicemen is a priority: a new training program is being implemented in the Armed For...
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. Within the framework of this program, approved by the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, General Oleksandr Syrsky, a pilot project is being implemented that extends the basic combined military training from one to one and a half months. The new program takes into account current challenges, including national and patriotic training. In October, the Main Directorate of Psychological Support of the Armed Forces of Ukraine held specialized meetings with specialized managers dedicated to improving the quality of national-patriotic training. Experienced officers and scientists visited the training centers and shared their knowledge and experience. The main purpose of these events is to form unified approaches to learning, exchange experience and find new, interesting teaching methods. It is designed to make the training process more dynamic and effective, which will contribute to improving the quality of military training and saving their lives. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukraine and Denmark discussed key support within fighter and air defense coalitions.

Title: Another devastating night in Kharkiv region: civilians and houses under enemy fire
Description: This was reported by Oleg Synegubov, the head of Kharkiv OVA. A private house and three cars were damaged by shelling in Kharkiv, Kyiv district at 21:21. A 37-year-old man and a 49-year-old woman were injured. At 2:40 a.m., a guided aerial bomb hit an open area in the village of Bilashi in the Kharkiv district. In the city of Dergachi at 21:05, the roof of a two-story building caught fire as a result of shelling. Three men were injured: 39, 42 and 64 years old. A 75-year-old man died as a result of shelling in the Kupyan region at 15:00. A 42-year-old civilian was injured in the village of Kucherivka of the Petropavlovsk community at 12:13 p.m. Fighting intensified at the front. In the Kharkiv direction, the enemy stormed three times the positions of the Armed Forces near Vovchansk and Vovchansk Khutori. In the Kupyansk direction, 15 attacks took place during the day, in particular in the areas of Petropavlivka, Kolisnikivka, Lozova and Vyshnevo. Also, as a result of intensified evacuation measures, 91 people, including one child, were evacuated from the Kupyansky and Borivskyi directions. As reported by ArmyInform, on A Russian aerial bomb caused a fire at a civilian enterprise in Kharkiv Oblast, there are casualties. We will remind you that in Kharkiv, emergency rescue work and debris removal in the 9th floor, which was targeted by the enemy with a KAB, was completed.

Title: Since the beginning of the year, the Russians have launched almost 7,000 Shaheds across Ukraine
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. Of these drones, 1,185 were destroyed or suppressed by Ukrainian defenders, 738 units were lost in location, and another 29 UAVs left the controlled airspace of our state. In general, since the beginning of 2024, the enemy has launched 6,987 attack UAVs on the territory of Ukraine. Mostly, enemy drones targeted civilian and critical infrastructure of Ukraine. Thanks to the professionalism and skill of the servicemen of the Defense Forces, it was possible to save thousands of lives of our people from the Russian air terror, to protect hundreds of homes of Ukrainian citizens and important state objects from destruction. Anti-aircraft missile troops, aviation, EW units and mobile fire groups continue to protect Ukrainian skies around the clock. As reported by ArmyInform, a massive night attack: in the sky over Ukraine, Air Defense Forces shot down more than 30 drones.

Title: The border between magic and reality has been erased: a prosthesis that can understand the user's in...
Description: This was reported by the Deputy Prime Minister of of Innovation, Development of Education, Science and Technology, Minister of Digital Transformation of Ukraine Mykhailo Fedorov. The new system, called MARS, uses sensors and artificial intelligence to recognize the user's muscle movements, allowing the prosthesis to -understand- the user's intentions. This makes controlling the prosthesis more natural and simple, and also opens up possibilities for controlling other technologies, including drones. The user will be able to control the drone by changing the position of the prosthesis and tensing the muscles, similar to how a computer mouse controls the cursor. Esper Bionics is currently testing a prototype and plans to launch it on the market next year. The technology shows a future where the line between magic and technology is becoming increasingly blurred. As ArmiyaInform reported, this year, thanks to the support of the Brave1 platform, Ukrainian developers of defense innovations attracted more than $25 million of foreign investment. This is a significant jump compared to last year, when the amount of investment was $5 million.

Title: Our arta hit the areas of concentration of personnel of the occupiers
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. In addition, the operation in the Kursk region is ongoing. According to the available information, the Russian aviation has carried out 21 strikes using 33 anti-aircraft missiles on its territory over the past day. Our soldiers inflict significant losses in manpower and equipment on the occupying troops and actively undermine the offensive potential of the enemy in the rear. Over the past day, the missile troops and artillery of the Defense Forces hit one means of missile troops and artillery and nine areas of concentration of personnel and equipment of the Russian invaders. We will remind you that last The loss of the Russian invaders amounted to 1,460 people. Also, Ukrainian soldiers destroyed 6 tanks, 20 armored combat vehicles, 26 artillery systems, one MLRS, 25 operational-tactical UAVs, one cruise missile, 77 cars and nine units of special equipment of the occupiers. As reported by ArmyInform, there were 170 clashes with the enemy at the front: The Armed Forces repel Russian offensives under constant fire.

Title: The Russian army shelled an educational institution and houses in the Kherson region: there were cas...
Description: This was reported by Oleksandr Prokudin, head of Kherson OVA. According to him, Russian troops attacked Antonivka, Prydniprovske, Sadov, Tomina Balka, Bilozerka, Honcharne, Stanislav, Sofiivka, Nadezhdivka, Molodizhne, Beryslav, Zolota Balka, Tyahinka, Krupytsa, Dudchany, Novooleksandrivka, Novokairy, Tomarine, and Kherson. As a result of shelling, an educational institution and 11 private houses in residential quarters of the region were damaged. Due to the aggression of the Russian military, one person died, 13 others were injured. As reported by ArmyInform, as a result of the missile attack on Odesa Russian troops attacked the fire department.

Title: What a terrible suicide: the Russian hid under the car and threw himself with a machine gun, but did...
Description: About this notified and published the corresponding video in the GUR of the MOU. One of the recent strikes occurred when two groups of Russian troops stopped by the road. A Ukrainian FPV drone unexpectedly attacked them from the air, causing panic among the soldiers. One of the occupiers, having thrown down the machine gun, tried to hide under the UAZ car, but it did not save him. The video recorded episodes of a successful operation: the destruction of Russian soldiers and the setting fire to their equipment. The campaign to destroy the logistics of the Russian occupying forces at the front continues. As reported by ArmyInform, the occupiers were going to build a crossing in Kharkiv Oblast, but /->fighters of the Third Separate Assault Brigade struck their -bridge-builder-.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , decree: to start a national minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, which should be announced in all mass media, regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: The enemy is absent in the Black and Azov seas, but active in the Mediterranean
Description: The Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported this. In the Mediterranean Sea, 1 enemy ship, which is a carrier of Kalibr cruise missiles with a total salvo of up to 8 missiles. During the day in the interests of the Russian Federation, passage through the Kerch Strait was carried out: The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention for the Safety of Life at Sea of ​​1974 (SOLAS) by turning off automatic identification systems. As ArmyInform reported, the Russians are forced to hide in their base in Novorossiysk, but they have a new hobby.

Title: Massive night attack: in the sky over Ukraine, Air Defense Forces shot down more than 30 drones
Description: This is inform the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Also, the enemy attacked with 48 Shahed-type shock UAVs and drones of an unknown type from the directions of Orel, Kursk - Russian Federation. The enemy's tactical aircraft struck with guided aerial bombs on Kharkiv Oblast, Sumy Oblast and Zaporizhzhia. The air attack was repulsed by anti-aircraft missile forces, aviation, electronic warfare units and mobile fire groups of the Air Force and the Defense Forces of Ukraine. As of 08:00, 31 enemy UAVs have been shot down, 14 UAVs have been lost in location, three UAVs have flown in the direction of Belarus. Also, the Air Defense Forces managed to shoot down one Kh-59/69 guided air missile, the rest, due to active countermeasures, did not reach their targets. Anti-aircraft defense worked in Kirovohrad, Kyiv, Cherkasy, Vinnytsia, Zhytomyr, Khmelnytskyi, Sumy, Chernihiv and Poltava regions. According to preliminary results, there were no casualties. However, as a result of the Russian missile-drone attack, due to falling debris, several civilian enterprises were damaged, as well as apartment buildings and private houses in Poltava region, Cherkasy region, Kyiv region, and Odesa region. As reported by ArmyInform, there were 170 clashes with the enemy at the front: The Armed Forces repel the Russian offensive under constant fire.

Title: 170 clashes with the enemy at the front: the Armed Forces repel Russian offensives under constant fi...
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. In addition, the enemy fired 4,241 shots, 160 of them from MLRS. The aggressor carried out airstrikes, in particular, in the areas of the settlements of Kharkiv, Varvarivka, Kozacha Lopan, Berestov, Katerynivka, Uspenivka, Kostiantynopolske, Velyka Novosilka, Roszdolne, Kurakhove, Antonivka, Ulakly, Yurkivka, Tavriyske, Mala Tokmachka and Kozatske. In the Kharkiv direction the enemy stormed three times in the areas of the settlements of Vovchansk and Vovchanski Khutory. In the Kupyansk direction, there were 15 attacks by the occupiers during the day. The defense forces repelled enemy assaults near Petropavlivka, Kolisnikivka, Zagryzovo, Lozova, Berestovo, and Vyshnevo. In the Lyman direction the enemy attacked 21 times. Tried to advance near Katerynivka, Stepovoy, Grekivka, Terni and in Serebryansky Forest. In the Kramatorsk direction, one battle was recorded in the area of ​​Chasovoy Yar. On the Toretsk direction the enemy launched three attacks near Toretsk. In the Pokrovsky direction, our defenders stopped 35 assaults and offensive actions of the aggressor in the Promenya, Lysivka, and Vyshnevo districts. In the Kurakhiv direction the defense forces repelled 60 attacks on the positions of our troops near Novoselidivka, Kreminnaya Balka, Novodmytrivka, Ostrivskyi, Maksimilianivka, Antonivka, and Elizavetivka. The occupiers most actively tried to advance in the areas of the settlements of Antonivka and Elizavetivka. In the Vremivsk direction, the enemy carried out five assaults on our positions in the Bogoyavlenka and Trudovoy districts. It was actively used for strikes in the direction of attack and bomber aircraft. In the Orikhov direction, the occupiers attacked twice in the direction of Novodanilivka, were strongly repulsed, and suffered losses. In the Dnieper direction Russian invaders stormed the positions of our units four times, these actions did not bring them success. In the Volyn and Poliske directions no signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. We will remind you that last The loss of the Russian invaders amounted to 1,460 people. Also, Ukrainian soldiers destroyed 6 tanks, 20 armored combat vehicles, 26 artillery systems, one MLRS, 25 operational-tactical UAVs, one cruise missile, 77 cars and nine units of special equipment of the occupiers.

Title: Almost 300 strikes per day: the Russian terror of the Zaporizhia region continues
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of the Zaporizhzhya OVA. Russian troops carried out 8 airstrikes on Tavriyskyi, Yurkivka, and Malia Tokmachka. According to him, 153 UAVs of various modifications attacked Lobkovo, Gulyaipole, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Robotine, Mala Tokmachka and Malinivka. In addition, 3 shellings from the MLRS covered Mala Tokmachka and Robotyn. As the head of the OVA noted, 123 artillery shells were fired on the territory of Lobkovo, Gulyaipol, Novoandriivka, Novodanilivka, Robotyno, and Malaya Tokmachka. -We received 16 reports about the destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure facilities. Civilians were not harmed,- added Ivan Fedorov. As reported by ArmyInform, last night Russian troops attacked the Poltava community several times using drones.

Title: Almost 1,500 infantrymen, dozens of self-propelled guns and artillery systems: the General Staff of ...
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. The total combat losses of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 01.11.24 are approximately: As reported by ArmyInform, the Armed Forces of Ukraine stopped 150 Russian assaults: the enemy intensified the offensive in all directions.

Title: Drone attack in Poltava region: rescuers took two people out of a burning house
Description: This was reported by the head of the Poltava Regional Military Administration Philip Pronin. Enemy strikes damaged civilian infrastructure, with three residential buildings and an outbuilding damaged. Rescuers were able to save two people who were taken out of the burning house. Fortunately, there were no casualties. Currently, two fires have been completely extinguished, two more have been contained, and rescue operations are ongoing. More than 50 rescuers of the State Emergency Service and 14 units of equipment are involved in the liquidation of the consequences of the attacks. Psychologists are working at the site to provide assistance to the victims. As reported by ArmiyaInform, several times during the past day the enemy attacked Nikopol region. He used artillery and kamikaze drones. Got to Nikopol and Mirivska hromada.

Title: The occupiers hit the fire station in Odesa: two rescuers were wounded
Description: This was reported by the State Emergency Service of Ukraine. Two rescuers, who were heading to the shelter after the air alert was announced, were injured. They are currently in the hospital, where they are receiving all the necessary medical care. As a result of the shelling, fire engines and the building of the unit were damaged. -This strike is another terrorist act by the Russian troops, directed against those who save the lives of civilians every day,- the department emphasized. As reported by ArmyInform, last night Russian troops attacked the Poltava community several times using drones.

Title: The Armed Forces stopped 150 Russian assaults: the enemy intensified its offensive in all directions
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The occupiers launched two missile strikes using four rockets, 35 air strikes using 62 anti-aircraft missiles, 490 kamikaze drone strikes, and carried out almost 2,600 attacks on the positions of our troops and population centers using various types of weapons. In the Kharkiv direction, the occupiers launched three attacks near Vovchansk and Vovchansky Khutori. Enemy losses in the direction were 114 soldiers killed and wounded, 25 UAVs, six vehicles and four units of special transport. Also, our defenders significantly damaged an armored combat vehicle, an artillery system and three cars. On the Kupyansk direction Defense forces repelled 15 attacks. The enemy was active in the districts of Petropavlivka, Kolisnikivka, Zagryzovo, Lozova, Berestovo, and Vyshnevo. Twenty-one times the enemy attacked in the Lyman direction, tried to advance in the direction of Katerynivka, Stepovoy, Grekivka, Terni and in the Serebrian Forest. The enemy tried three times to penetrate our defenses on the Toretsk direction. During the day, the occupiers attacked in the Toretska district, and the battle is currently ongoing. In the Pokrovsky direction in the districts of Promenya, Lysivka and Vyshnevoi, our troops repelled 23 offensive and assault actions of the enemy. Two of them are still ongoing. Our troops are taking measures to maintain the designated borders, and are retaliating fiercely. According to preliminary data, the enemy lost 320 people killed and wounded, Ukrainian servicemen also destroyed two artillery systems, five armored combat vehicles, a UAV control station, a motorcycle and two cars. In addition, the tank, artillery system and BBM of the enemy were significantly damaged. The invaders remain active, trying to advance in the districts of Novoselidivka, Kreminnaya Balka, Novodmytrivka, Ostrivskyi, Maksimilianivka, Antonivka, and Elizavetivka. Battles continue in 16 locations. In the Vremivsk direction, the occupiers attacked five times near Bogoyavlenka and Trudovoy. In the Orikhov direction our troops stopped two enemy attacks in the direction of Novodanilivka. In the Dnieper direction, the situation has not undergone significant changes, no losses of positions and territories have been allowed. Ukrainian soldiers repelled three assaults by Russian invaders. In the department, the soldiers of the 79th separate amphibious assault brigade of Tavria, the 14th brigade of operational assignment named after Ivan Bohun and the 35th separate brigade of marine infantry named after Rear Admiral Mykhailo Ostrogradsky, who confidently hold the lines and inflict significant losses on the occupiers, were recognized in the department. As reported by ArmyInform, the occupiers were going to build a crossing in Kharkiv Oblast, but /->fighters of the Third Separate Assault Brigade hit their -bridge-builder-.

Medics quickly provided the victims with the necessary assistance at the scene. Another KAB hit the private sector of Kharkiv Kyiv district. As a result of the shelling, a private household was significantly damaged, but, fortunately, there were no casualties. In addition, according to the information of the Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office, on October 31 around 2:00 p.m., the Russian Armed Forces carried out artillery shelling of the city of Kup'yansk. A 73-year-old man died. Residential buildings were damaged. We will remind you that in Kharkiv, emergency rescue work and debris removal in the 9th floor, which was targeted by the enemy with a KAB, was completed. As reported by ArmiyaInform, several times during the past day the enemy attacked Nikopol region. He used artillery and kamikaze drones. Got to Nikopol and Mirivska hromada.

Title: M1A1 Abrams Weapons of Victory: Uranium Shells, Gas Turbine Engine and British Armor: American Tank ...
Description: In the 1970s, the US began developing a new main battle tank to replace the aging M60 Patton tanks. The result of this work was the M1 Abrams, which was accepted for service in 1980. Named after General Creighton Abrams, a commander during the Vietnam War, the M1 tank featured the use of composite armor (Chobham), high mobility thanks to a gas turbine engine, and the 105 mm M68A1 gun. To reduce the risks, it was decided to develop a tank according to the classic scheme with a crew of 4 and a high ballistic cannon as the main armament. Several armament options were considered: the M68 105 mm rifled gun, the British 110 mm gun and the German 120 mm smoothbore gun. The 110 mm option was rejected and the 120 mm was considered risky, leaving the 105 mm gun with the option of replacing it with a 120 mm later. During the development of the prototypes, the two companies were guided by the following basic requirements: The hull and turret of the M1A1 Abrams tank are of welded construction. The main material for the outer armor is MIL-A-11356 steel. The front parts of the hull and turret, as well as the side parts of the turret, use multi-layer armor based on the English Chobham armor. The upper front part of the case is a 50 mm steel plate. The main characteristics of the reservation: An important safety element is the presence of knockout panels, which allow to prevent an explosion in the event of an ammunition fire. Some tank modifications are also equipped with the Softkill active defense system to counter guided anti-tank missiles. Since 1985, Abrams tanks have been armed with the 120mm M256 smoothbore gun, which uses unitary projectiles with a partially incendiary case, including armor-piercing subcaliber and cumulative rounds. Due to the large diameter of the cartridges, the M1A1 ammunition was reduced to 40 rounds. Additional armament includes a 7.62 mm M240 machine gun mounted with the gun, another such machine gun near the loader hatch, and a 12.7 mm M2 machine gun on the commander's turret. The tank is also equipped with smoke grenade launchers for setting up a smoke screen. M1A1s were first used in combat during Operation Desert Storm. More than 1,800 tanks were used in the campaign to liberate Kuwait from Iraqi occupation, including 594 M1A1HA tanks and 1,178 M1A1s. The Iraqi army had about 1,000 T-72 tanks. Abrams tanks had significant advantages due to a modern sighting system, better crew training and the use of uranium ammunition. On February 26, in a battle with the Iraqi Tauvahalna division, Abrams tanks destroyed 24 T-72s, losing only 4 of their own. In the Iraq war, Abrams tanks were also actively used, but the style of their use was significantly different from the previous conflict. During the first month of fighting, 151 tanks were damaged and 2 were destroyed. By February 2005, 70% of the Abrams tanks in Iraq were damaged, of which 80 were beyond repair. In 2011, a tank company (14 vehicles) of the 1st Tank Battalion of the US Marines was deployed to Afghanistan. Tanks were used to detect the enemy, but their use was episodic due to the terrain. During the war against the terrorists of the Islamic State, 140 M1A1 tanks were given to the Iraqi army, but by the end of 2014 only 40 remained in service. And in June 2018, the Iraqis began to replace them with Russian T-90s. Ukrainian tankers especially note a number of advantages of Abrams: these are high-quality thermal imaging sights, accuracy of fire, maneuverability and reliable stabilization of the gun. Despite the considerable weight of more than 60 tons, this tank demonstrates excellent maneuverability on the battlefield. Thanks to its capabilities, Abrams effectively destroys enemy equipment and infantry, constantly adapting to the new conditions of modern warfare. In the story on the Army TV channel, the Abrams crew of the 47th Mechanized of the brigade recalls a case when they had to finish off an enemy T-62 after it was disabled by an FPV drone. This is a clear example of synergy between different types of weapons on the battlefield. Tankers note the lack of additional armor in some critical areas among the shortcomings of the tank. However, these nuances do not reduce its combat capabilities, which is demonstrated in successful operations. Lilia Borschenko for ArmiyaInform

Title: -Four friends came to our unit, still serve together-: new recruiting opportunities and experience o...
Description: Currently, this system is being worked out in many brigades, so the mechanisms of interaction between military units and TCC and SP are being honed. ArmyInform correspondents asked servicemen of the recruiting group whether the mobilization process has become easier and what opportunities volunteers have 46 separate airmobile brigade of the Airborne Assault Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. For volunteers who decided to mobilize directly through a specific military unit, there are currently two options: — come on the PPD, write a statement about the desire to serve in a specific brigade. After that, a referral to the VLK is issued to determine fitness for service. In the case of a positive conclusion, psychological tests follow, and then the processing of documents begins. For this, it is necessary to request a personal file from the TCC, but the procedure for issuing it is not yet fully worked out, the 46th brigade explains. — if a person cannot come to the PPD, he communicates with the recruiters of the brigade, who provide a sample application. The volunteer signs it, sends a scan and the original by mail. After that, a referral is made, which is transferred to the TCC for the place where the person wants to undergo the VLK. The person must pass it within the specified time. -According to the TCC procedure, the team must be informed that the volunteer has completed the VLC and send a conclusion. We already have the first person who went through this scheme, but we did not wait for the conclusion, he called and informed himself,- — says the head of the freelance recruiting group, Lieutenant Oleksandra Unknown. The TCC must also provide a list of names, according to which the mobilized person will come to the brigade, and a military ID (if he is a soldier or a sergeant). — The brigade does not issue military tickets, and without them we have no right to send a person to the BZVP. And according to the new law, after arrival and registration within three days, we must send him to study. And if a person does not have a military ticket, he will not be accepted there. And the TCC says that we do not know such a procedure. While this is a problem, — explains Oleksandra Nevydima. At the same time, a military unit can itself turn to the nearest TCC with a request to issue a military card for a specific person , who expressed a desire to serve. — This system is interesting and can help increase mobilization. It is only necessary to work out the algorithm of cooperation with the TCC. Then it will make our work easier, and people will not be afraid that even with the attitude they may not get into the chosen brigade and unit, - adds the recruiting group of the 46th brigade of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. In the 46th brigade of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, they emphasize that currently the majority of new arrivals are those people who come through the recruiting system. Young people choose the specialties of UAV operators, scouts, anti-aircraft gunners or communications 8217; porters. People aged 35-45 already choose more according to their civilian specialty and experience, for example, drivers of heavy equipment, repairmen. — We had a company of four friends from Dobropill , who came together and still serve together. For us, this is only a plus. This is already a well-formed team that understands each other in half a word. They came to the TCC with our relations, we talked to the TCC and said that these four guys should get to us, — recalls Oleksandr Nevidim. She emphasizes that recruiters never promise candidates a position if it doesn't exist. Moreover, there are always back-up options, if the position is filled while the person undergoes the BZVP, this sometimes happens. They also offer an alternative if there are no positions that the candidate is interested in. — We do not hide that the brigade is conducting combat operations in the Kurakhiv direction, this is already known to everyone. A person who knows what he is going for is more motivated. When recruiting began, all units said that people come more motivated, learn better and ultimately serve better, — explain the recruiters. In 46 brigades of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine are convinced that one of the effective ways to attract volunteers is to inform about the combat path of the military unit. It is for this purpose that a documentary series is currently being filmed about all the key events in which the brigade participated. Five series have already been released, work on the sixth is underway. — A year ago, on the Day of Airborne Assault Troops, the idea arose to shoot a documentary series. The first series was devoted to the Makarov operation, where three battalion tactical groups of the 95th brigade were involved. From there, the birth of the 46th brigade began — on April 5, 2022, it was these 3 BTGr that formed the basis of the brigade, — says the head of the communications department of the 46th OAeMBr, Lieutenant Oleksandr Nevidimy. The series also tells about the coordination of the brigade, the long operation in the Kherson region and its liberation, and then about the battles in the East — in Bakhmut and Soledar. Work is currently underway on a new episode about the brigade's participation in the Zaporozhye counteroffensive in 2023. — Our fourth battalion broke through defense of the enemy at Robotyn, and the then battalion commander Oleg Dmytrouk was awarded the title of Hero of Ukraine for this operation. We tell you how it really was at the level of our brigade. And so that the enemy does not tell it in his own way and does not distort it, - explains Oleksandr Nevymidy. A well-known Ukrainian producer helps the paratroopers of the 46th brigade of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine to create the series Ihor Kondratyuk. — No one from the military offered me this. I liked the idea. This is a young brigade, and if we do not write its history, then the Russians can write it. It helps awareness one hundred percent. People who are currently considering whether to join the military can see real servicemen, sergeants, officers, commands, how the brigade structure works. Such awareness must be there. Reports from the brigades — are important stories for mobilization. To choose a brigade, you need to know it at least a little from the inside, — he notes. Recently, the 46th Brigade of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine organized a two-day intensive for civilians. It is also part of the unit's recruiting campaign. Participants received all the necessary equipment. Among them were volunteers, wives of the dead and missing, as well as ordinary civilians who understand that war affects everyone. More you can read about this intensive in the ArmiyaInform report. We also remind you of the opportunity to use aggregator of vacancies in ZSU on our website. Photo by Natalia Kravchuk/ArmyInform

Title: The Colombian podcast turned out to be in Spanish: the Russians are dispersing another fake about vo...
Description: As established by investigators from Vox Ukraine, it is a podcast of Spanish, not Colombian journalist Juan Luis Sanchez. In addition, the Russians faked the recording, because the Spanish media elDiario.es, where this journalist works, did not publish it. A separate search for keywords from the heading -Military conflicts around the world - Ukraine, Israel, Korea- (-Conflictos militares en todo el mundo Ukraina, Israel, Corea-) also did not yield results. According to Article 47 of the Additional Protocol 1 to the Geneva Convention, foreign citizens who officially fight in the armed forces of one or another party conflict, are not mercenaries. Therefore, all foreigners who serve in the ranks of the Defense Forces sign a contract, are considered combatants and have the full status of military personnel, not -mercenaries-. Similar fakes, as we have repeatedly emphasized, are aimed at cultivating a negative image of our country in the world and discrediting the military units of the Armed Forces in which they serve volunteers are citizens of other countries.

Title: The occupation authorities carry out the systematic militarization of Ukrainian children at the TOT
Description: Russia popularizes militarization as -military applied sports- and the way to a -healthy and safe lifestyle.- It turns Ukrainian children into objects of propaganda. Conducting such -schools- violates children's right to a peaceful childhood and prepares them to participate in the war against Ukraine. I would like to emphasize that the involvement of children in hostilities is contrary to the Geneva Convention for the Protection of the Civilian Population in Time of War and Additional Protocol I, which expressly prohibit the use of children in war. In addition, the Rome Statute of the International Criminal Court defines the recruitment and use of children in an international armed conflict as a war crime. However, the Russian occupation authorities disregard these norms, using children in the interests of their regime since the beginning of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation in 2014. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that on TOT a new batch of construction workers arrived from Belarus.

Title: The occupiers announced the construction of a new plant in Mariupol
Description: Mariupol City Council informs about this. Here's the truth, the invaders have also been promising to restore the work of the existing steel mills for almost three years. According to the occupier, some -small industries- will also be restored. It is not clear what exactly it is about. The invaders destroyed the city's two largest metallurgical enterprises in the spring of 2022 - the Azovstal plant and the Ilyich plant. They promised to restore them, but instead they only loot. Metal and equipment are exported, which are then sold for hundreds of millions of dollars. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that on TOT a new batch of construction workers arrived from Belarus.

Title: The European Commission presented a report on Europe's readiness to respond to crises
Description: About this informs the Foreign Intelligence Service of Ukraine. The document, along with the economic report of M. Draghi (Prime Minister of Italy in 2021-2022) on European competitiveness is part of the strategy of U. von der Leyen to strengthen the strategic capabilities of the EU and the role of the European Commission. The report emphasizes that the world is facing a new reality and focuses on Russian aggression against Ukraine, the pandemic and climate change. This requires changes in policy approaches and security measures from the EU countries. S. Niynisto states that today the EU's ability to respond to threats is slowed down by -institutional, legal and political limitations that make it difficult to quickly unite the relevant actors to manage the crisis.- The main proposals: creating the EU's own common defense treaty to provide assistance to one of the member states in the event of external aggression. The document should supplement NATO's collective security mechanism; endowment of the EC with broad functions in the field of defense and reorientation of 20% of the EU budget to security needs; creating within the EC a central hub for coordination between different sectors and increasing situational awareness; expansion of the powers of the Intelligence and Situation Center (EU INTCEN), including the collection of intelligence with the help of EU diplomatic missions and the conduct of counterintelligence operations; increasing military support to Ukraine to offset US aid in the event of a reduction. It was emphasized that the European Peace Fund, as a quick extra-budgetary instrument, should be provided with sufficient resources. At the same time, the document emphasizes the need to promote the integration of the Ukrainian defense industry into the defense industry of the European Union. Earlier ArmyInform reported that a citizen of the Russian Federation will be tried in Finland for war crimes committed in Ukraine.

Title: Economic problems in the Russian Federation are intensifying
Description: About this informs Service of foreign intelligence of Ukraine. In particular, it is about: Record acceleration of inflation. Consumer prices from October 22 to 28 increased by 0.27% (last week - 0.2%), and in annual terms the indicator increased to 8.61%. The last weekly price increase close to 0.3% was recorded at the beginning of July, and this was explained by the indexation of housing and communal services tariffs. Deficit of agricultural goods. On October 27, the Russian Federation began importing butter from Turkey. 20 tons of it have already been imported in two days. Exhaustion of budget funds for social programs. On October 30, the largest Russian banks (-Sberbank- and -VTB-) stopped issuing family mortgages due to the exhaustion of the limits allocated by the government for this program. At the same time, -Sberbank- increased interest rates on family mortgages above the established limit: in Moscow and St. Petersburg, the average rate will be 9.4%, and in other regions - 10%. According to estimates, the Russian authorities will continue to increase the tax burden on citizens and businesses in order to fill the budget and compensate for the costs of the war against Ukraine and expenses for national projects by withdrawing working capital from the population. Earlier, ArmyInform reported , that Russian criminality entered the TOT markets of the south with the help of the FSB.

Title: Soldiers of the Royal Brigade showed -quick- repair of BMP in field conditions before combat departu...
Description: The corresponding video was published by the brigade's official page.

Title: A new batch of construction workers from Belarus arrived at TOT
Description: informs about this Center of national resistance. So, construction workers from Belarus arrived in Mariupol. In a conversation with the locals, they say that they are being taken away forcibly, because otherwise they threaten to fire them and close the doors to all construction companies in the country. Of course, their importation to TOT takes place with the knowledge of the Belarusian fake government. Thus we have another case of trafficking in his own people by a mad dictator. trade their population. Builders are brought in in shifts for three months. Earlier, ArmiyaInform reported that Russian criminality entered the TOT markets of the south with the help of the FSB.

Title: The pseudo-warrior -Dzhankoy- talked about the advantages of serving in the anti-tank missile unit
Description: The story of the fighter was made public by the operational command -East-.

Title: Arta and drones: the occupiers fought all day in Nikopol region
Description: About this informs the head of Dnipropetrovsk OVA Serhii Lysak. A 78-year-old woman was injured. She received a shrapnel wound to the chest. Hospitalized in a moderate condition. Infrastructure, administrative and two non-operational buildings were damaged. And also a private house. Caught a power line. Previously, ArmyInform announced that in Kharkiv emergency and rescue work and demolition of debris in the 9-story building, which the enemy targeted with a KAB, were completed.

Title: President: The North Korean military will be pushed forward, and we will defend ours
Description: He reported this on his channel. -- -We are already talking about the contingent that will fight against us. Today we know that 3,000 North Korean soldiers are already in a training camp. We know that the number will soon be increased to 12 thousand soldiers and officers. We also know that there are negotiations on the supply of engineering troops, as well as civilians - a large number of civilians from North Korea so that they work at certain military plants of the Russian Federation. Putin is checking the reaction of the West, checking the reaction of NATO countries, the reaction of South Korea. And I believe that after all these reactions, Putin will decide and increase the contingent,- the Head of State said. -I think it is also very beneficial for the leader of North Korea. I will say frankly: the North Korean military has no combat experience in modern warfare. And therefore, the North Korean military will get practice in this war, understanding what a land war is. He will understand what the combat use of artillery is. Drones, FPV, rockets, etc. will be used, respectively. I think the North Korean leader, like Putin, does not care about people's lives. But this practice is very important for his army,- said the President. Attitude towards prisoners Ukraine treats prisoners of any nationality as prisoners of war. It is very important for us to preserve their lives, it is important to respect international law and not to torture prisoners. -I specially emphasize this, because compared to the Russian army, which tortured our boys, we do not do this. The most important thing for us is to increase the exchange fund. Therefore, first of all, we will be ready to exchange North Korean soldiers for Ukrainians,- Volodymyr Zelenskyy stressed. Previously ArmyInform reported that Oleksandr Syrsky called for an international reaction to the participation of the North Korean military in the war on sides of Russia

Title: Swedish armored personnel carrier PBV 302 in Ukraine: Defense forces made the first inspection of th...
Description: The relevant video was made public by the Ground Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Military personnel who are currently undergoing training already have combat experience on Soviet BMPs and say that the Swedish machine is much more powerful and comfortable. Previously ArmyInform reported that foreign investors have invested $25 million in the development of Ukrainian defense technologies through Brave1.

Title: Russian criminality entered the TOT markets of the south with the help of the FSB
Description: About this informs Center of National Resistance. We are talking about natives from the Caucasus, who are brought to TOT and put under the control of entire industries. For this, they -share income- with FSB employees. It also helps the Russian Gestapo to get information about the locals and is engaged in the persecution of disloyal -with foreign hands-. Currently, it is the Russian criminality that distributes trading points in the markets and recorded cases when people were thrown out of their points because of their refusal to cooperate with the occupiers. instead, the right to trade is transferred to loyal collaborators. We remind ArmyInform reported , that another Kremlin henchman was detained in Kharkiv.

Title: A citizen of the Russian Federation will be tried in Finland for war crimes committed in Ukraine
Description: This is informs the Office of the Prosecutor General of Ukraine. The charges are related to the activities of the suspect in the -Rusych- unit, who fought on the side of the so-called -LNR-. According to the Finnish investigation, the suspect, as the deputy commander of the unit, participated in actions that violate the laws and customs of war. As a result of these actions, he and the soldiers of the unit killed 22 Ukrainian servicemen and seriously wounded four. In addition, he is accused of actions contrary to the laws and customs of war regarding the manner of conducting hostilities and the treatment of wounded and killed enemy soldiers. The charges are treated in Finland as international crimes under Finnish law. The suspect cannot be extradited to Ukraine, so Finland has launched its own investigation. The charges in the trial are brought by two prosecutors who specialize in war and international crimes. In 2016, Ukrainian law enforcement officers reported suspicion of the said person for participating in a terrorist organization (Part 1 of Article 258-3 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). In August 2023, the Prosecutor General's Office sent a request for the detention and temporary arrest of this person. After communication with the Finnish side, the suspect was detained by the competent authorities of this country. In September 2023, the Prosecutor General's Office sent a request for his extradition. In December 2023, the competent authorities of Finland began their own investigation into the crimes of this person committed during the hostilities in Ukraine. During the investigation, the Finnish National Bureau of Investigation (NBI) cooperated with the Ukrainian Office of the Prosecutor General and the Security Service of Ukraine. At the request of the Finnish side, the Office of the Prosecutor General provided the materials collected as part of the Ukrainian investigation and assisted in the collection of evidence. In addition, the NBR exchanged information with Europol, Eurojust and the International Criminal Court. Earlier, ArmyInform reported, who conquered space for the Russians: another Kremlin henchman was detained in Kharkiv.

Title: -One by one, three Russian -dryers- were destroyed, the interval between the downings was about two ...
Description: The story of the legendary anti-aircraft gunner - in social networks of the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. At dawn on February 24, 2022, around five in the morning, the enemy attacked their -regular post- with missiles of various types, the officer recalls. And in some time they were already -hunting- for their first target from a reserve position, with a clear understanding that there would be no turning back. -In half an hour, they celebrated the downing of the Russian Ka-52 helicopter with synchronized -Yeeeeee!- and applause. It was almost the first combat use of the S-300 PS complex,- the anti-aircraft gunner shares his memories. Maxim's calculation met the war in Donetsk region - in the Druzhkivka area. But soon the anti-aircraft guns overran the entire eastern front line — from Kupyansk to Mariupol. -For some reason, most people are convinced that the work at the anti-aircraft complex is static! Where is there… Almost after each combat launch, we changed the place of deployment. On March 22, we destroyed three Russian -dryers- one by one. The interval between the downed targets was about 2 hours,- recalls Maksym. In April 2022, his unit struck the Il-22PP. The cabin was depressurized, the -board- landed at the airport in Rostov, Russia. -We carried out the first launch on the dry land, then fired two rockets directly at the IL-22. It was learned from the radio interception that the Il-22 made an emergency landing with significant damage. Fortunately, the Su-35 was not able to fly anywhere after our work,- says the anti-aircraft gunner, who now, after his injuries, teaches at the Kharkiv National University of the Air Force. Earlier ArmyInform told about the mobilization, training and war of the commander of the UAV branch in the 128th OGSHBr.

Title: The Ministry of Defense launches a personal account for suppliers of the Armed Forces
Description: This is reported by Rustem Umyerov.

Title: They wanted to build a crossing, but our drone struck a Russian bridge-builder earlier
Description: Video of combat work they publishedon their channel. -The same MTU-72 is an armored bridge-builder that was supposed to pave the way for overturning enemy equipment. Fighters of the Third Assault Division shot down a heavy machine gun with drones,- the fighters said. With the next sorties, they hit another truck, a -loaf- and withdrew from the BC to the Russians. They also shot down a motorcyclist and hit the enemy UAV twice. -All targets were destroyed by the fighters of the Punk group from the 2nd mechbat of the brigade!- - added the defenders. As reported by ArmyInform, soldiers of the Third Separate Assault Brigade in Kharkiv Oblast with FPV drones -ale-rosiyan-chekav-syurpryz/->eliminated a group of enemy infantry that tried to sneak up to Ukrainian positions through the swamp.

Title: The US ambassador reacted to the airstrike in Kharkiv: -this night, Russia killed a small child-
Description: She reported this on her page on the X network. In particular, the US ambassador emphasized , that a child was a victim of Russian aggression. -Russia continues its brutal attacks on Ukraine, killing a young child and injuring 35 people in Kharkiv tonight, as well as damaging civilian infrastructure in other parts of the country,- Brigitte Brink stressed in her post. As reported by ArmyInform, at night Russian troops struck a nine-story residential building in Kharkiv with a guided aerial bomb, which caused significant destruction and numerous victims. As of 1:30 p.m., it is known that as a result of the Russian airstrike carried out by the occupiers on the night of October 30, died two more people: a man and a 15-year-old boy. Their bodies were retrieved from the rubble.

Title: Foreign investors invested $25 million in the development of Ukrainian defense technologies through ...
Description: This was reported by the Deputy Prime Minister for Innovation, Development of Education, Science and Technology. Minister of Digital Transformation of Ukraine Mykhailo Fedorov. One of the key tools for attracting investments is regular events, such as invest demo days, where matchmaking takes place between companies and investors. For example, Swarmer, which develops artificial intelligence for drone swarms, attracted $2.7 million in foreign investment during one such event. Brave1 also updates the catalog of partner companies every month, providing investors with depersonalized information about 130+ startups and explaining the structure of the Ukrainian defense innovation system. The platform aims to attract $50 million in investment by the end of the year, which will allow companies to scale and develop their products faster. As reported by ArmyInform, at the Brave1 training ground, tests of the three most anticipated technologies, aimed at increasing the efficiency of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, took place.

Title: Conquered space for the sake of Russians: another Kremlin henchman was detained in Kharkiv
Description: informs the Security Service of Ukraine about this. These satellites are used to detect the positions of the Ukrainian military, adjust enemy fire and conduct reconnaissance. The attacker, who holds the post of general director of a Russian company, entered into contracts with the Roscosmos corporation and provided his company's testing ground at the disposal of the Russian military and space forces. He signed all documents remotely via e-mail, and gave instructions to Russian subordinates in messenger chats. The investigation established that the suspect lived in Russia for a long time and participated in the Kremlin's resettlement program to the aggressor country. His subversive activities were documented, and he was detained at his residence in Kharkiv. During the searches, the law enforcement officers seized a Russian passport, computers and phones with evidence, as well as more than 10 million hryvnias, probably received for cooperation with the occupiers. The man is suspected under Article 111-2 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (assistance to the aggressor state). He is currently in custody and may receive up to 12 years in prison with confiscation of property. The investigation continues, law enforcement officers are working to identify other persons involved in assisting the aggressor. Previously, ArmyInform reported about pseudo-linerka in the service of the enemy: a woman from Kharkiv collected data for Russia.

Title: The situation at the front is worsening: 79 clashes per day, the occupiers do not stop their assault...
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. Sumy and Chernihiv regions continue to suffer from artillery shelling from the territory of the Russian Federation. Thus, areas of border settlements came under the influence of enemy fire. Among them are Pokrovka, Bachivsk, Shalygine, Novenke, Leonivka, Basivka, Pavlivka and Korenyok. It is also currently known about seven air strikes on the Kursk region, during which the enemy dropped 13 air bombs. In the Kharkiv direction, an enemy attack in the Vovchansk region is currently underway. Two enemy attacks have already been repulsed near Vovchansk. In the Kupyansk direction the enemy began storming the positions of our units near Petropavlivka, Kolisnikivka, Zagryzovy, Lozova, Berestovoy and Vyshnevoy seven times. Six clashes are ongoing. In the Lyman direction, during the day, the invading army carried out 12 attacks on Ukrainian positions in the direction of Katerynivka, Stepovoy, Grekivka, Terni and in the Serebryansky forest. Eight clashes have ended, four are ongoing. The occupiers were beaten by NARs in the Serebrian Forest. In the Toretsk direction, the enemy twice tried to improve his position. Ukrainian soldiers gave a worthy rebuff. The occupier dropped four aerial bombs in the Katerynivka district. Since the beginning of the day, the occupiers have already made ten attempts to dislodge our defenders from their positions in the Pokrovsky direction. Fighting continues near Promen, Lysivka and Vishnevo. Myrolyubivka and Myrnograd were hit by the KAB. 22 enemy attacks were recorded in the districts of Novoselidivka, Kreminnaya Balka, Novodmytrivka, Ostrivskyi, Maksimilianivka, Antonivka and Elizavetivka in the Kurakhivka direction. In the Antonivka district, the occupiers are making the main efforts - they have conducted ten assaults, three of which are ongoing. In the Vremivsk direction, two skirmishes continue near Bogoyavlenka and Trudovoy. Two attacks today have already been repelled by Ukrainian defenders. In the direction of Orihiv, the occupiers attacked twice in the direction of Novodanilivka. The enemy dropped eight guided aerial bombs on Yurkivka, Tavriysky and in the area of ​​Malaya Tokmachka. In the Dnieper direction two enemy assaults were successfully repelled. There are no major changes in the rest of the directions. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukrainian troops hold Toretsk - the enemy has not yet advanced beyond the eastern outskirts of the city, the number of assaults is decreasing.

Title: The Ukrainian armored personnel carrier -Bucephal- destroys the Russians, a double blow to the enemy...
Description: The invaders tried several times to hit our Bradley with the help of an FPV drone and ATGM, the drone stuck and did not explode, and the projectile did not cause any damage to our BMP. In the Pokrovsky direction, fighters of the 15th Brigade of the National Guard -Kara-Dag- dismantle the fortified area of ​​the Russians. Ukrainian BTR-4E -Bucephal- destroys houses with occupants who tried to gather for further assaults. At night, in the Lyman direction, the Russians decided to ride to our positions on a motorcycle. However, their two-wheeler broke down and while they were trying to fix it, they were spotted by drone pilots of the 63rd OMBr. At one point in the dark autumn night, the bodies of the dead occupants began to be illuminated, they burned until the very morning. These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - junior lieutenant Serhiy Lipko and lieutenant colonel Serhii Misyura.

Title: Direct mobilization: the military can select units for service without the involvement of the TCC
Description: About this during the briefing reported the head of the mobilization and defense work sector of the Zaporizhzhia regional TCC and SP Lt. Col. Andriy Yakunin. According to the new order, candidates for mobilization can now apply directly to military units, where they will be tested and interviewed. Medical examination and final recruitment are carried out through the territorial center, but unit commanders play the main role in selection. This approach allows conscripts to get into the chosen unit after completing basic military training. Lieutenant Colonel Andriy Yakunin noted that in the Zaporizhzhia region mobilization measures continue every month, despite the fact that part of the region remains temporarily occupied. Residents of the region are actively joining the Armed Forces of Ukraine, realizing the danger of war. The mobilization of special vehicles is also ongoing, but there are no plans to seize ordinary cars of citizens. -No one but us will protect our country. We must defend our freedom and independence,- concluded Andriy Yakunin. As reported by ArmyInform, an agitation campaign is underway in Lviv region, aimed at attracting high school students to enter higher military educational institutions (VVNOZ).

Title: A new military support system: a focus on individual and gender needs
Description: The relevant Procedure developed by the Ministry of Defense approved by the Cabinet of Ministers of Ukraine. The procedure provides for the provision of uniforms and equipment taking into account the anthropometric data of servicemen, the provision of personal hygiene equipment and the improvement of annual medical examinations. If necessary, medical assistance will be provided in state or communal institutions. The document also defines the procedure for providing psychological support to servicemen who were exposed to stress factors in combat conditions or suffered from sexual harassment. Such assistance will be provided in a secure and confidential manner. Separately, the issue of psychological support for family members of servicemen, in particular those whose relatives are in captivity, have disappeared or are currently in the environment, has been regulated. Such help will be provided by specialists at the territorial centers of recruitment and social support. The new procedure also provides for the application of a gender-oriented approach during the development of budget programs of the Security and Defense Forces. As reported by ArmyInform, Ministry of Defense implements NATO standards regarding of gender equality in the Armed Forces.

Title: - The main thing in reconnaissance is to keep a cool head and be confident in your comrades- - parat...
Description: reports this on the official page of the brigade. -We are the first to go! We enter ground zero, where we do not know what is happening there and who is there. Our job is to find out the front line of the enemy, what their means are, what they do and how they work. And continue to oppose the enemy by all available means,- says the scout. Anton comes from Dnipropetrovsk region. Before the large-scale invasion, he worked as a miner. The fighter decided to mobilize in order to protect the country and his relatives. I am convinced that service in the Armed Forces is the best contribution to victory over the enemy. -To protect my mother, to protect my relatives and everyone I care about. Who, if not us? It is necessary to restrain the enemy. Intelligence found me by itself. Representatives of the brigade arrived and made a selection. I went for an interview, talked and that's how I got here, right after BZVP. And still in the ranks of these powerful men,- says Anton. The fighter is currently working in Kurshchyna. For reconnaissance, this is one of the most dangerous directions. The enemy is motivated, the terrain is unfamiliar, because of this it is not always possible to work quietly. -In Kurshchyna, they entered the deep rear of the enemy. There was a case: we approached the village, gave the coordinates and waited for instructions. The voices of our two opponents were heard. It so happened that we were ambushed on the way. They did not agree to lay down their arms, so they transformed into another life. Next, we found the house where the -Akhmatovs- were. We had a fight there, not everything went according to plan, they ran away. We got a good foothold there, took control of the positions and led our boys. They did a good job,- adds the defender. Anton recently received the medal -For Military Service to Ukraine- from the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, General Oleksandr Syrskyi, for numerous successful combat missions and exemplary service. -For me, this award is proof that we are going in the right direction. We protect the Motherland! But I am not here for awards, I did not set myself such a goal. The main thing is to restrain the enemy and protect Ukraine!- Earlier, ArmyInform reported that the -Kings of Swamps- sneaked across the river to our position, but the Russians were waiting for a -surprise-.

Title: Budget 2025: record spending on security and defense
Description: told Prime Minister of Ukraine Denys Shmyhal. All tax revenues from citizens and businesses will be directed to strengthening Ukraine's military capabilities. More than UAH 2.2 trillion is earmarked for defense needs, which is about 26% of GDP and UAH 46 billion more than in 2024. The total expenditures of the budget for 2025 are planned in the amount of more than 3.6 trillion UAH, which is 535 billion UAH higher than current expenditures. Revenues of the general fund of the budget will also increase and will amount to UAH 2.7 trillion, which is UAH 411 billion more than last year. The state leadership thanked the people's deputies for their support of the draft budget and hoped for its quick approval as a whole.

Title: -Indifferent to their soldiers and equipment-: the occupiers' aviation demonstrates -friendly fire-
Description: This was told by the spokeswoman of Luhansk OTU on the broadcast of the -Edyny Novyni- telethon - Major Anastasia Bobovnikova. According to Anastasia Bobovnikova, in urban battles in Toretsk, the infantry is active, preventing the enemy from advancing. Despite the smaller number of enemy assaults, the number of shelling does not decrease. The enemy uses both artillery and aviation. Moreover, airstrikes are not distinguished by their accuracy - the Russians often strike in their own way. -It has been known for a long time that the leadership of the Russian army does not care about its soldiers, does not care about equipment - they don't care. And that's why they can freely use aviation, Toretsk is flown by every day,- said the spokeswoman of Luhansk OTU. Previously ArmyInform reported that the enemies are trying to storm in the Toretsk and Kramatorsk directions, but despite the attack, they are not succeeding.

Title: The bodies of two more victims, including a 15-year-old boy, were recovered from the rubble in Khark...
Description: Kharkiv Mayor Ihor Terekhov informs about this. -The body of a young man, 25-30 years old, was just found from under the rubble of the house. In total, 36 are injured at the moment. The attack on the residential building was carried out last night with the help of the FAB-500 from the UMPK,- the message reads. Later, they identified the place where the body of another child killed by Russian bombs is located, it was taken out from under the rubble. As reported by ArmyInform, at night Russian troops struck a nine-story residential building in Kharkiv with a guided aerial bomb, which caused significant destruction and numerous victims.

Title: The car of a serviceman of the Armed Forces was set on fire - two Kharkiv residents will appear in c...
Description: The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office informs about this. According to the investigation, at the end of July of this year, 30-year-old and 47-year-old Kharkiv residents, wanting to make extra money, established contact with the -employer- - according to preliminary information, an employee of the Russian special service - through the Telegram messenger. The curator gave the men the task of setting fire to the car of a soldier of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. On August 1 of this year, around 2 a.m., while on Byron Avenue in Kharkiv, the perpetrators saw a camouflage-colored Jeep Grand Cherokee. Using a highly flammable mixture prepared in advance, the defendants set fire to the vehicle, as a result of which the car burned. After committing the crime, the men fled from the scene. However, the law enforcement officers promptly identified the perpetrators and detained them in accordance with Art. 208 of the CPC of Ukraine. It is established that the -employer- promised to pay 1,000 US dollars for the successful completion of the task, but the men never received the money. At the request of the prosecution, preventive measures in the form of detention were chosen for the arsonists. They will be tried in the Comintern District Court of Kharkiv. The accused face up to ten years in prison. Previously, ArmyInform reported about the pseudo-linerka in the service of the enemy: a woman from Kharkiv collected data for Russia.

Title: The occupiers destroyed the oldest school in Mariupol, built in the 19th century
Description: Mariupol City Council informs about this. During the Second World War, the building was used as a hospital. After 80 years, in 2022, wounded people died here again from military shelling. A shelter was set up at the school. But this did not stop the Russians from destroying the historic building. Now the invaders are erecting a new building in an attempt to destroy the evidence of their crimes. And together with them, they destroy the history of Mariupol. Earlier ArmyInform reported , that the occupiers control mobile communications and the Internet to identify pro-Ukrainian residents.

Title: Combat training of soldiers does not stop even on the line of fire, Sergeant Oleksandr
Description: The story of the fighter was made public by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. -It's normal for an adequate man to want to defend his Motherland!- - this is how Oleksandr under the pseudonym -Pylip- answers the question about his voluntary desire to serve in the army.

Title: A pseudo-clinician in the service of the enemy: a woman from Kharkiv collected data for Russia
Description: informs the Security Service of Ukraine about this. According to the SBU, a local resident, being in direct contact with an employee of the Russian special service, collected information about the coordinates of Ukrainian units in the Kharkiv direction. To gather intelligence, the agent tried to establish contact with the Ukrainian military, offering help in household matters, in particular, cleaning services for a nominal fee. Under the guise of -friendly- conversations, she learned about their location and transferred the collected data to the Russian curator in the form of screenshots with marks on Google maps. SBU counter-intelligence agents exposed the agent in advance and arrested her red-handed when she was near a military object for reconnaissance. During the detention, a mobile phone was seized from her, which she used to communicate with the Russian special service. The woman is suspected under Part 2 of Art. 111 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (treason committed under martial law). She is currently in custody and could face life in prison with forfeiture of property. As reported by ArmyInform, in Bukovyna, intruders spied on military echelons and prevented mobilization.

Title: The occupiers monitor mobile communications and the Internet to identify pro-Ukrainian residents
Description: Andrii Chernyak, representative of the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, reported this. According to him, after seizing Ukrainian telecommunications equipment, the Russian occupiers reprogrammed it for their own purposes. This gives them the opportunity to monitor citizens, record their attempts to access prohibited Internet resources or use messengers. -The occupiers create fake information resources and accounts similar to Ukrainian ones in order to attract Ukrainian citizens and then detain them,- noted Andriy Chernyak. He also called on the residents of the occupied territories to be vigilant and seek contacts and safety instructions on the official resources of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, if they intend to help Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Kremlin decided to form assault units from convicted patients with hepatitis -B- and -C- and send them to war against Ukraine.

Title: Death on his shoulder: he ran, shot, fell, got up, shot again, but still could not save himself
Description: A video of combat work appearedon the unit's page. The video shows one of the occupants trying to escape from the Ukrainian drone, then he opens fire with a small-arms weapon. The run of the Russian invader ends with a fall. As soon as he gets to his feet, he is met by a drone. A number of other occupiers died while traveling in vehicles. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 24th mechanized brigade named after King Danilo zseredyny/->made a small movie about the combat work of their BMP-1, performing tasks in Donetsk region. Also, fighters of the battalion of unmanned aerial systems -Rarog- of the 24th mechanized brigade named after King Danylo vid-nashyh-droniv/->recorded unsuccessful attempts of Russian attack aircraft to deceive Ukrainian FPV drones.

Title: Kamikaze drones hit the Kherson region: local residents were injured
Description: This is reported by Khersonska ODA. Around 7:00 a.m., the occupiers attacked Antonivka with the help of drones. As a result of dropping explosives, a 77-year-old woman was injured, who received a blast injury. Three people went to the hospital after yesterday's shelling of Blagovishchenskyi in the Kherson district. A 51-year-old woman and two men, 56 and 20, were injured, all with blast injuries. In the morning, there was also a drone attack on the Ship district of Kherson, as a result of which a 33-year-old man received an explosive injury. At 11:20, the occupiers struck Beryslav. The victim, a 42-year-old woman who was near the store, suffered a blast injury, contusion and shrapnel injuries. Also, medical assistance was provided to a 63-year-old man who was injured yesterday in Stanislav during an enemy attack from a UAV. He was diagnosed with blast injury and concussion. As reported by ArmyInform, victims and destruction in Kherson region: Russians targeted the library and private houses.

Title: -Sanalization- Russians in Chasovoy Yar: the enemy dies en masse trying to cross the canal
Description: A representative of the press service of 24 separate mechanized Andriy Polukhin of the King Danylo brigade. According to Andriy Polukhin, the enemy is storming in small infantry groups. Attempts are being made to bring personnel into the destroyed temporarily occupied Kanal neighborhood and cross the canal directly. However, at the moment, the enemy cannot do this. -Sometimes such a group can go beyond the canal, into one of the destroyed buildings near it, but it turns out to be blocked. Then it reveals itself in these ruins, and our guys work on that point,- said the representative of the press service of the 24th separate mechanized brigade named after King Danylo. Earlier ArmyInform reported about how soldiers of the self-propelled artillery division 24 of the separate mechanized brigade named after King Danylo systematically and accurately destroy the infantry, vehicles, vehicles and fortifications of the occupiers.

Title: Once and for all: a sniper from a distance of one and a half thousand meters destroyed the occupier ...
Description: They published a video of combat work on their channel. -the Russian becomes -good- at a distance of 1437 meters. The snipers of the 68th OEBr are the best!- - commented the Ukrainian defenders. Earlier, ArmyInform showed how pilots of the 68th hunting brigade named after Oleksa Dovbush struck the occupier who crawled towards our positions. Also interesting behavior Russian attack aircraft was captured by fighters of the -Shershni Dovbush- attack drone company of the 68th Yeger Brigade named after Oleksa Dovbush.

Title: In Bukovina, intruders spied on military echelons and prevented mobilization
Description: This is reported by the Security Service of Ukraine. According to the case materials, these men secretly recorded the movement directions of the railway echelons of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and publicly called on conscripts to evade conscription. The operatives of the SBU established that the 41-year-old local resident, in the past a member of the banned Communist Party of Ukraine, came -to the attention- of the FSB back in 2015. After the start of the large-scale invasion, he was finally recruited and instructed to form his own agent network in Bukovina. He spread Kremlin narratives, denied the legitimacy of state power in Ukraine, and tried to create alternative -local self-government bodies.- Also, on the instructions of the curators, the person involved incited local men of draft age to hide from the TCC and spied on the routes of movement of mobile units of the Armed Forces. To carry out a hostile task, the agent recruited a 35-year-old local unemployed man, whom he allegedly could -dissuade- from the draft. The security service gradually documented the criminal actions of both figures and detained them.
